[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum ma bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D686}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA mo g+ha bA sha kalpa rA dzA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas 
[\[1b.2\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[1b.3\]]bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri bo po ta la na/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing sA la dang /_ta ma la dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_mya ngan 'tshang dang /_
[\[1b.4\]]a ti mug ta ka sna tshogs mang pos legs par brgyan pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa ya bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs 
[\[1b.5\]]cig tu bzhugs te/_gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]lha'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas 
[\[2a.2\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_
[\[2a.3\]]bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par blta bar/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/_'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang /_gnas 
[\[2a.4\]]gtsang ma'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du stsal nas/_bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yangs 
[\[2a.5\]]phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs der/_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod 
[\[2a.6\]]pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du yang bkur bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas byeM ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags so/_gang zhig don yod 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa'am/_sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'am/_dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/_mnar med par gzhol ba'am/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan 
[\[2b.2\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par 'gyur zhing /_ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das re shig de nyid kyis zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_bzlas brjod bgyis na/_tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang /_gtugs pa dang /_
[\[2b.3\]]bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/rims nyin gcig pa'am/_rims nyin gnyis pa'am/_nyin gsum pa'am/_nyin bzhi pa'am/_de bzhin du rims nyin bdun pa'am/_mig nad dam/_rna ba'i nad dam/_sna'i nad dam/_so dang mchu'i nad dam/_lce dang rkan gyi nad dam/_snying nad dam/_
[\[2b.4\]]lto nad dam ro rgyab dang rked pa'i nad dam/_yan lag gam nying lag gi nad dam/_gzhang 'brum mam/_pho ba'i nad dam/_tshad pa'am/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa'i nad dam/_sna nad dam/_klad pa'i nad dam/_sha bkra chen po'am/_sha gzig gu'am/_mdze'am/_rkang shu'am/_'brum 
[\[2b.5\]]bu phra mo'am/_lhog pa'am/_mtshan par rdol pa'am/_'brum bu'am/_brjed byed dam/_byad dam/_gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa'am/_'ching ba'am/_rdeg pa'am/_skrod ba'am/_bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa'am/_bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus kyis gdung ba'am/_
[\[2b.6\]]sems kyis gdung ba'am/_rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par gyur na/_sems can dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyis yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi'am/_rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang /_g.yo 
[\[2b.7\]]dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/_'dzin par bgyid/_'chang bar bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_'dri bar bgyid/_'drir 'jug par bgyid/_kun chub par bgyid/_sems can gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing /_tha na dud 'gro'i skye 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna bug tu gtad de/_rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la/_rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/_skur pa ma mchis pa dang /_gzugs ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /_ring du 'gro ba 
[\[3a.2\]]ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /_gos pa ma mchis pa dang /_sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_ma bral ba dang /_phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/_rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyid na/_de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 
[\[3a.3\]]'gyur zhing /_nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro/_/glegs bam du bgyis te khyim na 'chad bar bgyid dam/_rje dpon gyis skrag pas bgyis sam/_bzhad gad tsam gyi rgyus nyan par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[3a.4\]]dbang phyug gi mthus/_de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis tsan dan nam/_ga bur ram gla rtsi zhig la khros sam/_yongs su smad de rdo la btags nas/_bdag nyid la byugs na tsan dan nam/_
[\[3a.5\]]ga bur ram/_gla rtsi de 'di snyam du 'dis bdag la khros sam/_yongs su smad pas dri ma nam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi/_gzhan du na de nyid la dri bda' bar bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang gang su yang rung 
[\[3a.6\]]bas/_bzhad gad tsam gyis zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang sgyus mchod par bgyid na yang de nyid sems can dmu rgod dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so/_/gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_bsod 
[\[3a.7\]]nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/_tshul khrims kyi dri bda' bar bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong pha'am dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen pha'am/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]can su yang rung bas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyis te/_gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig 'thob par 'gyur te/_/
[\[3b.2\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung na yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang /_dbang po 
[\[3b.3\]]sbas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te/_zhugs kyis mi 'tshig chab kyis mi 'tshal rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/_ser bas ma lags 
[\[3b.4\]]so/_/chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba'am/_chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 
[\[3b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gzi brjid dang mdangs 'phrogs par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid la 'thad par 'gyur ro/_/de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de la mi ma lags pa'i 
[\[3b.6\]]'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/_de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/me dang mtshon dang /_dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu 
[\[3b.7\]]rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_skyob pa dang sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/_de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te brgyad gang zhe na/_'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur 
[\[4a.2\]]ro/_/lag pa mi g.yob pa dang rkang pa mi g.yob pa dang bshang gci ma mchis pa dang khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kha bub tu 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[4a.3\]]de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/chang dang sha dang kun dong dang ke'u dang sgog skya dang /_'dres pa dang /_lhag rol dang /_/
[\[4a.4\]]'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang /_mthu ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[4a.5\]]'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/_sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so/_/byang chub 
[\[4a.6\]]ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags/_sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lags te/_chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du kho nas thob pa lags so/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na/_'di ltar bdag gis snying po 'di 
[\[4a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod smros shig_/de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[4b.2\]]gzigs dbang phyug mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la 
[\[4b.3\]]thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol/_dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /_ma 
[\[4b.4\]]byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song ba rnams dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la 
[\[4b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa 
[\[4b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/tsi ri tsi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_si ri si ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_ma hA pad+ma hAsta/_ka la ka la/_
[\[4b.7\]]ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA shud d+ha sa twa/_bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_d+hA ba d+hA ba/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud d+ha sa twa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hAs+thA ma prAp+ta/_tsa la tsa la/_sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/_bi tsa la bi tsa la/_e Ta Ta/_e Ta Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Nika_/ma hA pa shu pa ti be sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ha hA ha hA/_hi hI hi hI/_hu hU hu hU/_oM kA ra bra h+ma/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_
[\[5a.2\]]pa ra pa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta/_sha rI rA ya/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa/_b+ha ga wA na/_sau ma A di t+ya/_ya ma ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_bra h+men+d+ra r-i Shi de ba ga Na/_a b+h+yartsi ta tsa ra Na/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_bu ru bu ru/_sa nad ku mAr/_
[\[5a.3\]]ru dra/_bA sa ba/_biSh+Nu d+ha na dA/_de ba r-i Shi nA ya ka_/ba hu bi bi d+ha/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_tha ra tha ra/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_ya ra ya ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ma ra ma ra/_pa ra pa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra dA ya ka_/sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/_bi lo ki ta/_lo 
[\[5a.4\]]ke shwar ma he shwa ra/_mu hu mu hu/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal sa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_bdag dang /_sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_
[\[5a.5\]]'tshe ba thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad las srungs shig_/srungs shig_/gsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_chom po dang /_rkun po dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_mtshon las yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/_ka Na ka Na/_
[\[5a.6\]]ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_tsa ra tsa ra/_in dri ya/_ba la bo d+h+yA~M ga_/tsa tu rAR+Y+Ya sa t+ya saM bra kA sha ka_/ta pa ta pa/_da ma da ma/_sa ma sa ma/_ma sa ma sa/_ma hA ta mo\u0f85n+d+ha/_kA ra/_ba d+hi ma na Sha/_Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pUr ka_/mi li mi li/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Tu 
[\[5a.7\]]Tu Tu Tu/_e ne ya tsar+m+ma kri ta pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi/_I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/_ma hA b+hU ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka_/ku ru ku ru/_pa ra pa ra/_ka ra ka ra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_bi shud d+ha/_bi Sha ya/_bA si na ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/_rat+na mu ku Ta/_mA lA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nyA shi ra/_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]si kr-i ta mu ku Ta/_mA lA d+ha ra/_ma hAd+b+hU ta/_ka ma lA la~M kr-i ta/_ka ra d+ha rA ya/_d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/_bi mo k+Sha/_a pra ka~M bya/_ba hu sa twa san+ta hi pa ri pA tsa ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka_/sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka_/sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa 
[\[5b.2\]]na ka ra/_na mo stu te swA hA/_bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyis na/_mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur zhing /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams bcad pa la ni/_a ga 
[\[5b.3\]]ru'i bdug pa'am/_thal ba dang /_chab bam/_yungs kar dang /_seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so/_/rims thams cad la ni skud pas so/_/nad thams cad la ni mar ram/_'bru mar ram/_chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o/_/byad dgrol ba la ni 
[\[5b.4\]]mtshon gyis so/_/lto na ba la ni srung ba'i skud pas so/_/dug bsad pa la ni sa 'am chab kyis so/_/mig nad la ni skud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o/_/so na ba la ni shing ka ra bI ra'i so shing gis so/_/mtshams bcad pa ni/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan 
[\[5b.5\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas/_phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyis na/_mtshams chen po bcing bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad srung ba la ni skud pa'am/_chab bam thal bas so/_/gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud 
[\[5b.6\]]pas so/_/rims thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so/_/g.yan pa dang /_khyi rdo dang /_lhog pa dang /_mgrin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang /_pi pi ling sres pas so/_/mig nad la ni dri chu'am/_shing bal sha'i chu'am/_shing mngar gyi chus so/_/rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyis so/_/'thab pa 
[\[5b.7\]]dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod par 'gyed pa dang /_skur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te/_kha bshal bar bgyi'o/_/dpung dang yul dang rgyal srid dang /_yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba la ni bum pa gang ba gzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]chen po bgyis nas/_bklag par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/des yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/_sems can thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_
[\[6a.2\]]glags lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_snying gar byug par bgyi'o/_/mtshams med pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni/_rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so/_/khyim bsrung ba la ni pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis so/_/sems can thams 
[\[6a.3\]]cad bskyang ba dang /_'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang /_gdon thams cad bsrung ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so/_/dza ya dang bi dza ya dang /_na ku li dang /_g+han d+hA na gu li dang /_ba ru ni dang /_tsai gra ba ru Ni dang /_a b+ha ya ba ni dang /_in dra ba ni dang /_g+han d+ha pri yang ku 
[\[6a.4\]]dang /_rgya spos dang /_tsa kra dang /_ma hA tsa kra dang /_biSh+Nu krAn ta dang /_so ma ra dzi dang /_su nan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_nor bur bgyis nas spyi bo 'am/_dpung pa la btags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o/_/khye'u rnams la ni mgul par ro/_/
[\[6a.5\]]bu mo rnams la ni sta zur nas te/_dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel na thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/dug dang mes mi tshugs lags so/_/dug gis gnod pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[6a.6\]]skyes na yang gnod pa bskyed par mi bgyid cing /_myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang 'brug dang ser ba gcad pa dang /_chab kyi rgyun dang /_ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas te/_las thams cad bgyid pa 'phags pa spyan 
[\[6a.7\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bsgrub par 'tshal na thang sku'i cho ga ni ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis/_sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tshugs dang e na ya'i pags pa dang /_phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba dang /_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi ste/_ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'drir stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i 
[\[6b.2\]]dkyil 'khor bgyis te/_me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram la/_spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bgyi'o/_/sna brgyad pa 'am drug cu rtsa bzhi pa 'am/_gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang /_khrag dang ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la/_a ga ru'i bdug pas 
[\[6b.3\]]bdugs te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/nyin zhag gcig gam/_nyin zhag gsum du smyung ba bgyis nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal te/_dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas/_gos gtsang ma bgos na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid 
[\[6b.4\]]mchis nas/_bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/ldang ros sam mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te/_mig la bskus na de nas mi gda' bar gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa thams cad zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob 
[\[6b.5\]]par 'gyur te/_ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'grub pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po 
[\[6b.6\]]tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs so//_//de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 
[\[6b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing /_'od zer sna tshogs pa 'gyed 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/_bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas/_rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa 
[\[7a.2\]]dang /_snying brtse bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen 
[\[7a.3\]]po'i snying po 'di mchis te/_'di pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po'i snying por 'phags pa snying por gyur pa/_de kho na nyid grub pa pad+ma dam pa dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_snying po rim par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[7a.4\]]dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang /_sgrub pa gsang ba 'di/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang /_rig 
[\[7a.5\]]sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/gang yang dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_lha dang gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_drang srong gi tshogs dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_skar ma'i tshogs dang 
[\[7a.6\]]rgyu skar dang /_rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/_dngos grub sgrub pa bklags pas grub pa dang /_bsgoms pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs 
[\[7a.7\]]kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa/_phyag dpung pa'i 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang /_spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[7b.2\]]sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te/_ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyis khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig smros shig_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi 
[\[7b.3\]]rang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[7b.4\]]gis phyogs bcur bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to/_/oM pad+ma ha sta/_ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hri da yan tsa ra tsa ra hUM/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin 
[\[7b.5\]]no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po ta la 'di brag dang /_nags tshal dang /_rtsi shing du bcas pa dang /_ri rab khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnams 
[\[7b.6\]]rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang ldeg par gyur te/_thams cad 'dar 'dar por gyur to/_/klu'i gnas dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to/_/chu gter rnams kyang 
[\[7b.7\]]'khrug par gyur to/_/de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/_/rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]smras pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems pa dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[8a.2\]]gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang gA'i [{]klungs [,]klung [}]ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste/_spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 
[\[8a.3\]]gsungs te/_gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal ba brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/_zhig par bgyid do/_/sdig pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do/_/sdig pa dang sems can gdug pa rnams dang /_phas 
[\[8a.4\]]kyi rgol ba rnams dang /_mi mdza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/_'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o/_/rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin blta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so/_/rig sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar 
[\[8a.5\]]gyur pas shin tu khrus bgyis te/_gos gtsang ma bgos par bgyi'o/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o/_/me tog dang /_
[\[8a.6\]]bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mar me dbul bar bgyi'o/_/tshes brgyad dam/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o/_/ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar skyil mo krung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[8a.7\]]bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang /_yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bgyi'o/_/gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod 
[\[8b.2\]]bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar 
[\[8b.3\]]bar 'gyur zhing /_rig sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang /_spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa'i rtags dang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[8b.4\]]ro/_/de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra bas spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du 
[\[8b.5\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyis mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[8b.6\]]du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/_/de lta bas na/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi 
[\[8b.7\]]dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na/_khang pa brtsegs pa legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i mchog la 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs shing chos ston pa blta bar 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/_gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i lhag pa'i 
[\[9a.2\]]bsam pas gus pa dang /_dad pa dang /_zhes dang /_bla mar bgyi'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor pa me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub dang /_ba 
[\[9a.3\]]dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o/_/tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar la zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i 
[\[9a.4\]]rgyal bo'i snying po dang /_nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o/_/mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o/_/a ga ru dang /_tsan dan dang /_du ru ska dang /_gu gul gyi 
[\[9a.5\]]me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas blang bar bgyi'o/_/dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_don yod khams gsum rnam par grags/_/bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med/_/gang phyir bdugs pa tsam gyis ni/_/stong 
[\[9a.6\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[9a.7\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la/_dri chen po'i mchod pa dang /_bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing /_de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor na de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_mu ge dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_nang 
[\[9b.2\]]'khrug pa dang /_'khrugs pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_gdung ba dang /_mi bde ba thams cad dang /_nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang /_ser ba dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur 
[\[9b.3\]]ro/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/byad dang /_g.yengs byed dang /_sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /_dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad dang /_brjed byed thams cad dang /_rims dang 
[\[9b.4\]]bza' nyes dang /_bgo nyes dang /_gnod sgrib dang /_nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod ltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur/_'jig par 'gyur/_'gyes par 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi snying po 
[\[9b.5\]]la mchis kyi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/'di ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/
[\[9b.6\]]zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o/_/snying po dang nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/_dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o/_/ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du nam langs kyi bar mchis nas nyal bar bgyi ste/_rmi lam 
[\[9b.7\]]du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam/_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas/_rin po che'i shing dang bcas/_rin po che'i ri dang bcas/_rdzing dang bcas/_gnas dang bcas/_khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas/_gzhal med khang dang bcas/_rdzu 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[10a.2\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de yang /_rig sngags 'chad de 
[\[10a.3\]]la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing legs so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mdzad de/_kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang /_khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang /_khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang /_khyod kyis bya ba gang 
[\[10a.4\]]yin pa byas pa dang /_khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang /_gsang sngags rnam par phye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te/_legs so legs so/_/khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig_/khyod 
[\[10a.5\]]'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te/_tshe brjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/_'jig 
[\[10a.6\]]rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/_'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag gnyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/_sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[10a.7\]]phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs kyi ri mo de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i phun sum 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo dang rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams las don yod pa'i grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/grub pa chen po bla na med 
[\[10b.2\]]pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bgyi'o/_/gang 
[\[10b.3\]]gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang /_lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na/_de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o/_/
[\[10b.4\]]bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod pa zhal ston par 'gyur zhing /_dge ba'am mi dge ba thams cad dam/_nyams pa'am bri ba de thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba'am/_'gro ba'am 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gsang 
[\[10b.5\]]sngags kyi cho ga dang /_sgrub pa'i don dang las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o/_/oM pad+ma d+ha ra a mo g+ha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so/_/oM pad+ma pA sha d+ha rA ya/_a mo g+ha ba rasany+tso da ya hU~M/_de bzhin 
[\[10b.6\]]gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/_bdug 
[\[10b.7\]]pa'i rgyal pos bdugs nas chab dang /_yungs kar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_phyogs bcur gtor na thams cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/oM trai lo kya a b+h+ya hA na a mo g+ha pA sha/_/pad+ma bi lo ki ta A yan+tu/_b+hu ba ne sur/_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]su ru su ru/_bi ma le hU~M/_dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/_gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur gtor bar bgyi ste/_thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags so/_/
[\[11a.2\]]oM pad+ma g+hu dza ma hA pA sha d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra yA mi/_a mo g+ha pA sha yan+tu b+hu ba swA hA/_mu ru mu ru hU~M/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha tshogs 
[\[11a.3\]]la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_chab dang /_me tog dang /_tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te/_thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so/_/oM 
[\[11a.4\]]pad+ma a mo g+ha badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na/_ku ru ku ru swA hA/_sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/_chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na/_dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par 'gyur 
[\[11a.5\]]ro/_/de thams cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro/_/dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_ro langs dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_
[\[11a.6\]]'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/_rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong bas rdo rje ltar sra bar 'gyur ro/_/oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad mot+ta ra sing hA/_san+tu Ti si ri si ri hU~M/_gdan gyi gsang sngags te yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 
[\[11a.7\]]bgyis te sa la gtor na/_pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang /_yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/_rig sngags 'grub pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so/_/oM ma hA kA ru Ni ka pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha dr-i D+ha badzra a d+hi Sh+Thi te b+hu ru b+hu ru b+han d+ha 
[\[11b.2\]]re swA hA/_dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang /_nags tshal dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_bsti gnas dang /_'chags dang /_phug dang /_dgon pa dang /_gnas bsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang /_yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa 
[\[11b.3\]]brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis te/_gnas su gtogs pa thams cad bsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/nyes par bgyid pa dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad 'bros par 
[\[11b.4\]]'gyur te/_gnas bsang ba'i gsang sngags so/_/oM pad+ma a mo g+ha pA she na sa man+tA da sha su dik+Shu si mA ba na d+ha ya/_tu ru tu ru hU~M/_lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs 
[\[11b.5\]]bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o/_/lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/_rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la ban+d+hA 
[\[11b.6\]]ya sa man+te na/_pad+ma ma hA bad+me d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/_dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/_dri chab dang /_yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang /_de bzhin du 'og dang steng du yang gtor te/_dkyil 'khor chen po bcing bar 
[\[11b.7\]]bgyis par 'gyur te/_bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gdug pa dang /_lha 'am/_klu gdug pa gang su yang rung ba de dag 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang /_sngags ngan pa dang /_sems ngan pa dang /_bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/_/oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud d+he sho d+ha ya sa man+te na/_d+hi ri d+hi ri shud 
[\[12a.2\]]d+ha sa twa ma hA pad+me hU~M/_'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'am/_bya skyibs sam/_tshang ching ngam/_'chag sa'am/_gnas sam/_tshal lam/_nags 
[\[12a.3\]]tshal lam/_skyed mos tshal lam/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_brang sa'am/_skyabs sam/_khang pa la gtor na stong pa'am/_mi stong pa'am/_'dam rdzab dang /_mi gtsang ba dang /_phyag dar gyis gang ba dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sogs te 
[\[12a.4\]]rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/_/gtsang ba dag par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid la dbang bskur na bza' nyes dang /_bgo nyes dang /_gnod ltas dang /_gnod sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[12a.5\]]gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro/_/mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen gnas ma bgyis pa ni bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de la lha thams cad bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang sba ba bgyid par 
[\[12a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_khyab 'jug chen po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad du/_rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig 
[\[12a.7\]]rten pa thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /_mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/tshig btsan par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bzhir kun tu 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gtor na 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mu ge dang mi ngas dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram/_reg par bgyid na/_rig 
[\[12b.2\]]sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du mchis ba de dang der cher mchod par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad kyis mi zlog par 'gyur ro/_/nyin 
[\[12b.3\]]gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_btsun 
[\[12b.4\]]mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro/_/rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog 
[\[12b.5\]]stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/oM pad+me sa ra sa ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya swA hA/_
[\[12b.6\]]gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi gsang sngags so/_/o~M bi pu la pad+ma a mo g+ha pra sa ra pra bi sha tu/_ku ru ku ru swA hA/_'jug pa'i gsang sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad+ma ban d+hu re hU~M/_slob ma'i gsang sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+ma shi khe tu ru tu ru/_tiSh+Tha 
[\[12b.7\]]badzra ban d+he swA hA/_spyi gtsug bcing ba'i gsang sngags so/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/o~M a mo g+ha pad+ma dza lo ta k+She pa/_b+hi ri b+hi ri hU~M/_chab bteg pa'i gsang sngags te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM a mo g+ha bi ka Ta sa~M b+ha ra pad+ma A sa Ne dza la 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]pa ti/_ku ru ku ru hU~M/_bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/o~M pad mo pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/_chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/o~M a mo g+ha pad+me su pad+me/_pUr+Na 
[\[13a.2\]]ka re d+hi ri d+hi ri bi ma le swA hA/_lag pa'i gsang sngags te/_lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/_sgrub pa 
[\[13a.3\]]thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad du bgyi'o/_/o~M a mo g+ha bi ma le dzi hwA gra saM sho d+ha ni saM sho d+ha ya d+ha ra d+ha ra bi ma le pad+ma ka ma la di hwA swA hA/_lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te/_dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_kha 
[\[13a.4\]]bshal la lce'i dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma dang /_ku mu da'i 'dab ma dang /_'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro/_/so dang rkan dang mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/o~M a mo g+ha na d+ha bsti su ru su ru pra b+hu ru di bya gan d+hi pad+ma pra b+he swA hA/_gsang sngags 
[\[13a.5\]]'dis khar stsal ba'i ril bu tsan dan dang /_na la dang /_spr-i ka dang /_ut+pal dang /_gur gum dang /_gla rtsi lhan cig blang ba bgyis la/_phye ma zhib mor btags nas ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 
[\[13a.6\]]bzlas brjod bgyis te/_zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad pa bgyis na/_rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyang grags tsam du the tshom med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[13a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'ang dgyes/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po gnyis pa/_bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]bas/_/don yod rig sngags bla na med/_/rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyis pas/_/dus kun rdul dri spang bar bgyi/_/mkhris pa bad kan snabs dag dang /_/de bzhin kun 'jig myur du ni/_/kha nas lha yi dri 'byung 'gyur/_/su la tshig dag smras pa ni/_/
[\[13b.2\]]de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur/_/lha rnams dbang du mchis pa dang /_/bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang /_/gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang /_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang /_/zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang /_/thams cad dbang 
[\[13b.3\]]du gyur nas mchis/_/'di ni kha na mur bgyid na/_/tshig ldan lce yi rtse mo la/_/mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu mi min dbyangs 'gyur te/_/dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs/_/tshigs bcad stong ni klog pa dang /_/sngon bklags pa ni nyams mi 
[\[13b.4\]]'gyur/_/hU~M zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang /_/lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'ang mchis/_/phaT ces bgyis pas gdug pa dang /_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jig_/gnod sbyin srin po sha za dang /_/brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba pa/_/thams cad 
[\[13b.5\]]mod la 'byer 'gyur zhing /_/khas bub tu yang 'gyel bar 'gyur/_/ril bu kha na thogs na ni/_/dus kun tu ni mkhas par 'gyur/_/grub pa myur du 'thob 'gyur te/_/thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur/_/tshig snyan 'jam zhing mnyen par 'gyur/_/ril bu 'di 
[\[13b.6\]]ni bcang bgyis na/_/don yod pad+ma dri ma med/_/ril bu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur/_/o~M ma la bi ga te/_pad+ma bi ba re/_san tsa ra ba tsa re swA hA/_a mo g+ha sid d+he sho d+ha ya hU~M/_nA ga pus pa'i shun pa dang /_u shi ra dang /_tsan dan dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_li 
[\[13b.7\]]shi dang /_ka ko la dang /_spang spos dang /_rgya spos dang /_gur gum dang /_pra pun da ri ka dang /_e la dang /_sa ma ka dang /_u gra dang /_su ga na d+hi ka 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhib tu btags nas/_gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bsres pas khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba'am/_chab dron pos khrus bgyis pa'am/_'tshal bas shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma shin tu dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis par bton pa tsam gyis sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang /_gdon kun 'joms 
[\[14a.2\]]par 'grub pa dang /_/nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/_/mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs/_/bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni/_/dri ma kun zhi som nyi med/_/dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar/_/bsod nams phung 
[\[14a.3\]]po rnam par 'phel/_/gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar/_/zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes/_/gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pa na/_/lus ni lha yi bzhin du gyur/_/mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar gyur/_/ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur/_/tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur/_/
[\[14a.4\]]thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur/_/tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur/_/mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang /_/rtag tu bron dam mchis 'gyur/_/lus la lha yi dri dag 'byung /_/pad+ma ku mud mnyen pa'i lus/_/sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te/_/lha yi tsan dan 
[\[14a.5\]]dri dag ni/_/mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med/_/rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang /_/bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang /_/lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang /_/gdug pa'i bgegs rnams mthong mi 'gyur/_/mi bzad dgra 
[\[14a.6\]]rnams kyis kyang min/_/lus nyid sbyang ba bgyis nas su/_/sngags bzlas brjod pa'i sgrub pa bgyi/_/legs par sgrub pa'i las bgyis nas/_/de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur/_/
[\[14a.7\]]lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan/_/dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi/_/ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yis/_/rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur/_/thog mar lus sbyang cho ga bgyi/_/de nas gsang sngags legs par spyad/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+ma lo tsa ni di bya dr-iSh+Tari 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]pa ri shud d+he/_su ru su ru pad+ma/_a k+Shi b+hu ru b+hu rus man+ta bya ba lo ka ni swA hA/_ldong ros gi wang rgya mtsho sbu ba sa ha dza/_/ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la/_/gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[14b.2\]]kyis mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs/_/'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis/_/kun pas bkra shis 'di ni mig nad kun/_/'joms par bgyid de g.yar lam bzang po rmi/_/yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur/_/ngan par snang dang ngan par blta/_/
[\[14b.3\]]nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gtum po 'joms pa gtum po dang /_/lhag ma sbags pa bgo nyes dang /_/bza' nyes gnod sgrib gnod sbyin dang /_/srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag_/thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu/_/mi snang bar ni the tshom med/_/mig 
[\[14b.4\]]gis bzang po mthong ba dang /_/rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas/_/lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/mig yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/oM bud d+ha bud d+ha/_bi bud d+ha pad+ma a mo g+ha mu khi bar bar de swA hA/_rig sngags 'dis gi wang la 
[\[14b.5\]]lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/snying po dang nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di blangs te dpral ba'i 
[\[14b.6\]]dbus su thig le bgyis te/_thig le lan cig bgyis pas dpral ba'i steng na skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa thams cad dbang gyur mchis/_/gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang /_/srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid/_/thams cad 'jig 
[\[14b.7\]]'gyur the tshom med/_/sems can gdug pas gdug bsams kyang /_/phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas/_/de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te/_/me la phye ma leb bzhin no/_/rtag tu rgyal po skye bor bcas/_/'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang /_/blon po che 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]dang mdun na 'don/_/btsun mo'i tshogs bcas dbang du gyur/_/dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag_/thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur/_/rgyal rigs dmangs rigs dag dang ni/_/thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur/_/mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 
[\[15a.2\]]'gyur/_/rig sngags lha ni thams cad dang /_/gang dag dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste/_/de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/_/rjes su bsgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur/_/phyogs bcur bsrung ba bgyid 'gyur ba/_/rtag tu sgrub pa bla na med stsol/_/thig le 'di bgyis 
[\[15a.3\]]grogs med rgyu ba dag_/chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang /_/g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa/_/kun nas bsgral bar 'gyur te som nyi med/_/seng ge stag dang dom dang ni/_/glang chen khro bo mi bzad dang /_/wa dang gdug bcas srog 
[\[15a.4\]]chags dang /_/so gdug sbrul kun mgo nas za/_/gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas/_/de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te/_/nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ser ba me dang tshig pa dang /_/char pa mi zad mtshon chu byad/_/mkhas pas thig le 
[\[15a.5\]]'chang ba'i lus/_/khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur/_/mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don/_/thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur/_/shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang /_/'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag 
[\[15a.6\]]dran par bgyid cing /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du bdag mchis nas/_yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal 
[\[15a.7\]]bar bgyi'o/_/dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/don yod pa grub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]par bgyid na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15b.2\]]de ni bdag gis ma nongs so/_/de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis ci skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang /_cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas/_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/_dgos pa de dag thams cad the tshom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[15b.3\]]nas gsang sngags bzlas te/_oM a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra sa ra pra sa ra hU~M/_mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/_gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o/_/oM a mo g+ha pra bar Na 
[\[15b.4\]]mu ru mu ri di bya ka shi kaM_/saM b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/_gos kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM a mo g+ha bas+t+ra N+yota k+Shi pA mi bo d+hi ni pad me swA hA/_gos bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM di byot+ka saM b+hu ta a mo g+ha ba 
[\[15b.5\]]ru na tsa re\u0f85 b+hi Shiny+ts+ya hU~M/_khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM a mr-i ta a mo g+ha pad+ma sa ne/_spar+sha ni tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_nye reg gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni ku ru ku ru swA hA/_bdag bsrung ba ste/_yungs kar 
[\[15b.6\]]dang chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/_rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro/_/oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/_ma hI pad+me tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M/_dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM sarba tra a mo g+ha ba pa ti tiSh+Tha ra k+ShaM tu hU~M/_slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa bsrung ba ste/_
[\[15b.7\]]thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o/_/oM trai lo kya pad+ma a mo g+ha kra ma Ne mi li mi li swA hA/_gom pa 'dor ba'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/oM pad+me ma hA pad+me sa ra sa ra/_sa man te na pa ri beSh+Ta ya/_a mo g+ha pa she 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]na su ru su ru swA hA/_tshon skud sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bya'o/_/oM bi tsi tra a mo g+ha pa tA na na rang ga bi shud d+hA ya/_ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/_ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM a mo g+ha sha ra badzra tuN+Da tha ra tha ra swA hA/_mda'i 
[\[16a.2\]]gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM bi pu la a mo g+ha ma hA d+ha ra bi shud d+he si ri si ri swA hA/_rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/su dag der zhugs nas mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs 
[\[16a.3\]]su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/oM nA nA bi tsi tra/_a mo g+ha pus pa/_pha la tA kI rna pUr ya pa ra pa ra hU~M/_bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM a mo g+ha rat+na bi ma Na/_ka Ta da tsa a dr-iSh+Ti bid bya gan d+ho dz+wa la s+phar Na/_sa man te na dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/_pog 
[\[16a.4\]]phor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM dz+wa la ba ti/_rad na g+ha ta/_ri si Ni tu Ti tu Ti swA hA/_gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM da byi p+hany+dza na a mo g+ha pad+ma ba re pU ra ya hU~M/_kham phor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM a 
[\[16a.5\]]mo g+ha saM pU ra Ni dro Na g+han d+ha pa ti swA hA/_thig le'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM sa ra ni sA ra ya/_a mo g+ha b+hu dza ne mA da ne hU~M/_ril ba mgrin [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM rat+na di bya/_rat+na kuM b+ha ba ti sA ga ra saM pU ra Ni swA hA/_bum 
[\[16a.6\]]pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM bi tsi tro dz+wa la nAn raM ga bi b+hak+ta ya saM sho d+ha ya tu Ti swA hA/_tshon rtsi'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM di bya a ba lo ki ni bi b+ha dza yaM tu sa man te na sa ma ra Ne swA hA/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor 
[\[16a.7\]]dbye bar bgyi'o/_/oM nA nA pra hA ra Na a mo g+ha mu drA dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/_phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM a mo g+ha rat+na sU tra d+ha re ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/_thig skud kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor ram/_ri mo bris 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa'i ras sam/_gzhan gzhi gang yang rung ba la gdab par bya'o/_/oM bi pu la ba re pra be sha ya/_oM mo g+ha pad+me hU~M/_sgo'i cha dbye ba'i gsang sngags te sgo re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM su bi b+hak+ti su mang+ga la dwA ra b+ha ban+ti/_oM di bya bA dza na/_
[\[16b.2\]]a mo g+ha pA shan pa na ba re/_gi ri gi ri hU~M/_oM saM pUrna/_rU pya di bya b+ha dza ni/_a mo g+ha pad+me swA hA/_lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/_/oM bi bi d+ha rU pa hA ro pa k+Sha ra Na/_tsa la tsa la/_a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM di bya gan+d+ha nu sa ra ni a mo g+ha 
[\[16b.3\]]ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/_mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM g+han+d+ha s+pha ra Ni sa man+ta/_a mo g+ha pra s+phu ra hU~M/_dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM ni rma la kA ya sho d+ha ni di bya gan+d+ha pra pU ra ya ni pU ra ya hU~M/_byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan 
[\[16b.4\]]bdun bzlas so/_/oM gan+d+ha tsUr+Na pra pU ra Ni/_tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM sa man+te na/_bi ma le gan+d+hot+ta re swA hA/_bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM di bya gan d+ha pra pU ra ni sA ga ra dza la di bya a 
[\[16b.5\]]d+hiSh+Thi te ka la sho dA ra pU r+Na pU ra ya/_dza ya sid d+he swA hA/_bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM ra sa sA gra ba ti/_sarba bi d+ha a d+hi Sh+ThA na a d+hi Sh+Thite saM pU ra ya hU~M/_gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[16b.6\]]bzlas so/_/oM di bya b+ho dza na/_saM pU ra ya/_bi pU la pra b+he swA hA/_kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM tri shu kla b+ho dza na ba li bi pu la ra sA gra ba ti su ra pra su ra hU~M/_zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma'am/_gtor ma gzhan la yang lan 
[\[16b.7\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM ba la ti sA ra ba ti di bya ba na spa ti/_ta ra ta ra ni swA hA/_'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM di bya ku su mot+pa la nA nA puSh+pa pra bar+Sha Ni b+ha ba swA hA/_me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM bi bi 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]d+ha la tA buSh+bA kun Thi ta ba na sba ti A ha ra saM bUr+Na kum b+he swA hA/_me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM ma hA d+hU pa me g+ha pa Ta la sany+tsa dA ya/_sa man+te na hU~M swA hA/_bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[17a.2\]]bzlas so/_/oM a tharba ni dz+wa la dz+wa la de ba mu khe swA hA/_me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM bi bi d+ha ma Ni ka na ka ra t+no dz+wa la pU Sha Na ma Ni ma Ni a mo g+ha ma Ni swA hA/_cha zhing brgyan pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM pad+ma ka re bi ma lan 
[\[17a.3\]]kha/_ang gu li/_sa ma sa ma sarba ta thA ga ta/_a d+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/_thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM sarba gu Na pra Na ta/_shi ro baM da nA ya na ma ska ro mi/_mi li mi li tu ri Ni swA hA/_phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun 
[\[17a.4\]]bzlas so/_/oM da sha di sha a b+hi ban da na pra sa ra tu hU~M/_bskor ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM bi bi d+hA yu d+hA dz+wa li ta pa ni/_pra dz+wa la pra s+phur hU~M/_thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM di bya a mo g+ha bi pu la swa re ma d+hu 
[\[17a.5\]]ra ni ra g+ho Sha ru te na ra Na ra Na hU~M/_dril bu'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do/_/oM ra smi dz+wa la sa man+te ma/_a ba b+ha sa ya ma hA ma Ni rat+na shi khe swA hA/_mar me'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM d+hu ru d+hu ru a pA hA 
[\[17a.6\]]ya shI g+h+raM dza be hUM/_dgug pa'i gsang sngags te gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM duSh+ThA sa do bi bo d+ha ni/_sa ma sa ma ya ba re swA hA/_dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM bi tsi tra ma ni bi bu la pra brta ni hU~M/_
[\[17a.7\]]bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM bi ci tra t+no dz+wa lo di bya/_ku su ma ba re puSh+pa ra ti swA hA/_me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/oM di bya lo tsa ne a mo g+ha pra ba re/_sarba di bya a d+hi Sh+Thi ta/_sid d+hi shud d+ha bi lo ki te 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]swA hA/_dgug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+me sa man+ta shu b+ha ne ta ra ta ra gats+tsha swa b+hA ba naM swA hA/_slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM di bya saM pU ra Ni nA ga bi lo ki na hU~M/_
[\[17b.2\]]'khar gsil gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM pa tra pU ra Ni pU ra ya/_a mo g+ha ba tis man+ta pra b+he swA hA/_lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM dUrba saM s+tha la bid d+hi a d+hi Sh+Thi ta pra sa ra su ru su ra/_r-i Shi pU dzi te 
[\[17b.3\]]swA hA/_rtswa gding ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/oM dz+wa la dru ma dz+wa la shi khi ra smi gar b+he swA hA/_sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM pad+me ni pad+mA sa ne ba re pra ba re nA ga b+hu ba ne swA hA/_'bab chu dang mtsho'i gsang 
[\[17b.4\]]sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/_/o~M kha ga tsa ri Ni/_ga ma ga ma ya pA da pra tsa ri Ni hU~M/_len pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM sarba hra a mo g+hA b+hi Shi ka ma hA tsU Da bi ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsi tu mAM/_pra bar pa Ni b+hu dze pad+me d+hA dze swA hA/_dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[17b.5\]]gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/rigs sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ci lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas/_cho ga bsgrubs na dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang /_me tog dang /_bdug 
[\[17b.6\]]pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang /_nor bu sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i me tog dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi 
[\[17b.7\]]mchog dang /_ro sna tshogs pa'i mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gtor ma bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ci tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ci lta 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ci lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen 
[\[18a.2\]]po rnams la so so'i gzhal med khang ci lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi rnams kyi khang pa ci lta ba dang /_kha zas kyi mchog ci lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang /_de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i 
[\[18a.3\]]cho ga zhib mo dang /_cho ga dang gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su grub par bgyis te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di 
[\[18a.4\]]brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag 
[\[18a.5\]]par bgyi'o/_/cho ga zhib mo dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_snying po dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba 
[\[18a.6\]]chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/de kho na nyid yang dag pa sgrub pa'i grub pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o/_/shin tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba 
[\[18a.7\]]ma mchis pa dang /_mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o/_/'di la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing /_dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o/_/bden par smra ba dang /_
[\[18b.2\]]bden pa la dga' ba dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing /_phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzlas par bgyi'o/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs 
[\[18b.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas/_sangs rgyas yid la rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o/_/'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[18b.4\]]la phyag bgyis nas/_mngon sum du bsgom par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/_mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyis te/_
[\[18b.5\]]'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid bsgrub pa'o/_/de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o/_/bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig_/'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa/_sems dag 
[\[18b.6\]]pa lag na pad+ma can sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun dang /_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/srin po lha min gsang ba pa/_/'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang /_/drag 
[\[18b.7\]]po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs/_/gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang /_/drang srong sogs dang de bzhin du/_/zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang /_/de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dag_/phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/_/de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur/_/sgrol ma 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dag_/mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can/_/de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang /_rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni/_/lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /_/lha mo khro gnyer mA ma kI/_/dpe med 
[\[19a.2\]]pho nya mo dang ni/_/'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang /_/pad+ma ko ti ut+pa la/_/pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du/_/ti se yi ni rtse mo na/_/'phrog ma 'byung po'i ma dag dang /_/de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu/_/mthu chen de bzhin rig 'dzin dbang /_/rdo rje 'chang chen de 
[\[19a.3\]]bzhin du/_/bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang /_/sum cu gnyis nas lha dag ni/_/gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis/_/de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do/_/
[\[19a.4\]]de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan stong dang /_phyag rgya sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya bcings 
[\[19a.5\]]pa tsam gyis ni/_/bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags/_/mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med/_/mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang /_/de bzhin rgya mtsho'i klong dang ni/_/mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dang /_/de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang /_/mgon po 'jigs pa 
[\[19a.6\]]brgyad 'phrog dang /_/de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/_/phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/_/mgon po thams cad ston par mdzad/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/_/rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od 
[\[19a.7\]]dpag med/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba/_/mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas stong gi zhing dag ni/_/chu bo gang gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong /_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon/_/phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/_/mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste/_/nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan/_/de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur 
[\[19b.2\]]bas/_/de la yid gnyis som nyi the tsom med/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshung ba'am mtshams med lnga/_/mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la/_/kha zer ba dang dam chos bslu ba dang /_/rgyal bas gsungs 
[\[19b.3\]]spong mnar med gzhol ba dang /_/mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang /_/bskal pa 'bum po thams cad skad cig grol/_/phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam/_/thos sam mthong ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang /_/sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi 
[\[19b.4\]]med/_/don zhags snying po'i phyag rgya mthong ba yang /_/'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags/_/sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang gA yi/_/bye ba brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang /_/chos kyi 'khor 
[\[19b.5\]]lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs/_/don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang /_/gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams phung chen gyi/_/bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de yi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de ni dpag tu med pa som nyi med/_/de 
[\[19b.6\]]nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas/_/gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang /_/yo byad bsgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang /_/rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang /_/sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdugs bgyis shing /_/dpung pa lag pa lha yi 
[\[19b.7\]]spos kyis byug_/gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gdan bshams par/_/skyil mo krung bcas nas ni byams sems dang /_/snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam bzhag nas/_/phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/rtag tu 'jig rten 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]dbang la phyag bgyi zhing /_/rtag tu bla ma mchod cing chos la brtson/_/shin tu rig pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar/_/shin tu rig pas bsrung ba'i cho ga bgyi/_/shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus/_/bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang /_/sems can 
[\[20a.2\]]kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_/lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni/_/phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste/_lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la/_sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te/_mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying gar gzhag go/_/phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i 
[\[20a.3\]]rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/_byang chub snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do/_/mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/_/o~M a mo g+ha bi ku r+b+bi ta sa man+ta a ba lo kA ya na s+t+rai ya d+h+wa/_a d+hi Sh+Thi ta a mo g+ha pad+me/_tsa ra bi tsa ra sany+tsa ra 
[\[20a.4\]]hU~M hU~M/_de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po pad+ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur 
[\[20a.5\]]ro/_/dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen 
[\[20a.6\]]pos phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi/_byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs 
[\[20a.7\]]pa dang /_lha'i bu dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_khyab bdag dang /_kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]cad dang /_'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang /_chad pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so/_/don yod dam tshig mchog 
[\[20b.2\]]grags pa/_/pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing /_/mdzub mo gung mo rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/_sen mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te/_rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/_/oM a mo g+ha 
[\[20b.3\]]pad mA~M ku she sa ma na yA na/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA satwa hU~M/_phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thags tu 'am/_bzlas pa tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[20b.4\]]gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang /_mnyes pa dang /_rab tu dgyes pa dang /_tshim pa dang /_thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing /_yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol 
[\[20b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[20b.6\]]gzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa 
[\[20b.7\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/lag mthil pad+ma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing /_mthe chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni/_/pad+ma 'chang la bdug pa dang /_/me tog la sogs dri rnams dang /_/phreng ba 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]byug pa phye ma dang /_/ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni/_/gtor ma mchod yon rab tu dbul/_/bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang /_/tshon skud sna lnga tshon dbye'o/_/gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la/_/phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog_/'di ni dbul 
[\[21a.2\]]ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs/_/thams cad du ni don yod mchog_/go bar bgyi ba'i phyag rgya 'di/_/pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs/_/gung mo nor bus dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni bag tsha ba med pa'i pad+ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/_'di ni grub pa dam 
[\[21a.3\]]pa lags so/_/spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni/_oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ma hA sa t+ya A ya tu mi ha maN+Da le/_bi ri bi ri bi ri pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/_dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[21a.4\]]dang /_/phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab dgug_/lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug_/phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang /_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin 
[\[21a.5\]]dang /_/dri za lha min de bzhin du/_/nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/_/lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste/_/de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing /_/bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med/_/lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad+ma'i mtshams su bya ste/_gung 
[\[21a.6\]]mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/_/grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang /_/dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyis pa yi/_/bsrung ba'i las la bag tsha med/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang /_/gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis/_/dpag tshad 
[\[21a.7\]]bdun ni khor yug tu/_/mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_/bsrung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur/_/oM a mo g+ha badzra dr-i D+ha pad+ma ban d+ha sa man+te na ma hA sa man+ta rak+Shan+tu mAM/_tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT/_de nas don yod phyag rgya ste/_/grub ldan sems can kun smra na/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]don yod pa yi phyag rgya ni/_/khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan/_/rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par bzhag ste/_srin lag kha gdengs la sor mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni/_don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya chen por 
[\[21b.2\]]bsgrags/_/phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang /_/'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang /_/dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang /_/gsang sngags dam pas bsrungs bgyis nas/_/rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur/_/dus 
[\[21b.3\]]gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur/_/oM badzre badzra/_a d+hi Sh+Thi te pad+me bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/_d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/_pra be sha tu s+t+rai ya d+h+wA nu ga da na d+ha ri tu Ti swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis/_/de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi/_/sangs 
[\[21b.4\]]rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu/_/g.yo bar 'gyur ba som nyi med/_/phyag na pad+ma'i lus 'bar nas/_/mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis/_/rtag tu lta zhing mdun na mchis/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang /_/mtho ris sgo rnams 
[\[21b.5\]]'byed par 'gyur/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na/_/gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing /_/sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgo na/_/gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do/_/bde can 'jig rten khams dag ni/_/sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bcings 
[\[21b.6\]]tsam gyis/_/gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog_/nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/_/sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/_/gnod pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid/_/dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar/_/phyag 
[\[21b.7\]]rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/_/mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang /_/nyes byas thams cad 'jig par byed/_/dmyal ba'i sgo ni gcad par 'gyur/_/mi bzad 'jigs las bsgral bar 'gyur/_/phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/_/mtshams med lnga ni 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bgyis pa dang /_/sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/_/sems can kun las rtag tu sdug_/de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob/_/phyag rgya 'di ni mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/_gung mo pad+ma'i ral pa'i tshul du bgyis te/_spyi bo'i 
[\[22a.2\]]ral pa sa la bzhag pa ni pad+ma'i ral pa'i phyag rgya lags te/_'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te/_sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/_gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+mo dza le bi sho d+ha ya hU~M/_bi ri bi ri bi ma le swA hA/_phyag 
[\[22a.3\]]rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab bdag gis bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags 'di/_brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su/_/phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas/_/rtag tu bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis/_/mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur/_/mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang /_/tshangs spyod 
[\[22a.4\]]ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur/_/mi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur/_/bsod nams phung po lha bzhin 'bar/_/zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes/_/'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug_/gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub/_/grub pa don yod zhags pa yi/_/don yod de nyid grub par 
[\[22a.5\]]'gyur/_/lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te/_/bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med/_/mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/_/sems pa mchog sbyin dag pa po/_/mchog sbyin rgyun du thams cad du/_/nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing /_/tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 
[\[22a.6\]]'gyur/_/de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur/_/thams cad du ni las 'grub ste/_/gnod pa kun las rnam par grol/_/sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/_/thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog_/khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/_/don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no/_/
[\[22a.7\]]lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan/_/srin lag gnyis yud tsam bskum pa ni pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te/_/kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag_/phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu 'di/_/skyil mo krung bcas mchis nas su/_/phyag rgya 'di dag bcing bgyis
