[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]zhing /_/mnyam par gzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas/_/bcings pa tsam gyi mod nas ni/_/skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur/_/kun nas go char gyur nas ni/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas/_/lha min 
[\[22b.2\]]mkha' lding gis mi mthong /_/phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu/_/de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros/_/bgegs med par ni las 'grub pas/_/bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med/_/oM a mo g+ha badzra dr-i D+ha pad+me shwa ra hU~M/_thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub 
[\[22b.3\]]mo dang gung mo bkug nas/_mthe bo pad+ma kha phye ba ltar bgyis te/_don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/_/oM pad+me shwa ra a mo g+ha bar dA/_bi ri bi ri swA hA/_
[\[22b.4\]]'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems pa'i bsam pa rtse gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/_dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i 
[\[22b.5\]]sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/dbugs 'byin 
[\[22b.6\]]par mdzad do/_/rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do/_/mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs 
[\[22b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]brgyad yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/_yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bcangs 
[\[23a.2\]]nas/_zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun na mchis nas/_rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/'di 
[\[23a.3\]]ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no/_/zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad de tshur shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no/_/khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pas 
[\[23a.4\]]nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig_/rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas/_rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig_/snying rje chen po'i sems 
[\[23a.5\]]kyis sems can thams cad la goms par gyis shig_/khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas/_shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /_khyod pad+ma'i nang du rdzus te skyes nas/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe 
[\[23a.6\]]byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pas/_lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 
[\[23a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/don yod 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'a phrul 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi zhing slar ldog par 'gyur/_bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgya 
[\[23b.2\]]brgya stong bcings na/_tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa'i don yod pa'i mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs 
[\[23b.3\]]pa dang /_lha'i bu dang /_drag po dang /_dbang po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 
[\[23b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/_'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod sgrub pa 'bum lags so/_/'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[23b.5\]]cad na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 
[\[23b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya bcings te skyil mo krung bcas nas/_sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang /_'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod 
[\[23b.7\]]bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin pa mdzad cing dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do/_/bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la pha 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ri mo'i sku gzugs de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur 
[\[24a.2\]]ro/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[24a.3\]]bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po gsum pa/_thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la/_rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste bar gtad la srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing /_
[\[24a.4\]]gung mo pad+ma lta bur bgyis te/_sngags 'di brjod do/_/oM tu ru tu ru pad+me a mo g+ha sid d+hi hU~M/_phyag rgya 'di ni don yod 'grub/_/las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi/_/'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis/_/kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/myur du ston pa stsol 'gyur te/_
[\[24a.5\]]rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog_/mchog kun rab tu stobs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa/_/sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol/_/bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel/_/bkra shis sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/lha rnams rtag 
[\[24a.6\]]tu bsrung bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje bcings pa shin tu bcing /_/rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi/_/mdzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas/_/snying po dag ni rab tu brkyang /_/don yod pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /_snying po gsungs pa dang /_pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya 
[\[24a.7\]]las dang don thams cad 'grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag thams cad gsungs nas/_de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/_oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya/_pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA maN+Da la hr-i da ya hU~M/_snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/_/pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]yi/_/grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med/_/thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag_/de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi med/_/shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzung /_/shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas/_/shin tu bkru bas gos gtsang gyon/_/gtsang 
[\[24b.2\]]ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing /_/sems can kun la brtse gyur nas/_/rtag tu bla ma gus par bsgom/_/rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing /_/pad+ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi/_/myur du las 'grub myur du ni/_/pad+ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas 'grub/_/myur du 'jig rten 
[\[24b.3\]]dbang phyug 'thob/_/myur du sems can kun phan ldan/_/lag pa g.yon pa brkyang ba tsam gyis khar pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa bsgyur nas/_mdzub mo gyen du bsgreng mthe bo yid tsam bkug la lag pa g.yas par brkyang ste/_sor mo rnams pad+ma'i tshul du gzhag la/_
[\[24b.4\]]mthe bo yid tsam bkug ste/_gung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni/_don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga chen po'i mig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/_gsang sngags 'di brjod do/_/oM pa shu pa ti pA sha d+ha ra sa 
[\[24b.5\]]ha sra ra smi bra ti man+di ta kA ya/_A kar+Sha Ni saM tso da ni/_b+hu ru d+hu ru/_a mo g+ha pA sha sid d+hi hU~M/_phyag rgya 'dis gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas/_lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du 
[\[24b.6\]]brdeg cing slar yang rang gi gnas su gzung zhing /_gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/_lan bdun du yang brdeg go/_/don yod rgyal po bzlas pas ni/_/bsam pa mchog tu dag pas bgyi/_/bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la ni/_/don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[24b.7\]]byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang /_/mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag_/ci ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin/_/mod la grub pa bla med dang /_/mod la thams cad dgug par 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za lha 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]min nam mkha' lding /_/mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/_/rig sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir/_/thams cad de yi mod la 'du/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dag_/de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'chang la phyag 
[\[25a.2\]]bgyi'i phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur/_/mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/_/mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur/_/yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi/_/rang bzhin mod la ston par mdzad/_/gang dag mnar med song ba dang /_/
[\[25a.3\]]sems can mtshams med lnga bgyid dang /_/gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang /_/gang dag dam chos spong ba dang /_/phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin 'jug gam/_/bcings pas mod la sdig pa kun/_/'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mthong /_/phyag rgya 
[\[25a.4\]]bcings pa tsam gyis ni/_/dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang /_/gsang sngags zlos par bgyid pa dang /_/rig sngags 'chang ba mthong ba de/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/mngon du mthong bar blta bar bya/_/
[\[25a.5\]]tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni/_/brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi/_/sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams/_/phyag rgya bcings sam mthong tsam gyis/_/dgun 'byang 'gyur som nyi med/_/thal mo lhan cig dam par sbyar te/_mkhas pas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis la 
[\[25a.6\]]mdzub mo nor bur bgyis te gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste lag pa spyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/_/oM s+t+rai ya d+hA nu ga ta/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu/_sarba s+t+rai ya d+hA/_a 
[\[25a.7\]]b+hi She kaiH_pad+ma ma Ni su pad+me/_a mo g+he sarba ta thA ga ta/_a d+hi Sh+Thi te hU~M/_'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis/_rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi bya ba byed pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pu'i 
[\[25b.2\]]gnas su 'gyur ro/_/spyi gtsug rdo rje'i pad+ma bcing /_/rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang /_/mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi'o/_/rang gi gdong gi khro gnyer bzhin/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste/_/las kun sgrub par bgyis pa yi/_/thams cad sgrub byed phyag rgya ste/_/
[\[25b.3\]]kun sgrub dam pa'i gsang sngags pas/_/'di dran sgrub pa kun gyi mchog_/oM kro d+ha rA dzA d+ha ma hA/_a mo g+ha ha na ha na/_sarba duSh+Da na hU~M/_phyag rgya 'di dran tsam gyis kyang /_/mthu chen po yi gsang sngags kyis/_/gdug pa kun ni rnam 'jig ste/_/ri rab kyang 
[\[25b.4\]]ni snyil bar bgyid/_/phyag rgya bcing ba bgyis pa yis/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid/_/sems can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu/_/bgegs dang log 'dren gdug pa ste/_/de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/_/thams cad 
[\[25b.5\]]dbang du gyur nas mchis/_/lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang /_/bram ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa/_/thams cad dbang du gyur nas ni/_/mchis par 'gyur ba som nyi med/_/rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam gzhag la/_/mthe bo mnyam du bteg nas ni/_/gung mo yis ni gung mo nyid/_/
[\[25b.6\]]yid tsam bkug nas bsgreng bar bgyi/_/'di ni pad+ma chen po yi/_/lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste/_/grub pa bla na med pa yi/_/thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags/_/thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar/_/mthe bo nyid ni brkyang bgyis la/_/mthe chung yid tsam bkug pa ni/_/dkar 
[\[25b.7\]]sham chen mo'i phyag rgya ste/_/'di ni kun grub bla na med/_/rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbyor dam bcings shing /_/shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la/_/khro gnyer bzhin ni de bzhin khro ba dang /_/phyag rgya chen po kun 'dod rab tu sbyin/_/lag pa gnyis kyis thal sbyar 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]brkyang nas ni/_/gsang ba de brkyang gung mo bskum nas ni/_/mthe chung brkyang nas lcags sgrog pad+ma yi/_/tshul du snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi/_/phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor kun nas lha 
[\[26a.2\]]dag dang /_/dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur/_/thams cad 'tshogs shing 'du ba dang /_/kun gyis bsrung bgyid som nyi med/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni/_/thal sbyar pad+ma'i tshul bzhin legs byas te/_/snying gar gzhag pa gnod sbyin pho nya 
[\[26a.3\]]mo/_/'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags/_/dang por rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la/_/gung mo lhag ma skum zhing mthe bong gzhag_/pad+ma tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol bdun gyi/_/grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon 
[\[26a.4\]]mongs kun/_/nad kun nye bar zhi ba som nyi med/_/don yod pa yi grub pa bla med kyis/_/cho ga zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub/_/lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste/_/rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma bcing /_/mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas ni/_/mthe bo yang ni dgug par 
[\[26a.5\]]bgyi/_/'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste/_/cho ga zhib mo'i pad+ma lags/_/pad+ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar/_/mdzub mos 'khyud la gung mo ni/_/lcags kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi/_/don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di/_/rgya mtsho'i klong gi kha lta bu/_/rdo rje za ba nyid 
[\[26a.6\]]kyis gsungs/_/'di ni las kun bgyid pa po/_/grub pa kun gyi bla na med/_/phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'i mthe bo gnyis/_/lcags sgrog lhag ma bkug nas pad+ma'i tshul/_/snying ga'i gnas su gzhag pa mgrin sngon gyi/_/'di ni dogs med las kun phyag 
[\[26a.7\]]rgya lags/_/lag gnyis pad+ma'i khu tshur te/_/g.yas g.yon du ni bzhag nas su/_/kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du gzhag_/byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyis pa ni/_/zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste/_/de bzhin kun gyis mi thub pa'o/_/mthe bo mnyam par 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]mnyam bgyis la/_/sor mo'i rtse mo bskums pa dang /_/mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul/_/rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya lags/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni/_/'khor lo'i tshul du mdzub mo bskum/_/g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi/_/phyag rgya 'byung po 
[\[26b.2\]]thams cad 'joms/_/lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni/_/lag pa gnyis pa brkyang nas kyang /_/snying gar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/_/'di ni rgyun du gshin rje lags/_/lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su/_/sor mo sgreng ba'i thor tho dgug_/g.yas pa 
[\[26b.3\]]snying gar bzhag nas su/_/mthe bo dang ni mthe chung dgug_/lhag ma rnams ni brkyang bgyis te/_/'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste/_/klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lags so/_/lag pa gnyis ni bsdams bgyis la/_/sor mo phyin ka log tu sbrel/_/g.yas pa dang 
[\[26b.4\]]ni g.yon pa dag_/snying ga'i gnas su gzhag bgyi ste/_/phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi/_/gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyi/_/lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang /_/mthe bo mdzub mo dgug bgyis la/_/lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su/_/mdzub mo 
[\[26b.5\]]gyen du bsgreng ba ni/_/'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste/_/thams cad du ni las sgrub pa'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi/_/mthe chung sor mo dgug bgyis te/_/drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di/_/lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o/_/lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings 
[\[26b.6\]]la/_/lta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste/_/lha min thams cad 'gugs pa yi/_/khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs/_/g.yas pa bI dza pu rar bgyi/_/g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi/_/mthe bo mthe chung bskum pa ni/_/'byung po thams cad bskrad bgyid pa/_/'di 
[\[26b.7\]]ni grag pa'i phyag rgyar gsungs/_/g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas su/_/mdzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni/_/dkur bsten khu tshur bcangs nas gzhag_/sor mo rnams ni brkyang bar bgyi/_/drag po rgyun du lta bgyid pa/_/de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi/_/gzhon nu 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs/_/gyen du lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/_/sor mo gsum ni brkyang bgyis te/_/mthe bo mdzub mo dgug pa ni/_/'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa/_/'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo 
[\[27a.2\]]gsum/_/bkug nas sor mo gnyis gnyis brkyang /_/skar ma'i tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa/_/'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs/_/gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya 'di dag ni/_/las dang don kun grub pa bsgrub par bgyid/_/sdig pa thams cad spong zhing 
[\[27a.3\]]nyon mongs kun/_/nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad 'byang /_/las kun zad par byed cing don yod pa'i/_/las sgrub don yod grub pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/oM pad+ma tA re tA rA ya/_pad+ma b+hu dze hU~M/_oM ma hA pad+me shwa raM ge/_/hu ru hu ru swA hA/_oM b+h+r-i ku Ti pad+me 
[\[27a.4\]]ta ra ta ra hU~M/_oM pad+me paN+DA ra bA si ni/_kun+Da kun+Da swA hA/_oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba ra de sid d+h+ya sid d+h+yaM tu hU~M/_oM sarba tra ga mi ni a b+ha ya rau dri Ni hU~M/_oM a mo g+ha ni tA re tA rA ya pad+me b+hu dze hU~M/_oM dA ru la ru la pad+me a mo g+ha hU~M/_oM ba Da ba mu khe ni krin tA ya duSh+Ta na hU~M/_oM 
[\[27a.5\]]pad+me nI la kaN+The shwa ra/_b+hu ru b+hu ru hU~M/_oM sau mya ba da ne pra si ta shU sa ya hU~M/_oM pad+me shwa ri sA d+hA ya hU~M/_oM a mo g+he shwa re hU~M/_oM sa ma ri ta re ta re hU~M/_oM nA ga pad+ma ni hU~M/_oM yak+shA d+hi pa ti mu ru mu ru hU~M/_oM a mo g+he brah+ma ra te hU~M/_oM shi ri bar de a mo g+ha b+hu dze 
[\[27a.6\]]hu~M/_oM a mo g+ha ra dza pad+ma na b+he/_sa ra sa ra sa man+ta b+hu dze swA hA/_oM ru dra ru Ti mi li mi li swA hA/_oM sha ka ti d+ha re a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/_oM sa ha sra ki ra Ne hU~M ru hi swA hA/_oM sau ma bah+me hU~M/_de bzhin phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs pa yang /_/phyag rgya tha dad gsang 
[\[27a.7\]]sngags tha dad sgrub/_/gsang sngags 'chang gis ci skad gsungs pa'i las/_/rtag tu kun bgyid mdor na thams cad bgyid/_/gtsang ma spyod pa gtsang ma dag_/legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas/_/dri zhim dri yis dpung pa dang /_/lag pa yan lag 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]byugs nas su/_/phyag rgyal na re bcings pa na/_/gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi/_/phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang /_/gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni/_/brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum/_/phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya bcings pa 
[\[27b.2\]]bgyis pa na/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[27b.3\]]mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rim par bye ba dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[27b.4\]]ro/_/tshig btsan par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa dang blo gros bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad pa rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dam pa stsol bar 'gyur 
[\[27b.5\]]ro/_/rtag tu dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang gdug pa dang /_rab tu gdug pa thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_bgegs dang /_log 
[\[27b.6\]]'dren dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad gtso bo gcig 
[\[27b.7\]]pur 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/skyon gyi dri ma dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/legs par dran zhing lus shin tu yongs su 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dag par 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi 
[\[28a.2\]]khams bde ba can du song shig ces shin tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro/_/ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas ma 'ongs ba'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[28a.3\]]skye ba na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul ba yi/_/phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par 
[\[28a.4\]]bgyi/_/khru gang kho na'i tshad dag gis/_/dkyil 'khor lham pa bri bar bgyi/_/gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis/_/dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa kun las grol ba dang /_/de nyid dag ni grub par 'gyur/_/rgyun du gang gis go cha yis/_/rtag 
[\[28a.5\]]tu go cha bgos par 'gyur/_/go cha'i go ni 'bar ba dang /_/mdzes pa rtag tu stsol bar 'gyur/_/cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste/_/gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur/_/mthong 
[\[28a.6\]]ba tsam gyis gdon kun dag_/'jig par 'gyur te som nyi med/_/gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te/_/nad kun las kyang de bzhin no/_/pha rol dpung ngam rang dpung ngam/_/mi thub pa yi dgra kun las/_/rtag tu legs par rgyal bar bgyid/_/rtag tu gdon 
[\[28a.7\]]las bsrung ba dang /_/dus kun du yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'chang rnams bde bgyi phyir/_/de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/_/phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag_/dgos pa kun gyi rjes mthun par/_/gang 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dang gang du bkod pa dag_/de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur/_/pad+ma kha phye zhes bgyi ba'i/_/pad+ma 'dab mas mdzes pa dang /_/kun nas 'khor bar 'bar ba'i phreng /_/rnam par rtog pa med par bgyi/_/phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung /_/'di dag thams cad 'bras bu 
[\[28b.2\]]stsol/_/rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje'i mda'/_/dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje dang /_/pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan/_/pad+ma rab gnas pad+ma gnyis/_/rtag tu pad+ma legs par bgyid/_/pad+ma'i khu tshur de bzhin du/_/pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma bgyings/_/pad+ma'i lcags kyu thal mo sbyar/_/
[\[28b.3\]]pad+ma'i lcags sgrog pad+ma'i gzeb/_/rtag tu pad+ma sems dpa' dang /_/nor bu pad+ma rdo rjer gsungs/_/don yod pad+ma de bzhin du/_/pad+ma'i ral gri pad+ma'i dril/_/rtse gsum zhes bgyi gtun shing 'chang /_/nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug_/de bzhin zhags pa bdun 'dzin 
[\[28b.4\]]dang /_/chu srin 'dzin dung 'khor lo phyed/_/bI dza pU ra se'u 'bru/_/zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang /_/tho ba 'dzin dang tshems shing dang /_/me tog phur ma bgrang phreng dang /_/rdo rje rtse lnga don yod zhags/_/don yod grub pa de dag ste/_/thams cad pad+ma'i steng du dgod/_/
[\[28b.5\]]lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba/_/gang dang gang du dgod pa ni/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham/_/'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi/_/kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi/_/nor bu'i rgyan gyis [(]bgrubs [,]bklubs [)]par bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni/_/ra ba'am rtsig par bgyis pa 
[\[28b.6\]]'am/_/ci yang rung ba de dag ste/_/de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/_/rtag tu sdig pa thams cad spong /_/mnar med gnas su gtogs pa dang /_/mtshams med pa ni lnga nyid de/_/thams cad skad cig tsam gyis 'byang /_/sems 
[\[28b.7\]]can dag pa dran bgyid na/_/phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur/_/sems dpa' sa bcur rab tu gnas/_/'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas/_/gang lags dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin ni/_/rgyun du spyi bo lag na thogs/_/gang gis 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]phyag rgya 'di mthong ba/_/rgyun du mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang /_/rtag tu mngon sum mthong ba yis/_/de dag mtshungs te khyad par 'phags/_/gsang sngags sum cu rtsa lnga'i tshig_/rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub/_/de ni dus rnams kun 
[\[29a.2\]]du yang /_/ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam grol dkyil 'khor rab myur bar/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/'od dpag med kyi sras po yi/_/thu bor 'gyur ba som nyi med/_/'jig rten mgon gyi thugs zhal nas/_/skyes sras rtag tu 
[\[29a.3\]]thu bor 'gyur/_/'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid dang /_/chos las skyes par lung ston 'gyur/_/gang gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang /_mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[29a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis sug par phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur na/_phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang zhing che ba mchis par bsgrags so/_/de 
[\[29a.5\]]la gsang sngags ni/_oM a mo g+ha man dza li mi li tsi li hU~M/_oM a shwA sa ya k+Sha Na bi ga te hU~M/_oM a b+ha ya bar de Di hU~M/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta/_a d+hi Sh+Thi te d+hi ri d+hi ri hU~M/_oM pad+ma hr-i da ya mUSh+Thi hU~M/_oM bi sa ra bi sa ra sarba mA lA na ta tA dzA ya hU~M/_oM badzrim+b+ha hu ru 
[\[29a.6\]]hu ru hU~M/_oM aM ku sha a mo g+ha A kar+Sha ya hU~M/_o~M ka ba tsa ya tu ru tu ru hU~M/_oM a mo g+ha shaM ka li mi li hU~M/_oM a mo g+ha tsin tA ma ni tu ri tu ri hU~M/_oM a mo g+ha ma Ni tsi li tsi li hU~M/_oM badzra tu Ti tsi li hU~M/_oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya tsa ra tsa ra shud d+ha satwa hU~M/_oM g+ho Sha ba ti 
[\[29a.7\]]tsi Ti tsi Ti hU~M/_oM bid+yA khaDa ga ts+tshin+da ya a tru na hU~M/_oM tri ma la pa ri shud d+he b+hi Ti b+hi Ti hU~M/_oM su ru su ru hU~M/_oM ma Ni ma hU~M/_oM puSh+pa ba ti dza ye hU~M/_oM b+ho d+hi tsit+ta pA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/_oM pad+ma pra sha bi shud d+he hU~M/_oM badzre pA she b+ha ba tu mu ru mu ru hU~M/_oM tsin+tA ma Ni pA 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]sha ba ra de hU~M/_oM tsakra pA sha swa nir g+hA ta ka d+hu ru d+hu ru hU~M/_oM tri shU li pA sha bi lo ka tA ra ya hUM/_oM nA ga pA sha ban d+ha ya kaD+D+ha ya duSh+Ta na ga Na pA sha pa tA ya hU~M/_oM dza lod b+ha ba d+ha rA ya hU~M/_oM tsan dra bi ma le bi sho d+ha ya an d+ha ka ra rash+mi ba re hU~M/_oM shrI bo d+ha ya hU~M/_oM 
[\[29b.2\]]bi dza ya pUr+Na pa re hU~M/_oM pha lod b+ha bai tu re hU~M/_oM pUr+Na maN Da le dza la hU~M/_oM sa ha sra rash+mi ki ra Ne hU~M/_oM sarba duSh+Ta na pra ha ra shA sA ya hU~M/_oM man bi sho d+ha ya mA lA bi ma le hU~M/_oM puSh+pa ba ti su gan d+ha ba re hU~M/_oM pA sha sa ha sra gu ni te k+Sha Na k+Sha Na hU~M/_oM 
[\[29b.3\]]badzrod k+She pa su tsi mu kha tsi Ti tsi Ti hU~M/_oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta pA sha hA ste hU~M/_oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid ng+h+ya sid d+h+ya sA d+ha ya hU~M/_lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang /_/de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag_/lan cig bzlas pa tsam dang ni/_/phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas 
[\[29b.4\]]kyang /_/sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/_/cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub/_/don yod zhags pa rnam grol ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni/_nor bu rin po che dang /_me tog 
[\[29b.5\]]dang /_pad+ma dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_nor bu'i phreng ba dang /_bgrang phreng dang /_dung dang /_'khor lo dang /_dbyugs to dang /_mdung thung dang /_rdo rje dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_rtse gsum kha gdengs dang /_mtshon shag ti dang /_rdo rje dang /_dgra sta dang /_rtse gsum 
[\[29b.6\]]pa dang /_gnyis pa dang /_nor bu dang /_mtshon shU li dang /_las kyi rdo rje dang /_yid bzhin nor bu dang /_mtshon cha dang /_be con dang /_dbyug pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang /_ral gri dang /_zhags pa dang /_lcags kyu dang /_sbrul dang /_ljon shing dang /_
[\[29b.7\]]bye ru dang /_dgra sta dang /_'khor lo dang /_dgra sta yu ba sbom po can dang /_lag pa dang /_gtsug phud dang /_nor bu sgron ma dang /_'od dang /_'od zer dang /_gtun shing dang /_'phyang mo nyug pa dang /_dgra sta dang /_snod zlum po dang /_bum pa dang /_brag dang /_ri 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]dang /_lhun po dang /_sbrul 'khyil ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_chu srin dang /_nya dang /_ru sbal dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /_rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_rig sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_rtse gsum dang /_dkyil 
[\[30a.2\]]'khor dang /_ral gri dang /_gri dang /_pad+ma'i phreng ba dang /_rtse gsum dang /_mu sun di dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_phyag rgya bzhi pa dang /_mche ba bzhi dang /_zlum po dang /_dung dang /_'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rtse gsum dang /_dung dang /_nor bu'i dung dang /_pad+ma'i 
[\[30a.3\]]dung dang /_u d+ha dang /_gos dang /_seng ge'i gdong dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_ka la bing ka dang /_ngang pa dang /_bzhad dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang /_gdong bzhi pa dang /_dkyil 'khor bzhi dang /_rtse gsum dang /_bum pa gang ba dang /_zla 
[\[30a.4\]]phyed dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /_zla ba'i 'od dang /_pad+ma bzhi dang /_pad+ma gsum dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_me tog dang /_phur ma dang /_glegs bam dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi g.yang gzhi dang /_rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /_rta babs dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_'khar 
[\[30a.5\]]gsil dang /_so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_kha khyer dang /_ska rags dang /_gtsug phud dang /_mchod phyir thogs dang /_phreng ba chen po dang /_gru gsum dang /_kun nas rdo rje sde dang /_phyag rgya mtshon cha 'di dag ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin/_/rnam grol dkyil 'khor 
[\[30a.6\]]gsang ba 'di/_/don yod zhags pa'i cho gar dran/_/ras sam gos sam rtsig pa'am/_/ci yang rung ba 'dri bgyid pas/_/dogs med legs la legs 'byor pas/_/mtshon gsal kun du pad+mar gzhag_/phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi/_/thams cad srog las 
[\[30a.7\]]byung bas ni/_/don dang las rnams kun stsol cing /_/phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog_/de ni mod la 'bras bu ster/_/'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun/_/phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/sangs rgyas kun dang shAkya yi/_/rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs/_/
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]de lta bas na mkhas pas su/_/rtag tu kun nas mtshon bcangs na/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te/_/sras kyi thu bor som nyi med/_/phyag rgya rim byed dam pa 'chang ba gang /_/'jig rten mgon po sras kyi thu bor 'gyur/_/don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba 
[\[30b.2\]]yi/_/rnam par grol ba'i snying po bla na med/_/phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag_/'di 'chang ba la myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas don yod pa las thams cad pa dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste/_de nyid grub pas ci lta bu'i/_/
[\[30b.3\]]cho ga'i cho ga bsgrub pa bzhin/_/so so so sor 'tsham pa yi/_/de dag kun ni rtogs par bgyi/_/de nyid grub pa'i ci lta bu'i/_/mtshan nyid gzugs ni ci bzhin pa/_/de nyid bsgrubs pas zhags pa ni/_/skud pa lnga las 'grub 'gyur te/_/gsang sngags 'dzin pas 
[\[30b.4\]]mod la ni/_/'grub par 'gyur la som nyi med/_/ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang /_/arka kha che dar dag gis/_/skud pa shun pa'i skud pa ste/_/skud pa 'di dag bkal nas de kho na nyid kyi cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo bsgrubs pas zhags pa ras skud kyi rgyu las blangs te/_tshad 
[\[30b.5\]]bzhin bkal nas rtag tu smyung ba bgyis la legs par bkrus pa/_gos gtsang ma can tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o/_/de nas shin 
[\[30b.6\]]tu mnyam par gzhag pas brgyad bsgril du bkal te/_don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar bas pad+ma kha phye ba thogs pa ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa'i lus phyed pa sor bzhi ba'i tshad bgyi'o/_/bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis 
[\[30b.7\]]te/_nges pa'i gzugs dang /_khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/_dngul lam gser las bgyi'o/_/de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug pa zhags pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /_skyu ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o/_/
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'am tshes brgyad la legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhag gcig mchis te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/_tshig gzhan mi smra bar 
[\[31a.2\]]zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_stan bzang po bshams nas/_de'i steng du zhags pa gzhag par bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri 
[\[31a.3\]]dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o/_/a ga ru dang /_tsan dan dang /_du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/_/mar me yang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[31a.4\]]gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la yang ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/_ma 'khrugs 
[\[31a.5\]]pas gdugs rtse'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod re re bgyis te/_zhags pa'i steng du gtor zhing stong rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du gdugs re re mchis par bgyi ste/_rdo ci thogs pas gdugs rtse'i bar du bzlas brjod 
[\[31a.6\]]bgyi'o/_/mchod pa bgyi'o/_/kha zas ngan pa spang bar bgyi'o/_/lhag ma dang spags pa spang bar bgyi'o/_/gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/_gal te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni me'i kha dog tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[31a.7\]]gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub na ni/_kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]zhags pa 'di grub kyis/_khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa khug cig_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongs su gtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig_/'on te 'jig rten pa'i sgrub na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bus bsams pa ci lta ba bzhin 
[\[31b.2\]]du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar yid la bsams shing smon pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs na gsang sngags kyis thams cad 'grub par bgyid de/_thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de logs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying 
[\[31b.3\]]po lan bdun bzlas par bgyis te/_mod la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa'am mnar med par mchi ba zhig na yang de'i legs par 'grub par 'gyur te/_de la yid gnyis dang /_som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/khro 
[\[31b.4\]]gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchi bar 
[\[31b.5\]]'gyur zhing /_ci srid 'tsho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang blon po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyur/_/khro 
[\[31b.6\]]bo'i rgyal po'i zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang log 'dren dang /_gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[31b.7\]]'tshal na lo'am/_lo brgya'am/_lo stong ngam/_bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/_/nam byams pa dang /_snying rje bskyed nas/_de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na phyir bkrol bar 'gyur ro/_/dpung gi nang du 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]'phangs na dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/_/g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su 'phangs na mtshon cha dang /_go mtshon dang /_gzhu dang /_mda' dang /_mdung dang /_ral gri dang /_gtun shing dang /_mu sin di dang /_'khor lo dang /_
[\[32a.2\]]thag mdung dang /_mtshon cha thams cad dang /_go cha dang /_ya lad thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/_/chab dang yungs kar la la na bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/_gter na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhags pa la gdugs gcig bzhin ci 'byor pas 
[\[32a.3\]]mchod par bgyi'o/_/gang gi don du bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//'on te mi snang ba bsgrub par 'tshal na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/_g.yas pa dang g.yon pas gang 
[\[32a.4\]]du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor 
[\[32a.5\]]los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/lo bye ba bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang /_brtson 'grus pha rol gyis zil gyis mi gnon par 'gyur ro/_/char 
[\[32a.6\]]pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na ci tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/ha cang char pa ches pa dgag pa'i slad du mchod pa bgyis na char pa bkag par 'gyur ro/_/yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad dang /_mi 
[\[32a.7\]]ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas rig sngags 'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la lag pas zhags pa blangs te/_gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang /_zhags pa bcings nas don yod pa'i 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas zhags pa 'phangs na de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rang gi dpung dang /_gzhan gyi dpung thams cad dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang /_mi mdza' ba thams 
[\[32b.2\]]cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_mi ngas chen po dang mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ha cang char che ba dang /_dus ma lags pa'i char dang /_grang ba dang /_rlung dang /_
[\[32b.3\]]tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/ci lta ci ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/_don yod rgyal po mchod par bgyi 
[\[32b.4\]]zhing bzlas brjod bgyi gsol bar yang bgyi'o/_/mchod pa dang /_gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/_de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/cho ga zhib mo las ci skad gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams 
[\[32b.5\]]kyis cho ga de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas skad cig de'i mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o/_/'phags pa 
[\[32b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang /_bla mar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o/_/mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du 
[\[32b.7\]]bsgom par bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu byang chub dgug par bgyi'o/_/de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/_rig sngags 'chang de kho na nyid bsgrubs pas phug tu 'jug pa'i bsgrub pa 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]thams cad kyi mchog phug tu 'jug pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang /_mi'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 
[\[33a.2\]]gnas su 'jug pa dang /_'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_thang la rgyu ba dang /_nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_skar ma dang rgyu skar gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang /_nags su 
[\[33a.3\]]'jug pa dang /_ril rgyu ba dang /_'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste/_ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa tshogs chung ngu dang /_rtsol ba chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/del yid 
[\[33a.4\]]gnyis dang /_som nyi bskyed par mi bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal ba/_gtsang ma de kho na nyid la gus pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/_/
[\[33a.5\]]byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag nas sa snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas brtsams te/_zla ba nya'i bar du gsal ba shin tu bkra shis pa la dus gsum du ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyis la/_rtag tu brgya rtsa 
[\[33a.6\]]brgyad pa yi/_/dus gsum rgyun du bzlas brjod bgyi/_/nyin par dus gsum lan gsum ste/_/mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi/_/'khor lo zhags pa bla med 'di/_/skud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyi ste/_/ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang /_/arga'i 
[\[33a.7\]]skud pa sum 'gyur du/_/de ni legs par tshad bzhin du/_/khru ni sum cu rtsa drug bgyi/_/'khor lo rnam pa gsum las bgyi/_/rgyar ni sor bzhi'i tshad lags te/_/snying por bcas shing mu khyud bcas/_/kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag_/gser dang dngul 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]dang zangs las bgyi/_/chos bstan legs par brgyan pa yi/_/bzang po'i stan la gzhag par bgyi/_/spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi/_/sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod/_/de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham/_/ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi 
[\[33b.2\]]stan bshams par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa gzhag par bya ste/_mchod pa bgyis la bsams pa ci lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zla ba nya ba la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas/_
[\[33b.3\]]tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi zhing /_bdug pa rnam pa gsum po/_/a ga ru dang /_tsan dan dang /_gu gul rnams 'bul bar bgyi'o/_/ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan mchis pa 
[\[33b.4\]]la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar ba'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la 
[\[33b.5\]]mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi stod dang /_spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ri mo'i gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 
[\[33b.6\]]'khor lo zhags pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di 'grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa chen po bgyis la/_don yod khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/_de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o/_
[\[33b.7\]]lag pa g.yon pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing /_g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor lo'i tshul la brten nas blangs te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskor bar bgyi'o/_/de nas phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa chen po 'grub 
[\[34a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi rkang ba spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang gis ci bka' stsal ba de bgyi'o zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dang de 
[\[34a.3\]]thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/bran ni rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gi gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas/_'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par gyur pas/_zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar bgyi'o/_/phug gi 
[\[34a.4\]]sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/_zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o/_/zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor dang /_gtan pa dang /_
[\[34a.5\]]phug dang /_'bab chu chen po dang /_gseg ma dang /_'bab chu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lam mi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang /_bcom pa dang bshig par 'gyur ro/_/gtan pa dang /_sgo glegs dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_lcags sgrog rnams 
[\[34a.6\]]dum bu dum bur bcad cing gyes par 'gyur/_nyams par 'gyur/_'jig par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu dag pa dang shin tu dri ma med pa/_shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra ba rin po che sna bdun 
[\[34a.7\]]gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/me tog sna tshogs kyi rab shin tu dri zhim po'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang /_'khor lo'i 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]phyag rgya'i tshul mngon sum du bgyis nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas gnas mchog de yang rnam par drug tu 'gul ba dang /_g.yo ba dang /_ldeg pa dang /_'ur 'ur chem chem ste 
[\[34b.2\]]lha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o/_/de nas don yod pa rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman/_bud med kyi gzugs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_lha'i gos kyi rgyan gyis bklubs pa kha dog bzang 
[\[34b.3\]]po rgyas pa/_mchog dang ldan pa/_lha'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba bI dza pU ra thogs pa mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/sman bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de ma mthong ba tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas/_gzi brjid thams cad dang /_stobs thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/
[\[34b.4\]]de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa mdun du bcing bar bgyi ste/_mthong bcom gyi mod la de'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_gzi brjid nyams par 'gyur ro/_/mthu chung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bud med de rgod pa dang /_oM zhes bgyi 
[\[34b.5\]]bas gnon par bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas par bgyis te/_kha bub tu sgyel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te chab de la reg par mi bgyi'o/_/don yod rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/_de nas mig tshugs kyis blta bar bgyid na/_rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas 
[\[34b.6\]]bzhu bar bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste blang bar bgyi byug par bgyi'o/_/kun tu byugs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/_thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzegs par 'gyur ro/_/mig la byugs na phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[34b.7\]]pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang dang /_gnas rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_gang dag bzhugs shing gzhes la 'tsho ba dag ci ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_gang dag 'das pa dang /_gang dag ma byon pa dang /_gang dag da ltar byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas pa rnams dang /_gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang /_de 
[\[35a.2\]]bzhin du ci ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid la kun nas byugs te/_des byugs pa tsam gyis pags pa'i mdog lha'i gser dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/skra sngo la cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/_/mig lha'i ut+pal sngon po 
[\[35a.3\]]mchog 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe lha'i bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang /_mi'am ci'i bu mo dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi bu 
[\[35a.4\]]mo gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar yid la bsams pa dang /_yid la brnag pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i btung ba chen po bdud rtsi'i ro bro bdag 
[\[35a.5\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mdun nas rgyug par byed do/_/dgra thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad bcom pa dang /_nyams pa dang /_gtugs pa dang /_gshegs 
[\[35a.6\]]pa dang /_btsal ba dang /_gyes pa dang /_phye mar bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/yang na sman gyi bud med de'i skra kun bton te/_ska rags su bgyis nas bcing bar bgyi'o/_/gang du bcings pa de yang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro/_/gang du zhugs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur 
[\[35a.7\]]ro/_/de la lha thams cad gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad dang /_lha ma yin thams cad dang /_mi 'am ci thams cad dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing slar yang ldog par 'tshal na sman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi bgyi/_reg par mi bgyi bar lag pa'i phyag rgyas gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o/_/de nas gnas thams cad na gnas pa'i 
[\[35b.2\]]bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na sdod par 'gyur te/_kha cig gi lag na ni bum pa gang ba'o/_/kha cig gi lag na ni gdugs so/_/kha cig gi lag na ni lha'i gos thogs so/_/kha cig ni lha'i nor bu rin po che thogs pa'o/_/
[\[35b.3\]]kha cig ni dri dag go/_/kha cig ni me tog dag go/_/kha cig ni phreng ba dag go/_/kha cig ni rgyan dang lhab lhub sna tshogs thogs so/_/kha cig ni byug pa dag go/_/kha cig ni dri'i phye ma dag go/_/kha cig ni spos chus rin po che sna bdun gyi snod bkang ba dag go/_/kha cig ni 
[\[35b.4\]]lha'i 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dag go/_/kha cig ni lha'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog mdzes dang /_mdog mdzes chen po dang /_a 
[\[35b.5\]]ti mug ta kA dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_bar shi ka dang /_mthon ka dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_kA dam pa dang /_sna ma dang /_yu ti ka dang /_klu'i me tog dang /_kon ta dang /_g+han d+ha bar shi ka'i me tog dag thogs so/_/kha cig ni lha'i tsan dan go shir+Sha dang /_sbrul gyi 
[\[35b.6\]]snying po'i bdug pa dang /_a ga ru dang /_du ru ska dang /_tam la'i lo ma'i bdug pa thogs pa'o/_/kha cig gi lag pa na ni rma bya'i bsil yab thogs so/_/kha cig gi lag pa na ni ral gri'o/_/kha cig gi lag pa na ni mdung thung ngo /_/kha cig gi lag pa na ni rdo rje dang /_
[\[35b.7\]]dgra sta dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mdung dang /_gtun shing dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_gzong kha gnyis pa dag go/_/kha cig ni go cha dang /_ya lad bgos nas bsrung ba'i phyir kun nas 'du zhing mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/kha cig ni rin po che sna tshogs pa'i snod dang /_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]gser gyi snod dang /_dngul gyi snod dag thogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang /_gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog gis bkang nas thogs te/_de dag thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'chang gis 
[\[36a.2\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas yid la byed pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba yid la bgyi'o/_/mchog tu brtse ba'i yid la bgyid pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar dbugs dbyung bar 
[\[36a.3\]]bgyi zhing lam drang bo nas 'jug par bgyi ste/_seng ge'i khri la mngon du mchis nas/_don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa thog mar seng ge'i khri'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal bo/_bam po bzhi pa/_de'i 
[\[36a.4\]]'og tu rig sngags 'chang rang nyid mchis nas/_steng du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa la yang phyag bgyi'o/_/des dgra thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'og 
[\[36a.5\]]tu phyogs nas phyag bgyis na de nas 'khor los rig sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo gcad par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i rol mo'i 
[\[36a.6\]]cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal med khang chen po nas dbu rgyan dang /_cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do/_/dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab 
[\[36a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gser gyi char dang gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog dang /_lha'i me tog bkra ba sna tshogs kyi char dang /_lha'i rgyan gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu mos rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du bdud rtsi'i 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]bcud 'tshal te/_mchis nas 'bul bar bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis reg par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lha'i lus rnam par 
[\[36b.2\]]dag pa thob nas/_pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/skra lhag par sngo ba dang /_mig ut+pal sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro/_/gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshal na/_de'i bcud 
[\[36b.3\]]kyis len mchog las ci tsam 'tshal ba blangs te/_lha'i chab tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o/_/khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing /_ci ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong na ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[36b.4\]]mchod gnas kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rig sngags 'chang 'di yang mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg na 'dzam bu chu bo'i 
[\[36b.5\]]gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/rtsig pa'am/_ri 'am/_ka ba'am/_ljon shing ngam/_snod dam/_bum pa'am/_rdza bo 'am/_gos sam/_bong ba la reg na de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas/_dgos pa'i bar du 
[\[36b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/_lha mo 'am/_mi 'am ci mo 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang de gos gtsang ma bgos nas/_legs par khrus bgyi'o/_/tshes brgyad dam/_bcu bzhi 'am/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[36b.7\]]ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas/_nyin zhag gcig gnas par bgyi'o/_/'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/_de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_yungs kar re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/_/lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du yongs su 'khyil la 'khor lo'i gdengs ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[37a.2\]]nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te/_klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/_mi'am ci gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/_lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te/_gnas kyi nang du zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/'phangs ma 
[\[37a.3\]]thag tu slar yang kho nar drang bar bgyi ste/_ci lta bu'i don yid la bsams pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas/_ci ltar bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i nor ram/_dbyig ga/_gser ram/_nor bu 'am/_mu 
[\[37a.4\]]tig gam/_bai DUr+ya'am/_shang ka shi la'am/_byi ru'am/_sa le sbram mam/_dngul lam/_gos sam/_chas sam/_rgyan nam/_gzhan yang gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor pa can dag don du gnyer na zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi ste/_de thams cad 'dren 
[\[37a.5\]]par bgyid do/_/gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de dang der ji ltar yid la bsams pa de nyid shin tu gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i rigs sam/_bram ze'i rigs sam/_khyim bdag gi rigs sam/_rje'u 
[\[37a.6\]]rigs kyis ci dang ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo'i ming nas brjod de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/tha na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_
[\[37a.7\]]glang po che dang /_ma he yang 'dren par bgyid do/_/gang gi ming nas brjod de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs na/_de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te/_ci ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du thams cad 'grub par bgyid do/_/zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'tshal na yang /_zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/_zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/_zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcings nas drang bar 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' las 
[\[37b.2\]]babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/_ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/_/'on te zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na/_zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te/_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 
[\[37b.3\]]bzlas pa dang /_rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur na/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i stan la ci srid du 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing /_slar bde ba dang /_ma snad pa dang /_ma rmas pa dang /_legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nags khung du 'gro bar 'tshal na/_
[\[37b.4\]]gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas/_gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi zhing nags khung gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/_zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thams 
[\[37b.5\]]cad bcings nas thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas/_rig sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying 
[\[37b.6\]]po bzlas te/_lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o/_/zhugs pa tsam kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing /_dbus kyi nags kyi mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i chab dang sa shing rnyog pa ma mchis pa shin tu gsal 
[\[37b.7\]]ba lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa ha cang mi grang ba ha cang mi dro ba reg na bde ba ro dang ldan pa/_bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te/_de ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas/_lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /_rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba thogs te/_rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing spyi bo smad de 'dzum pa 
[\[38a.2\]]dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/_rje btsun rig sngags 'chang khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig_/rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par bgyi ste/_'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang /_rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /_'jig rten 
[\[38a.3\]]pa'i dngos grub grub ste/_bdag nyid kyi ma dang /_sring mo dang /_mngag gzhug ma zhes gar bde bar brjod la de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/_sring mo kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o/_/de yang rig sngags 'chang khyod 
[\[38a.4\]]rang gi gnas su snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing /_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so/_/de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang lha'i dril 
[\[38a.5\]]bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang /_gser dang /_gos dpyangs pa dar gyi chun 'phyang rab tu dpyangs par gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/_rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces 'bul bar bgyid do/_/de nas rig 
[\[38a.6\]]sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongs su bskyil te/_stan du bting la nor bu rin po che chen po de zhags pa'i steng du gzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/_/don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o/_/bzlas pa tsam gyi 
[\[38a.7\]]mod la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/nor bu rin po che chen po de las kyang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab de las blangs la skyor chu lan bdun du reg par bgyi'o/_/'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[38b.2\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bur rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur zhing /_shin tu yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas/_lag pa 
[\[38b.3\]]g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag steng 'i rig sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/_/zhes dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i 
[\[38b.4\]]sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/_sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/_/khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs/_/khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste/_/grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba bsgrubs/_/'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te/_blangs 
[\[38b.5\]]la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas/_oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o/_/oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyi'o/_/nye reg 
[\[38b.6\]]bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil zhing lag pa na 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe lo drug 
[\[38b.7\]]khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye bar bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/'on te gsang sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga slong na de'i tshe 'di lta bur 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi skra 'di sdoms shig ces de'i tshe bud med des skra'i ral pa bton nas/_rig 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]sngags 'chang la 'bul ba na/_skra thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkug nas srad bu la mdung pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi ste/_gcig bkal te/_mgo la btags pas ni ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul ston par 'gyur/_'bras bu 
[\[39a.2\]]dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur/_bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/_/mgul du btags pas ni mi gda' bar gyur nas/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi ma 
[\[39a.3\]]yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/dpral ba la btags pas ni lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/_phas kyi dgra bo dang mi mdza' ba dang /_
[\[39a.4\]]gdug pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/dpung pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing /_bdag 
[\[39a.5\]]gi nor du 'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa 
[\[39a.6\]]dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/_nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs par bya dang /_gcan gzan dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_gdug pa dang /_gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams 
[\[39a.7\]]dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/brla g.yas pa la btags pas ni tshal lam/_ser ga'am/_ri 'or ram/_phug gam/_dgon pa'am/_bsti gnas gang du zhugs te/_zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang /_sman thams cad dang /_lha thams 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]cad rang gi gzugs su mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/byin pa g.yas pa dang /_rkang pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/_rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_byin pa g.yon pa 
[\[39b.2\]]la btags pas ni/_nyi ma re re bzhin dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas/_dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/_/brla g.yon pa la btags nas dur khrod chen por zhugs na dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 
[\[39b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa gang ba bzung zhing /_lag pa g.yas pas bud med de bzung nas/_gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o/_/gnas mchog de'i dbus na rdzing me 
[\[39b.4\]]tog gi tshal par bkram par bgyi ste/_rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o/_/bkrus shing reg pa tsam kho nas/_'khor lo'i rig sngags 'chang zhags pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang 'bum 
[\[39b.5\]]phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro/_/nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don du gnyer na ni bu gcig pa bzhin yongs su 
[\[39b.6\]]skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/'bras dang /_'bru dang /_gos dang /_chas dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul yongs su 'grub par bgyid do/_/sring mo zhes bgyi bas ni dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar stobs par 'gyur zhing yan lag spong 
[\[39b.7\]]bar bgyid do/_/nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid nas mchi bar 'gyur/_lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/_lha'i khyim dang /_gzhal med khang stobs par bgyid do/_/mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi ba ni/_gang dang gang du 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]mngag pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te/_lha'i gnas sam/_klu'i gnas sam/_gnod sbyin gyi gnas sam/_srin po'i gnas sam/_'byung po'i gnas sam/_gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsams pa bzhin 
[\[40a.2\]]bgyid do/_/nags sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas rig sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/_gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/_gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bris la/_dri sna tshogs kyis byug_/ro 
[\[40a.3\]]sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la/_a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_dkyil 'khor 
[\[40a.4\]]gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_skra gyen du bsgreng ba/_mgo 'bar ba/_mig dmar ba/_mchu dang lce dmar ba/_
[\[40a.5\]]sen mo dmar ba/_skra sngo ba/_dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa/_gsus pa 'phyangs po mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/_mgo lnga pa sbrul ltar lce bsgyur ba/_stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/_lag pa na dgra sta dang /_dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas phyogs 
[\[40a.6\]]bcur lta bar byed do/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste/_brtan par bgyis la/_khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas/_'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo bcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o/_/
[\[40a.7\]]byugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid kyi lus mi chod pa dang /_mi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/mig gnyis phyung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na lha'i mig tu 'gyur ro/_/rkang brus te byugs na tshe bskal pa bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa bsags pa'i 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]rgya mtshor 'gyur/_bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang /_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/snying phyung ste 'tshal na nam mkha' la mchi'o/_/khrag gis snying gar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/lce bcad na ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad brlag par bgyid do/_/
[\[40b.2\]]gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/_de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'i/_/'khor lo zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo sa la brdab par bgyi ste/_lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang /_de'i 'og tu 
[\[40b.3\]]thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par bgyi ste/_zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang thad thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'on te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal na 
[\[40b.4\]]gyen du bltas nas/_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_bdag nyid la byugs te/_lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha'i go 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i gnas 
[\[40b.5\]]su mchi bar 'tshal na/_lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul nas bcing bar bgyi zhing don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_lha bcings pa gang yin pa de'i ming nas brjod na lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[40b.6\]]tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer ba de snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gis lha'i gnas su 'gro'o zhes brjod par bgyi'o/_/gal te gzhan bsams pa zhig mchis na 
[\[40b.7\]]mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/_/de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na/_lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pa na thogs te/_nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/ci srid 'tshal bar lha'i gzhal med khang chen por longs spyod par 'gyur zhing /_'on te mi 'tshal na lha'i 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]gnas nas slar yang 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan ci ltar rang gi blo gros dang /_yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad du grub par 'gyur te/_de la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/'khor lo'i zhags 
[\[41a.2\]]pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas rig sngags 'chang pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal bas/_rig sngags 'chang de gtsang ma legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/nub gsum mchis sam/_nub lnga mchis sam/_nub gcig mchis nas rig 
[\[41a.3\]]sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/_ras kyi skud pa'am pad+ma'i skud pa bai DUr+ya'i kha dog lta bur tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bgyi zhing khru nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te/_de la yang pad+ma bgyis te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma kha phye ba sor bzhi ba'i tshad kyis pad+ma gser 
[\[41a.4\]]gyi 'dab ma dang /_dngul gyi 'dab ma dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_in dra nI la dang /_rin po che ka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi ste/_de nas zhags pa la btags par bgyi'o/_/zhags pa'i thor to gcig la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya gdags par bgyi'o/_/de nas legs par 
[\[41a.5\]]brgyan pa'i chos kyi stan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o/_/ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri'i pad+ma bsams par bgyi zhing /_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi stan bshams la/_bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o/_/me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing 
[\[41a.6\]]a ga ru dang /_tsan dan dang /_du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/_/mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o/_/pad+ma'i zhags pa de yang chos kyi stan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rig sngags 'chang 
[\[41a.7\]]gis skyil mo krung bcas nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te/_bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/_/lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zla ba nya ba'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]pa bgyi'o/_/zhags pa de la yang mchod par bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/_/de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_nyin mtshan gsum dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang mchod pa 
[\[41b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas pad+ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[41b.3\]]nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i skyil mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la bsgom par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du blta ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzlas par bgyi'o/_/
[\[41b.4\]]de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas/_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing /_'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41b.5\]]rig sngags 'chang nga'i bu snying las skyes pa'i thu bo/_bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang /_mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang /_bzlas brjod kyi mchod dang grub pa'i mchog ste/_khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po grub cing /_khyod kyis pad+ma'i zhags 
[\[41b.6\]]pa chen po grub kyis/_ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig_/khyod kyis yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/_khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni grol/_khyod skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa'i 
[\[41b.7\]]'jigs pa las thar na/_khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni yongs su grol/_'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni yongs su thar/_'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/_rig 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cher 
[\[42a.2\]]bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni ldan/_rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni byas/_khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni lung bstan/_dmyal ba dang /_ngan song gi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni grol gyis/_ci ltar yid la 
[\[42a.3\]]bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cig_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma'i zhags pa de blangs te gnas gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/_/nam dgos pa de'i tshe 
[\[42a.4\]]zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o/_/las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa g.yon par bzhag la/_lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_sems can 
[\[42a.5\]]nam lha gang gi ming nas brjod de/_bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mdun na mchis nas/_'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan pa don du gnyer bar 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang 
[\[42a.6\]]gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te/_gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/_pad+ma'i zhags pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[42a.7\]]zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni rang gi mgul du btags la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas rig sngags 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]'chang gi spyi bor phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad lung ston par mdzad yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa dang sdig pa tshe rabs stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur/_lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur nas/_lus 
[\[42b.2\]]yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang /_ser sna spangs par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas/_lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas/_sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/mchod par 
[\[42b.3\]]'os pa dang /_bla ma'i gnas su'ang 'gyur ro/_/nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad/_legs pa'i lam ston 
[\[42b.4\]]par yang mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun na mchis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do/_/de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/bor ba tsam gyi mod la skal ba 
[\[42b.5\]]mnyam par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/_mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras pa'i lus pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/don 
[\[42b.6\]]yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar thon du bgyis nas sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /_cho 
[\[42b.7\]]'phrul chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_gnas mchog dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la blta bar 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang gis gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/_gnas sam/_khang pa'am/_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_'khor gyi khyams sam/_'chag sa'am/_khang pa brtsegs pa'am/_spyil po 
[\[43a.2\]]gtsang ma phyi brdar legs par bgyis pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'byes pa khru gang ba'am/_khru do pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/_gru bzhi lham pa/_grwa kun nas cha mdzes pa/_sa dang sbyar ba'i lci bas shin tu legs par phyi brdar bgyis la/_rtswa sngon po 
[\[43a.3\]]gnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cha dbye ba'i thig gdab par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying bo la pad+ma rgya chen po 'byes pa 'dab ma brgya pa/_tshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing mdzes par bgyis la/_snying po ni rin po che ka ti 
[\[43a.4\]]ka las bgyi'o/_/pad+ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la/_grwa bzhi nas kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o/_/pad+ma'i bar gyi zur zur du ut+pal sngon po legs par bris la/_kha khyer gyi phyi rol du nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mtshos bskor bar bgyi'o/_/lha'i 
[\[43a.5\]]chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la/_chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa bya rnam pa sna tshogs gnas 'cha' ba ngang pa dang /_bzhad dang /_khrung khrung dang /_ngur ba dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_bya'i tshogs
