[\[43a.6\]]kyis mdzes par bgyis la/_nya dang chu srin dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha' bar bgyid do/_/mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang /_me tog gi ljon shing dang /_'bras bu'i ljon shing dang /_sna tshogs pa kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 
[\[43a.7\]]'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol na lag pa dang thal mo'i phyag rgya bris la sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o/_/de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma'i gdan bzang po bshams te de'i steng du/_bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]mthu chen thob gzhag par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o/_/me tog sil ma dang /_dri dang byug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/_/gtor ma dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o/_/yon chab dang zhabs 
[\[43b.2\]]bsil gyi snod dang /_mar me'i phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o/_/pad+ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/legs par khrus bgyis nas ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis 
[\[43b.3\]]par gyur pas kha shar phyogs su bltas la skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/_lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o/_/snying rjes mchog tu brtse bar gyur pas sems can thams cad la brtse 
[\[43b.4\]]bar bgyid na/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyis te/_ci tsam na thun tha ma la/_'od dpag med 'bar bar gyur nas/_dkyil 'khor chen po de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[43b.5\]]rig sngags 'chang gis skya rengs shar tsam na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser spungs pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas/_phyag 
[\[43b.6\]]g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mi gda' bar gyur pa dang /_shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gnyid thob nas/_ci ltar nyal ba tsam mam 
[\[43b.7\]]mig btsum pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhal med khang dang /_gnas dang /_'jig rten dang /_yul ljongs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pa de chos ston par mdzad pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[44a.2\]]'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_lag pa 
[\[44a.3\]]g.yas pas gzung nas/_nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/zhags pa grub pa rnams dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor khri brgya stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//
[\[44a.4\]]de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/_shing shun dang /_ras skud dang /_kha che dar gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te/_khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la/_tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi ba'i tshad du bgyis te/_rtse lnga ba 'byung po 
[\[44a.5\]]la sogs pa'i mgo dang /_sbrul gyi ska rags kyis bcings la/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o/_/legs par khrus bgyi'o/_/
[\[44a.6\]]ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/_/rtswa'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa mnan nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khri bzlas so/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po stong bzlas so/_/de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te/_de 
[\[44a.7\]]bzung nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i rigs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rigs dang /_pad+ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang /_mthu 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dang /_brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro/_/lha'i lo khri nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags 
[\[44b.2\]]pa steng ngam 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas dgug par bgyid do/_/phyogs bcur 'phang ste khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas skyes pa dang /_bud med dam/_gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/_myur du dgug 
[\[44b.3\]]par bgyid de/_som nyi mi bgyi'o/_/gal te lha 'am/_klu 'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po 'am/_dri za 'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi 'am ci 'am/_'byung po 'am/_lto 'phye chen po thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du dgug par 
[\[44b.4\]]bgyi ste som nyi mi bgyi'o/_/zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/_mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_gnod 
[\[44b.5\]]sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing ci srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te/_bran bzhin du las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/_bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar 
[\[44b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_lag pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod du zhugs na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad kyi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje'i zhags pas brdabs na/_phug thams cad kyi 
[\[44b.7\]]sgo dbye bar 'gyur zhing 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/_/lam ngan pa dang /_mi ngan pa dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_'bab chu ngan pa dang /_sbrul dang /_dbugs gdug pa dang /_srog chags gon sa dang /_gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]chags su gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/mi drang bo dang lam drang bor ci ltar rang gi gnas sam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/_slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[45a.2\]]rdo rje'i zhags pa las thams cad bgyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrub bar 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des nor bu 'tshal bar bgyi ste/_rdo rje'am/_bai DUr+ya 'am/_shel rang 'byung ngam/_ma rgad dam/_in dra nI 
[\[45a.3\]]la la sor mo'i tshigs pas lhag tsam shin tu phyis la/_shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis la/_gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa/_mu tig gis dkris pa/_ge sar kha phye ba tsam pa ka'i me tog ci lta ba bzhin bgyis la/_ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsi mdzes pas 
[\[45a.4\]]kha bsgyur ba/_shin tu tshad la bab par bkal ba khru nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/_sor mo gung mo'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la/_thor to cig shos su ni nor bu 'am gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma 
[\[45a.5\]]bgo bar bgyi'o/_/legs par bkrus nas ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba gzhag par bgyid cing /_spos phor gyi snod bshams nas/_a ga ru'i bdug pa dang /_
[\[45a.6\]]tsan dan dang /_du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/_ba dan sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o/_/me tog sil ma dang /_dri dang rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o/_/
[\[45a.7\]]rig sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/btung ba ngan pa dang /_kha zas ngan pa dang /_gnas ngan pa dang /_lhag ma dang /_sbags rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri chig stong bzlas nas/_lag pa g.yas pas 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no/_/lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang /_de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/_yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_rig sngags 
[\[45b.2\]]'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par rgya cher bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nya la nyin 
[\[45b.3\]]zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/_mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul ba bgyi'o/_/de nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/_nyin 
[\[45b.4\]]mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_yungs kar re re nas brdeg par bgyi'o/_/lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna 
[\[45b.5\]]tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur/_rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na/_sgra chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[45b.6\]]ro/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[45b.7\]]gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis/_nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas/_rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur/_phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis/_rig sngags 'chang gi mgo 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bor bzhag nas/_rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub bo/_/khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[46a.2\]]las bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/_rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgur bsgyur ba thams cad de/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas/_rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi 
[\[46a.3\]]nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa la ltos shig_/yid la ci ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul sna tshogs la ltos shig_/rig sngags 'chang 
[\[46a.4\]]khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig_/'on te bde ba can blta bar 'tshal lam/_ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyi mchod par 'tshal lam/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/_lha'i me tog dang /_
[\[46a.5\]]lha'i dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_dril bu dang /_ba dan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan dang gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi ba 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 
[\[46a.6\]]'khor bgyis la me tog dang /_bdug pa yang dbul lo/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di/_lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/_lag pa g.yas pas don yod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog bzung nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_'di lta 
[\[46a.7\]]bu yid la bgyid pa chen po ci lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas/_don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_
[\[46b.2\]]bam po lnga pa/_dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad la 
[\[46b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 
[\[46b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[46b.5\]]dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM ma hA pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni ma Ni/_a mo g+ha ma Ni su ma Ni/_ma 
[\[46b.6\]]hA ma Ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_a laM kA ra/_ma hA a mo g+ha ma Ni/_tsa ra tsa ra sany+tsa ra/_ni sha tsa tsa re shwa ra ma hA/_pad+ma b+hu dza ba ra da/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/_pra ba ra ma hA bo d+hi satwa pad+ma d+ha ra pad+mA sa na pad+ma ma ku Ta/_mA lA d+ha ra/_pad+ma gau ra/_pad+mA laM kr-i ta ta nu/_sa ta 
[\[46b.7\]]sra b+hu dzas ha sra ne tra nA nAd+b+hu ta/_bra ba ra Na/_mu drA bi b+hU Shi tA sa ha swa b+hu dza/_dza ya dza ya/_sha ta sa ha sra ra smi pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_bi tsi tra/_A b+ha ra Na d+ha ra/_ma Ni ka na ka/_badzra bai DUr+ya/_mar+k+ka ta/_in dra nI la pad+ma rA ga b+h+rU Shi ta sha rI ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_bi tsi tra/_
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]ra tsa Na/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra dA brah+ma/_biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/_pad+me shwa ra/_lo ke shwa ra/_ya mAn+te shwa ra/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_r-i Shi ga Na/_ku mA ra/_senA ba ti be sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ma hA b+hu ta bi sha d+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She 
[\[47a.2\]]ka ta sa ma ya ma nu smar b+ha ga bAn/_pu ra ya me A tA shAn+ta tA rA ya pU ra shA yA ya sa twa na/_tar+dz+dza ya dush+TAM/_bA ta ya pig+h+nAM/_mA ra ya tri do Sha mA laM/_sa ra sa ra pA paM/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya/_ma hA cin+dA ma Ni/_a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bi pu la 
[\[47a.3\]]sid d+hi/_ma ma tri b+hu ba na di bya pra yats+tsha/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_saM b+ho d+ha ya/_saM b+ho d+ha ya/_ma hA ba shu pa ti ge Sha d+ha ra/_a nan+ta bi kur+b+ba Na/_r-id+d+hi san dar+Sha ya/_tu ru tu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_ga ga ne bi pu la bi mA na/_saM da ni ka_/na mo stu te bi pu 
[\[47a.4\]]la pu N+ya/_ko shA d+ha ra/_ma hA a mo sid d+he hU~M hU~M/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA~M/_bi pul kIrti ka te swA hA/_b+hu ba swA hA/_b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/_a mo g+ha bi pu le swA hA/_ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni sid+d+he swA hA/_ma hA tsin+ta ma Ni sid+d+hi bar de swA hA/_sarba sid d+hi bar de swA hA/_oM bi pu le shwa ra/_lo ke 
[\[47a.5\]]shwa ra/_ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni/_ma hA a mo g+ha sid d+he hUM phaT swA hA/_don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa lags pas mnan na nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul 
[\[47a.6\]]gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas/_byang chub sems 
[\[47a.7\]]dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i char sprin gyi tshogs chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des/_rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[47b.2\]]mchod pa'i char chen po de dag yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' las chu 'bebs par 'tshal na/_de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams 
[\[47b.3\]]cad kyi mchog don yod rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe bskal ba chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur 
[\[47b.4\]]ro/_/'on te babs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen 
[\[47b.5\]]po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu bsrung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang 
[\[47b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[47b.7\]]sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba'am/_phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba'am/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am/_lha'i zhal zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /_lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin 
[\[48a.2\]]gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba'am/_sbyin pa mang po dang /_chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba'am/_nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na/_
[\[48a.3\]]rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/_ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang /_bdug pa yang dag dbul bar bgyi'o/_/pus 
[\[48a.4\]]mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/_/
[\[48a.5\]]yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang /_sbyin gtong chen po dang /_kha zas dang /_btung ba dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab 
[\[48a.6\]]lhub dang /_rgyan 'phyang dang /_rol mo dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rin po che'i ljon shing dang /_'bras bu'i ljon shing dang /_me tog gi ljon shing dang /_mar me'i ljon shing dang /_dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyis te/_gsang sngags kyi gzungs 
[\[48a.7\]]bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/_de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsams pa bzhin de bzhin 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la 
[\[48b.2\]]mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du lan gsum du bzlas par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang 
[\[48b.3\]]bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang /_mchod pa bgyis pa dang /_rim gro bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[48b.4\]]dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang /_blo gros dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 
[\[48b.5\]]dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang /_skrag pa dang /_dngang ba rnams zhi bar 
[\[48b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/rims kyis ma lags/_dug gis ma lags/_dug sbyar mas ma lags/_sbyor bas ma lags/_mtshon gyis ma lags/_mes ma lags/_chus ma lags te/_lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[48b.7\]]dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/_pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags/_pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/_phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/_lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/_klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/_gnod 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_'dod dgur bsgyur ba dang /_sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun 
[\[49a.2\]]chad gzung bar mi nus shing /_rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/_de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/_mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'am/_'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa'am/_dam pa'i chos 
[\[49a.3\]]spong ba'am/_bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par 'gyur/_yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad 
[\[49a.4\]]bzlas brjod bgyid cing /_smyung ba lan cig bgyis te/_bzlas brjod byas na de bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing /_bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i 
[\[49a.5\]]sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/_sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bsten pa tsam mam cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas 
[\[49a.6\]]na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_mthong ba'i chos la kun tu 
[\[49a.7\]]bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang /_dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /_dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par skyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]'chang mthong ba tsam gyis/_mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/chung ngu na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa'am/_gum pa'i sha'am/_gum pa'i ro rul ba'am/_chung ngu na gum pa'i gos por ba'am/_rtsig 
[\[49b.2\]]pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na/_sems can de gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_de la yid gnyis sam som nyi bskyed par mi bgyid na/_gang dag 
[\[49b.3\]]ches mang du ltag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_gang rigs kyi bu po'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen pha'am/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid dam/_
[\[49b.4\]]brjod par bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_'don par bgyid/_sems par bgyid/_bsgom par bgyid/_mchod par bgyid/_bri bar bgyid/_'drir 'jug par bgyid na/_de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/mthong 
[\[49b.5\]]ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nyid bcangs na/_mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di nyid re zhig kun chub 
[\[49b.6\]]par bgyis nas/_mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/_dgos pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsams te/_bsams pa'i las thams 
[\[49b.7\]]cad bgyis na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pad nga bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas/_lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]du blta bar bgyi ste/_'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la/_lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/_lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs na mi gda' bar gyur nas/_gar dga' ba der 'jug 
[\[50a.2\]]par 'gyur te/_mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ci lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci'i gnas dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[50a.3\]]chen po'i gnas dang /_ri sul gyi phug dang /_ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[50a.4\]]nyon mongs pa dang /_nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/_zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/_bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o/_/gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/gtsang 
[\[50a.5\]]ma'i gnas sam/_phyogs su ba'i lci ba ste/_ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/_/gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/_/me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gang bas brgyan cing /_spos sna tshogs kyis bgos pa'i bdug pa gzhag 
[\[50a.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan bzang po bshams te/_shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum por bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o/_/dbus su nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 
[\[50a.7\]]'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o/_/don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_de'i 'og tu tsan+dan dang /_
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]a ga ru dang /_du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi ste/_zhags pa dang /_de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba'am/_lha gda' ba'am/_klu gda' ba'am/_
[\[50b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci gda' ba dang /_'byung po dang /_lto 'phye chen po gda' ba'am/_g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba'am/_tshe ring ba gda' ba'am/_tshe nyams pa gda' ba'am/_tshe 'pho ba 
[\[50b.3\]]gda' ba'am/_rgyal srid gda' ba'am/_grong 'thob pa'am/_yul 'thob pa'am/_grong khyer 'thob pa'am/_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shang ka shi la dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_gos 
[\[50b.4\]]dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan gda' ba'am/_nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang /_mig 'phrul smra ba'am/_zhing smra ba'am/_gter smra ba'am/_'bru smra ba'am/_bud med 'phrog pa'am/_las bsgrub pa'am/_gsang sngags bsgrub pa'am/_dbang du bgyi ba'am/_ngo mtshar 
[\[50b.5\]]ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'am mi dge ba/_de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/lo'am/_lo phyed dam/_gnod pa'am/_'tshe ba'am/_yams sam/_mi ngas sam/_mi ngas chen po'am/_phyugs ngas sam/_gor ram/_rta nad 
[\[50b.6\]]dam/_glang po che'i nad dam/_rang gi dpung ngam/_gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang /_skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ci lta ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang bsams shing gang gnyer bar 'grub pa'am/_mi 'grub pa'am/_dge 
[\[50b.7\]]ba'am/_mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/_de la the tshom dang yid gnyis dang som nyi mi bgyi ste/_dngos po don gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu bzhag na/_ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/ha cang 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma 'char khar nyi ma la bstan na nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba tshes pa la bstan na zla ba babs nas 'dod dgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do/_/
[\[51a.2\]]chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nags khung du bstan na sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro/_/ri phug tu bstan na sman thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/_ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/_/'bru'i 
[\[51a.3\]]phung po la bstan na 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/_gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma mo'i gnas sam/_nag po chen po la bstan te/_spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/_
[\[51a.4\]]dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/_blon po'i tshogs dang bcas/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig 
[\[51a.5\]]dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shang ka shil dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan 'chang ba dang /_khang pa dang /_ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen 
[\[51a.6\]]po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te/_don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na/_ci ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin/_me tog dang 'bras bu dang /_gzhal med khang gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bor 
[\[51a.7\]]dbang bskur ba khyim gyi steng ngam khyams su bzhag la/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyid do/_/don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]gcig bzlas par bgyi'o/_/de nas don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas/_ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin char du 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub la 
[\[51b.2\]]sogs pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_yams dang /_gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus babs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[51b.3\]]thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang sha kho na thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa nas gcan gzan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[51b.4\]]mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas rig sngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang gis lcags 
[\[51b.5\]]chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la lag zungs kyi ngos la dngul las bgyis te/_gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o/_/shing shun gyi skud pa'am/_arka'i skud pa dang /_kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan cig tu sgril la khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshad la bab par bkum pa/_bsgrub 
[\[51b.6\]]pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_zhags pa dang /_ral gri mnan la/_lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste gzung bar 
[\[51b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/khros pa'i gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas/_ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas/_rig 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing /_ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/_/lo khri brgyad stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'on te lag pa g.yon 
[\[52a.2\]]pas zhags pa bzung la g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/_khros pas hU~M zhes bgyi bas mnan na/_mi gda' bar gyur nas/_mi gda' ba dang /_zhags pa dang /_ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe lo khri thub par 
[\[52a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na/_bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po gdug pa thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags gcad par 'gyur ro/_/g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na/_g.yul 
[\[52a.4\]]'gyed pa'i mtshon cha thams cad bcad par 'gyur/_rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/_thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na/_dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rig sngags gtubs par 'gyur zhing /_gnas thams cad 
[\[52a.5\]]stongs par 'gyur ro/_/phug gi sgor bskor na/_'khrul 'khor dang sgo glegs thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro/_/sgo dang gtan pa thams cad gtubs par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur/_thal bar brlag par 
[\[52a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad du ci ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas yang rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des skud pa lnga las bsgrubs te/_tshon rtsis kha bsgyur 
[\[52a.7\]]ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin du gtubs la/_bsgrub par shin tu 'os pa las bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang /_ma d+hu'i me tog dang /_ra sa'i me tog dang /_ldong ros dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_nA ga puSh+pa dang /_shing arka'i 'o ma de lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]btsal te/_dus gcig tu lhan cig mnyam du btags shing spyi bor legs par bsku ste/_de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_sbrul 'khyil pa mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka can yongs su 'khyil pa gser gyis g.yogs pa/_legs par sbrel 
[\[52b.2\]]ba ni zhags pa'i mchog lags so/_/rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis la/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te/_dris mchod par bgyi'o/_/me tog gi sil ma dang /_bum pa gang bas brgyan par 
[\[52b.3\]]bgyi'o/_/ba dan gyis kun nas brgyan par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas su stan bzang po bshams te/_de'i steng du klu'i zhags pa bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o/_/sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogs su bstan no/_/dkar gsum gyi gtor 
[\[52b.4\]]ma gzhag par bgyi'o/_/mchod yon zhabs bsil dkar po'i snod dang /_bdug pa rnam pa gsum po tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_du ru ska rnams bsreg go/_/'bras yos dang /_yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[52b.5\]]phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/_rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te/_mchis nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o/_/thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_tshangs pa dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong 
[\[52b.6\]]rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o/_/sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/_/rgyun du sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur/_/stan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni/_/sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du/_/stan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur/_/de nas rig sngags 
[\[52b.7\]]'chang gis bzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas/_klu'i gnas su mchis te/_klu'i mtshor mchis na/_klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yod rgyal po bzlas nas/_sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du smra bas rig sngags 'chang zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzung ste bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o/_/de nas rigs 
[\[53a.2\]]sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor dang /_sgo glegs dang /_gtan pa thams cad gtubs shing bcad par 'gyur ro/_/zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mdzes ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing bklubs ma mdzes ma 
[\[53a.3\]]mchis nas/_rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te/_rigs sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do/_/rigs sngags 'chang gis blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/_bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang /_rig sngags 'chang gis 
[\[53a.4\]]bzed nas btung bar bgyi ste/_tshe nyi khri thub par 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang 
[\[53a.5\]]gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la/_don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma la bzlas nas bya ba par bgyi ste/_gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/char mi 'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon 
[\[53a.6\]]por bskor bar bgyi ste/_lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/ha cang char ches pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bzhag na char ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/grang ba'am/_rlung ngam/_ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang par sngar 
[\[53a.7\]]klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na/_dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/_/grang ba'i rlung dang ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/lo khyud 'khor tshang bar mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas [(]brdogs [,]bzlogs [)]la/_lag pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na/_nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zhal zas dang /_btung ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas skye bo stong stong tsam la stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[53b.2\]]de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la/_lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung nas/_dpyid dam/_ston ka'am/_sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/_nam 
[\[53b.3\]]mkha' la 'phangs na me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog bzang po gang ci yang rung ba bzang po shin tu smin pa/_kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[53b.4\]]bzlas brjod bgyis na/_klu'i gzhal med khang dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan 'phyang dang /_rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i tshe klu 
[\[53b.5\]]'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/_zhags pa bzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsnun 
[\[53b.6\]]la/_de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te/_rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa bskor na/_rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod 
[\[53b.7\]]bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbus su 'phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig bgrad pa/_lce bsgyur ba mig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bsams pa'i don de lta de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/_'bri'i rtsid pa dang /_rtsid pa chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang /_lcags 
[\[54a.2\]]las mdung rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/_de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par khrus bgyis te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar 
[\[54a.3\]]bgyi'o/_/zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'byung po'i 
[\[54a.4\]]gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/zhags pa lag par thogs nas/_dur khrod du zhugs na/_dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/_gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur zhing khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal bde bgyid par 
[\[54a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/ro'i mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing /_ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/bkrol na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin gyi mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs nas/_
[\[54a.6\]]gnod sbyin de yang mdun du mchis nas/_rigs sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka' stsol cig dang /_thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa'i las gyis shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/_bka' bzhin 
[\[54a.7\]]'tshal zhes de nas nyin gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na/_las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te/_khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/_gnod sbyin mo mchis nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/_rig sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzums 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]par blta zhing /_rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo la ma dang /_chung ma dang /_sring mos bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o/_/gal te ma zhig tu bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' 
[\[54b.2\]]ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_gos dang /_nor dang /_'brus yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/_/chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/_mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing /_de dang lhag par dga' bar rtse bas phye bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[54b.3\]]te sring mo zhig tu bgyid na/_yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang /_gos dang /_rgyan thams cad stsol bar 
[\[54b.4\]]bgyid do/_/nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do/_/rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te/_khros pas drangs nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/_de nas rnam thos mchis nas/_nyin gcig bzhin dong tse stong stsol bar 'gyur/_
[\[54b.5\]]gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/_des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa yang stsol/_bsod nams kyang bgyi'o/_/nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/_khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcag gis brdeg par bgyi'o/_/nag po 
[\[54b.6\]]chen pos sgra phyung ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi bgyi bar slar yang khros pas brdeg par bgyi'o/_/de nas mchi ma zags pa dang /_rig sngags 'chang gis ma bzed de/_thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig 
[\[54b.7\]]sngags 'chang gis slar yang thal mos brdeg par bgyis te/_de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyugs pa/_rig sngags 'chang gis byugs na nam mkha' la mchis nas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro/_/gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/_nag 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing /_ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pa pa dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[55a.2\]]mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas gzhan yang zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/_'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i/_/rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa/_/sgyu ma 
[\[55a.3\]]lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te/_/lag pa stong dang mig stong dang /_/mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan/_/rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs/_/khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni/_/gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to/_/gsang ba 
[\[55a.4\]]'di yi gzugs bstan pa/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/rig sngags sgrub pa bla na med/_/de nyid zhags pa bsgrubs phyir ro/_/de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can/_/'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa/_/sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang /_/de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba 
[\[55a.5\]]dang /_/bde can blta bar 'tshal ba dang /_/de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal ba/_/mchog tu gus par bgyi ba yi/_/cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis/_/de nyid gus par dang ba dang /_/shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyi/_/grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba 
[\[55a.6\]]la/_/sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bstan te/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog_/don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das/_/don yod 'bras bu dam pa po/_/don yod kun du grub pa 'thob/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/_/don 
[\[55a.7\]]yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon/_/'jig rten dbang phyug mchod sbyin pa/_/don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba/_/mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur/_/don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi/_/cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad/_/de lta bas na kun bsgrims te/_/bdag nyid yongs 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]su dag bgyis nas/_/ji ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin/_/rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs/_/rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing /_/zhags pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs dang /_/de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang /_/rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du/_/dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha 
[\[55b.2\]]dang /_/sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang /_/khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang /_/lha dang klu dang ston pa dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni/_/'byung po lha min dri za dang /_/nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci/_/lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun du/_/'jig rten mgon po mchog 
[\[55b.3\]]sbyin bstan/_/gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang /_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni/_/dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang /_/zla gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs lha/_/'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan/_/sems 
[\[55b.4\]]can rnams la phan 'tshal bas/_/gdul ba'i don du grol ba'i lam/_/sems can rnams la bstan pas na/_/de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi/_/mchog tu dang bar bgyi ba lags/_/ci ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams/_/ci ltar mthun pa bzhin du 'grub/_/ci ltar mthun pa ri mo'i 
[\[55b.5\]]gzugs/_/ci ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa sgrub/_/gnas 'di gang du 'os pa dang /_/gang du sems ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/goms pa gang gi phyag rgya dang /_/gang gi dkyil 'khor char dbye ba/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon/_/kun du sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso/_/
[\[55b.6\]]don yod 'bras bu stsol ba'o/_/don yod pa yi grub pa thob/_/don yod dgos pa thams cad dang /_/grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/_/mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur/_/zhags pa dang ri mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad 
[\[55b.7\]]par bya ste/_sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/_sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/_dgra thams cad 'joms pa/_bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/_gdug ba thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/_dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/_'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/_mi mdza' ba rnams 'joms pa/_pha rol gyi dpung ldog pa'i mchog_/nad thams cad 'joms pa/_mod la 'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/_
[\[56a.2\]]mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/_yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms pa/_lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa/_sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog 
[\[56a.3\]]sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ba lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/_klu rnams dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/_dus kun du shin tu mnyam 
[\[56a.4\]]par bzhag pas/_'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis par rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas pa bsrung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas/_
[\[56a.5\]]gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyi ste/_gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam/_/ca co ma mchis dben par ni/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o/_/zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi/_/don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms/_/rgyas pa rgyas pa thob 
[\[56a.6\]]'gyur te/_/thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/_/gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang /_/skrag par sdigs pa drag shul spyod/_/gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste/_/gsang sngags 
[\[56a.7\]]sgrub pa bla na med/_/'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi/_/sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o/_/me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang /_/de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa'ang dgug_/khung brkos de la pad+ma'i tshul/_/pad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi/_/cho ga ci bzhin khung nang gi/_/pad+ma la ni ge sar 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bgyi/_/gru bzhi'am ni zlum po ste/_/de lta bu ni brko bar bgyi/_/legs par byugs shing shin tu gnag_/shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab/_/tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang /_/shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi/_/bkra shis phyag rgya chen po ste/_/bzang pos gtor ma'i 
[\[56b.2\]]las bgyi'o/_/bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/_/bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod/_/thog mar me lha bkug nas ni/_/de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi/_/rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa/_/legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas/_/gsang sngags bzlas 
[\[56b.3\]]pa'i cho ga bgyi/_/de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi/_/bdag bsrung gtsug tor bcing ba dang /_/gzhan bsrung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_/de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang /_/rgyun du arka'i shing spar te/_/dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang /_/mar dang yungs kar 
[\[56b.4\]]'bras yos dag_/nyi shu gcig dbul me ston bgyi/_/de nas me'i lha dgug go/_/oM na mo\u0f85 g+ni dz+wa la/_ma hA dz+wa la/_dz+yod snA pra b+hA maN+Dal/_sarba bid Ahu ti rak+ti ni rata tuSh+Na dz+wa la/_d+hu ma shwa sa/_artsi ShA mu kha triSh+Na/_rash+mi da ba ag nish+tsa bid tu tash+tsa hU ta sha na mu kha na te/_sarba 
[\[56b.5\]]de bA nAM/_sarba yak+Sha ma hA bIr+ya ma hA dza ya/_ma hA bA la/_nir ma ri shan/_sarba da hA na pra bu la A kA sha sa mug gang kash+tsa a ba pras da kA shan/_man Da la pU dzi to/_ma Ni ta sarba tra di ba bya ru pa/_bi shA ra dang /_A bA hA na sarba da tra gAn/_de ba hU ta/_sha na hu tra/_sha na ta ma si bi 
[\[56b.6\]]d+ha ma ka na/_an d+ha kA rA na/_mug te rash+mi ma pri yang ku g+ha na d+ha pha lA ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_a gra dza/_sUk+Sh+ma su tIk+Sh+Nash+tsa mr-i ti sa na tsi bi na/_pri yo pash+mi push+mi push+pa b+ha sma b+hasta tsa b+ha sma bas+t+ra ni/_se ba ka~M_/b+ha sma sany+tsa d+ha nid t+yan d+hu ma mA ku la/_dzA ya se pA ka sid d+ha ras grA tsa ra sa rbad tra pra d+ha pa ri shA/_
[\[56b.7\]]sa rbad tra ni ra ma ri sha No/_nir t+ya spriSh+Ta d+hash+Ta na muny+tsa si/_dwa tring sha_/b+ha ba no de ba ag ni mu kha de bA ta/_e ru tsi ru dzA ba la ba da ka ma hA na ta/_a tha par No/_de ba de ba na/_bi shA ra da/_a yA na tu sA d+ha shi g+h+raM kar ma sA d+ha ya tad twa ta/_oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/_tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/_hu ru hu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/_gsang 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du/_/bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi/_/gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar la/_/spar bdun spar bas me la dbul/_/mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang /_/de bzhin spar ba'i spar bas so/_/dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang /_/bdug pa rgya 
[\[57a.2\]]cher dbul bar bgyi/_/de bzhin 'bras bu spar bar 'bul/_/de nas chab kyis bsang ba bgyi/_/ci ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du/_/nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su/_/sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/_/dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang /_/
[\[57a.3\]]blag sha u dum bA ra dang /_/sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang /_/kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang /_/pad+ma ut+pal thang shing dang /_/de bzhin dri bda'i tsan+dan dang /_/byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang /_/de bzhin gzhan yang dri bda'i shing /_/'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang /_/sha mi shi 
[\[57a.4\]]ba'i las lags pas/_/mchod yon de bzhin rtswa dag ste/_/de dag gis ni me spar nas/_/sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams bgyi'o/_/'bras yos tsan+dan phye ma dang /_/a gu ru dang du ru ska/_/kun du ru la sogs pa dang /_/du ru skar bcas spri ka dang /_/spang spos pri yang 
[\[57a.5\]]ku blangs te/_/de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing /_/mar ram mar sar lhan cig brdzi/_/don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni/_/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/lan stong 
[\[57a.6\]]rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa lags nas phyogs bcur blta zhing kun du brtags nas/_rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/bdag tshim par 
[\[57a.7\]]byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyis mchog slongs shig dang /_thams cad sbyin no/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blang bar bgyi ste/_ci ltar blangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]gis mchod yon gyi snod dag 'bul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing /_'bras bu'i shing spar nas/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/
[\[57b.2\]]stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas/_dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/_pus mo nub tsam du 'bul bar bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste/_blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing /_
[\[57b.3\]]rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam 
[\[57b.4\]]par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na/_cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na/_rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 
[\[57b.5\]]'byin par bgyis te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrubs zin gyis/_mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa/_de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[57b.6\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de la snod blangs te/_rang gi lag nas rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bar bgyi'o/_/'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[57b.7\]]lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po drug pa/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med 
[\[58a.2\]]khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang /_tshal dang nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang /_sbal mig dang /_lo ma dang /_rtsa ba dang /_myu gur 
[\[58a.3\]]bcas pa kha cig ni gser gyi me tog kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog_/kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go/_/gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag dang /_ta ma la dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_lcug ma'i me tog dang /_ta la dang /_g+han d+ha par shi ka 
[\[58a.4\]]dang /_sna ma dang /_yu ti ka dang /_ta ra na dang /_kub bya ka'i me tog dag dang /_tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid 
[\[58a.5\]]mgu ba dang /_yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i chu klu dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri'i chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang /_lha'i pad+ma dang /_ut+pal dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar pos 
[\[58a.6\]]legs par brgyan pa'i chab gser gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mo dang /_mi'am ci'i tshogs dang /_dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri za dang /_klu dang /_rig 'dzin dang /_mi'am ci'i 
[\[58a.7\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_lha'i 'byor pa gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang /_chos kyis 'khor 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]lo bskor ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do/_/de bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen po/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/_de ltar zas kyi gong 
[\[58b.2\]]bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so/_/phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 
[\[58b.3\]]'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag 
[\[58b.4\]]rgya ring bar phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang /_cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[58b.5\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du 
[\[58b.6\]]yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gos dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la 
[\[58b.7\]]sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'on te skal ba chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur te/_lha 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/phas kyi rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba 
[\[59a.2\]]dang /_gdug pa dang /_rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig 
[\[59a.3\]]pur 'gyur ro/_/bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_sems can thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/tshig btsan zhing don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'gum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa 
[\[59a.4\]]bzhed par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_pad+ma las rdzus te skye 
[\[59a.5\]]bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/_phyir yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs 
[\[59a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/dpral bar thig le bgyis na/_thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis/_rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/_/dgos pa thams cad bgyid 
[\[59a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de nas don yod bsgongs pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang sran ma ma shar bsres te bsgril la bsgongs nas/_mar dang bu ram dang /_sha kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi lhan du brdzis nas/_bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/_de'i 'og tu shid ka ra 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]bI ra'i me sbar nas/_bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis te/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad tsam sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang yungs kar dang me tog ci rnyed pa dang bsres te/_lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[59b.2\]]gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/'bras yos dang /_yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o/_/de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas/_rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs 
[\[59b.3\]]pas bkang nas/_rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/_lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po long shig ces stobs par bgyid do/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blang bar bgyi'o/_/blangs pa 
[\[59b.4\]]tsam kho nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas/_nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/_/pags pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los sgyur ba drug khri brgyad 
[\[59b.5\]]stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas/_las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[59b.6\]]don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par dbye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di/_nyin gcig bzhin sh+lo ka stong klog gam 'chang 
[\[59b.7\]]bar bgyid na/_tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma las brdzus te skyes nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshig btsan par 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]mchod pa chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/_/dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas/_'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas/_gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs 
[\[60a.2\]]pa de 'tshal na/_bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas/_yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang /_mkhas pa dang /_bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas skye bo 'bum zas btsal bar 
[\[60a.3\]]sems na/_'o ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/_gnas gtsang ma bcom skyungs par shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/_de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar 
[\[60a.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas/_'o thug gi nang du bstsal lo/_/de nas char bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de'i 
[\[60a.5\]]'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_lam gyis 
[\[60a.6\]]dub ba dang /_slongs mo pa rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o/_/ji tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang /_snod de gang ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bas par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_rtsod pa thams 
[\[60a.7\]]cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang /_mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro/_/nga ro lha ltar mnyen cing snyan la dga' bar bgyid pa ma yin pa'i dbyangs su mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba yang dag par 
[\[60b.2\]]stobs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe brjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas/_de gnas mthon po bla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung 
[\[60b.3\]]bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o/_/phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang gA'i bye ma 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang /_lha'i 
[\[60b.4\]]'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang /_lha'i tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan 
[\[60b.5\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig 
[\[60b.6\]]sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do/_/gang gi phyir yon spyangs nas/_skal ba dang mthun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang /_gzhan du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur 
[\[60b.7\]]ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis de la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/_'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/sgron shing dang arka'i shing gi yam sreg shing 
[\[61a.2\]]gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/_/sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/_nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/nub gsum du bgyis na/_klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor 
[\[61a.3\]]du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/nub lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi ma lags pa thams cad dang /_mi thams cad 'khor dang 
[\[61a.4\]]bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/nub bdun du bgyis na rig sngags 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/nub thams cad du bgyis na/_brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang 
[\[61a.5\]]gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo thams cad babs nas dbang du 'gyur te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/_arka'i 
[\[61a.6\]]shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/_rig sngags 'chang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/
[\[61a.7\]]nga mnyes par byas kyis/_rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang /_mchog sbyin te gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no/_/gter smra ba'am/_nor bsgyur bar smra ba'am/_zhing smra ba'am/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/_mi snang bar bya ba'am/_gsang sngags smra ba'am/_cho ga 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]zhib mo 'grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/_/rgyal bo nyid dam/_blon po nyid dam/_yul bdag nyid dam/_phyug pa nyid dam/_grong rdal 'thob pa'am/_gos 'thob pa'am/_ba lang dang /_rta dang /_ma he dang /_rnga mo dang /_lug 'thob pa'am/_nor 'thob pa'am/_
[\[61b.2\]]'bru 'thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/_/nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/_mi snang bar bya ba'am/_rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa'am/_ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa'am/_gzungs 'thob pa'am/_phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa dang ro langs bslangs pa'am/_rig 'dzin sgrub 
[\[61b.3\]]pa nyid dam/_ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/_nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/_phug tu 'jug pa'am/_dur khrod du 'jug pa'am/_nags su 'jug pa'am/_ril rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa de dag 
[\[61b.4\]]thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_pad+ma ze ba'i dbus nas rdzus te pad+ma las skyes nas skye 
[\[61b.5\]]ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor rim par dbye ba dang bcas pa/_cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te/_byang chub kyi snying po la 
[\[61b.6\]]thug gi bar du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o/_/de nas la du'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsgrub par 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des kha zas la la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/
[\[61b.7\]]de nas legs par khrus bgyis te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/de nas la du mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]lha'i la dus bkang nas dbul bar bgyid do/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te/_khye'u de'i lag tu gtor ro/_/khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/_rig sngags 'chang khyod ci zhig don du gnyer/_rig sngags 
[\[62a.2\]]'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_rig sngags 'chang snod kyi la du khyer cig dang /_'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no/_/rig sngags 'chang long shig_/
[\[62a.3\]]'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog yin no/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba de blangs te/_khye'u la yang khyed kyis kho bo'i grogs gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o/_/khye'u yis smras pa/_dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa'i grogs bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe 
[\[62a.4\]]dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/_gu gul dang /_tsan+dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyar nas/_don yod lcags kyus lan bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/arka'i shing gi me sbar ro/_/sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/_bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas dgos 
[\[62a.5\]]pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/las thams cad bgyi'o/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis mchis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o/_/bgegs dang log 'dren dang /_'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 
[\[62a.6\]]la du de la reg par bgyis na/_nam mkha' la 'phur nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang /_bye 
[\[62a.7\]]ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa drug khrir 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/_/la du lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/_don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]bskur te/_de nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad la stsal bar bgyi'o/_/longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/_slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur 
[\[62b.2\]]ro/_/ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/_ji srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang /_gtugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/la du la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/_de'i 'og tu gang du reg pa der yang 
[\[62b.3\]]gser bzang por 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/_klu'i gnas su 'phangs na de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur te/_sgo na char mi 'bab pa/_bsgo ba bzhin char 
[\[62b.4\]]'bebs par bgyid do/_/ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin/_ha cang char chen po 'gums par bgyid do/_/rlung dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do/_/phug gi sgor la du la lan 
[\[62b.5\]]bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_phug gi sgor bsnun na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa dang /_sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro/_/gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/_
[\[62b.6\]]bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na/_nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/_dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 
[\[62b.7\]]'phangs na 'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung ba thams cad sgren mor gyur na/_thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing /_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/rma ma byung ba'i mi ro la/_dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_lag pa gnyis su la du stsal la/_gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur 
[\[63a.2\]]na ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/_bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /_lo nongs pa dang /_nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_pha rol gyi dpung dang /_phas kyi dgra bo dang /_mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_mi ngas dang /_yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 
[\[63a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'am/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing /_dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring ba'am tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro/_/dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro/_/gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/_nor bsgyur ba'i gtam 
[\[63a.4\]]mam/_zhing gi gtam mam/_mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/_/cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang /_gsang sngags 'grub pa dang /_phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/_/mig sman 'grub pa dang ril bu 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /_
[\[63a.5\]]mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang /_ro langs bslang ba dang /_rigs ma dag pa dang /_dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/_/sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyur ro/_/nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro/_/'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa 
[\[63a.6\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dang /_da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chab kyi khar stsal la la du blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na/_rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang 
[\[63a.7\]]bcas pa bdag nyid dam/_nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/_grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u dang bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing /_nor chen po 'du ba 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/_dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par stsal na/_dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas/_nor chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis 
[\[63b.2\]]nas/_khug ma'i nang du stsal te/_mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyis te/_ci tsam du bsrel ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas/_gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gang na shing gcig pa'am/_'bab chu gcig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[63b.3\]]brjod bgyis te/_dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/_'dod dgur sgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang /_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[63b.4\]]gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag la/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/_chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur ba bgyis na/_de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang /_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas 
[\[63b.5\]]mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/_mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad
