[\[63b.6\]]bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/_khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na/_ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[63b.7\]]cad kyi spyan sngar/_lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la/_lcags kyu'i rgyal 
[\[64a.2\]]pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_me thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/_/de nas a rka'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar la/_la du de me thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/_mar dang yungs kar dang zho dang sbrang rtsi bsres la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[64a.3\]]tshang ba dang /_me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/_rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/bdag tshim par byas so/_/bdag dga' bar gyur to/_/rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis rig sngags 
[\[64a.4\]]'chang ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin 'dod pa smros shig dang /_mchog sbyin no/_/rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o/_/me lha des yang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad grub pa 
[\[64a.5\]]stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs nas 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te/_chab nas 'byung ba bzhin no/_/lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do/_/'bar bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na/_skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par 
[\[64a.6\]]mi bgyid de/_me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsre lan cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro/_/lus la bab na ci ltar tsan+dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gos kyi mtha' mar thum 
[\[64a.7\]]po bgyis na tshig par mi 'gyur ro/_/chab kyi nang du stsal na 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du dgos pa grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa thams cad 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang cho ga grub pa thams cad lung 'bog par 'gyur ro/_/du ba dang rlung dang me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur 
[\[64b.2\]]ro/_/dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas don yod me 'bar ba/_/bla med 'bar bzang bsgrub 'tshal na/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang /_/gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas/_/phyogs bcu khor khor yug gi/_/
[\[64b.3\]]kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid/_/sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'tshed pa bla na med pa 'grub/_/bcud kyi mchog de dam pa lags/_/nor sgyur smra ba bla na med/_/gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa/_/sgrub pa bla na med pa lags/_/ci ltar nyin bzhin mtshan gda' bas/_/
[\[64b.4\]]nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs/_/lan cig dgos pa sgrub pa na/_/legs par las bgyis nor bu dang /_/rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la/_/gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang /_/gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang /_/don yod chu dang me dang ni/_/me yi shing 
[\[64b.5\]]rnams brjod par bgyi/_/me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste/_/de dag thams cad gcig spungs pa'i/_/yam sreg cho ga bla na med/_/tsan+dan dang ni seng ldeng dang /_/pa tang ka ra bI ra dang /_/arka sha mi smyug ma dag_/sh-ir sha ka nA ki ra ka_/'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing /_/
[\[64b.6\]]blag sha dang ni sna ma dang /_/gan d+ha bar shi pad+ma yi/_/rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas/_/pad+ma dkar po ku mu da/_/ut+pal me tog lo ma rtsa/_/bI dza pU ra bil ba shing /_/sin du ba ra tsam pa ka/_/dre ka pi tsu mar+d+ha dang /_/sa ha ba la tsi tra ka_/shing de kun ga bsdus pa yis/_/yam sreg 
[\[64b.7\]]shing gis las bgyis te/_yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni/_/sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi/_/bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang /_/mtshal las gnyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang /_/srang gcig tsan+dan dkar po nyid/_/srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste/_/de dag 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang /_/de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag_/zhi ga dag ni bkang nas su/_/me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi/_/sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag legs gsal ba/_/gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi/_/gos gtsang 
[\[65a.2\]]legs par khrus bgyis pa/_/dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi/_/ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang /_/me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod/_/bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid/_/stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang ba dang /_/de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang /_/me tog bdug pa mchod yon 
[\[65a.3\]]snod/_/dbul te 'o mas mdag ma dgum/_/'o mas zhi ga zhi bar bgyi/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/de nas zhig 'bar bar 
[\[65a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhi ga de la mchod par bgyi'o/_/de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am/_dngul gyi sgrom bur zhig nas nor bu blangs te/_sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu ci lta ba bzhin du/_'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen 
[\[65a.5\]]po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na 'tsho ba dang /_sreg pa dang /_'tshed pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nam 
[\[65a.6\]]hom bgyid pa de'i tshe/_thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/_sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/_me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa 
[\[65a.7\]]dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos pa/_ya lad dang go char gtams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas/_gcig po g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na/_de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/de nas g.yul 'gyed 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams pham par gyur nas/_phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang /_dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lag pas nor 
[\[65b.2\]]bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na/_gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas/_lag pas nor bu bzung ste/_gnas kyi nang du zhugs na/_chab thams cad kyis phyir mi 
[\[65b.3\]]tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas klu thams cad mdun na mchis nas/_bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/lo tog dang rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_nags tshal thams cad 
[\[65b.4\]]bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/mnyen cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro/_/gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang mi bde ba yang chung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba 
[\[65b.5\]]de dag thams cad dang /_gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni/_nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so/_/de nas don yod snang ba rnam par blta bas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/_rang gi gzugs 
[\[65b.6\]]su lta bar 'tshal na/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/lus legs par bkrus te/_spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o/_/shing arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/_/yungs kar dang /_a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_zho dang /_sbrang 
[\[65b.7\]]rtsi dang mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/_mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsams pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang /_de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 
[\[66a.2\]]thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/_/de nas mig sman bsgrub par 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang de/_legs par bkrus te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_des zangs kyi za ma tog bgyis la de nas mig sman so'i bir dang yungs kar 
[\[66a.3\]]nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de'i steng du u sh-i ra dang /_yungs kar dang /_tsan+dan dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/shing arka'i me 
[\[66a.4\]]sbar bar bgyi'o/_/lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang /_ga pur dang gla rtsir bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la don yod lcags kyu'i rig 
[\[66a.5\]]sngags rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni thams cad du mgul la legs par sbyar te/_de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo /_/de nas mig sman gyis byugs na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig 
[\[66a.6\]]sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/dbral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[66a.7\]]dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur ro/_/nor 'du pa grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa'i dus sam/_bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na bgegs dang log 'dren dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams thams cad kyis 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/bde ba sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_gos 
[\[66b.2\]]dang /_lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyang mig mi 'dzums par lta bzhin du bdag nyid dam nor dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mig la byugs te dgon po chen por zhugs na/_chom po dang /_g.yon can dang /_rkun po dang /_gcan gzan gdug pa dang /_sbrul 
[\[66b.3\]]dang /_dbyig dug dang /_sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_bde legs su slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na/_smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te/_thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[66b.4\]]g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na/_thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing /_'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro/_/gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/_gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/rims zhag gcig pa 
[\[66b.5\]]dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_rigs zhag bzhi ba thams cad la mig la bskus na/_rims thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dug mi bzad par 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus 
[\[66b.6\]]na/_gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro/_/klad pa cher bro 'tshal ba yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang /_brjed byed kyis zin pa la yang mig la bskus 
[\[66b.7\]]pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po khros pas gsod par 'os pa gang su yang rung ba khrid pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i thar bar 'gyur ro/_/nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na rang gi gzugs kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te/_mig mi 'dzums par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas na/_dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams 
[\[67a.2\]]cad dang /_/'bru mang po rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus nas nyal na/_rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/dran 
[\[67a.3\]]pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro/_/mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na/_rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur 
[\[67a.4\]]ro/_/gi wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo dang blon po'i tshogs dang /_'khor 
[\[67a.5\]]thams cad dga' bar gyur nas/_thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro/_/dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig tu bskus na/_'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/nag po chen 
[\[67a.6\]]po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na/_gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags dang /_dug sbyar ma dang /_byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na dug sbyar ma dang /_byad dang /_gsang 
[\[67a.7\]]sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/_/bkres pa'i mig la bskus te/_grong du zhugs nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te/_bsod snyoms 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]la mchis na/_kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang /_yon phal po che 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sme ba dang /_ling tog dang /_rab rib dang /_chu bur dang /_mtshan mo 'thom pa dang /_g.ya' ba dang /_tshag po dang /_mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang /_mig sle bo de dag thams cad zhi 
[\[67b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i mig dag pa 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang mtshungs pa 'dab [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang don grub pa yang thob nas/_dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[67b.3\]]nas nor dang /_'bru dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan dang /_rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang /_'phel bar bgyid pa dang /_don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o/_/grub pa kun gyi bla na med/_/don kun grub pas mod la ni/_/
[\[67b.4\]]mkhas pa mchog tu dga' bar bgyid/_/dbang phyug skal ba phun sum tshogs/_/mod nyid kho nar thob 'gyur bar/_/the tsom du yang mi bgyi zhing /_/yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so/_/gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang /_/legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo/_/sbyin 
[\[67b.5\]]sreg bla na med 'phel ba/_/'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/_/ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas/_/'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/_/arka'i shing dang blag sha'i shing /_/yam sreg dag gis me sbar la/_/sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas/_/'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang /_/
[\[67b.6\]]zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi/_/sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang /_de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_gu gul ske tshe'i 'bras bu 
[\[67b.7\]]dang /_mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang /_de'i tshe bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gnas mal dang /_stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro/_/gos sna tshogs 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]dang lhab lhub dang /_rgyan dang /_rgyan phreng dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug gi 'byor pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas zla ba yar gyi 
[\[68a.2\]]ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bskus te/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/_khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas/_don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya bcings te/_de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus na/_nam mkha' 
[\[68a.3\]]la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad yang 'khyil par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na nyin par lta ba bzhin du mtshan 
[\[68a.4\]]mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po bdun pa/_mig sman 'dis 
[\[68a.5\]]mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/_lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid la khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o/_/de nas ma mo dang gtso bo'i lha thams cad mdun du mchis nas/_mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las 
[\[68a.6\]]thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur zhing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/_/rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gi wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho 
[\[68a.7\]]ga brjod par bgyi ste/_don yod rgyal po grub pa yis/_/rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing /_/lha dang lha min mchod pa dang /_/sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang /_/dbang du gyur pa dam pa dang /_/mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang /_/mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang /_/mod la 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]phug tu 'jug pa dang /_/nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang /_/ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang /_/thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang /_/klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang /_/de bzhin chu klung cher bsgral dang /_/rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyes pa dang /_/de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang /_/nad kun 
[\[68b.2\]]zhi bar bgyid pa nyid/_/sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/_/g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de/_/rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid/_/gdon rigs kun kyang tshar gcod cing /_/rigs rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid/_/sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing /_/sdig pa 
[\[68b.3\]]thams cad nyams par bgyid/_/dbang phyug stsol cing skal ba stsol/_/nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid/_/'thab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang /_/'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid/_/bcing ba dang ni shing sgrog dang /_/khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog_/rgyal po gdug pa khros pa 
[\[68b.4\]]yis/_/gsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid/_/da lta 'di la rten pa na/_/mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing /_/mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/'di ni kun du sdug pa dang /_/gnas kun mchis par mchod par 'os/_/lus can shin tu snying du sdug_/rgyal po btsun mo 'khor 
[\[68b.5\]]bcas pa'i/_/rtag tu snang chen dag tu 'gyur/_/dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni/_/rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang /_/bud med kun dang de bzhin du/_/skyes pa khye'u dang bu mo yi/_/rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur/_/gi wang bla na med pa po/_/'di la gang dag rtag 
[\[68b.6\]]brten na/_/'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste/_/mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod par bgyid/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/nyin dang mtshan du bsrung ba dang /_/rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so/_/gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang /_/klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang /_/'byung po 
[\[68b.7\]]gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/grul bum mi min lto 'phye che/_/dri za lha min nyid dag dang /_/nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te/_/de dag thams cad bsrung ba yi/_/ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu/_/rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur/_/gi wang grub pa dam pa po/_/de ltar stobs 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]dang ldan pa lags/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis/_/gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas/_/gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos te/_/gi wang legs par bsgrubs nas su/_/dmar po chen po nyid dag dang /_/gur gum dag dang mnyam sbyar la/_/zangs 
[\[69a.2\]]kyi snod du bkang nas su/_/don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du/_/stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas/_/rgya dar gyis ni kha 'gum mo/_/de nas seng ldeng gi shing dang /_arka'i shing gi yam shing gis me spar la/_'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang /_gu gul dang /_'bras 
[\[69a.3\]]dang /_til dang bsres la/_zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te/_snod kyi nang du stsal nas de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/_khro bo'i 
[\[69a.4\]]rgyal pos dbang bskur te/_phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro/_/de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis na nam mkha' la 'phur nas/_rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing /_skra cung 
[\[69a.5\]]zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/_/lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas/_gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing /_'byung po dang /_
[\[69a.6\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po mthu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/mig la bskus na ci ltar 
[\[69a.7\]]nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sa'i phug dang thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/thang gi gnas su zhugs nas/_thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/_slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na/_khyim dang gzhal 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]med khang ci lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ci ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 
[\[69b.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus mtha' dag byugs te g.yul ngor/_g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na ya lad dang /_go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa na btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 
[\[69b.3\]]mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gang la blangs na de dag thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la bsgo ba de dag thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/khar 'chos nas/_gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang /_
[\[69b.4\]]bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dang nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yas pa la byugs na su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyis pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba 
[\[69b.5\]]dang /_mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas/_bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro/_/mdzub mo g.yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang sprin dang /_'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na grang ba dang rlung dang ser ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad gcig khor 
[\[69b.6\]]khor yug tu zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang char ches pa gcod par 'gyur ro/_/char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs 
[\[69b.7\]]na/_de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mod la char pa mi 'bebs na de'i tshe lan lnga brdebs pa dang /_klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe/_klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan bdun bsnun na klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rigs phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/_bskus pa tsam gyi mod la 
[\[70a.2\]]gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rims gyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/_rims zhag gcig pa'am/_nyin gnyis pa'am/_nyin gsum pa'am/_nyin bzhi ba'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis 
[\[70a.3\]]na mod la nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sha bkra dang /_mdze dang /_rkang shu dang /_shu ba dang /_g.yan pa dang /_'brum bu rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lba ba dang /_lhog pa dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_shu ba mched pa dang /_'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs 
[\[70a.4\]]pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro/_/dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lto na ba dang /_skran dang /_dmu chu dang /_mchin pa na ba dang /_rtsib 
[\[70a.5\]]logs na pa dang /_snying na ba dang /_chu so na ba dang /_gzhang nad dang /_tshad pa dang /_gcin srib dang /_gsud pa dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_rtug skams la sros na 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_mchog 
[\[70a.6\]]mar gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te/_phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la byugs te/_mgo la thal mo brdabs na/_phug gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/_slar cung zad kyang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnas de na 
[\[70a.7\]]gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa gnyis la byugs te/_me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas lag pa nas bzung 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]ste/_rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs shig_/rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/_de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/_thams cad bgyid par 
[\[70b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/_glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/brla gnyis la byugs na tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyad du 'gyur ro/_/byin pa gnyis la byugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/mgrin pa la byugs nas 
[\[70b.3\]]nags khung du zhugs na/_nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/_/gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang sman gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po 
[\[70b.4\]]lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/_ri sul dang sman gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing /_de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing /_las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[70b.5\]]de nas rtswa dang shing gel ba dang /_nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing /_gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la/_bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 
[\[70b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/ci ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/snying gar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang /_yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/lto la thig le 
[\[70b.7\]]bgyis na kha zas dang btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na/_ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/sgal tshigs la byugs 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang /_stan thob par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba la byugs sam/_gnad dang gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na/_ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thob par 'gyur ro/_/mjug do la byugs na/_rta'i bzhon pa thob 
[\[71a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/_nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags na 
[\[71a.3\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro/_/zhag bcu bzhi bgyis na mi'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/_/ka la bing ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i 
[\[71a.4\]]dbyangs su 'gyur ro/_/bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsal na bya rog lta bu dang /_mo sham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/btson rar stsal ba dang /_shing sgrog dang /_lcags sgrog dang /_gtan pa dang /_khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag 
[\[71a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'thor bar 'gyur ro/_/tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'am tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi wang gi ril bu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o/_/khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad 
[\[71a.6\]]dang /_sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/nub gsum du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_sgrub pa dang /_grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/phas kyi rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_gdug pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad kyis 
[\[71a.7\]]mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyi thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/gi wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]na bu bzhin du pang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang /_rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lus thog thag tu byugs na gsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phrog par mi 'gyur te/_dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/_/mda' 'phangs na lus 
[\[71b.2\]]la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro/_/gi wang gi ril bu mgul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang ri dang /_nags tshang tshing bgrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang /_g.yon can dang /_rkun po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang mi ma lags pa 
[\[71b.3\]]dang /_gcan gzan gdug pa dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[71b.4\]]thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rdzi ba med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/_thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i 'os chen 
[\[71b.5\]]por 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/byin pa g.yas pa la btags na dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gi wang gi ril bu khar bsrel la lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyis don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar 
[\[71b.6\]]gnas mthon por 'dzegs te phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na mod la bkug par 'gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang gdon mi 'tshal bar 
[\[71b.7\]]de zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa'am lag pa g.yon pa la gi wang gi ril bu btags na gang du reg par nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_shang ka shil dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]dngul dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/_ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bya tshang du zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabs na 'tshed pa dang 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/_
[\[72a.2\]]ci 'tshal ba de mchis par 'gyur ro/_/spos 'tshong gi tshong khang du mchis na tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bad ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[72a.3\]]bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na bu ram gyi khu ba dang /_sha kha ra'i glegs bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid 
[\[72a.4\]]bskrogs par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bo'i sgor btab na bskrad par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon cha dang /_go cha rnams rengs pa dang /_rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i sgor btab na phas kyi rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_sems can 
[\[72a.5\]]gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang /_rengs pa dang /_rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/dung la byugs nas gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_byad dang /_dug sbyar ma dang /_dug dang /_nad 
[\[72a.6\]]las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gyi sgor bus na yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/phyugs lhas su bus na 'o ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/ra lug gi lhas su bus na 
[\[72a.7\]]ra lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/_gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na thams cad sgren por gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/_/rdza rnga la byugs te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang ba dang /_rlung dang /_ser ba thams 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]cad bcings pa dang gshig par 'gyur te/_tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer ram/_yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na nad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[72b.2\]]'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mi ngas dang /_mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/_thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[72b.3\]]de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong bzhi ba dang /_rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_'byung po dang /_
[\[72b.4\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_gdon dang /_brjed byed thams cad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyid pa'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/_spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/_gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams 
[\[72b.5\]]pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag cing /_sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang /_snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/_arka'i shing dang /_sha mi'i shing dang /_shing 'o ma can nam/_ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/_de dag gi yam sreg 
[\[72b.6\]]shing gis me sbar la/_'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma'i ldum bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar du bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[72b.7\]]pos dbang bskur te/_don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo /_/de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_nad dang /_mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]pa dang /_rang gi dpung dang /_gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_chom po dang /_g.yon can dang /_rkun po dang /_gcan gzan gdug pa can dang /_sbrul dang /_dug mi bzad pa dang /_gdug 
[\[73a.2\]]pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad brgyar kho ra khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/_gnod pas ma lags/_nad kyis ma lags te/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_gdon 
[\[73a.3\]]rnams kyis mi tshugs te/_rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_'khrug pa dang /_skrod pa dang /_mdangs gcod pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_sdig pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te/_rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[73a.4\]]sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/_/shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[73a.5\]]shin tu smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshang tshing dang /_myu gu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_
[\[73a.6\]]yul de na dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams rtag tu na da ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar 'tsho ba dang /_yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa dang /_
[\[73a.7\]]snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir dpag 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te/_yongs su skyong ba dang /_srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /_srung ba 
[\[73b.2\]]dang /_yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang 
[\[73b.3\]]phyug chen po dang /_lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba dang /_yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong dang /_bram 
[\[73b.4\]]ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang /_sgrib 
[\[73b.5\]]pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[73b.6\]]la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang /_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u 
[\[73b.7\]]dang /_bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su bsrung ba dang /_yid kyis brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/_yang nas yang du blta bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang /_dri chu skyo ma bgyis te 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na mtshams chen po bcad par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/nad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dri chab dang thal bas khrus 
[\[74a.2\]]bgyis na thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/btson ra na mchis pa'am/_phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro/_/gdug pas zin pa dang /_dug gis myos pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro/_/me dgug 
[\[74a.3\]]pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so//_//de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/_'di ni ma bsgrubs 
[\[74a.4\]]par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang /_/shin tu bkra shis mchog dge la/_/legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo/_/byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag_/sems can kun la brtse ba dang /_/snying rje dam pas brgyan pa dang /_/don yod 
[\[74a.5\]]zhags pa'i rig sngags che/_/grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal/_/bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag_/'grub par bgyid de som nyi med/_/'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag_/de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na/_/lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyi/_/phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur/_/ci 
[\[74a.6\]]ltar gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la/_/bsod nams phung po khri phrag bskyed/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang /_/sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/_/smyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig_/mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyid pa/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/_/
[\[74a.7\]]dge bsnyen pho mos de bzhin du/_/bde ba can du myur du mchi/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur ba'i/_/nyon mongs pa las thar bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub dag_/mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med/_/de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/_bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na/_/rig sngags 'chang la de nyid 'grub/_/don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi/_/mdun du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi/_/gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu/_/tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis/_/gru bzhi lham par thig gdab 
[\[74b.2\]]bo/_/ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag_/dbus nas ngos bzhir gshis su dbab/_/tsan+dan dkar pos bri ba ni/_/dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dang /_/'dab brgya gur gum gyis gtor zhing /_/pad+ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu/_/ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni/_/spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi/_/
[\[74b.3\]]yungs kar ldan pa gzhag par bgyi/_/a ga ru yi bdug pa dbul/_/bum pa gang bar dgod par bgyi/_/me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi/_/mchod yon snod kyang bzhi gzhag go/_/rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pas/_/gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi/_/legs bkrus 
[\[74b.4\]]rnam par dag pa dang /_/gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang /_/dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su/_/dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o/_/dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi ba ni/_/don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag_/dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad/_/'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 
[\[74b.5\]]gi/_/mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te/_/bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su/_/bgrang phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi/_/mdzub mo dag ni mthe bo dag_/brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi/_/yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag_/ting 'dzin brtag pas lus snyoms par/_/legs 
[\[74b.6\]]par bzhag ste zhi bar lta/_/tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bgyi/_/bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/_sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/_phyag rgya bcings nas sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi 
[\[74b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i zhabs mthong ba tsam du bris la/_ci tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas so/_/lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang /_bzhin 'dzum pa dang /_shin tu rab tu dga' bas spu zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du 
[\[75a.2\]]blta bar bgyi ste/_gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngos g.yas pa nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mig sgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/_rig sngags 'chang gis sgrib 
[\[75a.3\]]pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/lus 'jam pa dang shin tu gzhon 
[\[75a.4\]]sha chags pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil pa dang mnyen pa dang /_snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro/_/mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lus yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa dang /_gnyer ma dang /_skra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams 
[\[75a.5\]]cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ci tsam du 'dug ce na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid do/_/lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' la 
[\[75a.6\]]mchi ba'am/_mi gda' bar bgyi ba'am/_lha'i mig 'thob pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing la blta ba'am/_ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa'am/_gzungs rab tu 'thob pa'am/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa'am/_gtsug lag smra ba'am/_gsang sngags smra 
[\[75a.7\]]ba'am/_thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/_gter smra ba'am/_nor sgyur ba smra ba'am/_mig 'phrul smra ba'am/_'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/_phug tu 'jug pa'am/_klu'i gnas su 'jug pa'am/_zhing smra ba'am/_gnod sbyin dgug pa'am/_srin po dgug pa'am/_ro langs bslang 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ba'am/_nags khrod du 'jug pa'am/_ri la rgyu ba'am/_grong khyer du 'jug pa'am/_sman blta ba'i phyir 'jug pa'am/_ral gri rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/_grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/_'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/_rgyal bo 'thob pa'am/_yul 'thob pa'am/_yul gyi 
[\[75b.2\]]bdag po nyid dam/_dpung chen po rab tu 'joms pa'am/_bskrad pa'am/_rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[75b.3\]]ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na/_sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/mig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas/_des zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te/_tsan+dan gyi dkyil 
[\[75b.4\]]'khor bgyis la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun na skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i 
[\[75b.5\]]mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun du bzlas par bgyi'o/_/zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas/_'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas 
[\[75b.6\]]brjod bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/_zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang /_rlangs pa dang /_dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de blangs nas mig la byugs na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 
[\[75b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_gdon dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/tshes brgyad dam/_bcu bzhi'am/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la 
[\[76a.2\]]tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/_lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis 
[\[76a.3\]]nas/_lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang /_dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas/_tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal 
[\[76a.4\]]pa stong du 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[76a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du/_lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i gzhal med khang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rang gi lus rdo rje 
[\[76a.6\]]sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus 
[\[76a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/_lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu thams 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang /_brjed byed thams cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/_bden pa'am mi bden pa'am yang dag pa'am/_
[\[76b.2\]]yang dag pa ma lags pa'am/_skal ba dang ldan pa'am skal ba dang mi ldan pa'am/_byung ba'am/_ma byung ba'am/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dran bzhin 
[\[76b.3\]]du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba'am/_thams cad dbang du gyur nas gzhag par 'tshal lam/_thams cad sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar bgyi bar 
[\[76b.4\]]'tshal lam/_don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'tshal lam/_rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'tshal lam/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so ba bzhin 
[\[76b.5\]]du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/_ral pa'i thor tshugs dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i pags pas brgyan pa/_phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_skyil mo krung ngam 'greng ba dang drung na nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pus 
[\[76b.6\]]mo g.yas pa phab pa/_g.yon pa khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/_'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/_ri'i steng gi pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o/_/gtsang mas 
[\[76b.7\]]gos gtsang ma bgos te/_dus gsum du khrus bgyis na nyin zhag gcig mchis te/_rig sngags 'chang gis ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/_/chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bas/_dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o/_/gal 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]te 'di lta bu'i cho gas mi bgyid na/_bklags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/_bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho gas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin 
[\[77a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/_blta bar 'tshal lam/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/_sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu gzhag par 'tshal ba'am/_thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par 
[\[77a.3\]]dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/_rig sngags 'chang des dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen pha'am/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rgyal po'am/_btsun mo'am/_gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/_des ci 'byor pa'i gser las don yod pa'i 
[\[77a.4\]]zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o/_/de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te gzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/_gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma'i phreng ba bgyi'o/_/pad+ma'i phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang 
[\[77a.5\]]bgrang phreng gzhag par bgyi'o/_/me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o/_/spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bgyi'o/_/mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o/_/pog phor gyi snod lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par 
[\[77a.6\]]bgyi'o/_/dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba'ang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung btsas te mchis nas don 
[\[77a.7\]]yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/_bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas/_phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod kyi phyag 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dngas chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan 
[\[77b.2\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/_grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang nas 
[\[77b.3\]]rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/don yod zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs 
[\[77b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad+ma dri ma med pa zhes bgyi 
[\[77b.5\]]ba'i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dge 
[\[77b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de la lha thams cad dang /_tshangs pa la sogs te/_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/_rtag tu rjes su 'brang 
[\[77b.7\]]zhing srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po brgyad pa/_des ci 'byor ba'i gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la/_de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te gzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba legs par mdzes pa byas te/_li khris thig btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma bri/_pad+ma'i dbus su ril ba b+h+r-ing gar dang bgrang phreng bri/_
[\[78a.2\]]me tog sna tshogs bkram la bum pa spos chus bkang la/_me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag_/mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya zhing /_pog phor lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/_/spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam ste/_
[\[78a.3\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/_skyil mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro/_/
[\[78a.4\]]khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas la/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te yid kyis phyag byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/_bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o/_/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' 
[\[78a.5\]]la 'bar bar snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral ba'i gseb 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni/_dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma 
[\[78a.6\]]ston to/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/_rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa 
[\[78a.7\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhal ston par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni/_skya rengs shar ba'i 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]dus kyi tshe/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/_pad+ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing /_dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/_/rgyal ba 'od dpag med legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/_/gang la 
[\[78b.2\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa bskrun par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 
[\[78b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[78b.4\]]dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/_tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab kyis bkang ba gzhag par bya zhing /_mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya'o/_me tog sna tshogs pa bkram zhing /_tsan+dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs 
[\[78b.5\]]te/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o/_/dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing /_bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu gzhag par bgyi'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang 
[\[78b.6\]]mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo /_/bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/_skyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba pad+ma'i tshul du byas la/_bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_shar 
[\[78b.7\]]phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing /_bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo /_/rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur te/_ming brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bsgo ba de byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher brjod par 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing /_
[\[79a.2\]]bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum du bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo'i lha dang 
[\[79a.3\]]nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas/_klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo la 
[\[79a.4\]]sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/_/zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la/_tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/_me tog dmar po bkram la/_bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing /_mar gyi mar 
[\[79a.5\]]me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o/_/mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bya'o/_/ras 
[\[79a.6\]]la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/_sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/_/sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[79a.7\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o/_/sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o/_/bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o/_/brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grag par 'gyur la/_dmyal 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]ba pa'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing /_bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 
[\[79b.2\]]dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing /_sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni/_sa'i 'og 
[\[79b.3\]]gi sems can mun gnag snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing /_'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing rga ba 
[\[79b.4\]]dang /_'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_tshe bskal par thub par 'gyur ro/_/shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi 
[\[79b.5\]]bar du/_de nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing /_mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga pur dang /_spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/_yang legs par btags la/_kun tu ru dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_gan 
[\[79b.6\]]d+ha ra sa dang /_chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/_sha khar btab la/_legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi ba'i tshad du byas te/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang /_e ne ya'i pags pas bzhag pa/_phyugs 
[\[79b.7\]]bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/_phyag bzhi gcig na pad+ma thogs/_gnyis pa na zhags pa thogs/_gsum pa na gsal shing thogs pa/_bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa/_gdan pad+ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/_g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/_g.yon du dri med 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'gro bya'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro bo'i rgyal po'o/_/gong du ni 'od dpag med do/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs su bgos la tshes brgyad nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du dus gsum 
[\[80a.2\]]du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing /_tshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang /_rig sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du blta ba bri bar bya'o/_/grwa bzhir dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen 
[\[80a.3\]]po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha bri bar bya'o/_/sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor khor yug tu pad+ma bri bar bya'o/_/grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba gzhag par bya'o/_/sgo bzhir dri dang gtor ma dang bum pa bkang ba gzhag go/_/dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod yon gyi 
[\[80a.4\]]snod brgyad gzhag go/_/me tog sna tshogs pa bkram par bya zhing /_a ka ru dang /_tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/_'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs pas legs par brgyan par bya ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[80a.5\]]dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan la mchod par bya'o/_/ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa/_srid du khru bcu drug pa thor to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig thor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun kor btags te/_sbrul 'khyil pa bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[80a.6\]]dbus su bzhag ste/_gtsang mas gos gtsang mas g.yogs par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/_skyil mo krung du 'dug la/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bcing ba byas la bdag bsrung ngo /_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[80a.7\]]bzlas par byas la/_dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis brgyan par byas la/_bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/_mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng du 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]gtor bar bya ste/_stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la dgos pa 
[\[80b.2\]]thams cad byos shig_/khyod kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma grub pas/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig 
[\[80b.3\]]rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_spos des dpag tshad drug tsam du khyab par byed do/_/gang la dri mnams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_byad 
[\[80b.4\]]dang /_dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la zangs kyi gab tshe 
[\[80b.5\]]bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o/_/nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe/_gtsang mas khrus legs par byas te/_blang bar bya zhing dgos par bya'o/_/nyin re bzhin dus gsum du mchod par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang 
[\[80b.6\]]de yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag pa dang /_sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/_shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad+ma'i snying po 
[\[80b.7\]]las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/_
[\[81a.2\]]rang nyid nor dang bcas/_dbyig dang bcas/_'bru dang bcas/_bran pho dang bcas/_bran mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog rnying pa de bsdus la gla rtsi dang /_pri yang ku dang /_rgya spos dang /_ru rta dang /_gur gum dang /_spang spos dang /_swa ma ka dang /_spr-i ka dang /_
[\[81a.3\]]na la da dang /_bo la dang /_yungs kar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril bu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog_/pad+ma zhes bya ste/_thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed nad thams cad sel ba dang rims nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do/_/btsog shu dang /_'bras 
[\[81a.4\]]dang /_me dbal dang /_rkang shu dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_de thams cad la ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na sdig pa sel to zhes thub pas gsungs so/_/tshe sbyin par byed/_rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do/_/
[\[81a.5\]]thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang /_bud med rnams dga' ba dang /_dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/byad 'joms shing dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_phye ma'i dug dang /_gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag kyang de bzhin no/_/zas za ba 
[\[81a.6\]]dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na/_de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo /_/klad pa'i nad mi bzad pa la ni byug par bya'o/_/mig na ba la ni mig sman gyi thur mas so/_/so na ba la ni khar mur ro/_/lto na ba la ni chu 
[\[81a.7\]]dron dang ngo /_/rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang byug go/_/yan lag dang nying lag na ba la ni bsku bar bya'o/_/dbang du bya ba ni lag mthil la bsku bas so/_/nad tshabs che ba la ni sku mnye dang khrus bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni sna nas btang ba'i las bya'o/_/bdug pas ni 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyas thebs pa la ni mtshog mar thig le bya'o/_/snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tsha bsres pa'o/_/khyim zhi bar bya la ni 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas 
[\[81b.2\]]so/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa rnams la ni ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/_dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang /_mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang /_pog phor bzhi bzhag ste/_a ga ru dang du ru skas bdug go/_/gu gul la lan nyi shu 
[\[81b.3\]]rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na/_'thab 
[\[81b.4\]]pa dang /_rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te brgya byin rang dang /_lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/_mi rnams kyis 
[\[81b.5\]]lta ci smos/_brgya byin dgug par 'dod na pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing /_dri chab kyang dbul lo/_/gu gul dang /_mar dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[81b.6\]]bzlas te/_shing arka'i me sbar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o/_/bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/_bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs 
[\[81b.7\]]pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de de ni sems mi bzod do/_/tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug ste/_mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do/_/gu gul 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]la lan dgu bcu bzlas te/_khyab 'jug la bdug cing chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na/_khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to/_/hi ra N+ya 
[\[82a.2\]]ka shi bu la yang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na/_rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro/_/gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug 
[\[82a.3\]]cing /_arka'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya bar sgra 'byung ngo /_/de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing /_rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams 
[\[82a.4\]]cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/_/mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing /_yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
[\[82a.5\]]nas/_nag po chen po'i steng du gtor na khugs par 'gyur te/_bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing /_gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'bye bar 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa 
[\[82a.6\]]byed do/_/thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na mtshan mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mtshan mo rgyu ba dang /_nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[82a.7\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so/_/mtshan mo longs spyod par gzhal med 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]khang thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang snying rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o/_/bzlas brjod 
[\[82b.2\]]kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o/_/de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa dge bzhi ba rgyas pa drag shul spyod pa srung ba nad thams cad sel pa/_byang 'jig pa/_dbang du byed pa/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/khyim srung bar 'dod pas arga'i yam sreg shing dang /_pad+ma dang /_
[\[82b.3\]]yungs mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/_khyim chen po bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_khrag khrug thams cad dang 
[\[82b.4\]]phyir rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba thams cad dang /_rims thams cad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_mu ge'i gnod pa dang /_mi ngas dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang skyob 
[\[82b.5\]]pa dang sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg gi mar dang /_yungs kar dang /_gu gul gyi sbyin sreg stong 
[\[82b.6\]]rtsa brgyad byas na/_yul dang /_yul 'khor dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul gru dang /_ri khrod dang /_ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang /_gan d+ha pri yang ku dang /_rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang 
[\[82b.7\]]bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po dang /_blon po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_yul gru dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shing a pa marga'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]dang /_mar bsres pa dang /_me tog dkar po rnams las lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul gru stong 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang pad+ma'i sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa 
[\[83a.2\]]brgyad sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo zad pa dang di nar brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/me tog ku mu da dang /_pad+ma sdong bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_'dab mar bcas pa dang /_yungs kar bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me sbar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/_log 'dren thams cad las yongs su 
[\[83a.3\]]grol bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyi ste/_gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la gos dkar po bgos te tsan+dan dang pri yang ku'i shing dang /_'bras yos dang /_mar dang /_yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/_nam phyed kyi dus su gnod 
[\[83a.4\]]sbyin mo 'ongs nas zong lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/_rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la/_shing bil ba'i me spar te/_shing bil ba'i me tog dang mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_de'i 
[\[83a.5\]]'og tu gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o/_/gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o/_/yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dang rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas btud de 
[\[83a.6\]]rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/_dgos pa thams cad byed cing dran 
[\[83a.7\]]bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing /_'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang /_pad+ma'i 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]'dab ma dang /_yungs kar dang /_mar bsres pa rnams las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te/_chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na/_de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul 
[\[83b.2\]]bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o/_/ba ru ra'i shing gi me spar la til dang /_'bras sob dang /_mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang bcas pa dang /_dbyig 
[\[83b.3\]]dang /_gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar dkar po dang /_tsam pa ka'i me tog dang /_pad+ma'i yam sreg shing dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar bsres pa'i sbyin stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing /_bud med 
[\[83b.4\]]dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'bras phub lan tshwa dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/_rigs bzhi 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro/_/a ga ti'i shing gis me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang /_arka'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya 
[\[83b.5\]]rtsa brgyad byas la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/_nyin re bzhin di na ra brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/pa la sha'i yam sreg shing dang 'bral yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/_gser brgya phrag stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog
