[\[83b.6\]]gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas te/_rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/_chu klung chen po'i nang rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/_yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
[\[83b.7\]]na khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o/_/de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po zhig sbyin par byed de blangs la phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya zhing /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod par bya'o/_/tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas te/_
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/_a pa mar ga'i yam sreg shing dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang /_sra rtsi pog sreg pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_rang gi ming gis sbyin sreg stong byas na sdig pa thams 
[\[84a.2\]]cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing nad thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/shing arka dang /_ti la dang /_yungs kar dang /_gu gul dang /_mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na/_zhi ba 
[\[84a.3\]]chen por 'gyur ro/_/'bras yos dang /_'o ma dang /_mar dang /_yungs kar dang /_tsan+dan dkar po bsres la sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro/_/tshes bcu bzhi la ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang /_lan tshwa sna bdun bsres pa dang /_shing tsher ma can gyi 
[\[84a.4\]]yam sreg shing yungs mar la bsres pa drag shul spyod par bya'o/_/char mi 'bab pa'i tshe pad+ma dang tsan+dan dang /_yungs kar dang /_mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji srid 'dod pa de srid du 
[\[84a.5\]]char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/thal ba de blangs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na char ha cang ches pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/_/sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser 
[\[84a.6\]]ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi sde gnon pa ni til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so/_/pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so/_/phug sgrub pa ni shing arka'i sbyin sreg gis so/_/arka'i lo ma dang /_mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo 
[\[84a.7\]]thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu dang /_rgya spos dang /_yungs kar dang /_mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/shing pa la sha'i me sbar te na le sham brgya 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]stong sbyin sreg byas na/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog dang /_kar ni kA ra'i me tog dang /_ut+pal rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na/_zla ba dang /_
[\[84b.2\]]nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la 'od zer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/a shwad thas yam sreg shing byas la/_shu ti dang /_nye'u shing dang /_arka dang /_tsan+dan dang /_yungs kar dang /_nas dang /_mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus mtshams gsum 
[\[84b.3\]]du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gdon dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na 'bras so ba dang /_yungs kar dang /_lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bgyis te/_thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing 
[\[84b.4\]]bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o/_/sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o//_//de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa 
[\[84b.5\]]byang bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya ste/_ras khru do gru bzhi lham pa kha tshar mchad pa skra med pa thag ran bzang ba/_shin tu dkar ba/_shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can bsnyen gnas la gnas pa/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/_zas dkar gsum za ba/_dus 
[\[84b.6\]]gsum du khrus byas pa/_lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi snod sar par bzhag ste/_pir sar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa'am bzhugs pa'am skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/_ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/_e ne ya'i pags pa bsnams pa/_phyugs 
[\[84b.7\]]bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_phyag bcu drug pa zhal zhi ba/_spyan phye ba/_dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/_zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/_phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o/_/phyag 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o/_/phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la mdzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste/_pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bya'o/_/phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o/_/phyag gcig na rtse gsum pa/_gnyis 
[\[85a.2\]]pa na pad+ma/_gsum pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam/_bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa/_zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/_lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa/_drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs/_bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod/_brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi snod 
[\[85a.3\]]thogs par bya zhing /_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa sku me tog sna tshogs kyis bkra bas mdzes par bya'o/_/ri po Ta la'i khang ba brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/_gru bzhi lham pa/_ka ba bzhi zug pa/_khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan 
[\[85a.4\]]pa/_pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/_rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa/_me tog sna tshogs dang chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas la/_g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/_g.yon logs na zla ba/_gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs 
[\[85a.5\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o/_/ri pad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par byas shing /_sdong po dang ldan pa/_mtshos mdzes par byas pa/_mtsho nyas gang zhing chu sa na ma ka ra dang /_bzhad dang shang shang te'u dang /_ngur pas brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[85a.6\]]kyis legs par brgyan pa'i ri de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o/_/g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/_/
[\[85a.7\]]g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o/_/g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pus mo btsugs par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus kyi gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/_lag pa bzhi pa'i lag na mtshon 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]cha thogs pa ste/_zhags pa dang /_dbyug to dang /_rtse gsum dang /_pad+ma'o/_/pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung phyed bcas pa lus cung zad btud pa/_mgo bo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o/_/de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon du rdo rje'i zom chen po/_lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[85b.2\]]tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_rlung lha dang /_dbang po dang /_lha'i tshogs dag bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang /_ri'i bar du brgya byin dang tshangs pa bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs 
[\[85b.3\]]mdzes ma lag pa 'brel pa bya'o/_/lha mo dpal chen mo dang /_dbyangs ldan ma dang /_'jigs byed ma dang /_mtshan mo'i lha dang /_sa'i lha mo dang /_lo tog gi lha mo bya'o/_/dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o/_/dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o/_/ri dang /_pho nya mo'i 
[\[85b.4\]]bar du srin mo ral gcig ma'o/_/ri'i khor yug tu gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing /_ljon shing dang /_lcug ma sna tshogs dang /_me tog gis brgyan cing /_mtshe'u mdzes pa/_me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /_seng ge dang /_stag gis gang ba dang /_klu'i phru 
[\[85b.5\]]gu dang /_grul bum dag bya'o/_/g.yon du gsang ba chen po lnga bya'o/_/'og tu klu'i rgyal po chen po lnga bya'o/_/thams cad brag gi stan dang /_lag na rin po che'i me tog gi phor pa thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs 
[\[85b.6\]]kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs te/_lag na me tog dang /_pog phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/_/steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang /_shAkya'i rgyal po dang /_'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o/_/ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 
[\[85b.7\]]mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/_tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing /_sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/_sems can dag pa 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]rnams lta ci smos/_dad pas mos pa rnams dang /_dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni/_tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang /_phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[86a.2\]]phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing /_de dag gi dge ba'i rtse ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no/_/ras kyi sku 
[\[86a.3\]]gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku yang ston par 'gyur ro/_/nyam thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 
[\[86a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/nad kyis thebs pa dang /_nad tshabs chen pos gzir ba dang /_nad sna tshogs dang /_sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/_nad thams cad dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad yongs su grol bar 
[\[86a.5\]]'gyur zhing /_sgrib pa dang /_nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang /_mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang /_bkur sti chen po dang /_sil snyan dkrol ba mang po 
[\[86a.6\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/_grong khyer chen po'am/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_ljongs sam/_khyim mam/_grong du zhugs nas ras kyi sku gzugs bzhugs pa tsam gyi mod la/_'thab pa dang /_
[\[86a.7\]]rtsod pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_khrag khrug dang /_mu ge'i dgon pa dang /_mi ngas dang /_rang gi dpung dang /_gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul bo dang /_skem byed dang /_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]brjed byed dang /_grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba dang yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'di mthong ba tsam gyis shi 'phos nas thams 
[\[86b.2\]]cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal ba stong phrag bdun cu'i tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[86b.3\]]pad+ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo'o//_//de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzhi ba mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_chu klung 
[\[86b.4\]]gi 'gram mam/_pad+ma'i mtshe'u'am/_ut+pala'i mtshe'u'am/_me tog gi skyed mos tshal lam/_'bras bu'i kun dga' ra ba'am/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sa gzhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa/_rtswa dang shing bal dang /_skra dang /_phub ma dang /_sol ba dang /_phyag dar 
[\[86b.5\]]gyi phung po dang /_gyo mo dang /_shing dang /_bong ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_thod pa'i rus pas gang ba rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang /_'bab chu dang /_'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang /_nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa/_lho phyogs dang /_byang phyogs 
[\[86b.6\]]dang /_nub phyogs dang /_shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa/_gang nyams dga' ba kha dog dang /_gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang yungs kar la bzlas te/_kun du gtor ro/_/sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no/_/khro bo'i rgyal po yungs 
[\[86b.7\]]kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_phyogs bzhir gtor na/_kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdang ba thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad skad cig kyang mi gnas bar 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]phyogs bzhir byer te 'dong ngo /_/srog chags sdang ba dang /_sdang ba'i sems dang /_sdang ba'i gcan gzan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byas te/_
[\[87a.2\]]gru bzhi lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya zhing /_cha 'byes pa gru bzhi pa cha mnyam zhing mdzes pa sgo bzhi dang /_rta babs bzhir ldan pa/_'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la/_de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/_tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab 
[\[87a.3\]]nas/_tsan+dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/_zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i tshes grangs dang /_rgyu skar bzang po bdams te/_dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o/_/dang po ni dkar pos bri'o/_/gnyis pa ni dmar pos so/_/gsum pa ni ser pos so/_/
[\[87a.4\]]bzhi pa ni nam mkha'i kha dog gis so/_/lnga pa ni mig sman gyi kha dog gis te/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med pa cha rnam par mdzes shing /_gsal bar pir sar pa dang tshon dang snod sar pas bri bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa kho ra khor 
[\[87a.5\]]yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing /_pad+ma'i phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la/_de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang /_'od dpag med dang /_'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go/_/g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don 
[\[87a.6\]]yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/_/g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang /_rdo rje thogs pa bzhin khro gnyer can 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang /_dri med 'od 'phro bya'o/_/
[\[87a.7\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sha ma chen mo dang /_gos dkar mo dang /_dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang /_ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o/_/de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa thod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa/_sbrul gyi 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]mchod phyir thogs pa lag pa bzhi pa/_lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang /_dgra sta dang /_g.yas pa'i gung mo lha dang /_log 'dren la bsdigs par bya'o/_/g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i thor tshugs 
[\[87b.2\]]kyis bzhugs pa/_'od dpag med kyi thor tshugs kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang /_lha mo dbyangs can ma dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo dang /_sa'i lha mo dang /_lo thog gi lha mo dang /_'bras bu dang me 
[\[87b.3\]]tog gi lha mo bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu khor yug tu gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o/_/ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong gzhag par bya'o/_/grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa gzhag par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar 
[\[87b.4\]]bar du lcags kyu dang /_dgra sta dang /_rdo rje dang /_dbyug ba dang /_zhags pa dang /_lcags sgrog bya'o/_/phyi rol du tshangs pa dang /_drag po dang /_lha mo u ma dang /_tshangs pa'i drung du lha mo dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs can no/_/de gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang /_ril ba 
[\[87b.5\]]spyi blugs bri bar bya'o/_/grwa gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gzhag go/_/grwa gcig tu shi bA ba ha gzhag go/_/de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can gzhag go/_/lho phyogs kyi 
[\[87b.6\]]sgor rdo rje chen po ki li ki la zhes bya ba/_rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa/_lag na rdo rje dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa thogs par bya'o/_/nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa pad+ma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin par bya'o/_/byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs 
[\[87b.7\]]lag na rdo rje dang zhags pa thogs pa bya'o/_/de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ste dar las bcings la rnam pa thams cad dang /_me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/_steng du sna ma'i me tog gi 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]gdu bu gzhag par bya'o/_/tsan+dan dang /_gur gum dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur gyi chu dang /_pog phor bzhi gzhag cing /_a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug go/_/tshon sna lnga'i ras kyi srad bu mchod phyir gyi srad bu tshad du byas la/_gser gyi yang mig rtse gsum can 
[\[88a.2\]]gdags par bya zhing /_thor to gcig tu me tog pad+ma'i gdub kor dang mu tig dang rin po ches spras pa/_zlum por bskyil la bum pa'i steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas te yungs kar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_de la 
[\[88a.3\]]gdab par bya'o/_/tsan+dan dang /_ga bur dang /_gla rtsi'i phye mas bsgos la bsgo bar bya'o/_sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang /_zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bya zhing gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_spos chus bkang 
[\[88a.4\]]ba brgyad dang /_spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o/_/ro dang dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang /_zho dang /_'o ma dang /_spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang /_gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang /_dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi ba rnams sha dang /_khrag 
[\[88a.5\]]dang /_kun dong dang /_ke'u dang /_kha zas ngan pa dang /_btung ba ngan pa spangs te/_gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o/_/me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal dgram par bya zhing /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lda ldi dang /_ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/_pog phor sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[88a.6\]]gzhag par bya zhing /_bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya/_spos sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/_dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu pad+ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya zhing /_dus 
[\[88a.7\]]gsum du khrus byas la gos gsum bgo bar bya/_grogs gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o/_/'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing /_'jig rten mgon pos byin gyis brlabs pa 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]dang /_pad+ma'i rigs pad+ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang bsams pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'jug go/_/chos nyid thams cad kyis 
[\[88b.2\]]rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /_bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing lha dang mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i tshogs 
[\[88b.3\]]kyi bgo skal la dbang bar 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags la brten par 'gyur ro/_/brdeg pa dang /_spyo ba dang phur bus gdab pa dang /_bsreg pa dang bsdigs pa dang g.yeng ba dang /_gsad pa dang /_dbang du bya bas mi tshugs so/_/gang dag de lta bu 
[\[88b.4\]]byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam/_mgo la brgya phrag stong gyur du 'bab par 'gyur zhing /_gzhan gyis phyir bzlas shing dgrol bar mi nus te/_rig sngags 'chang des dgrol bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas/_don 
[\[88b.5\]]yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar bya zhing /_khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bum 
[\[88b.6\]]pa de yang 'bar la/_ras kyi sku gzugs de yang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing /_shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur te/_khro bo'i rig sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing /_ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang legs 
[\[88b.7\]]so legs so/_/khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing /_khyod kyis zhags pa 'di yang grub/_khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub kyis/_khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig_/de dkyil 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa mchog grub nas/_bum pa spos chus bkang bde blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_rgyu skar rgyal la khrus bya ba'am zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la/_lus thams cad dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa 
[\[89a.2\]]'thob par 'gyur zhing /_dngos po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_rna ba lnga yongs su dag pa dang /_mig lnga yongs su dag pa dang /_sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang /_lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par shes pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang /_dbang po lnga yongs su 
[\[89a.3\]]dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing /_rtag tu sku ston bzhed par yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/lha 
[\[89a.4\]]thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang skyob pa dang sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang skyob pa dang sba ba byed par 
[\[89a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_gsang ba pa brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang skyob pa dang sba ba byed par 'gyur zhing /_zhi ba dang bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro/_/shes pa don yod pa dang /_shes rab don yod pa dang /_thos pa_
[\[89a.6\]]dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtson 'grus 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la mkhas 
[\[89a.7\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa don yod par 'gyur ro/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]klung gi bye ma snyed sa ya brgya phrag brgyad stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag 
[\[89b.2\]]bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po dgu pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/_bla 
[\[89b.3\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/_bcom 
[\[89b.4\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rig sngags chen po'i rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[89b.5\]]kyi spyan sngar de bdag gis yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas/_bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so/_/na ma s+t+rai yad d+h+wA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi ti b+h+yaH_sarba 
[\[89b.6\]]bud d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH_na maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+hAr+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaH_a tI tA nu ga tA pra t+yud pan+ne b+h+yaH_namaHsamyaka ga tA nAM/_na maHsa mya ka pra ti pan+nA nAM/_na maHshA ra dwa ti sU tA ya/_ma hA ma ta ye/_na maHAr+ya maitre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_Ar+ya ga Na ba re b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA 
[\[89b.7\]]ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te sa mya ka sam bud d+hA ya/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_b+ho d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_te b+h+yo ma hA r-i Shi Ar+ya ga Na ba re b+h+yo na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong gIr+N+NaM a mo g+ha rA dza na nA ma hr-i da yan/_ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hA shi taM ma hA 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]taM par ShaM ma d+h+ye a ha mi dA nI mA bar+t+ta yiSh+yA mi/_si d+h+yaM tu me man+t+ra pa dAHsarba kA r+yA Ni/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/_tad+ya thA/_oM tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/bi ri bi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_pa ra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/si ri 
[\[90a.2\]]si ri/_pi ri pi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_ma hA pad+ma ha ste/_ka la ka la/_li ki li ki/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA shud d+ha sa twa/_e h+ye hi/_bu d+he bu d+he/_d+hA ba d+hA ba/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hA s+thA ma prA b+ha/_tsa la tsa la/_
[\[90a.3\]]sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/_bi tsa la bi tsa la/_e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA pa shu pa ti/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ha hA ha hA/_hi hI hi hI/_hu hU hu hU/_oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_
[\[90a.4\]]d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra da/_rash+mi sha ta sa ha sre pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa b+ha ga bA na/_sau ma A di t+ya/_ya ma/_pa ru Na/_ku be re/_brah+men dra/_r-i Shi ga Na/_a b+h+ya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_pu 
[\[90a.5\]]ru pu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_sa nad ku mA ra/_'u dra/_bA sa ba/_biSh+Nu d+ha na da/_de ba r-i Shi nA ya ka ba hu bi bid+ha be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_tha ra tha ra/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_ya ra ya ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ma ra ma ra/_pa ra pa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra dA ya/_ka sa man ta/_
[\[90a.6\]]a ba lo ki ta/_lo ke shwa ra ma he shwa ra/_mu hu mu hu/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_mAM sar+b+ba satwAMsh+tsa sar+b+ba ba ye b+h+yaH_sar+b+bo ba sarge b+h+yaH_sar+b+ba gra he b+h+yaH_sar+b+ba byA d+hi b+h+yaH_sar+b+ba dz+wa re b+h+yaH_e waM/_bad+ha/_baM d+ha na/_tA Da na/_ta rdza na/_
[\[90a.7\]]rA dza tsau ra ta ska ra/_ag ni/_ud ka_/bi Sha/_shus+t+ra/_pa ri mo tsa ka_/ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_tsa ra tsa ra/_in dri ya/_ba la bo d+h+yaM ga_/tsa tu rA r+ya sat+ya sam pra kA sha ka_/ta ma ta ma/_da ma da ma/_sa ma sa ma/_ma sa ma sa/_ma hA ta mo\u0f85n+d+ya ka ra/_bi d+ha man/_bi d+ha 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]man/_Sha Ta pAr mi tA/_pa ri pU ra ka_/mi li mi li/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Tu Tu Tu Tu/_e ne ya tsar+m+ma kri ta pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi I shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra ma hA b+hU ta ga na bAny+dza ka_/ku ru ku ru/_pa ra pa ra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_bi shud d+ha/_bi Sha ya/_ni bA sin/_ma hA 
[\[90b.2\]]kA ru Ni ka_/shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta rat+na mu ku Ta/_mA lA d+ha ra/_sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta ma ku Ta/_ma hAd b+hU ta ka ma lA laM kr-i ta/_ka ra ta la/_d+h+ya na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha a pra kam pya/_ba hu sa twa sa na ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Ni/_bi sho d+ha ka_/sarba byA d+hi phra mo tsa ka_/sarba 
[\[90b.3\]]A shA pa ri pU ra ka_/sar+b+ba satwA sa mA shwA sa kan mo stu te swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis 'khor mang po ri dang nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu 
[\[90b.4\]]g.yos so/_/'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to/_lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pu Na Da rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba'i me tog gi char chen pos pus mo nub pa tsam bab par gyur to/_/sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to/_/mtho ris 
[\[90b.5\]]kyi lha dag gis kyang nam mkha' las/_bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang lhab lhub dag gi char phab bo/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_
[\[90b.6\]]gtsang ma de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sems can dag pa chen po legs so legs so/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di bshad cing dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di bshad pas rin 
[\[90b.7\]]po che'i char chen po 'bab po zhes zer ro/_/de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_dus gsum du khrus bya zhing zas dkar gsum za bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar/_dpal lha mo bzhag ste mchod pa 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]byas la/_yungs kar 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_dpal lha mo la bsnun pa byas na tshes bcu bzhi nas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 
[\[91a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams bcad pa dang zhi bar bya ba la/_a ga ru dang tsan+dan gyi bdug spos bsregs la/_thal ba dang /_yungs kar dang seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o/_/rims thams cad la bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la/_mdud 
[\[91a.3\]]pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btags na/_rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad la mar dang til mar la bzlas te/_zangs kyi snod du sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog rnying pa dang pad+ma ze ba dang bcas pa btab ste btsos pa 'di ni grub pa 
[\[91a.4\]]yin te/_zas dang skom dang /_bsku ba dang sna nas btang ba'i las bya ste/_nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_khyad gcad na mar dang sbrang rtsi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la bsku zhin tshigs mas dril la/_lus kyi dri ma phyin par byas te/_gong 
[\[91a.5\]]bu las gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te/_mtshon gyis btab na dug sbyar ma dang byad dang gsang sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing /_nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/byad chen po 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/bsrung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_de 
[\[91a.6\]]bzhin du mdud pa bor ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang /_dngang ba thams cad dang 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/lto na ba la tshwa chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na lto ba'i nad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/dug 
[\[91a.7\]]gsad na chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi gdug par 'gyur ro/_/mig na ba la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na/_/mig nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/sdang ba'i dug mi bzad pa la 'jim pa la bzlas te byugs na dug med par 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/so na ba la ka ra bI ra'i so shing ngam sna ma'i so shing ngam shing ba ku'i so shing la bzlas te thos na so nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams gcad pa thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la btags te/_phyogs 
[\[91b.2\]]bzhir btsugs na/_mtshams med po bcad par 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srang bu la/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/_gdon thams cad de las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/srog chags kI Ta dang /_lhog pa dang /_mgul ba 'gags pa la sbrang rtsi 
[\[91b.3\]]dang /_pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug go/_/mgul 'gags pa la gdags pa byas na mgul 'gags pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/mig nad la spos chu dang shing pa la sha'i chu dang pa la sha'i me tog gis bkru bar bya ba'am shing mngar gyi chu la lan bdun bzlas te/_
[\[91b.4\]]bkrus na mig nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rna ba na ba la til mar dang shu ti zangs kyi snod du btsos pas rna ba bkang na rna nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang khrag khrug dang /_mi snyan pa thams cad la chu la lan bdun bzlas te/_gdong bkru ba byas na thams 
[\[91b.5\]]cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/dpung dang stobs dang yul dang yul 'khor dang /_phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba thams cad dang /_g.yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/_a ga ru'i 
[\[91b.6\]]bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo 'di mchod de/_bklags pa byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur te/_thams cad byams pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing /_thams 
[\[91b.7\]]cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/chu des bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te/_tsan+dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snying gar thig le byas te/_rtag tu dran par byas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/khyim thams cad bsrung na/_pad+ma dang /_na ku 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]le dang shing arka'i me tog mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na/_khyim bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po'i gdon thams cad las bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/yang las thams cad la nor bu sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di dag bsogs la cha mnyam par 
[\[92a.2\]]byas te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/_snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas las thams cad bya'o/_/dza ya dang /_bi dza yA dang /_mA gu li dang /_gan d+ha nA dang /_bA ru NI dang /_tA na tra ba ru NI dang /_gan d+ha bri yang ku dang /_ta ga ra dang /_tsa kra dang /_ma hA tsa kra dang /_
[\[92a.3\]]so ma rA dzI dang /_su man da rnams phye ma zhib mor byas te/_char pa'i chus sbrus la/_tsan+dan dang /_gur gum sbyar ba'i chus brlan te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar nor bur byas te/_yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas a ga ru'i bdug 
[\[92a.4\]]pas bdugs la/_de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste/_ras kyis g.yogs la grib mar bskams te/_blangs la yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bya zhing /_khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/_mgo bor bzung 
[\[92a.5\]]na/_rgyal po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyang gzi byin 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[92a.6\]]dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing /_dus thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba thams cad kyang rtag tu mthun par byed cing dbang 
[\[92a.7\]]du 'gyur ro/_/byad mi bzad pa dang /_dug sbyar ma dang /_phye ma'i dug dang /_gsang sngags dang /_g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs shing /_thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dpal dang /_gzi byin dang /_bsod nams dang /_bkra shis dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu ston pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du dus thams cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba bzang po thogs pa med pa yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/dpung pa la 
[\[92b.2\]]btags na glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'gyed pa dang dmag thams cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[92b.3\]]srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za'i gdon dang /_brjed byed kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/nam yang de la rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byis pa rnams la mgul du btags na gdon thams cad dang /_rims nad thams cad dang /_nad thams cad 
[\[92b.4\]]dang /_btsas pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba byed par 'gyur/_yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med 
[\[92b.5\]]rnams la ska rags sar pa btags te khrus byas nas/_gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/_skal ba bzang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing /_bkra mi shis pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/_khyim thab dang rtag tu 
[\[92b.6\]]rjes su mthun par 'gyur/_khye'u dang bu mo yod par 'gyur/_shes rab mchog tu 'gyur/_thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur/_de la bud med kyi skyon yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus mi thob par shes par bya ste/_shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten 
[\[92b.7\]]gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nor bu 'di btags na thams cad du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur zhing /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_mes mi tshugs so/_/dug byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nor bu 'di btags pas dug med par 'gyur zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang sprin dang ser ba gnon na/_chu la lan bdun bzlas te/_nam mkha' la gtor na rlung dang sprin dang ser ba thams cad mnan par 'gyur ro/_/bzlog par bya na bal po se'u'i lcug mas bzlog par 
[\[93a.2\]]bya'o/_/dran pa bskyed nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/_nor bu chu dron las btang ba byas na bklags pa tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags 
[\[93a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal srid dang /_yul 'khor dang /_btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na lus bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa der thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/pus mo gnyis la byugs na chu klung chen po pus mo nub tsam gyis pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal 
[\[93a.4\]]mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/_dmag gam/_g.yul ngo'am tshogs pa'i nang ngam/_ri khrod dang tshang tshing dang ri sul dang dgon par phyin pa na/_bsgreng ba byas na/_bde ba dang bde legs su rgal bar 'gyur zhing chom po dang /_g.yon can dang /_rkun po dang /_gcan gzan 
[\[93a.5\]]gtum po'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing bltar med par 'gyur ro/_/btson ra thams cad du song ba na byugs pa byas na/_shing sgrog dang /_khong sgril dang /_lcags sgrog gis bcings pa thams cad chag grugs su 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid la bskus na mtshon cha mi snang 
[\[93a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/mig gnyis la bskus na gnyid log pa'i tshe rmi lam chen po rmi bar 'gyur zhing ci ltar bsams shing smon pa snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad cing thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de la mig nad thams cad 
[\[93a.7\]]kyis mi tshugs so/_/kha'i nang du bzhag na/_gang blangs pa sbyin par byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gdon gyis zin pa la dpral bar byug pa byas na byugs pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur te/_thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/_/lag mthil du bskus nas/_glang po che la reg na 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dbang du 'gyur zhing gar btang ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dpral ba'i dbus su thig le byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro/_/mid pa la byugs na mgrin sngon bzhin du bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/'o 
[\[93b.2\]]ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus na mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur zhing /_gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur klu'i gnas kyi mtshor bor na klu chen pos char 
[\[93b.3\]]gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/char ha cang che ba'i tshe chu dang bsres te nam mkha' la gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sprin la bltas te ser ba'i rgyun la gtor na ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa'i rje ngar 
[\[93b.4\]]la btags te me'i nang du zhugs na mes mi tshugs shing tsan+dan bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro/_/ral gri la byugs nas g.yul ngor song na lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar gyur nas pha rol gyi dpung thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/nad chen pos thebs 
[\[93b.5\]]pa'i nad pa tshabs po che la phye ma byin na nad tshabs chen po las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/pho ba na ba la chu dron las btang na mod la yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsib logs na ba la dar ba las btang na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad la ni zhun mar dang til mar las sbyar te bskum nye 
[\[93b.6\]]dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba'i nad dang /_snar blugs pa dang /_byug pa byas na nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phug gi sgor khor yug tu byugs la snying po lan bdun bzlas te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la/_khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[93b.7\]]po'i gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas nas zhugs na/_phug gi sgo chag ste rang gi khyim du 'gyur zhing sdang ba thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/khar bcug ste mi smra bar snying po'i mdo brjod par byas na/_lan brgya 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]phrag stong bzlas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shing rta'i srog shing la byugs na g.yul ngo thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/zong la gtor na rin chen pos nyo bar 'gyur ro/_/bu mo'i gdong 
[\[94a.2\]]bkrus na mgo yang bar 'gyur ro/_/snying gar thig le byas na thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa las thams cad byed pa bdag srung ba/_gzhan srung ba'i nor bu gang dang gang la sbur zhing bzlas pas/_thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[94a.3\]]bgegs dang log 'dren rnams la til dang chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/byur ngan pa med par bya na ras la dkyil 'khor zlum po bris la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad 
[\[94a.4\]]bzlas la/_mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_a ga ru'i bdug spos bdug par bya zhing /_spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par byas na/_bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la byur ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/dbul ba nyams 
[\[94a.5\]]pa'i don dang /_ma grub pa dang /_sdig pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_sgrib pa bsal na gser ram dngul gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_blugs na de dag thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur zhing /_'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po nyams su myong 
[\[94a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad tshar bcad na til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so/_/nad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal na chu la bzlas pas so/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar bya na/_dus gsum du lan gsum gsum du rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi 
[\[94a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bcings pa dang lcags sgrog dang khong sgril gzhom na nyin re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so/_/rgyal po dbang du bya na lam po cher brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/chom po dang rkun po rengs par bya na/_rA dzA ko shA ka'i sa bon gyi sbyin 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]sreg gis so/_/me rengs par bya na seng ldeng gi shing la bzlas te mer bcug nas bzlas na me rengs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/chu rengs par bya na ka la ki'i sa bon chu'i nang du btab na chu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/dug gzhom na rma bya'i sgro yis so/_/mtshon rengs par bya na shing gnam 
[\[94b.2\]]lcags kyis tshig pa'i thal ba la bzlas te gtor na mtshon cha thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs na ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas na ting nge 'dzin stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[94b.3\]]slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma des ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba cha shin tu mdzes pa byas te/_tsan+dan gyis mchod par bya zhing /_gur gum dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur gyis mchod nas me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[94b.4\]]dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas/_bum pa spos chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag la/_mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang pog phor bzhi spos chu'i bum pa'i dbus su gzhag par bya zhing /_a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/bum pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[94b.5\]]phyin pa gzhag par bya/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing spos kyi mar me bzhi bltam par bya/_mchod pa rgya chen po bya/_ba dan gyis brgyan par bya zhing dkyil 'khor byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/_bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan 
[\[94b.6\]]brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku ston par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can brgya stong mang po gdul na ri'i rtse mor stong 
[\[94b.7\]]rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so/_/sdang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas rdo rje'am mdung rtse gsum la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas tsham ngam bya zhing khro bo'i rgyal po'i bsdigs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te khros pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]gsor te nam mkha' la 'phangs na bdud la sogs pa sdang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad grub ba dang gsang sngags thams cad 'grub pa dang bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 
[\[95a.2\]]bcings te stong nyi shu bzlas na grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'dod pas stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin du spos chu'i bum pas dbang bskur bar 
[\[95a.3\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan sku gdung dang bcas pa la mig gtad de khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs mnan te khri bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur 
[\[95a.4\]]ro/_/phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod pas/_phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mnan te bzlas brjod lan stong byas nas/_gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul ba byas na/_'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi sku gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing 
[\[95a.5\]]thams cad du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/_ma bsgrubs ma bklags par 'grub cing cho ga zhib mo mtha' yas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_ngo tsha ses pa dang /_brtse ba dang /_byams pa dang /_shes rab 
[\[95a.6\]]dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par bstan to/_/go cha bgos pa 'grub pa mchog thams cad grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi phung pos 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pas rtag tu mtshams bcad pa dang phyogs bcing ba dang yul bcing ba byas te srung ba mchog tu 
[\[95a.7\]]dkon pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing /_go cha bgos par 'gyur ro/_/gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na yang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]ston par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo mchog las khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/_shes rab dang byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan to/_/namaHsarba 
[\[95b.2\]]ta thA ga ta/_Ar+yA pa lo ki te shwa ra badzra d+ha re b+h+yaH_oM tsa ra tsa ra/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/tsi ri tsi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_ma hA pad+ma ha sta/_ka la ka la/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA s+thAm prA pa ta/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsa tsa ri ta/_tsa re shwa ra/_e h+ye hi/_sid+h+ya sid+h+ya/_bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/_d+hA ba d+hA ba/_ki Ni 
[\[95b.3\]]ki Ni/_par ma shud d+ha sa hwa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/_ha hA hi hI hu hU/_oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_sa smi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa/_b+ha ga bA na/_sau mA di t+ya/_ya ma ba ru 
[\[95b.4\]]Na/_ku be ra/_brah+men dra/_r-i Shi ga Na/_de bag NA b+h+yartsi ta tsa ra Na/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_sa nad ku mA ra/_ru dra/_biSh+Nu bA sa ba/_d+ha na dA/_de ba r-i Shi nA ya ka_/ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ras man tra ba lo kA/_bi lo ki te/_lo ke shwa ra/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_ban 
[\[95b.5\]]d+ha ban d+ha na/_tA Da na/_ta rdza na/_rA dza ta ska ra/_ag ni/_u dka_/bi Sha sha s+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka_/ka Na ka Na/_ba la bo d+h+yaM ga tsa ru tA r+ya sa t+ya sa ma pra kA sha ka_/ta ma ta ma/_sa ma sa ma/_ma hA tsi t+yan d+h+ya kA ra pra sha man mi li mi li/_e Ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi/_ma Ta ma Ta/_
[\[95b.6\]]bi shud d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si nam hA kA ru Ni ka_/shwe ta yadz+nyo ba bI ta/_rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta/_ka ra pu Ta d+ha na/_sa mA d+hi/_bi mo k+Sha a pra kaM pya/_ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka_/ba hu satwa san ta ti ba ri pA tsa ka_/sarba mA rA di pra duSh+Ta pra maR+daka_/sarba sing d+h+yA shA pa'i 
[\[95b.7\]]pU ra ka_/a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba ta thA ga ta/_a b+hi She kai ra/_b+ha ga bA na ta/_a mo g+ha rA dza hUM phaT/_na mo stu te swA hA/_gsang sngags kyi cho ga snga ma de lta bus las thams cad pa don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo zhes bya ba grub pa mchog las thams cad pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa twA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_a mo g+ha ba ra da pa sha ha stA ya/_ma hA shud d+ha sa twA ya/_A gats+tsha/_b+ha ga bA na/_b+ha ba bAn/_pad+ma ha sta/_ba ra da ka rAM gu le/_pad+ma b+hu dzai/_ma hA 
[\[96a.2\]]pa shu pa ti/_be Sha d+ha re/_pra sI ta shI g+ha mA gats+tsha/_ma hA bi ga_/bi b+ha Shi ta raSh+mi/_ha sa ha sa/_a mo g+ha shud d+he/_sa ha sa ha/_tsa la tsa la/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_b+ha ga bA na/_a ba lo ki te shwa re/_ma ma gan d+ha puSh+pa sa ma mardza ni/_a ma pra tIts+tsha/_tri rat+na sa t+ye na/_a mo g+ha sid 
[\[96a.3\]]d+he swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dgug pa a ga ru'i bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sarba 
[\[96a.4\]]gan d+hA d+hi ba si ta/_a mo g+ha b+hu dza/_ba ra dA ya/_sarba gan d+ha mA l+ya/_bi b+hU Shi ta pri ye/_tsaN Dar+d+hA shi ra si pri ye/_gan d+ha ga na d+hA nu le pa na sA ma ma pra tIts+tsha/_ba ra ba ra ba ra dA ya swA hA/_lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHAr+ya ya ba lo ki te shwa tA ya/_

[\[96a.6\]]mu buSh+pa ba re swA hA/_me tog la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twA ba ra de/_sma ra sma ra/_b+ha ga bA na/_sa ma ya sarba ta thA ga ta shA si te/_b+ha ga 
[\[96a.7\]]bA na/_a ba lo kA ya/_sarba sa twA a ba lo ka ni/_a mo g+ha ba ti pra sha ha ste/_sid d+he sid d+he sid d+he ba ra de/_sid d+h+yan tu te/_bud d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye na tu ru tu ru sa t+ya sa ma ya pA lA ya swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bya ba'i rig sngags so/_/na mo 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+hu re d+hu re badzra d+har pad+ma dza be/_bi ga tA ba ra de be ga be ga_/d+hu Tu d+hu Tu/_sarba bI dza pri ye/_bud d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye na/_mi li mi li swA hA/_gtor ma'i sngags 
[\[96b.2\]]te lan bdun bzlas te sbyin no/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/_a pra ti ha ta/_ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/_b+ha ga bA na/_A ha ra A ha ra pad+mA sa na pad+ma b+hu dze/_shwe taM ge shwe ta su dze shwe ta mA l+ya bi b+hU Shi te/_d+hu ma d+hu ma 
[\[96b.3\]]dz+wa la bu d+ha d+ha rma saM g+ha sa t+ye na swA hA/_mar me'i rig sngags te lan bdun bzlas pas so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM bi ri bi ri/_pad+ma pA Ni a ga mA ga ma a mo g+ha ta tA sid d+hi

[\[96b.5\]]kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+hu me d+hu me d+hu d+hu me pad+me pad+ma ni ra b+hA se/_shud d+ha shud d+ha ka ba tsa na pra b+hA sa bi ma le/_shud d+ha rA shi_/shu tsi shu tsi shu tsi go tsa ra sid d+hi pad+ma mAM ga ba ti/_pra ba ra Ni swA hA/_gos kyi rig sngags te lan bdun bzlas pas so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma

[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]b+ha yaM nA ga dza la saM sho d+ha ni pad+ma sa re/_pad+ma bi shud+d+he/_pA Ni dza li saM shod+ha ya/_At+ma naM d+ha ra d+ha ra sa li le swA hA/_chu'i sngags te khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i chu blangs la lan bdun bzlas te spyad do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_

[\[97a.3\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sarba de bA sur na ma skr-i te/_sa mas man ta pra pU ra Ne/_sa ma gan d+hA ba b+hA si te/_ga ga na bi shud d+he/_mug ti pra b+he/_dza ye bi dza ye/_dza ya nir mA l+yo pan ya ti/_buSh+pa 
[\[97a.4\]]mA l+ya gan d+ha bi sho d+ha na/_bi sho d+ha ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud d+he pad+ma bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_me tog nyid dor ba'i rig sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+ha ra Ni na d+ha re d+ha ra Ni ban d+he/_ban d+ha 
[\[97a.5\]]ban d+ha shu kra bi sho d+ha ni/_shu kra mA la ling gi ti/_shu kra bi sho d+ha ni/_shud d+ha bi ma le swA hA/_rtswa ku sha'am ras kyi srad bu'am/_bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor ba byas na/_khu chu 'gags par 'gyur ro/_/na mo 
[\[97a.6\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dz+wa le dz+wa le/_bi ma le dz+wa le/_pra b+ha si bi ra dza/_sUr+ya ba ti dza ya pad+ma/_mA la d+ha re swA hA/_me'i sbyin sreg gi thal ba la lan bdun bzlas te kun du gtor na/_bgegs

[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]gi rig sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bod+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ri Ni ha ri Ni ping ga le ping ga le/_hi ri hi ri/_b+ha ga bAn/_ni tsa la pra tsa la/_pra ti tiSh+Tha mAM rak+Sha ma ma bud d+ha d+harma sang g+ha sa t+ye

[\[97b.3\]]hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba te pad+ma sun da ri/_ma hA bid+yA de ba ti/_tsa la tsa la/_pad+ma sun d+ha ri/_be ga ba ti/_su ru su ru swA hA/_nyin re zhing me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_spos chus pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes pa dang gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma

[\[97b.5\]]oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya pra b+ha bi ni/_sarba bi g+h+naM pra sha ma ni/_A ha ra/_saM ha ra/_pad+ma pI tho\u0f85 ba biSh+Te/_ma Ni ka Na ka bi b+hU Shi ta/_ka ma la b+hu dze/_ta ra ta ra tA rA ya bar ma/_a mo g+ha hr-i da ya/_dza ye tri ne tre/_bar da b+hu dze/_sma ra sma ra/_b+ha ga bA na/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/_b+ha ra 
[\[97b.6\]]b+ha ra/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_brah+ma b+he Sha d+ha ra bi b+hu Shi ta ta nu/_ma hA b+ha ya ha re/_A lo ka ya/_bi lo ka ya/_sarba sa twA ba lo ki ni/_bar bar de swA hA/_las thams cad ba'i rig sngags te/_khyad par du ni rig sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i las mi rnams bsrung bar 
[\[97b.7\]]bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_pa ra pa ra/_ma ra ma ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ban d+ha ban d+ha/_sa man te na/_a mo g+ha bA sha ha ste/_a mo g+ha bA sha ha ste/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_bud d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye na swA hA/_thal 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas yul bcing ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_di shA ban d+ha na/_a mo g+he/_a pra ti ha te/_mu ru mu ru/_su ru 
[\[98a.2\]]su ru/_tu ru tu ru/_sarba bi g+haM bi nA sha ni/_pad+ma sa ra bi b+hU Shi te/_bud d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye na pan d+ha/_a dzi ta bar de swA hA/_spyan drangs te phyi nas phyogs bcing bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_
[\[98a.3\]]tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_si ri si ri/_pi ri pi ri/_ba ra ba ra/_pra bar bi mA na d+ha ra/_da ra da ra/_gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra shU/_b+ha ga bAn/_tu ru tu ru/_a mo g+ha pad+me swA hA/_me tog ci snyed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te sIm ba nas phul 
[\[98a.4\]]na slar gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o//_//de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po khro bo chen po'i snying po'i mchog bsgrubs na/_bsgrub sla ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/cho ga zhib grub grub pa che/_/
[\[98a.5\]]khro bo'i rgyal grub grub pa mchog_/don yod pa ni grub pa'i mchog_/rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya'o/_/don yod rgyal po khro chen gyi/_/snying po dam pa sgrub pa ni/_/cho ga zhib grub grub pa che/_/khro bo'i rgyal po grub pa mchog_/grub pa'i mchog ste don yod pa/_/rig sngags 
[\[98a.6\]]'di ni bshad par bya/_/gang brjod pa tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo'i mchog 'grub pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong gis gzigs par 'gyur ba/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[98a.7\]]par 'gyur ba/_bsod nams kyi phung po bla na med pa/_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/_stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed pa/_cho ga zhib mo thams cad don yod pa/_de kho na nyid sgrub pa 'grub pa/_dran pa tsam gyi mod la ni/_/sa gzhi yang ni g.yo 'gyur la/_/
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]sum cu'i lha rnams g.yo 'gyur zhing /_/lhar bcas rgya mtsho lhun por bcas/_/klu rnams 'dar ni yed yed cing /_/gnod sbyin srin po 'bros 'gyur ba/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/rig sngags rgyal po bla med kyis/_/phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas/_/dpung dang 
[\[98b.2\]]bcas shing bzhon bcas pa'i/_/lus skyes 'bar ba'i phreng can kun/_/'dar zhing kun du 'dar yed yed/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po yi/_/gnas mchog dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing /_/de dag thams cad 'dus 'gyur nas/_/'jig rten dbang la skyabs dong zhing /_/bcom ldan 
[\[98b.3\]]mgon po bskyab tu gsol/_/thugs rje'i bdag nyid bskyab tu gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[98b.4\]]'das bdag la grub pa don yod pa'i snying po'i rig sngags rgyal po'i snying po 'di gang gis bklags pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po myur du rab tu 'grub cing /_dran pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i lus kyis lus ston par 'gyur ba/_dngos grub 
[\[98b.5\]]dang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang du bsgrags par bgyi'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHa mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_
[\[98b.6\]]bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM pad+me pad+me/_pad+ma d+ha ra bi b+hU Shi ta/_b+hu dze/_tsa ra tsa ra/_brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_b+ha ra d+ha ra/_bi tsi tra mau la d+ha ra/_ma Ni ka na ka badzra bai DUr+yA laM kri ta sha rI ra/_ta ra ta ra/_ta rA ya ta rA ya/_b+ha ga ba te pA ra Na/_d+hu ru 
[\[98b.7\]]d+hu ru/_a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/_ba ra ba ra ba ra dA ya ka_/sa man ta a ba lo ki te/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa bar da pad+mA san pad+ma gaur/_dz+wa la dz+wa la sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka_/a b+hi She ka te ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ba la ba la/_ma hA be ga d+ha ra bi kr-i ta na yan/_daM Sh+DA ka rA la ma hA te dzaH
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]d+ha ra d+ha ra bi pu la dza na ba da ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_pra bar pu N+ya sam b+hA ra/_su ga ta d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/_sa man ta a ba lo ki ta/_I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/_duSh+Ta da ma ka_/rau dra pra la ya dam ka_/kro d+ha rA dza ma hA be ga d+ha ra/_sa ma 
[\[99a.2\]]sa ma ma hA s+t+rA ma prA p+ta/_tsan+d+ra sUr+ya a ti re ka pra b+ha ma la ma la sarba ma la bi sho d+ha ka sarba r-i Shi ga na san ta ti ma hA ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/_a mi tA b+ha dzi nA lang kr-i ta dza Ta/_dak+Shi na tsan+d+rA laM kr-i ta shi raH/_ma tha ma tha/_sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha b+hU ta ga Na b+hany+dza ka ta ra/_ta ra ta ra ga Na sa mA laM kr-i ta/_nak+Sha 
[\[99a.3\]]tra mA la sarba bi g+h+nA na bi nA sha na ka ra/_pa ra mai tri tsit+ta ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_ba ra pa ra/_pa ri pU rna maN+Dal sau mya mu kha/_Sha Ta bA ra mi tA/_pa ri pU ra ka_/mi li mi li/_e Ne ya tsarma ni bA sa na/_bA g+h+ra tsarmo ta ta ri ya/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ta/_tri ne tra tri shU la d+ha ra/_
[\[99a.4\]]badzra dz+wa la d+ha ra/_a mo g+ha pra sha ha ste/_ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra rU pa d+ha ra/_nA ge na dra rU pa d+ha ra/_bi ma la bi shud d+ha de ha sarba pA ba sha ma ka sarbA ba ra Ni bi sho d+ha ka_/sarba ki li bi Sha nA sha ka_/s+t+rai lo kya ba shaM ka ra/_sarba sa twA bi sho d+ha ka_/bo d+hi sa twA ba ra da/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_a 
[\[99a.5\]]d+hiSh+Thi te/_oM pad+ma bi b+hU Shai ta/_shud d+he d+hi ri d+hi ri/_a ba lo ki ya mA na/_sa ma sa ma/_sarba karma me sA d+ha ya/_a mo g+ha pra sha hr-i da ya sid d+he/_gu h+ya ni ba si ni bar da hUM phaT/_na mo stu te swA hA/_grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma thag tu 'byung po'i 
[\[99a.6\]]tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren de dag thams cad kha bu ba tu 'gyel te/_gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang /_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' bas ba spu langs te/_skrag par 
[\[99a.7\]]gyur pa'i lha tshogs thams cad dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sgrag par 'gyur ba'i lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_drang srong spa gong ba thams cad dang /_rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]thams cad dang /_chu bran thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu gang dag chu na gnas pa thams cad dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang /_lha gang dag lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang /_rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad dang /_gang dag gnas gtsang 
[\[99b.2\]]ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_nam mkha'i lha thams cad 'khrugs par gyur nas nam mkha' las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa'i phyir/_lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[99b.3\]]pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_ut+pal dang /_puN Da rI ka dang /_man dAr ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i char dang /_lha'i rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsam ri bo po Ta lar phab ste/_lha'i sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs len cing ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra bton nas/_bcom 
[\[99b.4\]]ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi don du rig sngags 'chang chen po 'di bshad do zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 
[\[99b.5\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags chen po'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi mchog bshad do/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po rig sngags chen po'i 
[\[99b.6\]]snying po 'jig rten mgon po thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag don yod pa'i rgyal po grub pa'i mchog las thams cad grub pa bshad du gsol/_de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 
[\[99b.7\]]snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub pa'i mchog_/cho ga dang yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa/_ras gru bzhi pa kun nas cha legs par phye ba/_kha tshar ma bcad pa skra med pa/_ri mo mkhan gtsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]ma bgos la gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas/_tshon lhag ma ma yin pa snod sar par bzhag la bri bar bya ste/_dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs shing /_rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa thor tshugs kyi 
[\[100a.2\]]g.yas su zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i pags pa gyon pa/_phyugs bdag gi chu lugs 'chang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_dbu gsum spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/_ri'i steng na pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin 'dzum pa/_
[\[100a.3\]]zhal g.yas pa 'jigs su rung ba khro gnyer can/_thor tshugs 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/_dbu zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/_zhal g.yon pa 'jigs su rung ba bzhin bsgyur cing mche ba gtsigs pa/_rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbul bzhugs pa/_phyag gcig na pad+ma thogs pa/_gnyis pa rtse gsum thogs pa/_
[\[100a.4\]]gsum pa don yod zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin pa la/_bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag la spyan gtod par bya zhing /_bzhi ba dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing 'od 'dom gang ba khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs na lha mo 
[\[100a.5\]]sgrol ma 'gying bag dang bcas shing lus btud par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mig gtod par bya'o/_/g.yon du pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma 'dzem bag dang bcas pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa la mig gtod par bya'o/_/lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod 
[\[100a.6\]]sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o/_/pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i bar du khro gnyer can bya'o/_/phyogs gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na pad+ma thogs pa bya'o/_/pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/_/ral gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 
[\[100a.7\]]'jigs byed ma bya'o/_/gang du gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dang brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o/_/'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dbang phyug gi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba gad rgyangs can khro bo don yod pa'i rgyal po dang smra ba bya'o/_/ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po Ta la na gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar 
[\[100b.2\]]rig par bya'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po bcu pa/_mthong ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las thar bar 'gyur/_'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_mtshams med pa lnga 
[\[100b.3\]]byed pa yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong bas mthong ba tsam gyi mod la rnam par dag par 'gyur/_mnar med pa la gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams 
[\[100b.4\]]brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/_shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[100b.5\]]khams su skye bar 'gyur/_sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas tshe rabs brgya stong phrag lnga bcu rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma yin te/_'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na/_/lhag par mang du 
[\[100b.6\]]byed pa lta ci smos te/_de ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rgyal po dang /_
[\[100b.7\]]blon po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'am/_btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig gis ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par byed cing /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod par byed na/_des na khyod 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas shing bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po byas pa yin no/_/gang zhig khro bo don yod pa'i zhags pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod bya 
[\[101a.2\]]ste/_chus dbang bskur na des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/snyam du de ltar shes par bya'o/_/gang gis don yod par grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo 
[\[101a.3\]]chen po'i gzungs/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas lan gsum bzlas te/_bskor ba lan bdun byas la chu'i nang du mchod yon dang /_lha bshos dang /_bdug spos dang /_me tog phul nas 
[\[101a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras na/_des khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/_gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[101a.5\]]don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal la mig gtad de lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis sbyar la/_snying gar gzhag cing tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[101a.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brgya stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod 
[\[101a.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho ga zhib mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgya stong khri bzlas par 'dod pa dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan brgya stong phrag khri bya bar 'dod 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]pa des ras kyi sku gzugs la brtson par bya ste/_ras kyi sku gzugs sngon du bzhag nas gnas gtsang zhing dben par gnas sam/_'chags [(]'am [,]sam [)]dgon pa'i gnas sam/_phug gam/_ri'i rtse mo'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_khang par gtsang sbra dang byi dor bya ste/_bser mo'i lci 
[\[101b.2\]]ba legs par mnyes la/_ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te bskus la spos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byugs nas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/_gur gum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris la gla rtsi dang ga bur gyis mchod par bya'o/_/dri chab kyi bum pa dri 
[\[101b.3\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/_ras kyi mgul chings kyis bcings la/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/_me tog dang bdug spos dri zhim po dang /_me tog gi phreng ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gzhag par bya/_dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya/_'o 
[\[101b.4\]]mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bya/_stegs bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya/_'o thug dang /_sbyar thug dang /_khaN+Da kha d+ya dang /_'bras chan dang /_lag pan dang /_bu ram dang sha khar dang /_zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya/_a ga ru 
[\[101b.5\]]nag po dang tsan+dan dkar po dang /_ga bur dang /_kun du ru dang /_shi ribA sa ka dang /_cung peng rnams snod dang bcas pa bzhag nas/_a ga ru'i yam sreg shing gis sbyin sreg bya/_me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/_mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[101b.6\]]rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas tshes bcu bzhi nas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/_dri chab 
[\[101b.7\]]kyis dbang bskur bar bya/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/_de nas mi smra bar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya de'i 'og tu don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/_de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun byung nas kun tu snang bar byas te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i spyan du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la 
[\[102a.2\]]sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang yang snying dga' zhing ba spu ldang bar 'gyur/_mdog mdangs yongs su dag par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gi sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur/_zhabs gnyis las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur/_
[\[102a.3\]]don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur/_phyag na pad+ma'i pad+ma lo ma g.yo bar 'gyur/_rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyis las 
[\[102a.4\]]thams cad byos shig khyod kyis don yod grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i dam pa grub po zhes nas/_de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gis gzugs ston par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do/_/'di ni grub pa'i mchog 
[\[102a.5\]]bla na med pa ste/_ma bsgrubs par las byed pa'o/_/de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod pas me tog pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/_gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[102a.6\]]te/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul la/_yang lan bdun bzlas nas me tog snying po blangs nas gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gdon gyis zin pa la byin na gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kyis thegs pa la byin na nad 
[\[102a.7\]]thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i sgor gtor na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mi ro bsregs pa'i sa'i steng du gtor na/_sems can de sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/mnar med pa na gnas 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]pa'i sems can la gtor na skad cig de la yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_nyal ba'i sngas su bzhag na rmi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad cing yid du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am bud med gang gi steng du 
[\[102b.2\]]gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing grib ma bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i steng du gtor na de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/lha'i gzugs brnyan gyi steng du bzhag na 'gugs par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas ras kyi sku gzugs 
[\[102b.3\]]kyi spyan sngar mig sman ldong ros la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grub pa'i rtags gsum ston par 'gyur te/_'bar ba dang dbu ba 'byung ba dang /_dud pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin gyi gnas 
[\[102b.4\]]thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dpral bar thig le byas na phugs thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/_sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur/_yan lag dang nying lag la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_spyi bor thig le byas na 'phags pa spyan 
[\[102b.5\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/mig la byugs na/_khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing /_dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed do/_/mtshan mo mig la bskus na nyin mo bzhin du mthong bar 
[\[102b.6\]]'gyur zhing /_gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_kha phug nas dor bar bya'o/_/rang gi lus la byugs na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur/_gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/_tshe 
[\[102b.7\]]bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/yang na bza' ba dang snying gar bsku ba byas na nag po chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi gzugs ston par 'gyur ba nas/_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang sna tshogs mang 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]po ston par 'gyur/_zla ba dang nyi ma ston par 'gyur ro/_/ldong ros dang /_gi waM dang /_sau bi rA ka dang /_gur gum dang /_kra ku d+ha la don yod par grub pa khri bzlas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa 
[\[103a.2\]]byas te/_thams cad du mi smra bar bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar btags la/_ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon du phyogs te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas nas phye ma zhib tu btags te/_yang 
[\[103a.3\]]don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po dang /_don yod pa'i grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/_mchod pa chen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas 
[\[103a.4\]]la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/_ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug pa la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/_bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la khro bo'i gsang sngags 
[\[103a.5\]]lan bdun bzlas te/_de'i 'og tu mig la bskus nas don yod par grub pa'i gzungs bzlas par byas na/_bskus pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po Ta la dang bcas gzhal med khang dang bcas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i 
[\[103a.6\]]ri bo po Ta la na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kha mas mthong bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur/_chos bshad pa de yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[103a.7\]]tshogs dang bcas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur zhing chos 'chad pa'i gsung gi sgra de yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar rigs ngan gyi rigs su skyes pa dang /_mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang /_mtshams med pa 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]lnga byed pa gang yin pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje dgongs par 'gyur zhing rmi lam du ston par mdzad do/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/_mchog thams 
[\[103b.2\]]cad sbyin par 'gyur/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/_lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing lha'i bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_nad kyis thebs pa thams cad la mig sman 'dis bskus na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_rims thams cad sel 
[\[103b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/dug thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad la mig la bskus na mi mthong bar 'gyur/_phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dang g.yo can dang chom po dang rkun po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gdab pa'i 'jigs 
[\[103b.4\]]pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang khrag khrug la mig la bskus na thams cad las rgyal zhing lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/g.yul ngo thams cad du mig la bskus na g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing dpung gi mchog rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i pho
