[\[103b.5\]]brang du 'gro ba'i tshe mig la bskus na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mi smra bar grong khyer du song na skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo grong khyer na gnas so cog thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mig g.yas pa la bskus na rigs bzhi'i 
[\[103b.6\]]'jig rten gang mthong ba de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mig g.yon pa la bskus na rigs ngan thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste/_don yod pa grub ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[103b.7\]]brjod bya ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byed na de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po dang /_gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur thams cad kyis ming bzung ba byas par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa stong mnyes par byas par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyur/_
[\[104a.2\]]'jig rten pa'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_sngon gyi sgrib pas mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/_nam yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_tshe rabs tshe rabs su skye ba dran par 'gyur/_lha thams cad kyang mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtag tu 
[\[104a.3\]]bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/phyag g.yon pa mnan te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po la sogs pa bkug par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnas so/_/gang gi 
[\[104a.4\]]tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa byas na lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/lte ba'i gnas su mnan te klu la sogs pa thams cad char gyi rgyun 
[\[104a.5\]]'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tshim par byed par 'gyur ro snyam du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na gang dang gang du song ba der skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_rgyal po'am/_rgyal mo'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma la 
[\[104a.6\]]gang bsams pa dang gang bcol ba dang /_smras pa'i las de thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/dbu nas bzung ste bzlas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du dbang du byas par 'gyur te/_thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/thog mar bzlas brjod 
[\[104a.7\]]stong rtsa brgyad byas nas bzlas par bya'o/_/zhabs gnyis mnan te stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na sa'i 'og yan chad dbang du byas par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/_mngag gzhug thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas pad+ma'i 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]mtshe'ur bor na pad+ma zad mi shes par 'byung zhing pad+ma dus thams cad par 'gyur ro/_/ut+pal la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas ut+pa la'i mtshe 'ur bor na ut+pa la sngon po zad mi shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nam yang nyams par mi 'gyur te/_dus thams cad du me tog 'byung 
[\[104b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog dang gan d+ha bAr+Shi ka dang /_yU thi ka dang /_na ba mA lA'i me tog rnams kyang dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu dang /_me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te skyed mos tshal lam 
[\[104b.3\]]nags tshal gyi nang du gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu zad mi shes shing dus thams cad par 'gyur ro/_/dpal chen mo dgug par 'dod pas spra tshil las lha mo dpal chen mo skyil mo krung phyed du 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lus btud pa lag pa na pad+ma thogs pa brang rgyas pa 
[\[104b.4\]]byas la 'bras bu dang /_me tog dgram par bya zhing ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_tsan+dan dkar pos mchod pa byas la ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzhags par bya zhing sngar tsan+dan dkar po las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi 
[\[104b.5\]]sku gzugs la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/_dpal lha mo chen mo la tsan+dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing gnyis ka la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya gtor ma dkar po dang dri chab dbul bar bgyi/_mchod yon stong dbul bar bya ste/_rig sngags 'chang gtsang 
[\[104b.6\]]mas dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos pas mngon du phyogs te/_skyil mo krung du 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun byas la ji snyed pa'i dri dang phreng ba dang me tog la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_dpal lha mo 
[\[104b.7\]]chen mo'i mgo la gdags par bya/_me tog gzhan gyis mchod pa bya zhing tsan+dan dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing yungs kar re re zhing 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]bzlas la dpal lha mo chen mo la bsnun par byas te/_stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_dpal lha mo chen mo 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad 
[\[105a.2\]]gser du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal lha mo chen mo bkug par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dpal rjes su spyod par 'dod na nyin re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod pa bya zhing mchod yon 
[\[105a.3\]]gyi snod kyang gzhag par bya/_dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya sbyin par bya/_longs spyad par bya/_bsod nams kyang bya zhing dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod par bya'o/_/dpal lha mo chen mo rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas don yod pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i 
[\[105a.4\]]snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing tsan+dan gyi ril bu stong rtsa brgyad kyis lus bdug par bya/_yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya ste/_yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /_dpal lha mo chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i nor bu dang gser dang mu tig gi rgyan gyis 
[\[105a.5\]]brgyan pa'i lus snang la zhal pad+ma kha phye ba lta bu spyan ut+pal sngon po ltar gsal ba pad+ma bsnams pa gdan pad+ma nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_gser mang po'i pad+ma'i char 'bebs pa rin po che 'bar ba'i bum pa stong phrag brgya thogs pa lha'i bu mo dang gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong mang po 
[\[105a.6\]]thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pas lus gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba mdun du 'khod par 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang gi 'jigs par mi bya zhing sems dga' bar byas la gsang sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[105a.7\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_b+ho d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA a mo g+ha ba ra dA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM pad+mi ni pad+ma ne tra pad+mAM ge_/pad+ma d+ha re pad+ma b+ha te/_pad+ma pri ye pad+ma gau rI pad+mA pra b+he pad+mA sa na pra tiSh+Thi te/_a ba lo ki ta pri ye ba ra de ba ra dA yi ni pra si ta pra sA d+ha ya 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]ku ru ku ru/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te bar de hu ru hu ru ba ra nga gi ni tsa la tsa la pad+ma bi b+hu Shi te pad+ma pri ye pad+ma gau ri pi ci tra bi ma na d+ha re b+ha ra b+ha ra sam b+ha ra sma ras ma ya/_ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ras me sat+ya a d+hiSh+Thi ta de bi a mo g+ha ba sha bar de hA~M/_na mo stu te swA hA/_lan bdun bzlas pa tsam 
[\[105b.2\]]gyis lha mo dpal chen mo phyag brkyang ste/_rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur zhing 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/thugs las skyes pa gsung las skyes pa khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo dang bcas pa grub kyis don yod 
[\[105b.3\]]pa'i zhags pas pad+ma dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs la zhugs shig nga'i gnas la rang gi khyim bzhin du las su bya ba thams cad byos shig_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang gzungs sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/
[\[105b.4\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+ha ga ba ti mA tr-i dza ni tri bar bar a ba lo ki ta ba ra de k+Shi ri ni swa ba tu/_am+ba am+ba bi pu la kIrti ka re pra ba ra b+hu dze a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste swA hA/_de'i 'og 
[\[105b.5\]]tu lha mo dpal chen mo'i nu ma gnyis las 'o ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'o ma'i rgyun de khas zed de 'thungs pa tsam gyi mod la lha'i me tog pad+ma dang ku mu da ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur skra cung zad 'khyil cing 'khyil la mig ut+pal sngon po lta bu dang tshig gsal zhing mi 'am 
[\[105b.6\]]ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par blta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mngon sum du 'gyur/_cho ga zhib mo mang po 'grub par 'gyur tshe lo stong phrag bcu thub par 'gyur/_rgyal ba 'od dpag med byang 
[\[105b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thabs cig tu gzhal med khang mchog na chos bgro ba mthong bar 'gyur/_rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_nor bu chen po pad+ma la lta ba zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_rig sngags 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]'chang thams cad kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras su 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[106a.2\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bu'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur/_thams cad du stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pa dang /_brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[106a.3\]]thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor rim pa phye ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po cho ga zhib mo zab pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur/_lha thams cad kyi gnas dang /_klu thams cad kyi gnas dang /_mi 'am ci thams cad kyi gnas dang /_phug dang khung gi gnas 
[\[106a.4\]]thams cad sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/_gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad sgo 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur/_'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa bla ma gcig pu 'jig rten mgon po dang 'dra bar mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/_
[\[106a.5\]]'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa chen por 'gyur/_dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin sreg byas na rig sngags 'chang de la bu bzhin du byams pas rang nyid bsnyen bkur yongs su spyad bas yongs su spyod do/_/
[\[106a.6\]]'dod pa thams cad dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shang kha shi la dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_lha'i nor bu chen po rin po che'i bar thams cad 
[\[106a.7\]]sbyin par byed do/_/yul ka shi ka'i gos bzang po mang po sbyin par byed cing lha'i bza' ba dang /_btung ba'i bar dang bdud rtsi'i ro'i bar du sbyin par byed do/_/gnas thams cad du song ba na yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can ji lta ba bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gi gzhal med khang mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang 
[\[106b.2\]]phyug chen po dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin chen po gsang ba pa'i 'khor rnams dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[106b.3\]]de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas yongs su bskor bas nyin mtshan du bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen po pad+ma la lha'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i 
[\[106b.4\]]zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_
[\[106b.5\]]bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis lha'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang /_lha'i gser dang /_
[\[106b.6\]]gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog mang po dang /_lha'i gos dang /_lha'i rgyan dang /_lha'i dri dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnams re re zhing 'phang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam gyi phung po byas nas/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye 
[\[106b.7\]]ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re re la tshul de lta bus so sor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nyin re zhing /_lo gcig gi bar du 'bul bar 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]byed mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i til mar rgya mtsho tsam gyis bkang ba'i mar me bltam par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[107a.2\]]gal te don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par blta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog pa dang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 
[\[107a.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur/_dpal lha mo chen mo de yang mchog 
[\[107a.4\]]thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/_dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/_/gang na dpal lha mo chen mo gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pas phyogs de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/_dpal 
[\[107a.5\]]lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_drag shul spyod pa dang /_las sna 
[\[107a.6\]]tshogs gzhan dag pas dpal lha mo chen mo'i las mchog tu ston to/_/dpal lha mo chen mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no/_/dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa sbyin pa'o/_/don yod pa'i grags pa rgya chen po sbyin pa'o/_/
[\[107a.7\]]don yod pa'i nam mkha'i gzhal med khang 'chang ba'o/_/don yod pa'i yon tan bsgrags pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o/_/dpal lha mo chen po ni don yod pa'i zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstan to/_/de nas rig sngags 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]'chang gtsang mas khrus legs par byas pa dri chus bsangs shing ba las byung ba lngas byugs pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos pas kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya zhing chang dang /_sha dang big btsong dang /_sgog skya dang ke'u rnams dang /_'dres pa dang /_'bags pa rnams yongs su spang 
[\[107b.2\]]bar bya/_kha zas ngan pa dang /_btung ba ngan pa dang /_gos ngan pa dang /_dri ma can yongs su spang bar bya/_sems can ngan pa dang /_rten pa dang /_ngan g.yo can dang /_gsod skyen can dang /_skye bo ngan pa can dang /_khrel med pa dang /_snying rje med pa dang /_byams pa dang bral ba dang /_
[\[107b.3\]]thub chod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/gnas ngan pa dang /_gnas rten ngan pa dang /_bgo mnyes dang /_bza' nyes dang /_grib ma ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya/_gcig gis gcig 'bags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing dri dang bdug 
[\[107b.4\]]spos kyis bsangs te mi smra bar bzlas brjod bya/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba'i sems dang yid bde bar bya/_bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing snying dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems su byas nas bzlas brjod bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[107b.5\]]gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la tu ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/_dpal lha mo chen mo la tsan+dan gyi bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing dus ji lta ba'i me tog dbul bar bya ste/_gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
[\[107b.6\]]te thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM puSh+pa bi lo ki te gan d+ha sa re/_a mo g+ha dza la sam b+ha ra Ni pad+me sa ma b+hU ri ta ra ta ra mu de te b+hUM swA hA/_lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[107b.7\]]gcig bzlas te me tog dang bdug spos dang dri dang mchod yon dbul lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas la a ga ru'i bdug spos dbul 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]bar bya zhing ci snyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/_spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing de nyid kyi zhabs drung du skyil mo krung du 'dug la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la snying po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag 
[\[108a.2\]]rgya byas te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas na/_bcings ba tsam gyi mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur/_tho rangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur 
[\[108a.3\]]te/_yid la bsams pa thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur/_mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/_'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/_dbugs kyang 'byin par 'gyur/_yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/_tshe 'di nyid la nad thams cad dang bral bar 
[\[108a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/_sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur/_nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_phas kyi rgol ba dang /_dgra bo thams cad 'jig bar 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur 
[\[108a.5\]]g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag gi nang du gtor ba byas na thams cad rengs par byas pa dang rmugs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i snying po dang gsang sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[108a.6\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM a mo g+ha bA sha hr-i da ya pad+me ni ba ra de dz+wa la dz+wa la pra sa ri ta pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/_snying po'i rig sngags so/_/oM a ba lo ki te pad+me ni ba rAng gi ni tu ru tu ru hUM swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'i 
[\[108a.7\]]gzungs so/_/don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+me rnam par blta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga zad par 'gyur/_dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchog sbyin par 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur/_de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_rims thams cad dang nad thams cad kyis 
[\[108b.2\]]mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig por la gu gul gyis bdugs te/_mgul du btags na gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te nag po chen po dang ma 
[\[108b.3\]]mo'i tshogs 'ongs te rgyas btab pa gang yin pa'ang gdon thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/skud pa nag pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar pos bsal bar bya'o/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa 
[\[108b.4\]]dang /_khrag khrug thams cad la gi wang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_thig le byas na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/snying gar thig le byas na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[108b.5\]]lag mthil la thig le byas na skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/smin mtshams su thig le byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mgul bar byugs na rje'u rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[108b.6\]]dpung pa gnyis la byugs na rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dpral ba'i skra mtshams su thig le byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na dmangs rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa'i rje ngar la byugs na dpag tshad brgyar 
[\[108b.7\]]ngal ba med par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rkang mthil la bskus na/_chu klung chen po'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho'i bar du rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/_gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/pus mo gnyis la byugs na me'i phung po 'bar zhing 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rab tu 'bar bar zhugs na tsan+dan dang pu shel tse bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro/_/ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus na mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing gal te bskal pa stong du bzhag pa zhig na'ang 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[109a.2\]]ro/_/de bzhin du lto bar bskus na ji srid du lto chus ma bkrus pa de srid du kha zas dang btung ba mi 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/pho mtshan la bskus na khu ba 'gags par 'gyur ro/_/ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te 'thungs na lus dag cing dri ma med la gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[109a.3\]]ro/_/bgo nyes dang /_bza' nyes dang /_gri bam ngan pa dang /_blta nyes su mi 'gyur/_'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po 
[\[109a.4\]]thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_dug dang dbyig dug dang byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_gsang sngags dang sbyor ba dang gtor ma rnams 'jig par 'gyur/_'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang khrag khrug rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/_phas kyi 
[\[109a.5\]]rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhun mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te tho rangs kyi dus su mi smra bar byas nas/_zos na bklags pas tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba zhag bdun du byas 
[\[109a.6\]]na bstan bcos thams cad la mngon du 'gyur ro/_/zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur 
[\[109a.7\]]ro/_/sbyor ba lo gcig gi bar du byas na tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad na bla ma gcig pur 'gyur zhing dge ba dang tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro/_/til mar dang lhan cig bskol nas mgo la bskus na skra cung zad 'khyil cing lcang lo can du 'gyur ro/_/bzhin gyi 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]dkyil 'khor la bskus na ston ka'i zla ba nya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing me tog pad+ma dang ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur lus thams cad la byugs na mar dang 'dra bar 'jam por 'gyur zhing rkang lag shin tu gzhon sha can du 'gyur/_rna ba la byugs na rna ba ji tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/_
[\[109b.2\]]sna nas btang na klad pa'i nad do cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing sna bas dang mchil ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_lha'i spos kyi dri mnam par 'gyur zhing nam yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mnam par mi 'gyur/_gnyer ma dang skra dkar spang bar 'gyur/_so rgal ba yang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/_lce 
[\[109b.3\]]pad+ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/_mid pa'i nad dang ske 'gags pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_'jam tsam du byas te rna ba bkang na sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_sgra yid du 'ong ba dang bkra shis pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na 
[\[109b.4\]]gi wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas legs par grub pa mchog tu dge ba/_dge bar 'gro ba mig rkang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying bo 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i 
[\[109b.5\]]nor bu pad+ma la rnam par blta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas kha zas dkar po zos la mig rkang gi ril bu khar bcug na ji snyed bshad pa dang bklags pa 'dzin 
[\[109b.6\]]par 'gyur/_lce pad+ma dang ku mu da'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/_mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_de las lha'i sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_gang la smras pa de dag bran pho dang bran mo bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/_gang la dri mnam pa de yang dbang du 'gyur/_tha na dud 
[\[109b.7\]]'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa yang dbang du byed do/_/'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_gnod sbyin mo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za la sogs pa thams cad dang /_brjed byed dang /_sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgyar byer nas thag ring po na 'khod par 'gyur ro/_/phyir rgol ba dang sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing byams pa'i sems kyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na lag pas glang po 
[\[110a.2\]]che gnon par 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra ba'i mthu stobs ston par 'gyur ro/_/mgul du btags te g.yul ngor song na gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 
[\[110a.3\]]'gyur zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/spyi bor bzhag ste rgyal po'i pho brang du song na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang blon po dang blon po chen po dang bram ze'i mdun na 'don pa dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing spyi bo la dbang bskur bar 'gyur/_thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang ldan 
[\[110a.4\]]par 'gyur/_lag pa la btags na gang la reg pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_nor dang 'bru dang /_dbyig dang nor bu dang mu tig dang /_gser la reg pa tsam gyis zad mi shes par 'gyur/_sa bon gdab pa dang brnga ba byas na zad mi shes par 'phel bar 'gyur rin po che'i lag 
[\[110a.5\]]pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_'bru'i phung po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma re re zos na dran pa dang /_blo chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/_sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur/_'bras dang mdze dang lhog pa dang 
[\[110a.6\]]lu'u ta dang shu ba dang g.yan pa dang g.ya' ba dang /_phol mig la byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur zhing nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sbyor bzla ba gcig tsam du byas na cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi mchog 
[\[110a.7\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dus kun tu lus la thogs na mtshon gzas pas lus la mi tshugs so/_/chom rkun dang g.yo can thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur/_til mar dang lhan cig bskol te klad pa na ba dang rna ba na ba dang 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]so na ba dang mig na ba dang /_klad pa phyed na ba la 'jam tsam blugs pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing phyin cad nad gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_/gdon stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad la zhun mar dang yungs kar bsres te bdugs na 'dus nas phyogs bcur 'byer zhing 
[\[110b.2\]]nam yang gnas kyi sa phyogs der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rang gi yid la 'dod pa'i dgos pa gzhan thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha thams cad 'gugs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan 'dren pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skul ba/_rig 
[\[110b.3\]]sngags 'chang thams cad kyi grub pa'i mtha'/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams dang /_'byung po'i gdon rnams dang /_brjed byed dang /_gnod sbyin mo rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_skem byed thams cad 'byer bar byed pa dang sdang ba'i bdud rnams gsod pa 
[\[110b.4\]]nad thams cad zlog pa gdug pa'i dug rnams bzlog pa mche ba'i dug dang gnas pa'i dug dang /_'gro ba'i dug thams cad la thogs pa med par 'grub pa rims thams cad 'joms pa khyad par du rims nyin bzhi pa 'joms pa/_bzhin dang bar byed pa'i gtso bo gos bdug 
[\[110b.5\]]pa'i mchog gsang sngags dang byad thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog gang la rgyal po khros nas gshed mas mtshon gzas pa yang bdug pa 'dis bdugs na de thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dug dang dug sbyar ma dang srog chags lu'u ta dang /_sbrul gyis zin pa dang /_srog 
[\[110b.6\]]chags gon se dang gzhan yang srog chags sna tshogs dug dang bcas pa mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams dang gal te klu 'jog pos zin na yang bdugs pa tsam gyis dug thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/nad kun 'phrog pa grub pa ste/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa/_/bsod 
[\[110b.7\]]nams phung po che dang mnyam/_/grub pa lha rnams kun gyis mchod/_/brgya byin sum cu'i lha dang ni/_/lha min lhan cig g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/bdug pa 'di yis bdugs pa dang /_/lha min de bzhin pa ma par 'gyur/_/drag po yis ni sum brtsegs bsregs/_/khyab 'jug 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]gis ni ba lI bcings/_/mi'u thung gis ni sa gzhi mnan/_/lha min dbang pos nyi zla dang /_/gza' rnams pham byas 'khrugs par 'gyur/_/bdug pa'i rgyal po'i khyad par gyis/_/mi'u thung ni kun las rgyal/_/sgyu ma byed pa stong phrag brgya/_/rtag tu 
[\[111a.2\]]rnam par rgyas par byed/_/bdug pa'i rgyal pos skya bseng rnams/_/rnam par pham par the tshom med/_/bdung ni bye ba stong phrag brgya/_/'dren pas byams pa'i stobs kyis btul/_/bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya/_/bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyis/_/sdang ba'i 
[\[111a.3\]]bdud ni yang dag zad/_/rgya mtsho rnam par dkrug byas pas/_/rgya mtsho gnas kun gcer bur 'gyur/_/snod gcig gi ni sum cha skams/_/yid bzhin nor bu chud zos pas/_/don kun grub pa bdag nyid ches/_bdug spos 'di yis bdugs byas nas/_/slar yang rang gi 
[\[111a.4\]]khyim 'ongs pas/_/rtag tu rgyal mtshan rtser btags na/_/bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas shing /_/nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni/_/rin chen bdun gyi char pa phab/_/de ltar bdug pa stobs ldan yin/_/las kyi don kun sgrub par byed/_/g.yul chen po lhung ba'i klu'i mtshor/_
[\[111a.5\]]dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bos rgya mtsho chen po la/_lhun po chen po'i ri rab kyis bsrubs pas/_dug 'dzags pa mgrin sngon gyis dug 'thungs pas bdug pa'i rgyal pos bskor bas dug med par byas so/_/bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus bdud rtsir yongs su byas so/_/de ltar 
[\[111a.6\]]bdug pa'i rgyal pos dug thams cad 'joms par the tshom med do/_/gling bzhi pa yi drang srong gis/_/des ni maN+Dal pham par byas/_/stan phyed la ni longs spyod pa'i/_/skra can dbang pos ltung bar byas/_/bdug pa'i rgyal po bsams pa yis/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba de rnams nyams/_
[\[111a.7\]]de phyir bden par smra ba'i phyir/_/bdug pa 'di ni bden pa ldan/_/bden pa'i rgyal pos rab tu bsgrags/_/bden pa'i chos dang bden par smra/_/mtha' dag bsdus las byams pa'i sems/_/'jig rten kun la rtag tu byams/_/snying rje dang ni dga' ba nyid/_/bdug pa 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]gzhan gyis bdugs pa 'di/_/mtshon cha thams cad 'joms par byed/_/bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdug pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/_'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po 'jig rten pa'i rtag tu bla mar gyur pa'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[111b.2\]]cad la phan pa'i don du rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi khyad par du dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang /_'jigs pa chen pos sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'jig pa chen po cher mi bzad pa/_rtag tu bkres pa dang 
[\[111b.3\]]skom pas nyen pa/_kyi hud zhes sgra sgrogs par byed pa'i skrag pa de la skyabs med do/_/sems can thams cad rjes su brtse bas brtan par kun tu blta bar bya'o/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs su gsungs pa ni bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o/_/bdug pa 'dis bdugs 
[\[111b.4\]]te/_gang gi don du ming nas smos pa yang /_ma rungs pa'am/_yang na byams pa yang rung ste/_yid la bsams pa rnams sgrub par byed do/_/'dis bdugs te brjod pa tsam gyi mod la/_'di rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grub par byed de spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsung 
[\[111b.5\]]dge ba'o/_/gza' zla ba'am/_gza' nyi ma rgyu skar nyam nga ba la gnas pa/_sgra gcan gyis zos pa rnams dang mi gang yin pa skye ba'i gnod pa dang /_rgyal po'am/_yang na bud med dam/_blon po chen po dang /_blon po dang /_bkrabs pa dang /_mdun na 'don dang /_
[\[111b.6\]]rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_rje rigs dang /_skye bo gzhan dang 'grogs pas gnod pa dang /_'thab pa nyid dang /_sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nye bar 'tshe ba la bdug spos rgyal pos bdugs pas de'i skad cig la de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[111b.7\]]bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim po thob ste/_gos med pa'i skye bos gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lha rdzas kyi dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_khri dang /_nye bar bsten pa dang /_lhab lhub thams cad skad cig gis 'byung ste/_gal te yang dag 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]par sbyar ba yin na'o/_/bsams pa dang /_re ba dang /_yid kyi shing rta thams cad mngon par smras pas 'grub par byed do/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsung ste/_rtag tu 'di dag thams cad 'grub bo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis zas rnyed cing /_lha rdzas 
[\[112a.2\]]kyi gos dang rgyan mchog rab tu 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi sdig pa thams cad rtag tu grol bas dmyal ba las grol te/_dmyal ba mi bzad pa thams cad las grol lo/_/sdug bsngal thams cad las grol te/_skye bo bde ba la rtse bar byed do/_/bde zhing bde 'gror 'gro la bde 
[\[112a.3\]]ba thams cad du thob par byed do/_/bdug spos 'dis bdugs pas mchog gi dri snom par byed de/_rdul dang mun pa can thams cad bdug pa bsnams pas sangs par byed de/_dper na nyi ma shar bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa rnam par sangs par byed pa bzhin no/_/bdug pa'i 
[\[112a.4\]]rgyal po 'dis sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing /_dmyal ba thams cad dang sdig pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad las grol te/_sa bcu po thob cing bde 'gro'i lam bzang po bstan pa de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di sbyar bar bya'o/_/
[\[112a.5\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bdug pa chen po'i rgyal po chen po cho ga zhib mo dang rjes su mthun pa 'di gsungs so/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar/_mchod rten la sa'i phyogs gang du bdug pa 'dis 
[\[112a.6\]]bdug pa bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_thams cad du rgyal ba dang /_de bzhin du lung bstan pa'i sa'i phyogs der gang gA'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa der rig sngags 'chang gis gang du 
[\[112a.7\]]bdug spos kyis bdugs pas rdo rje 'chang bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang bcas/_bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang /_rtag tu ri gangs ldan dang /_de bzhin du nor bu bzang po dang /_lngas rtsen dang /_gang ba bzang po dang /_ki lI kI la dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]chen po yang dag shes dang /_mi la zhon pa dang /_sangs rgyas stobs dang /_stobs po che dang /_sgra sgo skyong dang /_nad kU pe ra dang /_rab 'joms dang /_dz+ya Ta ba ka dang /_stobs kyi lha dang /_rdzu 'phrul chen po ste 'di rnams sde dang bcas/_dpung dang bcas/_bzhon pa dang bcas 
[\[112b.2\]]pas nyin mtshan rtag tu gnas nas de bzhin nyid du srung bar byed par byed do/_/bdag gi dpal sa gsum gyi lha mo rtag tu mchod par byed do/_/rtag du sa gzhi gang du bdug pa rab tu bdug par bya ste/_rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du gsang ba ba dang bcas pa dang /_chos 'dzin pa la 
[\[112b.3\]]mkhas pa rnams rtag tu srung bar byed cing /_de bzhin nyid du tshangs pa dang /_drag po lta'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang /_lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad du dus rtag tu yang srung bar byed do/_/zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_de bzhin nyid sgra 
[\[112b.4\]]gcan dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs dang /_mtshan mo'i lha rnams kyis dus rtag tu srung bar byed do/_/'jigs ma dang /_dpal mo dang /_dung can ma'i lha rnams dang /_dbyangs can ma dang /_sa 'dzin gyi lha rnams dang /_chu lha dang /_ljon pa dang /_nags kyi rtse 
[\[112b.5\]]mo'i lha dang /_ri'i lha dang /_chu klung dang /_lteng ka'i lha dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu'i lha dang /_lus ngan gyi lha dang /_gzhon nu'i lha dang /_lha'i drang srong bdag nyid che ba dang /_lteng ka'i lha dang /_chu klung dang /_lteng ka dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_zla ba 
[\[112b.6\]]dang /_nyi ma dang /_de bzhin du lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do/_/rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing /_nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang ste/_sa'i phyogs gang du bdug spos 'dis bdugs pa'i sa phyogs su rtag tu lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs so/_/'jig 
[\[112b.7\]]rten dbang phyug dang /_mgon po dang /_bla ma dang /_rnam par 'dren pa dang /_'jig rten gyi skyabs dang /_mchog sbyin par de bzhin nyid du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas so/_/gnas der bdug spos gang yin pa de dag gis mchog tu bdug par bya'o/_/dri mnams pa 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]tsam gyis myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes so/_/sems can kun la phan don phyir/_/sdug bsngal thams cad ldog byed pa'i/_/rdzas kyi ming rnams bshad bya yi/_/lha dang mi rnams mnyan par gyis/_/a ga ru dang rgya spos nyid/_/de bzhin tsan+dan ser mor 
[\[113a.2\]]bcas/_/spr-i ka nyid dang gi wang dang /_/kun tu ru bcas ma he'i mig_/ro dang sra rtsi pog nyid dang /_/de bzhin gur gum na lan+da/_/a ru ra bcas dpal bskor ba/_/sA ma kaM dang spang spos bcas/_/pri yang ku bcas tu ru ska/_/ka yas+tha dang ba yas+tha/_/na me ru dang gla 
[\[113a.3\]]sgang bcas/_/ru rta a ga ru nag nyid/_/ga pur dang ni gla rtsi nyid/_/lang+ka gser shing 'bras bu dang /_/arga'i 'o ma gser 'o ma/_/snu ha'i 'o ma nyid dang ni/_/thod pa skal ba ldan nyid dang /_/so ma rA dza khyab 'jug gnon/_/shing dga' rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid/_/nA 
[\[113a.4\]]ku lI dri nA ku lI/_/tshangs pa'i bu dang ku mu dang /_/pad+ma'i chu ba sbrang rtsi dang /_/bu ram dkar po'i khu ba dang /_/'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi/_/bdug pa'i mchog 'di bsgrub par bya/_/mkhas pas legs par khrus byas te/_/gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos 
[\[113a.5\]]shing /_/zla ba nya 'am bcu bzhi la/_/bcu gsum pa'am tshes brgyad la/_/rtag tu sbyar bya nyin mtshan gzung /_/sngags la mkhas pas bdug spos 'di/_/so so so sor kun sbyar nas/_phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsang sngags dang /_/me tog bdug spos dri rgya chen/_/
[\[113a.6\]]mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis dang /_/gtor ma'i las la mkhas pa dang /_/mchod yon snod ni gang ba dang /_/mgo la'ang dri dang til mar gyi/_/mar me legs gru gnas su ni/_/legs sbas gtsang mar gnas de sgrub/_/legs sbas gtsang mar gnas pa yi/_/slob ma 
[\[113a.7\]]mchog gi grogs kyis ni/_/don yod zhags pa'i spyan snga ru/_/'dug nas yongs su dag pa'i lus/_/sdom dang byams pa'i sems gzhag nas/_/sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran sgom zhing /_/gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig_/
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs te 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad don yod pa grub pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad tshig dang yi ge shin tu gsal bar bzlas nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par 
[\[113b.2\]]blta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te/_de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag brgya bzlas so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te a mo g+ha hr-i da yan/_tsa ra tsa ra ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya sA d+ha ya hUM/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya a mo g+ha bA sha ha ste swA hA/_de nas 
[\[113b.3\]]gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas te mnyam par gzhag la/_las thams cad la mkhas pas bdug spos kyi mchog la bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la bdug spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa 
[\[113b.4\]]snang ba rgya che ba nor bu chen po'i sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po yin te/_thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[113b.5\]]la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te ma hA a mo g+ha dza ya dza ya swA hA/_de'i 'og tu bdag rang la bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[113b.6\]]po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku ston par 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze'i gzugs kyis de dang lhan cig smra bar byed de/_gang la smras pa dang gang la gtam byas pa de thams 
[\[113b.7\]]cad tshe 'di la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu mtshan mo rang gi gzugs ston par 'gyur zhing mchog sbyin par mdzad do/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/_'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_sngon gyi sgrib pa dang 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gi lus la bdugs pa tsam dang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yul 'khor dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[114a.2\]]dang bcas pa dang /_blon po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_bkrabs pa dang /_bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro/_/tshes bcu bzhi dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang tshes brgyad 
[\[114a.3\]]la khrus legs par bya ste/_gos gtsang ma bgos la ba las byung ba lngas byugs pas khyim gyi phugs su dkyil 'khor byas la/_me tog dang mchod yon gyi snod gzhag par bya/_gtor ma dkar po nye bar gzhag par bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs la 
[\[114a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te/_phyogs bzhir phyag byas la bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par byas na/_bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gang ba la 
[\[114a.5\]]'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang /_gor shir+Sha dang /_ta ma 
[\[114a.6\]]la'i lo ma dang /_bdug spos mang po nam mkha'i ngos khebs pas mchod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'og min gyi gnas 
[\[114a.7\]]na gnas pa'i lha'i bar du thams cad bdug pa'i dris rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom mi bya zhing yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/skad chen pos don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]bzlas pa byas na/_des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang de la yang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/_dus kun tu dgongs par 'gyur/_yang dang yang du 
[\[114b.2\]]gzigs pa'i phyir byon par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dgyes par 'gyur/_
[\[114b.3\]]rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub stsol bar mdzad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhing ha cang char ches na gcod par byed cing char mi 'bab na 'bebs par byed do/_/rlung dang ser ba dang sprin thams cad gcod par 
[\[114b.4\]]byed bdugs pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'jig par byed bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur/_ma mo'i gnas su bdugs na rlung dang ser ba dang sprin thams cad gcod par byed ma mo'i tshogs dang nag po chen po la sogs pa 'gugs 
[\[114b.5\]]par 'gyur zhing dbang du gyur nas 'dug par 'gyur bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe bdugs na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/_thams cad du bdugs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/_thams cad du sbyar bar byas na 
[\[114b.6\]]kun tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bdug pa'i cho ga'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_de nas rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang /_gdong bkru ba dang 
[\[114b.7\]]lus bsku ba byas na ya lad dang /_go cha bgos pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba bshad par bgyi yis bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol/_don yod pa'i nor bu rgya chen po rdo rje'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu gang sbyor ba byas pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa mkhas pas mdzod 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]spu rnams su thig le byas na tshogs kyi nang dang skye bo mang po'i nang dang tshogs pa'i nang dang dge 'dun gyi nang dang de bzhin du rigs byed kyi tshogs bzhi'i nang du skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang du zla ba tshes pa bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa med do/_/lha rnams thams cad ya 
[\[115a.2\]]mtshan skye/_/drag po yi ni cod pan 'chang /_'jig rten mgon po'i g.yas kyi dbu'i/_/dbu rgyan rtse phran zla tshes bzhin/_/gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin no/_/zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/_/smin ma rna ba dpral ba dang /_/pad+ma dkar sham shin tu 'jam/_/mig gnyis 
[\[115a.3\]]ut+pal sngon po 'dra/_/sems can thams cad dga' bas blta/_/dga' zhing rtag tu tshig btsan 'gyur/_/de yi mig gis gang mthong ba/_/thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur/_/skyes pa dag la bsku byas na/_/rtag tu rig smra blo che zhing /_/rtag tu ya la go bgos pa'i/_/
[\[115a.4\]]'jigs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur/_/'byung po rnams ni mi bzod cing /_/gnod sbyin 'byung po gsang ba pas/_/rtag tu thub par mi 'gyur ro/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang /_/rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing /_/glang chen stobs kyi stobs ldan 'gyur/_/lha rnams 'dar ni yed yed 
[\[115a.5\]]cing /_/klu rnams mtshon skrag par byed/_/gal te rig sngags smra ba yis/_/reg na ri rab lhun po yang /_/g.yo bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing /_/stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal ldan 'gyur/_/nor bu rgyal po bla na med/_/'di ni thos pa 
[\[115a.6\]]tsam gyis kyang /_/sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing /_/dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/_/dpal dang skal bzang rtag thob 'gyur/_/gang gi lag tu thogs gyur pa/_/sgrib ba kun las nges grol zhing /_/de bzhin 'jig rten dga' bar 'gyur/_/de ni de bzhin 
[\[115a.7\]]gshegs kun gyi/_/thugs skyes gsung skyes sras su 'gyur/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/bla ma rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing /_/rig sngags smra ba dbugs 'byung phyir/_/de bzhin du ni bsrung ba dang /_/rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]po thub chen gyi/_/bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob/_/gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba de de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mthong zhing 
[\[115b.2\]]dbugs 'byin pa dang /_phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/_dpal dang skal ba bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/_rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa gcig bur 'gyur/_dgra thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur/_
[\[115b.3\]]phyag na rdo rjes de la rtag tu bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro/_/phyag na pad+ma yang rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa ste/_'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[115b.4\]]nor bu chen po bzung bas sdang ba bdud la sogs pa thams cad dang bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las rgyal te/_pha rol pham par mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/'dis rnga bo che la bskus te brdungs na chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sgra thos pa tsam 
[\[115b.5\]]gyis sems can thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 
[\[115b.6\]]spong ba dang /_mnar med pa la gzhol zhing gnas pa dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_de la dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_me'i 'jigs 
[\[115b.7\]]pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_mtshon gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_rims thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_'dis dung la bskus te bus na chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur/_tha na dung gi sgra 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]thos pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang slar ldog par mi 'gyur/_skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang nad dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_'di ni skye ba phyi ma yin te shi 
[\[116a.2\]]nas thams cad rigs mthun par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa pad+ma las skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 
[\[116a.3\]]'od dpag med las mngon sum du chos kyi gtam thos par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo la cod pan dkar po bcings te nor bu chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bsgreng ba tsam gyi mod la chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro/_/'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa mthong 
[\[116a.4\]]ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bdud 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba mthong bar rig par bya'o/_/'di bsgreng ba tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang khrag khrug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_gnod pa thams cad dang mi ngas dang 
[\[116a.5\]]mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_chom po dang g.yon can dang rkun ma dang phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba 'jig par 'gyur/_rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung dang sdang ba'i sems kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_dug mi bzad pa dang gcan gzan gtum po dang bya dang sbrang bu dang sha sbrang dang 
[\[116a.6\]]byi ba dang sdig sbrul dang 'bras dang lu'u ta dang dug dang shu ba dang lhog pa dang mtshan bar rdol ba dang ske bgegs pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/_sdang ba'i klu dang /_ser ba dang /_grang ba dang /_rlung gis mi tshugs shing nad thams cad rab tu zhib bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba dang /_
[\[116a.7\]]dga' ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo mang po dang mi mang pos yongs su gang zhing 'byor bar 'gyur/_chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog dang /_zas dang /_skom ro zhim pa dang /_shin tu 'jam pa 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_thams cad du lha'i reg pa dang bcas pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_phra men ma dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_brjed byed dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_
[\[116b.2\]]skem byed dang /_grib ma dang /_bza' nyes dang /_bgo nyes dang /_blta nyes dang /_grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/_sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/_mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[116b.3\]]yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni nor bu'i rgyal po chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[116b.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu gdags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa bdag gi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjes su 
[\[116b.5\]]bsgrags par bgyi'o/_/gser dang na la da dang /_gi wang dang /_ba bla dang /_ldong ros dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la dang /_gur gum dang /_nA ga pus pa dang /_twa tsa dang /_tar ga dang /_tsan+dan rnam gnyis dang /_spr-i ka dang /_kA la ka dang /_ru rta dang /_shu ti dang /_pri yang 
[\[116b.6\]]ku dang /_ha re nu ke dang /_sag smel dang /_lo d+ha dang /_dzA ta pa kri kA su ma na dang /_sA ma ka dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_shing arka'i 'o ma rnams bsogs te cha mnyam par byas la gser nyis 'gyur du byas te/_rgyu skar bzang po dang tshes grangs shis shing dge ba la khrus legs 
[\[116b.7\]]par byas te/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/_phye ma zhib mor byas te don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/_khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_gtor la dri chab bzang pos spangs te/_sbyar la 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gser dang bsres lag pur dang gla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas phug la ras skud kyis btags te gser gyis g.yogs la yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/_khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_
[\[117a.2\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar sgrub pa byas la de nyid kyi zhabs drung du gri ba ma la bskam par byas te/_phyed dam bzhi cha gser gyis g.yogs par bya zhing phyed g.yogs par mi bya'o/_/gang la gser gyis g.yogs pa 'di ni gang la don yod pa'i 
[\[117a.3\]]zhags pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dang 'dra ste/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las chen po sgrub par byed do/_gser gyis ma g.yogs pas ni 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed de/_nad thams cad dang /_gdon 
[\[117a.4\]]thams cad dang /_lu'u ta dang /_'bras dang /_'go ba'i nad dang /_shu ba dang /_lhog pa dang /_mtshan par rdol ba dang /_phol mig dang /_sha bkra dang /_mig nad dang /_klad nad dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_mgul pa 'gags pa dang /_kha nad dang /_sna nad 
[\[117a.5\]]dang /_rna ba'i nad dang /_so nad dang /_rkan na ba dang /_lce na ba dang /_mchu na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsi ba logs na ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_mchin pa na ba dang /_rgyab na ba dang /_gcin snyi ba dang /_zug gzer dang /_'khru ba dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum thams cad rab tu zhi 
[\[117a.6\]]bar 'gyur zhing rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/_rims nyin bzhi pa dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi nang gi nad thams cad la chu dron dang lhan 
[\[117a.7\]]cig sbyin no/_/pha rol gyi nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom mi bya'o/_/gser gyis g.yogs pa dpung pa la 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]btags na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur te/_stobs dang brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang /_pad+ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar byas te/_thig le dang gdong pa bkru ba dang lus 
[\[117b.2\]]bkru ba'o/_/yid la ji ltar bsam pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub pa ste/_the tshom mi bya'o/_/rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_skye bo dang blon por bcas brtag tu bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rig sngags 
[\[117b.3\]]bzlas na bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yas pa la btags te rig sngags bzlas na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/_lan cig bzlas pas stong phrag brgyar rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/mgul bar btags te 
[\[117b.4\]]bcangs na khrus ma byas pa khrus byas par 'gyur/_mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur/_tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/_thub par ma byas pa thub par byas par 'gyur/_smyung ba ma byas pa smyung ba byas par 'gyur/_tshig mi btsan pa tshig btsan par 'gyur/_ma grub 
[\[117b.5\]]pa grub par 'gyur/_dam tshig mi shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur/_byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/_/sbyin pa gang cung zad ci sbyin pa chung ngu yang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_nor bu 'di 
[\[117b.6\]]lag mthil g.yas pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/su la yang brjod par mi bya ste de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rked pa la btags te chu'i nang du zhugs na chu klung chen po'i gting du slebs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas nor bu bsgrub 
[\[117b.7\]]par 'dod pas dngul shin tu yongs su dag pa las pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kha phye ba dbus kyi snying po dang ze ba za ma tog 'dra ba sor bcu drug bcu drug pa'i tshad du byas la de'i dbus su gser gyi nor bu gzhag par bya'o/_/ba lang gi lci ba ba lang gi gcin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]byas la tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya ste/_kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma bris la pad+ma'i dbus kyi ze bar dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma bzhag ste/_bum pa gang ba bzhi dang gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya zhing me tog dgram par bya/_tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya/_
[\[118a.2\]]a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_tu ru ska'i bdug pas bdug cing gtor ma dkar po gzhag par bya/_'phan gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/_mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang bltam par bya/_'bras bu dang me tog phreng sna tshogs gzhag par bya/_'phags pa 
[\[118a.3\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste/_rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin mtshan gcig smyung ba byas la/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga nas nyi shu dgu dang gnam stong gi bar du mtshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing /_pad+ma za ma tog de dang 
[\[118a.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'ang mchod pa byas la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/_khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar dang chus dbang bskur bar bya/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 
[\[118a.5\]]rgya stong rtsa brgyad bya/_de bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o/_/mi smra bar dgos pa thams cad byas nas de'i 'og tu tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga zla ba nya'i nang bar gyi dus mtshams su nor bu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[118a.6\]]gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/_rig sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/_nam mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma 'bar ba de lag pa g.yas pas blangs 
[\[118a.7\]]te/_blangs pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser gyi mdog can blta na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur/_sdang ba dang phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]thams cad zlog par byed/_'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur/_tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur/_don yod pa'i rnam par blta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_don yod pa'i dri 
[\[118b.2\]]ma med pa 'bar ba'i rtse mo rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa 'thob par 'gyur/_phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/_nor bu 
[\[118b.3\]]chen po yongs su dag pa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyis lus rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchi zhes dbang du bgyi 
[\[118b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_mgo'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogs su song nas bde ba can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal med khang dang bcas 'khor dang bcas legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[118b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag las chos gnang ba'i sgo'i chos bshad pa chen po thos par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang rgyan dang gzhal med khang ston par 'gyur/_mgul du btags na phug gi gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/_thams 
[\[118b.6\]]cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_phug stong phrag drug_/cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/_dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing lus mi snang ba gang gA'i klung bye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyi lus mi snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon 
[\[118b.7\]]dang rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/dpung ba g.yon pa la btags na gnod sbyin dang srin po dang 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad mi snang bar byas par 'gyur/_thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/rked pa la btags na gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_pus 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]mo g.yas pa dang brla g.yas pa la btags na nags kyi phug gi gzhal med khang gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye zhing /_sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags 
[\[119a.2\]]na rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_cung zad tsam song bas dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur/_nyin mtshan gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rlung chen po'i shugs kyi stobs dang 
[\[119a.3\]]brtson 'grus kyis song ste/_slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur/_thams cad du dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rkang mthil la btags na sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur zhing /_sa'i 'og phug gi sgo 
[\[119a.4\]]thams cad bye bar 'gyur te/_rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshigs su bcad pa stong lobs par 'gyur ro/_/mid pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i rtse mor bzhag na lce pad+ma dang ku mu 
[\[119a.5\]]da ltar 'jam par 'gyur zhing thos pa mang po 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/lag pa la byugs na gang la reg pa de bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du 
[\[119a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/nor bu bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod grub kyi bum pa rab mchog ces 
[\[119a.7\]]bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan pa ji lta ba der de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po'i mthu sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab bsgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]lags so/_/rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas gser ram dngul lam zangs sam kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan pa kun nas shin tu zlum pa mgo 'am mgrin par phyin pa'i tshad 'jam zhing thag 
[\[119b.2\]]thug dang shang shong med pa/_dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa/_kun nas yongs su gang ba la mtshal gyi tshon gyis pad+ma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/_mgrin par pad+ma'i snying po dang ze ba bri/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/_
[\[119b.3\]]shar phyogs su zhal bri/_lho ru mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag_/nub tu dbyig 'byin gyi phyag_/byang du yid bzhin nor bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung du bzhugs par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang /_bram ze dang drang srong gi tshogs 
[\[119b.4\]]dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_rlung lha dang /_khyab bdag dang /_brgya byin dang /_rdo rje 'chang dang /_lha'i tshogs gzhan dag bri bar bya zhing me dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_lha mo sgrol ma dang /_khro gnyer can dang /_pho nya mo dkar mo dang /_tshogs kyi bdag 
[\[119b.5\]]po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_drag po dang /_khyab 'jug bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i khor yug tu pad+ma'i phreng ba bri'o/_/de nas bum pa tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/_rim pa'i cha bkra zhing mdzes par bya'o/_/
[\[119b.6\]]de nas thang shing las pad+ma'i gdan zlum po bum pa shong ba tsam gyi tshad du byed la de'i steng du bum pa bzhag la bum pa de yungs kar dkar pos bkang ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya/_ras dkar pos bcing bar bya/_steng du yungs kar dang gla rtsi dang ga bur dang gi wang dang 
[\[119b.7\]]ldong ros gzhag par bya/_bum pa'i kha ras dmar pos g.yogs par bya/_rin po che sna bdun gzhag par bya/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la dkyil 'khor khru bzhi gru bzhi pa 'phang du khru gang ba byas te/_ba lang gi lci ba dang sar bsres pas 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]legs par byugs te cha mnyam par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri thams cad kyis byugs la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dbus su tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa byas la/_gur gum dang me tog pad+mas mchod pa byas te/_pad+ma 'dab ma 
[\[120a.2\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bri la pad+ma'i ze ba'i steng du bum pa gzhag ste/_'phan gdugs sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/_dkyil 'khor gyi snying po khor yug tu spos dang me tog sna tshogs dang byug spos sna tshogs dang /_mchod yon gyi snod sna tshogs dang bum pa gang bar mdzes pa dang 
[\[120a.3\]]bdug spos kyi phye ma rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang me tog phreng ci 'byor pa kun tu gzhag par bya/_mar gyi mar me bzang po bcu drug bltam par bya/_phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya/_sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya/_'jig 
[\[120a.4\]]rten dbang phyug gi mtshan ma gsal bar bya/_mda' dang ba dan khor yug tu gzhag par bya/_tshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya/_ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang dkar gsum ci 'byor pa gzhag par bya/_'bras bu sna tshogs dang bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya/_me tog 
[\[120a.5\]]sna tshogs gzhag par bya/_me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/_me tog phreng bzang po kun tu gzhag par bya/_bdug spos kyi snod dang bum pa gang ba kun tu gzhag par bya/_pog phor bzhi gzhag par bya/_dri chab kyi phor pa bzhi gzhag par bya/_snod bzhi dang kham phor brgyad 
[\[120a.6\]]gzhag par bya/_ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dkar po rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya/_mar gyi mar me gang ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dbul bar bya/_'bras yos dang yungs kar dgram par bya'o/_/chang dang sha dang beg btsong dang ke'u dang 'bags pa dang kha zas ngan pa dang btung 
[\[120a.7\]]ba ngan pa spang bar bya/_bgo ma nyes spang bar bya ste/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la zla ba nya ba la bsgrub par bya'o/_/srung ba'i cho gas bdag bsrung ba dang thor tshugs bcing ba dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_yul bcing ba dang /_de bzhin du grogs bsrung ba dang gzhan 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]bsrung ba yang bya'o/_/gu gul gyi bdug pa dang mar dang yungs kar gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o/_/tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_tu ru ska dang /_kun du ru'i bdug pa 'di ni yang dag par bstan to/_/bum pa sgrub pa 'di ni mchog ste zhag lnga smyung ba byas nas gsang 
[\[120b.2\]]sngags bsgrub par bya ste/_dus mtshams gsum du bum pa dang sangs rgyas la mchod par bya'o/_/mi smra bar dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yas pa bum pa'i steng du bzhag nas khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la chu dang yungs 
[\[120b.3\]]kar gyis dbang bskur la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs stong phrag brgyad cu bzlas so/_/yid la byed pa rtse gcig pas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje lhur len cing sangs rgyas yid la bya ba sgom la bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga nya'i thun tha ma'i 
[\[120b.4\]]nang par dbyig gi bum pa cher g.yo bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po yang grag par 'gyur te/_bum pa chen po de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer kha dog sna lnga 'byung bar 'gyur/_rig sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/_dri ma med cing yongs su dag la dri ma dang 
[\[120b.5\]]bral bar 'gyur/_mdog yongs su dag cing me tog pad+ma dang ku mu da ltar dkar zhing 'jam par 'gyur/_bum pa de'i sku gzugs rnams rang rang gi lus las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa 
[\[120b.6\]]rgya chen po bya/_rig sngags 'chang bum pa bsgrub pa 'di ni grub bo/_/de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis dri'i chu dang yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dbang bskur bar byas na dbang bskur ma thag tu bum pa de las sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang 
[\[120b.7\]]chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis bum pa bzang po grub ste bum pa bzang po ji lta ba bzhin don yod pa'i snying po'i bum pa bzang po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po yang de bzhin gyis ji ltar 'dod par longs spyod cig_/yid la ji ltar bsams shing bcol ba thams cad grub par gyur cig_/
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]de nas mchod pa chen pos gzhal med khang chen po mchod de bum pa bzang po de gzung bar bya zhing mchod pa byas na yid la ji ltar 'thad pa dang 'dod pa thams cad grub par 'gyur te/_legs par bshad pa'am gtsug lag gam/_snyan dang gas dang gar gyi bstan 
[\[121a.2\]]bcos dang rtsis chos dang byA ka ra Na dang cho ga zhib mo smra ba dang gsang sngags smra ba dang /_nags sgrub ba dang phug sgrub pa dang bcud kyis len pa dang mig sman dang /_gter smra ba dang /_rig byed kyi sngags dang mdo sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la sogs pa chos dang 
[\[121a.3\]]'dul ba smra ba de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_spud pa dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbra ma dang /_mu tig dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_ma rgad dang /_ke ke ru dang /_shel dang /_mus ra dang /_
[\[121a.4\]]bai DUr+ya dang /_mthon ka dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_gos dang /_ma la cha dang /_gnas dang /_khang pa dang /_longs spyod dang /_rtsed mo rgya chen po dang rgyal po la 'os pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang chen po rnams sems kyis bsams pa tsam gyi 
[\[121a.5\]]mod la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mig 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang dang sangs rgyas kyi sprul ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa dang /_rdo rje 'chang gi sprul pa dang lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 
[\[121a.6\]]gzhal med khang dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po'i bdag po'i gzhal med khang de thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/char ha cang che ba dang char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char dang /_grang ba dang /_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba dang chu zlog 
[\[121a.7\]]par byed pa de thams cad ston par byed pa sde ston par byed pa g.yul 'gyed pa ston par byed pa'am/_gnas dang gzhal med khang dang /_dpal ston par byed pa de thams cad ston par byed/_de la sogs pa thams cad bsams pa tsam dang /_smon pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ro/_/nor bu dang /_'bru dang /_'bras bu dang /_me tog dang /_gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bsams pa de thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/gla rtsi de blangs la gi wang dang ga pur dang bsres te shing arka'i 'o mas sbrus te/_ril bu byas nas ba ser mo'i 'o 
[\[121b.2\]]ma la bdar te dpral bar thig le byas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_rig sngags 'chang bye ba stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur/_snying gar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro/_/lce'i 
[\[121b.3\]]rtse mo la reg na nyin re zhing tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags shing 'dzin par 'gyur/_mid na lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur/_'o ma dang lhan cig 'thungs na thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur/_shing arka'i lo ma dang lhan cig zos na rig sngags 'chang thams cad 
[\[121b.4\]]kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na gting du 'bying bar mi 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/_rgya mtsho'i 
[\[121b.5\]]pha rol tu yang phyin par 'gyur/_spyi bor thig le byas te g.yul ngor zhugs na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur/_zhun mar dang lhan cig zos na glang po chen po stong gi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_lag pa ya gcig gis glang po che bskyod pa dang 
[\[121b.6\]]nam mkha' la 'phen cing slar yang 'dzin to/_/ril bu 'dis lag pa la bskus na mi stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/ril bu 'di lha'i gnas su brkos te gzhag na lha thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_dus dus su char 'bebs shing sad dang rlung dang sprin dang /_ser ba gcod par 
[\[121b.7\]]byed do/_/rgyal po'i sgor brkos te bzhag na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang bka' la gtogs pa dang zhang blon dang bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang gi sgor brkos te bzhag na dge slong thams cad bde ba'i reg pa la gnas 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]pas gnas par 'gyur/_rtag tu byams pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du rgan pa'i mthar brkos te bzhag na dge slong thams cad zas dang skom 'dod dgu thob par 'gyur ro/_/lhung bzed kyi nang du bzhag ste grong khyer 
[\[122a.2\]]mang por bsod snyoms la song la kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs 'bad mi dgos par thob par 'gyur ro/_/sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su brkos te bzhag la mchod rten la mchod pa byas na/_ril bu ji srid du mchod rten gnas na gnas pa de srid du mchod 
[\[122a.3\]]rten chen po brgyad la nyin re zhing mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du brkos te bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas te/_don yod pa'i 
[\[122a.4\]]zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na ril bu ji srid gnas kyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/lam po cher brkos te bzhag na chom po dang g.yon can dang /_rkun ma dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 
[\[122a.5\]]dang gcan gzan khro bo rnams bcings par 'gyur zhing phyogs mtshams su 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/ri'i rtse mor brkos te bzhag na sman gyi dngos po thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur te/_ji srid du ri'i rtse mo snang ba de srid du skyes pa dang bud med dang /_khye'u dang bu mo dang ba lang dang /_phyugs 
[\[122a.6\]]dang /_ma he dang /_rta la sogs pa 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug gi 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_nad thams cad las yongs su grol 
[\[122a.7\]]bar 'gyur/_dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_mgul du btags te bcang bar byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston bzhed par 'gyur zhing rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/bang bar brkos 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]te bzhag na 'bru mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/chang yod pa'i sgor brkos te bzhag na chang thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/zhing gi nang du brkos te bzhag na lo tog mang po 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/brag phug tu brkos te bzhag na/_brag phug gi sgo bye bar 'gyur 
[\[122b.2\]]ro/_/phug gi sgor byugs na phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro/_/bu ga'i gnas su byugs na ro thams cad 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/nags kyi phugs su brkos te bzhag na nags kyi lha thams cad rang gi mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa gang byed pa de grub 
[\[122b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i mtsho'i nang du brkos te bzhag na pad+ma mang po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dus kun tu lha'i dri bsung 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim mthon po'i gnas su bzhag na ji srid snang ba de srid du skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams bsrung bar 'gyur zhing /_
[\[122b.4\]]phyogs bcu kun nas dpag tshad brgya mtshams bcad par 'gyur/_nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_sdig pa thams cad dang /_dgra thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_'go ba'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_pha rol gyi dpung thams cad rab tu zhi 
[\[122b.5\]]bar 'gyur/_'go ba'i nad thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_g.yul ngor yungs kar dang bsres te gtor na g.yul 'gyed pa chen po phan tshun mdza' ba chen por 'gyur/_nad chen pos lus skams shing tshe zad pa dang bgegs chen pos zin pa la dri chab kyi bum par 
[\[122b.6\]]ril bu 'di bsres te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrus byas nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa 
[\[122b.7\]]thams cad dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_tshe yongs su zad pa tshe slar nur bar 'gyur/_lha'i lus gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/_dri ma dang bral ba dang ser sna dang bral bar 'gyur/_las gzhan dang gzhan stong phrag brgya byed par 'gyur te rang 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]gi blos kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i las can du 'gyur/_phug gi gnas thams cad kyi rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyur/_tshe bskal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur/_shi nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba 
[\[123a.2\]]can du pad+ma'i snying po las rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_nor bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_margad dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_mu tig rnams kyis lus brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/skra bung ba ltar ga nag cing 'khyil la 'khyil pa dang /_
[\[123a.3\]]mig ut+pa la'i mchog sngon po lta bu dang /_bags pa'i mdog gser lta bur 'gyur ro/_/ngag 'jam pa dang snyan pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi phyag gis spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/phyag na pad+ma'i phyag mchog sbyin pas dbugs 
[\[123a.4\]]'byin cing khyad par mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa rnam par gzigs pa don yod pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'phags pa 'od dpag med lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yungs kar de de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag brgya phrag bye ba snyed kyi spyan du gyur pa dang gang 
[\[123a.5\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ring bsrel du 'gyur zhing /_khams sna tshogs kyi kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mdog gi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur/_nor bu rin po che bdun dang 'dra zhing 'di lta ste/_sku gdung re re yang nyi ma bzhin du so sor gsal bar 
[\[123a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad de lus re re ston par 'gyur ro/_/ring bsrel 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_gzhan du yid la ma 
[\[123a.7\]]byas na de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de la smad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang nyal kar rang gi blos byams pa'i sems kyis ring bsrel mngon du byas te smon lam gdab par bya'o/_/ci 'dod pa bsams te mchod pa byas na bsams pa tsam gyi mod la skad cig tu thams 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ring bsrel gyi snying po 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bum pa bzang po 'di yang blta bar bya ste/_de gnyis ka yang rdzu 'phrul mdzad par snang ba mthun pa yin te/_'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/bum pa sgrub pa don yod pa'i cho ga'o//_//
[\[123b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog can brgyad ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu'i spyi bor bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/_mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo grub pa bla na med pa don yod pa chen po'i bum pa sgrub pa rig
