[\[143b.4\]]kyis byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa lags te/_de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[143b.5\]]kyi gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten sel ba sngon gyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa mi zad pa 'joms pa ngan song thams cad sel ba/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa nges par sreg par byed pa/_yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/_/mtshams med pa lnga 
[\[143b.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spong ba dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang /_'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad spong bar byed pa de 
[\[143b.7\]]dag gis mnyan pa dang /_mthong ba tsam dang /_sdom pa tsam dang /_lan cig 'bad pa dang /_'chad pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nga mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad zad par 'gyur/_byang bar 'gyur ro/_/rims thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_dri 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]ma dang /_ser sna dang phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_nad dang mya ngan 
[\[144a.2\]]dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_phung bar byed pa dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_gsod pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_shags 
[\[144a.3\]]'gyed pa dang /_btson du 'dzin pa dang /_lcags su 'jug pa dang /_rkun ma dang /_zol ba dang /_mi rgod dang /_seng ge dang /_glang po che dang /_ma he dang /_nad ngan pa dang /_dmu chu dang /_sha bkra dang /_mdze dang /_'brum bu dang /_g.yon can dang /_shu ba dang /_shu bran 
[\[144a.4\]]dang /_g.yan pa dang /_klad pan pa dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_sbrul ma rungs pa dang /_kha gdug pa dang /_sbrul nag po dang /_srog chags go na dang /_dug 
[\[144a.5\]]dang bcas pa'i srog chags 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_g.yang sa dang /_khyim rdib pa dang /_grang ba dang /_rlung dang /_nyi tshan dang /_byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad ni/_bklags pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[144a.6\]]byas pa dang /_mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur/_phung bar 'gyur/_mod la phye mar brlag par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba 'di la dogs par mi bya/_yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya/_the tshom mi bya/_sems can gnyis su 'gyur ba bskyed par mi 
[\[144a.7\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag tu mngon du dran par bgyi ba dang /_rtag tu yid la byed pa'i blo 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po yang dang bzlas par bgyi'o/_/rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba/_don yod pa rnam par 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]'phrul pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs/_dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying 
[\[144b.2\]]po ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du yid la kha ton du brjod par bya'o/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su dran par bsgom par bya'o/_/de dag dran pa bsgoms pa tsam dang /_dran pa tsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 
[\[144b.3\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa dang /_lung ston pa dang /_byin gyis rlob par 'gyur na/_lta ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_'phags 
[\[144b.4\]]pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug mthong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_dran pa dang /_dus gsum du shin tu gsal bar yid la byed pa dang /_mchod cing phyag byed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_sems can de ni nga dang 'dra ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/'jig 
[\[144b.5\]]rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang zhig lan mang du shin tu lhag par byed pa 
[\[144b.6\]]lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin par rig par bya'o/_/bdag kyang dus thams cad du rtag tu rjes su dran par bgyi'o/_/dus thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par bgyi'o/_/bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[144b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe bdag gis sems can thams cad myur ba myur bar byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gzhag par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni go cha chen po brtan par khas blangs pa la 'tshol ba lags pas sems can thams 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]cad bsgral ba'i phyir re ba'i mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[145a.2\]]sems can dag pa'i mchog legs so legs so/_/'di ni mchog tu dkon pa ste/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga de'i ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis sems can yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/_lta ba dang /_klog pa dang /_sgrub pa dang /_smyung ba'i cho ga byed pa dang /_sdom pa la gnas 
[\[145a.3\]]pa lha smos kyang ci dgos/_sems can de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dag pa dus la bab pa gang yin par shes na smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[145a.4\]]phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing bzhin 'dzum ste/_don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po smras so/_/dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams 
[\[145a.5\]]cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_drang srong gi tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal 
[\[145a.6\]]lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta/_a ba lo ki te pa sha hr-i da ye/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_tsa ra tsa ra/_
[\[145a.7\]]ma hA pad+ma pad+ma b+hu dze/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA bA sha d+ha re/_ba ra ba ra ba ra da/_rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra/_pra ti maN+Di ta/_sha rI re/_ta ra ta ra/_bi bu la te dza d+ha re/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/_ka la ka la/_ma ha brah+ma/_be Sha d+ha re/_ma la ma la/_sarba bA ba A ba ra Na ma la 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]kilbi Sha/_nA sha ni/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_bo d+hi sa twa/_pi shud d+he b+hu ru b+hu ru/_ma hA sa twa/_bad sa le/_ya ma ba ru Ni ku be ra nam skr-i te/_hu ru hu ru brah+ma/_biTh+Nu/_ma he shwa ra/_ku mA ra/_nan di ke shwa ra/_I shwar/_ma he shwa ra de ba pra tra/_bad+di ta/_bad+di ta/_na ma skr-i te/_bi bi d+ha ma Ni 
[\[145b.2\]]mau li d+ha re/_a mi tA b+hA dzi na/_ma ku Ta/_d+ha re/_di bya/_ma Ni ka na ka_/badzra bai DUr+ya/_ma ra ka ta/_pad+ma rA ga_/in+d+ra nI la di bya mu ka ti ka_/a laM kr-i ta/_sha rI ra/_shwe ta yad dz+nyo pa bI ta d+ha ra/_dza Ta ma ku Ta/_maN+DI ta nA ma/_tsan+d+ra rA dzi ta/_pad+ma d+ha ra/_pad+ma A sa na/_
[\[145b.3\]]pad+ma b+hu dza/_tri lo tsa na/_tri shU la d+ha ra/_bA sha d+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_a b+hi She ka ta/_sa ra sa ra/_sarba pA pa pra sha ma na ka ra/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/tu ru tu ru/_sarba ba ra dA ya ka_/bo d+hi bo d+hi/_sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/_bo d+hi maN+Da/_a ba lo ki te/_lo ke shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_ma hA 
[\[145b.4\]]tsin tA ma Ni/_d+hA ra bi shwa rU pa/_ma hA sau mya ba da na/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/bud d+ha bud d+ha/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_b+ha ga bAn/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_a ba lo ki ta gar+b+he/_ma hA puN+ya/_te dza d+ha ra pra bar sid d+hi ka ra sarba byA d+hi ha ra/_sarba satwA ya bar sarba duHkha/_pra mo tsa ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka na 
[\[145b.5\]]mo stu te swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'di ni rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi snying po'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[145b.6\]]snying po'o/_/gzugs sna tshogs chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/_phyag stong mnga' ba/_dbu stong mnga' ba/_spyan stong gis rnam par gzigs pa/_phyag brgya stong gis byin gyis brlabs pa/_gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i bye ma'i rdul shin 
[\[145b.7\]]tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du rjes su zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba la 'jug pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'jug pa/_byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/_chos kyi sgron me 'bar 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]ba/_bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms pa/_chos kyi dung 'bud pa/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/_dmyal ba thams cad sel ba/_cho ga zhib mo thams cad grub par mdzad pa/_cho ga sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog sa bcu chen po la 
[\[146a.2\]]so sor 'jog pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la rjes su 'jug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_don yod pa'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa thob par mdzad pa/_don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i 
[\[146a.3\]]rnam par sprul pa/_don yod par sems rgya mtsho snyed yang dag par 'dzin pa/_don yod par sems can sa bon la so sor 'jog pa/_don yod par byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa/_don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs 
[\[146a.4\]]su sgrogs pa/_don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur gyi sprin rab tu byed pa/_don yod par sems can thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i khyim du 'dzud pa/_don yod par sbyin pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_don yod 
[\[146a.5\]]par lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_chos gos sna tshogs dang /_rin po che bdun gyi char 'bebs pa/_don yod pa'i 
[\[146a.6\]]tshe yongs su brjes te sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu brgyan pa sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par lta ba/_don yod par bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rab tu rdzogs pa/_don yod par dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed pa/_don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[146a.7\]]thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang /_grub pa dang /_cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa/_don yod par dbang phyug sgrub pa/_don yod par rig sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo yang dag par ston pa/_
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]don yod par grub pa mthong ba/_don yod par cho ga mthong ba/_don yod par tshe rab tu 'phel ba/_don yod par snyan par grags pa rab tu ston pa/_don yod par 'khor ba las rab tu sgrol ba/_don yod par skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba las yongs su sgrol ba/_don yod 
[\[146b.2\]]par mchog rab tu sbyin pa/_don yod par bzlas brjod dang cho ga rab tu rdzogs pa/_don yod par dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rdzogs pa/_don yod par rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba thob pa yang dag par ston pa/_don yod par lha'i gnas dang /_gzhal med khang sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[146b.3\]]kyi lha'i gnas su 'jug ba/_don yod par 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa/_don yod par sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su brgya byin lha'i rgyal por 'jug pa/_don yod par ri rab chen po lag pa gcig gis sgul ba/_don yod par 
[\[146b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ston pa/_don yod par mi snang ba ston pa/_don yod par stobs 'phel ba/_don yod par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba so sor 'thob pa ston pa/_don yod par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/_don yod par 'bru'i 
[\[146b.5\]]char 'bebs pa/_don yod par gos kyi char 'bebs pa/_don yod par rgyan dang /_chos gos dang /_mu tig gi chun 'phyang dang /_gdub kor dang /_gser gyi tsong tsong dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa yang dag par ston pa/_don yod par ro 
[\[146b.6\]]rnam pa sna tshogs ro'i mchog ro brgya'i kha zas kyi char 'bebs pa/_don yod par sems can sna tshogs grol ba ston pa/_don yod par bstan bcos dang /_tshig le'ur byas pa dang /_tshul dang 'dul ba dang /_mdo sde dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_
[\[146b.7\]]ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_de lta bu byung ba dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag sna tshogs dang /_chos mngon pa dang /_tshogs kyi gtam yang dag par ston pa dang /_don yod par theg pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang rab tu ston pa/_don yod par gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_grul bum dang /_brjed byed dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren sna tshogs nyes pa dang /_gsod pa dang shin tu sel ba 
[\[147a.2\]]yang dag par ston pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na yon tan chen po can gyi gzungs ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/_thams cad du mi 'jigs pa'i gnas rab tu ston pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam legs pa'i lam rab tu ston pa/_mya ngan las 
[\[147a.3\]]'das pa'i lam rab tu ston pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas dang /_sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par mdzad pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yon tan khyad par yongs 
[\[147a.4\]]su bsgrags pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba la rab tu gnas pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[147a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs 'di'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa bshad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba/_gsang ba'i snying po yongs su 
[\[147a.6\]]bsgrags pa legs so legs so/_/de dag ni sems can thams cad la lam mchog shin tu mchog tu gyur pa/_gya nom pa/_bla ma/_bla na med pa/_mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs kyi snying po gsang ba yongs su bsgrags pa ste/_gang gi 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu bo chen po dang /_
[\[147a.7\]]srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sems can pha rol tu sgrol ba yin no/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen pha'am/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs dang /_
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs gang la la zhig gam/_sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas don yod par rnam par lta ba'i snying po 'di dang /_rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin 
[\[147b.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_dam tshig chen po dkyil 'khor gyi ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par yongs 
[\[147b.3\]]su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du mthong ba dang /_mngon du chos thos pa dang /_mngon du dbyangs 
[\[147b.4\]]thos pa dang /_mngon du lung bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can chen po de dag gis ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu che ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_cho ga dang /_ming 
[\[147b.5\]]sna tshogs da ltar thos pa dang /_yang na klog pa dang /_yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang de dang mnyam pa yin na/_dka' ba byed pa lta 
[\[147b.6\]]smos kyang ci dgos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du thos pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de stobs dang brtson 'grus pha rol gnon par byed pa dang /_tshol ba dang /_'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_bzlas brjod kyi cho ga byed pa 
[\[147b.7\]]dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sgrub par byed pa dang /_'bad par byed pa de ni dka' ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te/_de dang mnyam pa yin no/_/dka' ba gang zhe na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]dka' ba la zhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no/_/rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen pha'am dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal 
[\[148a.2\]]rigs sam/_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs gang yin pa'am/_sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang /_cho ga stobs chen po dang /_pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga 
[\[148a.3\]]'tshol ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_bzlas brjod dang /_cho ga dang /_dkyil 'khor lta ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya bcings te sgrub pa dang /_'di lta ste/_thos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[148a.4\]]kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sems pa dang /_dus gsum du lan gsum don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran pa dang /_khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba dang /_gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod dang /_cho ga dran 
[\[148a.5\]]pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_byams pas snying brlan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba lhur byed pa de ni dka' ba spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no/_/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs pa dang 'dra ba'am/_lhag pa yin no/_/
[\[148a.6\]]de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas nyid du so sor gnas pa yin no//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_bsod 
[\[148a.7\]]nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu zhal 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na yon tan chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang /_dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang /_cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang /_rna ba'i bu gar 'di'i sgra lan bdun nges par lhung na/_de 'chi 'pho ba 
[\[148b.2\]]tsam dang bsams pa tsam gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/_'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde 
[\[148b.3\]]dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya rnams kha ton du kun du gnas shing tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/dbang po drug yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga yang so sor thob bo/_/tsam la rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i gzugs dang /_
[\[148b.4\]]kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs yongs su dag pa de'i phyir stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad sna tshogs 'dzin pa dang /_mnyan par bgyi/_bklag par bgyi/_kha ton du bgyi/_ser sna'i dri ma dang bral ba dang /_phrag dog dang bral bar bgyi/_sems 
[\[148b.5\]]can thams cad byams pa dang /_snying rje la sogs pa mchog dang yang dag par ldan pas bgyi'o/_/gzungs dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di mnyan par bgyi/_blta bar bgyi/_'jug par bgyi'o/_/phyi ma'i dus dang /_phyi ma'i tshe ma yin par phul du byung ba'i don la brtson 
[\[148b.6\]]par bgyi'o zhes pa'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga 'di ni bla na med pa zhes bgyi'o/_/mang du smos ci 'tshal te/_de la 'gran sems kyis kyang mnyan par bgyi'o zhes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[148b.7\]]dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis po Ta la'i ri bo 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to/_/me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /_'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gang yin pa rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi khang pa 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]brtsegs par rab tu gyur to/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams 'bum phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam par rab tu gyur to/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bu rnam par bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams pham par byas 
[\[149a.2\]]pa'i rgyan rnam par bkra bas rnam par bkra zhing /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang /_gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba'i bla res dpyangs pa rnams dang /_lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri yongs su bshams pa rnams kyang re re zhing khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na/_seng ge'i khri bshams 
[\[149a.3\]]pa brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur rab tu byung bar gyur te/_seng ge'i khri thams cad la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par byon te bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[149a.4\]]chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing /_legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam chen 
[\[149a.5\]]por rab tu bstan pas/_sems can thams cad pha rol tu 'gro bar byed pa dang /_gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa so sor khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam tshol ba la rjes su 'gro'o/_/'on kyang bzlas pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[149a.6\]]dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /_'jug pa ches mang po'i dbang du byas pa'i sems can rnams dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba de/_skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus su rig par bya'o/_/de nas po Ta la'i gnas kyi ri bo dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_
[\[149a.7\]]sman dang /_nags de rnams thams cad la mi gang tsam du mtho ba nyid dang /_shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad tsam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi pad+ma rnams rab tu byung ste/_'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa dang /_sdong bu bai DUr+ya dang /_'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi kha 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]dog ltar dmar ba'i mu tig gi ze'u 'bru dang /_lha rdzas kyi mu tig gi ge sar gyis khor yug tu bskor ba gang yin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyang chos la gus pas thams cad pus mo btsugs te/_
[\[149b.2\]]gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya mthong ba'i don du mu tig gi do shal brgya stong rib byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon par bkab par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rang 
[\[149b.3\]]bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di yang ches cher g.yos par gyur to/_/lha'i me tog gi char chen po mang po rab tu phab ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i don dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang /_gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dam 
[\[149b.4\]]pa la mchod pa'i don du char rab tu phab bo/_/de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bzhin 'dzum zhing rdo rje bskor bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[149b.5\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/_'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa blta bar bgyi/_chos 
[\[149b.6\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta bar bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu dkon par blta bar bgyi ste/_'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang /_
[\[149b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang phan yon so sor thob bo/_/kun tu snang bar byed par 'gyur ba 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ma gtogs 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]par sems can thams cad kyi nang na gzhan su yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no/_/lag na rdo rje 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad mdang phar gyur pa 'di gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di 
[\[150a.2\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di sems can thams cad kyi re ba skong ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_skyabs dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpung gnyen byed pa nas/_ji srid bud med dang /_skyes 
[\[150a.3\]]pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bar la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pas 
[\[150a.4\]]sngon sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du zhugs pa yin no/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje/_nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[150a.5\]]dbang phyug gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_nor bu rin po che chen po de yang mngon par dgab par phul lo/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs 
[\[150a.6\]]pas gcal du bkram pa/_mchod pa'i don du rab tu bkod nas rang gi stan la 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa don yod pa dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer 
[\[150a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]byung ngo /_/'od zer sna tshogs pa'i snang ba des kyang nam mkha'i mthil du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan to/_/'od zer gyi snang ba re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 
[\[150b.2\]]dgu bcu rtsa dgu rab tu bstan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sems can chen po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i gzungs 
[\[150b.3\]]kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya 'di bshad pa 'di legs so legs so/_/'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa'i lam/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i lam/_chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'bar bar 
[\[150b.4\]]byed pa/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/_chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/_bdud bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gnon par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rab tu rdzogs 
[\[150b.5\]]par byed pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis gnon par byed pa de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' pha rol gnon par byed pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom par byed pa'o/_/'di ni lam 
[\[150b.6\]]rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi lam du 'chags par byed pa/_bsam pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa/_ngan song du 'gro bar rgyu ba rnams kyi bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar byed pa/_'di ni byang chub chen po'i sa bon dang /_'bras bu rab tu ston par 
[\[150b.7\]]byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems can dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam par thar 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga shod cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[151a.2\]]kyi spyan snga nas bskul ba thob nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang /_sgrub thabs gsungs so/_/gnas bzang sa gzhi dge ba dang /_/sa gzhi gtsang zhing ne'u gsing la/_/ljon shing 
[\[151a.3\]]me tog 'bras bus khyab/_/me tog 'khri shing 'gram dang ni/_/sa gzhi mnyen la dag pa dang /_/gang du chu bo 'bab pa dang /_/gzi brjid ldan zhing yid dga' ba/_/sa gzhi sems ni dga' bar 'os/_/yid kyi shing rta rgyas byed cing /_/go skabs legs par 
[\[151a.4\]]gnas pa dang /_/shin tu dag cing thun tshags bral/_/rus pa gseg ma gyo mo dang /_/phub ma sol ba yongs su spangs/_/gtsang zhing gtsang la legs dag pa'i/_/sa gzhi yongs su zlum pa der/_/mkhas pas rgyar ni gzings tshad du/_/gzhal nas shin tu rnam 'byes 
[\[151a.5\]]shing /_/gtsang zhing mnyen la 'jam par phye/_/gnas der dkyil 'khor legs par bsgrubs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/_/'jig rten las 'das khyad 'phags par/_/de bzhin gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs/_/sa yi cha las dpangs su ni/_/mi gang 
[\[151a.6\]]tshad du brko bar bya/_/gzungs dang dkyil 'khor dmar po'am/_/yang na gur gum kha dog dang /_/sa rdul dkar po snum pa ni/_/mar sar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin/_/sa yi khyad par dbye ba de/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags/_/byang chub snying po sa der 
[\[151a.7\]]mtshungs/_/ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang /_/de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin/_/brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis/_/slar yang sa de dgang bar bya/_/ji srid dong bu mnyam par gang /_/de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o/_/nyung dang lhag pa bsngags pa 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]min/_/'dir ni 'grub pa med par bstan/_/khru ni sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag gdab/_/yang na khru ni bcu drug dang /_/yang na khru ni bco lngar bya/_/mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par dbye/_/ba yi lci ba dag dang ni/_/sa dang bsres 
[\[151b.2\]]te bsku bya ba/_/shin tu zhen par bsdig pa dang /_/'jam zhing mnyen par bya ba yin/_/de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/_/sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu dbye/_/sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang /_/rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni/_/
[\[151b.3\]]rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad/_/khru gsum yang na khru bzhi ni/_/thig skud tshon gyis rnam par dbye/_/nang gi thig ni tshad dag tu/_/mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni/_/nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya/_/bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu/_/pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dag_/kun tu bri bar 
[\[151b.4\]]bya ba yin/_/phyi yi thig gi tshad dag tu/_/rdo rje rnam pa'i stegs bu dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs gzhal med khang /_/stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya/_/pad+ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang /_/gzhal yas khang pa gnas par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad+ma la/_/
[\[151b.5\]]rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bya/_/g.yon du 'ong ni dpag med pa/_/g.yas phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs/_/shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni/_/don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi/_/dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du/_/btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni/_/phyag bzhi par ni 
[\[151b.6\]]bya ba yin/_/phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya/_/'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni/_/khro bo'i rgyal bo phyag bzhi ba/_/btud de thal mo sbyor ba dang /_/lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs pa/_/lag pa 
[\[151b.7\]]gnyis na thogs pa dang /_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs brgyan pa/_/sna tshogs dar gyis mdzes par bya/_/don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che/_/pad+ma gdan dang rnam rgyan pa/_/'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya/_/grwa bzhir dag ni 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]byas na ni/_/gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste/_/dbus kyi gnas su 'jigs med pa/_/shar gyi gnas su gnas pa ni/_/lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyan/_/g.yas kyi gnas su gnas pa ni/_/gos dkar mo ni rnam par brgyan/_/nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni/_/
[\[152a.2\]]lha mo dkar mo rnam par brgyan/_/byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni/_/lha mo pad+ma mdzes dga' brgyan/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su/_/rgyal chen bzhi ni gzhag par bya/_/bar gyi gnas su gzhag pa ni/_/ral pa gcig pa gtum mo shar/_/nub tu pho nya bzhin sgyur 
[\[152a.3\]]ma/_/g.yas phyogs su ni bzhin sgyur ma/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog bya ba yin/_/byang du srin mo khro gnyer gdong /_/kun kyang me dbus 'jigs pa med/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa bzhin/_/phyi rol thig le pad+mo'i phreng /_/rdo rje rtse gsum gzhag pa ni/_/kun tu 'bar 
[\[152a.4\]]ba phreng bar bcas/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/_/bri bya rtag dang phyag rgya dang /_/lha ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang /_/chu lha dbang po lus ngan po/_/dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi/_/lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar/_/
[\[152a.5\]]lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang /_/rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/kun kyang pad+mo'i gdan la gnas/_/de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_/rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang /_/zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang /_/legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no/_/mdung 
[\[152a.6\]]rtse gsum dang paT+Ti sa/_/ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang /_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i phreng /_/'khor lo dung dang ga dA dang /_/ral gri dang ni to ma raM/_/bum pa gang ba dag dang ni/_/mi snang ba yi 'bag sha dang /_/pad+ma dang ni ut+pa la/_/rgyal mtshan gdugs dang nor bu 
[\[152a.7\]]dang /_/dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang /_/gra bzhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin/_/nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni/_/dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni/_/phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil/_/bya ma bum dang kun di dang /_/ril ba b+h+r-ing ga ri dang ni/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na'i pags pa dang /_/mchod phyir 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]thogs pa'i snam bu dang /_/steng du rgyu skar bcas pa yi/_/zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no/_/kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug_/so sor cha ni dbye bar bya/_/mkhas pas shar gyi sgor bri ba/_/'gying bag mthong na 'jigs su rung /_/lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med/_/rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar 
[\[152b.2\]]ba'i nang /_/ki li ki la gtum po che/_/lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru gzhag_/nub tu rdo rje ping ga la/_/mthong na 'jigs su rung ba yi/_/byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/_/pad+ma'i phreng dang ut+pal phreng /_/grwa dag dang ni grwa rnams su/_/klu yi 
[\[152b.3\]]rgyal po bzhi rnams bri/_/sgo srung ba dag bri ba ni/_/nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang /_/stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin/_/sgo yi gnas kyi bar dag tu/_/chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba/_/gang gA dang ni si ta dang /_/pak+Shu dang ni sin+du yin/_/phreng ba'i nang rol thog dag tu/_/
[\[152b.4\]]dpal gyi lha mo ba san tI/_/dpe med ma dang sa yi lha/_/lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang /_/sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma/_/de bzhin mi yi lha dag dang /_/'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma/_/gtum mo dang ni me tog so/_/de dag bri bar bya ba yin/_/khrus byas 'dri mkhan gtsang 
[\[152b.5\]]ma yis/_/gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni/_/lhag ma min pas kun tu bri/_/zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya/_/khyad par 'dod pas zas ngan pa/_/spang bar bya ba nya dang sha/_/btsong dang sgog skya ke'u rnams dang /_/'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni/_/log 'dren glags tshol 
[\[152b.6\]]spang phyir ro/_/khrus byas gos ni sar pa bgos/_/gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/kun tu brgyan bar bya ba ni/_/ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs mda' dang ni/_/lha rdzas dar ni dpyang ba dang /_/ba dan yang 
[\[152b.7\]]ni dpyang bar bya/_/tshon skud sna lnga'i srad bu yis/_/kun tu yongs su bskor bar bya/_/zangs las byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad/_/sor bzhi 'dab ma bye ba de/_/mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya/_/snying po dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/_/pad+ma brgyad ni gzhal ba dag_/gser 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]las byas pa bzhi gzhag cing /_/de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi/_/kun tu byi ru'i phreng ba dang /_/mu tig phreng ba de bzhin no/_/kun tu gser gyi srang bu dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs gzhag par bya/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du/_/gser gyi snod ni 
[\[153a.2\]]bzhi dag dang /_/dngul gyi snod ni bzhi gzhag go/_/dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la dngul dang /_gser dang /_zangs las byas pa'i me tog spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa gzhag par bya'o/_/gser gyi bum pa bzhi gzhag pa la mu tig dang /_byi ru dang /_pad+ma 
[\[153a.3\]]rA ga dang /_ma rgad dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_dngul dang /_gser dang /_me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs gzhag par bya'o/_/gla rtsi dang /_ga pur dang /_gur gum dang /_lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang /_dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser 
[\[153a.4\]]gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog dang /_zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs spras pa gzhag par bya/_cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/_tshon sna tshogs can dang /_dar dmar po 
[\[153a.5\]]dpyang bar bya/_dngul gyi pog por bzhi gzhag ste/_tsan+dan dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur dang /_gur gum gyi bdug pas bdug par bya/_sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 
[\[153a.6\]]bgyis la bkang ba la dar gyis bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhag nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[153a.7\]]me tog dang /_'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_mchod yon gyi chab kyis dngul gyi snod dang /_zangs kyi snod bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/me tog dang /_mgo lcogs dang /_
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]por phog bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/gzhag par bya ste bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o/_/sgo bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan cing spud pa gzhag par bya'o/_/sna ma'i me tog gi gdu bu'i steng du mda' la ba dan btags pa drug cu rtsa bzhi bcugs 
[\[153b.2\]]te/_tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda' dang /_nor bu'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/_/de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu sa dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la dri chab kyis bskus te/_tshon sna lnga'i srad bus 
[\[153b.3\]]thig btab la sgo bzhi rnam par phye ste/_seng ldeng gi phur bu tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab bo/_/tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kun du bskor bar bya'o/_/bum bu dang /_bum pa dang /_byam bum drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang pa gzhag go/_/
[\[153b.4\]]khom phor zlum po drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang pa gzhag go/_/gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa bzhi so sor gzhag go/_/snod tshon sna lnga pa drug cu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang pa dang /_bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang /_gtor ma 
[\[153b.5\]]dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag go/_/yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba/_ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag go/_/'bras bu sna tshogs dang /_me tog sna tshogs dgram mo/_/phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du dpyang bar bya ste/_byang phyogs kyi dkyil 
[\[153b.6\]]'khor la drug cu rtsa bzhi snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum cu rtsa gnyis gdags so/_/me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud bar bya'o/_/gtor ma brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang dkyil 'khor thog thag tu mar me bud par bya'o/_/chang dang sha dang /_beg btsong dang /_sgog skya dang /_ke'u dang /_tshod sngon dang /_la 
[\[153b.7\]]phug spangs pa'i gtor ma gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol grwa bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o/_/sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o/_/chos klog pa legs par khrus 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]byas te/_lha rdzas kyi gos kyis dkris te/_gtsang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i gos gtsang ma sar pa bgos te/_chos kyi stan shin tu brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas tshig 'jam po tshig mnyen pos bklag par bya'o/_/nub kyi phyogs cha 
[\[154a.2\]]la dkyil 'khor mthon po la bde ba can gyi bkod pa bris pa 'od dpag med dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs bri ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/_/shar gyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor 
[\[154a.3\]]grwa bzhi mthon po byas la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shAkya thub pa dang /_'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/_/lho'i phyogs cha la ri 'dra ba'i gnas 
[\[154a.4\]]mthon po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/_/byang gi phyogs cha la khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[154a.5\]]po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_byams pa dang /_sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/_/stegs bu'i rnam par mthon por byas pa thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o/_/dar gyi phreng bas 
[\[154a.6\]]brgyan par bya'o/_/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /_bum pa gang ba gzhag pa dang /_dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang /_ro'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi ro 'bul ba dang /_'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyoms 
[\[154a.7\]]gzhag pa dang /_tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_du ruska dang /_ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur gum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing /_gos lan gsum brjes te/_dus 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]gsum du bzlas brjod dang cho ga bya'o/_/tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[154b.2\]]dang /_don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[154b.3\]]dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/zla ba nya la thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/_/tshes bco lnga'i nyin mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dpag tu med par bzlas brjod bya'o/_/mtshan thog thag bzlas 
[\[154b.4\]]brjod byas kyang ngal ba med pa dang /_lus snyom pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems su bya'o bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtshams bcad pa dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_bdag srung ba dang /_
[\[154b.5\]]gzhan srung ba dang dkyil 'khor bsdam pa byas nas/_de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa brtsam mo/_/mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang /_de nas bzlas brjod brtsam 
[\[154b.6\]]par bya ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la/_khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/_/bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs 
[\[154b.7\]]dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shin tu 'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba nyi 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer can don yod pa'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon du gshegs te/_phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang ba legs so zhes bya ba'i 
[\[155a.2\]]sgra phyung ste/_phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i spyi bo la bzhag ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin tu brgyan cing spras pa 'di ni shin tu bzang ba yin te/_legs so legs so/_/'di rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam 
[\[155a.3\]]par 'phrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[155a.4\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor bgegs dang /_rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/_bud med dang /_skyes 
[\[155a.5\]]pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u'i rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya'ang rung ste/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol ba yin no/_/'di ni sdig pa dang /_sgrib 
[\[155a.6\]]pa thams cad dang /_dmyal ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_nad dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba las yongs su thar bar byed cing 'jigs pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin no/_/'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po snying po dang /_gsang sngags 
[\[155a.7\]]su bcas pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngags 'chang ba de dang des ming brjod pa dang /_gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang /_lta ba dang /_nyan pa dang /_ming 'dzin pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu rgal 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa nyid du sa bcu bgrod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de gang zhe na/_gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jig 
[\[155b.2\]]rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_dran pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_lan 'ga' smyur bas mthong ba dang /_thang cig dang /_skad cig dang /_yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni nga dang mnyam pa dang /_mi mnyam pa yin no zhes smra'o/_/
[\[155b.3\]]bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin te/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pas spyi bos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang bas zung shig dang /_mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang /_ji ltar yid la re ba dang /_bsam 
[\[155b.4\]]pa thams cad rjes su gzung zhing sbyin par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang bas yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog smras na/_de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan 
[\[155b.5\]]yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/_de dag thams cad sa bcu la 
[\[155b.6\]]rab tu gnas pa yin/_'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/_lung bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin/_de ni mngal na gnas par skye ba'i tha ma ste/_phyis mang lan 
[\[155b.7\]]gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de pad+mo'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par rdzus te skyes par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phun sum 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]tshogs pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/_dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[156a.2\]]na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar legs so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs par skye ba yin pas legs so legs so/_/phyir mi ldog par bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[156a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas spyi bor 
[\[156a.4\]]phyag 'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'bel ba'i gtam mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad do/_/tha na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i sgra rnga bo che dang /_rnga bran dang /_dung dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rol mo'i sgra gang dag grag 
[\[156a.5\]]pa la sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos nas rna ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs par bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad 
[\[156a.6\]]kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu po'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen 
[\[156a.7\]]nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u'i rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_'ga' zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]sems can gang gis sgra de thos nas sgra dbyangs de dang ming thos pa rna ba'i bu gar song bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa mi zad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[156b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo yin no/_/rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dbugs 'byin pa mdzad 
[\[156b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjes su srung bar mdzad do/_/sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste/_sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[156b.4\]]bsregs shing sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de dang /_tha na sems can ngan pa yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig 
[\[156b.5\]]pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha 
[\[156b.6\]]thams cad kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na sgra thos pa tsam dang /_ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rnam par grol 
[\[156b.7\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang /_nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang /_'khor ba las sgrol ba 'grub pa phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]med par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i lam ston pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/_lha'i stegs 
[\[157a.2\]]sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyi mod la the tshom med par me lha dang /_dbang po dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_dbang phyug dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyi mod la thams cad 'ong bar 
[\[157a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/the tshom med par lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /_de'i mod la rig sngags 'chang 
[\[157a.4\]]ba'i rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do/_/de bzhin du nyin mtshan du kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu yang phyogs bcur srung bar byed de/_mi srun pa ma rungs pa sel cing 
[\[157a.5\]]dmyal ba dang /_'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang /_dug drag po dang /_sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do/_/de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang /_bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na med pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan srang nyi shu dang /_a ga ru srang lnga dang /_
[\[157a.6\]]du ru ska srang bdun dang /_ga bur dang /_gla rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang /_gur gum srang gcig dang /_lce bog kun du ra srang lnga dang /_gu gul srang bdun dang 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te/_phye mar byas la khar dkar po dang /_sbrang rtsis ril bu zho re'i tshad tsam 
[\[157a.7\]]du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang /_yungs kar dang /_'bras yos bsres te/_ril bu dang bsres nas mar gyi nang du smyugs te sbyin sreg bya'o/_/shing srur b+hi dang /_shing arka dang /_shing sha mya'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o/_/gang dang gang gi tshe stong rtsa 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro/_/de dang de'i tshe de nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de dang de'i tshe gcod thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems 
[\[157b.2\]]can bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang /_byur thams cad dang /_
[\[157b.3\]]gnod pa thams cad dang /_'khrug pa thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_shags 'gyed pa thams cad dang /_rang gi 'khor dang /_gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[157b.4\]]dang /_sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang /_rkun po dang /_zol ba dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_
[\[157b.5\]]khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur 
[\[157b.6\]]ro/_/tshe brjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /_pad+mo'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog 
[\[157b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar nge'i lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/stong rtsa 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]brgyad tshang na rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/_rig sngags 'chang ba 
[\[158a.2\]]legs so legs so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog_/rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin no/_/'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/_/'di ni gnod 
[\[158a.3\]]sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_brjed byed dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/_/'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/_/'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na 
[\[158a.4\]]med pa yin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/_rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan thams cad 
[\[158a.5\]]kyis brgyan pa/_don yod pa'i zhags pa dang /_tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/_dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_pad+ma dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_zhags pa thogs pa/_rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na bzhugs te bka' stsol pa/_rig sngags 'chang ba khyod kyis 
[\[158a.6\]]don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legs so legs so/_/zung shig dang /_mchog ji lta ba dang /_ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bas ji ltar 
[\[158a.7\]]'dod pa'i mchog smras na de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste/_rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag bzhag pa dang /_phyag bzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[158b.2\]]cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa/_byang chub 
[\[158b.3\]]kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ho ma khung bshad par bya ste/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa'i pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/_zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa dang ldan par byas te/_pad+ma'i snying 
[\[158b.4\]]po la ho ma khung za bas su brko ba dang /_thab ka kun tu khru gang ba brko bar bya'o/_/nang du pad+ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag la/_tshon sna tshogs kyis pad+ma de brgyan par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o/_/
[\[158b.5\]]dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /_dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang /_mchod yon gyi chus bkang pa gser gyi snod bzhi dang /_ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag pa dang /_dri dang me 
[\[158b.6\]]tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te/_phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dpyangs la/_dkyil 'khor kun du tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang /_sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang /_bum pa gzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dri chus yongs su bkang bar bya'o/_/sgo bzhir chos smra 
[\[158b.7\]]ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o/_/grwa bzhir cho ga smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o/_/gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog dang /_zangs kyi 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]me tog dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos dri zhim pos bgos te/_gtsang mar byas pa la ril bu la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[159a.2\]]po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/_/don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying pos stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni mi smra bar byams pa'i sems dang /_
[\[159a.3\]]snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang /_snying rje bar bya ba ni las bla na med pa yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_oM pad+ma 
[\[159a.4\]]pA Ni/_tsa ra tsa ra pad+ma b+hu dze/_dz+wa la dz+wa la hU tA sha ne/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/_da ha da ha/_sarba ma lA na/_a mo g+ha pA ni ba ra de/_hUM hUM nir da ha/_pA paM/_sha ma sha ni/_lo kot+tA ra Ni/_sa man+ta raSh+mi ba ra de/_ru tu ru tu/_pra ba re/_a mo g+ha sid d+hi/_oM b+hur+b+hu pa/_na 
[\[159a.5\]]mo stu te swA hA/_de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang /_gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o/_/thal ba des 
[\[159a.6\]]gang gi lus la byugs pa de ni sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dpral bar thig le byas na de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_mtshan mo pa dang /_nyin par pa dang /_nam phyed pa dang /_nyin 
[\[159a.7\]]phyed pa dang /_lo gcig pa dang /_zla ba gcig pa dang /_zhag bdun pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims lan 'ga' yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/mtshog mar thig le byas na gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las thar 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_grul bum dang /_brjed 
[\[159b.2\]]byed dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/thams cad 'bros so/_/phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na slar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/snying gar thig le byas na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na lto ba'i nang gi nad 
[\[159b.3\]]thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyur ro/_/dug gis myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyur ro/_/thal bas khrus byas na byad dang /_g.yengs byed dang /_sngags dang /_dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/_/sha 
[\[159b.4\]]bkra dang /_mdze dang /_'bras dang /_shu phran mched pa dang /_'brum bu dang /_lhog pa dang /_me dbal dang /_'brum phran rnams byung na chu dron po dang sbyar te bskus la mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na mod la nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur 
[\[159b.5\]]ro/_/sprin logs su gtor na sad dang /_ser ba thams cad mi 'bab bo/_/rlung ldang ba'i logs su gtor na rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/_/yul 'khor kun tu gtor na me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog 
[\[159b.6\]]dang /_me tog gi ljon shing dang /_shing gi ya la ga dang /_ldum ra dang /_kun dkar ra ba dang /_ri dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad legs par bsrungs bar 'gyur ro/_/yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun cad kun tu mtshams chen 
[\[159b.7\]]po gcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na der 'jug pa dang /_phyir 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_byol 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dgongs pa tsam gyis nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams 
[\[160a.2\]]cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe yongs su brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod dam/_ra bsregs pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/_dmyal bar skyes 
[\[160a.3\]]pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te/_mngon par dga' ba'am/_bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer ram/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_lha'i gnas sam/_grong ngam/_khyim mam/_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_yul 'khor kun tu gtor na 
[\[160a.4\]]mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang 
[\[160a.5\]]bral bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bye ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs 
[\[160a.6\]]ras la bri ba bshad par bya'o/_/dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do'am/_khru gsum mam/_khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa/_'jig rten dbang phyug_/tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/_dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_cod pan 
[\[160a.7\]]rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yas su zla ba tshes pa can gyis brgyan pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa bri ba ni ri bo po Ta la lcug ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]steng du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_seng ge'i khri bya'o/_/seng ge'i khri'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan bya'o/_/de'i steng du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/_pad+ma dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_zhags pa thogs shing gzugs de phyag dbugs 
[\[160b.2\]]'byin pa bya'o/_/dbu'i gong man tshad gzhal med khang chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/_dbus su mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o/_/dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun tshad dang mthun par pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/
[\[160b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_'od dpag med dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_skyil mo krung bcas te gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhugs 
[\[160b.4\]]par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od 'dom gang la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye 'khor kun tu 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba bya'o/_/de nyid kyi nye 
[\[160b.5\]]'khor du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis bya'o/_/gong gi dbus su rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can rdo rje gsor bar bya'o/_/de nas tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po dang /_'og min gnas 
[\[160b.6\]]kyi lha'i bu dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang /_'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_me lha dang /_nag po chen po dang /_dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang /_dga' bo dang /_nye dga' 
[\[160b.7\]]bo dang /_stobs lha dang /_gang ba bzang po dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams me tog sna tshogs dang /_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul pa dang /_
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya//_//'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_lha rnams kyi phyi rol thog thag tu pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje dang /_mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i pad+ma'i phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya/_
[\[161a.2\]]g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/_ut+pa la dang /_nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du blta bar bya'o/_/de'i rgyab bu khro gnyer ma me tog sna 
[\[161a.3\]]tshogs 'chang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/_/g.yon du dkar mo zhes bya ba ni skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/_ku mu da dang /_nor bu rin po che lag na thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[161a.4\]]dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad+ma mdzes dga' ma me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/_/lha mo sgrol ma dang /_dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/_na bza' dkar po gsol ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan 
[\[161a.5\]]pa bzhengs pa bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs su srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/_phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang /_dgra sta dang /_ral gri dang /_rdo rje lag na thogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/_/g.yon du pho nya 
[\[161a.6\]]mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag bzhi la rdo rje dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/_skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/_'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/_/ri bo po Ta la'i ngos 
[\[161a.7\]]kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/_me tog sna tshogs thogs shing /_gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'thor bar bya'o/_/ri'i smad du lha mo dpe med ma dang /_lha mo bas na ti dang /_sa'i lha mo 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]dang /_dpal lha mo dang /_lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang /_sgra dbyangs ma dang /_lcags sgrog ma dang /_dung can ma ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_me tog sna tshogs dang /_nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o/_/gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad phreng ba 
[\[161b.2\]]sbrengs la mchod rten gyi rgyan ji lta bar brgyan par bya'o/_/mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol du bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten dbang phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu drang 
[\[161b.3\]]srong dang /_lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/_kun dga' bo dang /_rdo rje 'chang ba lag na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon du g.yob par bya'o/_/g.yas 
[\[161b.4\]]phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu drang srong dang /_lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 
[\[161b.5\]]byed pa bya'o/_/ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog brag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan la tshad ji bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[161b.6\]]phyug gi seng ge'i gdan gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/_me tog dang /_pog phor dang /_bgrang phreng lag na thogs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du blta bar bya'o/_/ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos 
[\[161b.7\]]te/_gtsang bar byas la ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/_/snod sar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o/_/'di'ang kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshogs dang /_gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/tshig ngan pa dang /_sems 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/chang dang /_sha dang /_beg btsong dang /_sgog skya dang /_ke'u dang 'dres pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o/_/dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang /_phrag dog dang bral bar bya'o/_/byams 
[\[162a.2\]]pa dang /_snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la dang ba lhag par bya ste ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o/_/ga pur dang /_gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya'o/_/dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rmugs pa dang /_gnyid 
[\[162a.3\]]yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yin no/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri bar bya'o/_/rgyu skar shin tu bkra shis pa dang /_tshes grangs dang nyi ma shin tu bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o/_/rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin te de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[162a.4\]]thams cad kyis bsngags pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_dge sbyong 
[\[162a.5\]]dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam 
[\[162a.6\]]par gzigs pa/_byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/_rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/_ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba ni sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byed 
[\[162a.7\]]pa dang /_mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams kyang mthong ba tsam la sogs 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]pas sdig pa thams cad phye mar rlog go/_/rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang /_chos 
[\[162b.2\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta lan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/_'di la the tshom mi 
[\[162b.3\]]bya'o/_/yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/sems kyis skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin 
[\[162b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus dang sems yid las byung ba'i yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang /_phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[162b.5\]]'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang /_bla mar lta bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 
[\[162b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma yin te/_phyis ma rig 
[\[162b.7\]]pa'i mun pa'i nang du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/_ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin no/_/de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa brjod par bya'o/_/gang gis dran pa 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams 
[\[163a.2\]]cad mngon du bsrung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par mdzad pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_snying po dang /_cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i lus su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum 
[\[163a.3\]]du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po la 
[\[163a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki te ma hA maN+Dal pad+ma sarba bo d+hi sa twa na ma skr-i te/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/_a mo g+ha ma hA brah+ma/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya/_bo d+ha ya/_ma hA bo d+ha ni/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_pad+ma bi bo d+ha ni/_sarba pA pa an d+ha kA ra/_
[\[163a.5\]]pra sha ma ni/_sarba durga ti/_b+ha ra ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ba hu bi bi d+ha/_be Sha d+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta gar+b+he/_hu ru hu ru/_a mo g+ha gar+b+he/_tu ru tu ru/_a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/_mu ru mu ru/_bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/_k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/_sarba A ba ra Na bi shud d+he/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_
[\[163a.6\]]pa ri pU ra Ni/_ta ra ta ra/_tA ra ya mA na/_a ba lo kA ya/_pad+ma b+hu dze/_ma Ni ka na ka_/bi b+hu Shi ta/_bA hu/_da ma da ma/_dur dA na tA nA na/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra da/_ma hA kA ra Ni ka_/sarba de ba ga Na na ma skr-i ta/_r-i Shi ga Na/_sta bi ta/_sha ta sa ha sra tsan+t+ra sUr+ya/_a hi re ka_/
[\[163a.7\]]ra sh+mi/_a ba b+hA si ta/_ma hA pa shu pa ti/_be Sha d+ha ra/_pa ra ma/_shud d+ha satwa/_a ba lo ki te/_lo ke shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_pa ra ma/_kU ru Ni ka_/maN+Da le shwar/_su pra bud d+ha/_ma hA pad+ma/_b+hu dze shwa ra/_ma hA bid+yA d+ha re shwa ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA bi mo k+Sha/_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]maN+Da la d+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya/_mu drA sa ma ya d+ha ra/_ma hA ba la bid+yA d+ha ra/_ma hA ma Ni/_mau khi d+ha ra/_a mi tA b+ha/_mu ku Ta d+ha ra/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_sa man+ta/_a ba lo ki ta/_lo ke shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_pA sha d+ha re shwa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_pa ra ma/_ma hA mai tri/_a ba lo ki te/_
[\[163b.2\]]sarba satwa/_san+ta rA ga_/sid d+hi/_si d+hA shA/_pa ri pU ra ka_/ma hA ba ra/_pra mo da/_na mo stu te swA hA/_'di ni thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/_'phags pa spyan 
[\[163b.3\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog_/gsang ba sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'jug pa yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus 
[\[163b.4\]]gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM bI ra bI ra/_ma hA maN+Dal/_bi shwa rU pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/_pa ri pU ra ka_/sarba bo d+hi sa twa/_na ma skr-i ta/_ba ra ma bi pu la/_bi mo k+Sha d+ha ra/_ma hA pA sha_/bi lo ki ha/_a mo g+ha 
[\[163b.5\]]pA sha dz+wa li ta ma hA dz+wa la a ba lo ki tA/_ma hA ma Ni biSh+Ta d+ha ra/_sa man+ta a ba b+hA si ta/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ma hA gam b+hI ra/_bi mo k+Sha pA sha d+ha ra/_ba la bo d+h+yang ga_/A kar+Sha ka_/oM prah+ma rU pa/_ma hA a mo g+ha pra sha hUM hUM/_phaT phaT/_sarba sa twa/_bi lo ki ta/_ba ra pra da/_na mo stu te 
[\[163b.6\]]swA hA/_'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs
