[\[163b.7\]]rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM bi bud d+h+ya/_bi bud d+h+ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ta ra ta ra tA ra ya/_ma hA arna ba pa ra na/_ma hA b+hu dza bi lo kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a mo g+ha pA sha_/ma hA dA na pA ra mi tA/_pa ri pU ra ya/_hUM da ra da ra/_bi bid+ha/_bi tsi tre/_sarba sa twa u pa b+ho ga_/sarba ta thA ga ta/_ma hA dA na/_pU dzA me g+ha/_pra brta ya/_ta ra ta ra/_
[\[164a.2\]]tA ra ya/_ma hA pad+ma pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/_'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pa chen po'i snying po ste/_gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang sbyin pa byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[164a.3\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a mo g+ha shI la/_saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ma 
[\[164a.4\]]hA shud d+ha satwa/_pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta b+hu dza d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa man+ta/_a ba lo ki te/_hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di smyung ba byas te/_gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o/_/de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o/_/bzlas brjod 
[\[164a.5\]]byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i dri mang po lus las 'byung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig nyi ma re 
[\[164a.6\]]re zhing gzungs 'di dran na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams pas smyung ba byas te/_'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyu ro/_/tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 
[\[164a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM ma hA bIr+ya/_a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/_ba ra ba ra/_d+hi D+ha/_bIr+ya/_ma hA ba la/_
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]ba la ba la/_ma hA bo d+h+yang+ga/_ba la bo d+ha ni/_hUM phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[164b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a mo g+ha k+ShA na ti/_sarba bo d+hi sa twa k+Sha mi Na/_k+Sha Na 
[\[164b.3\]]k+Sha Na/_ma hA mai tri/_kA ru Na/_sarba satwa/_bta sa la/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sarba sa twa k+Sha mi Na/_hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal ba na gnas pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su 
[\[164b.4\]]gtogs pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang /_gnas pa gang yin pa dang /_skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par byed na/_dmyal ba'i sems can las thar bar 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa 
[\[164b.5\]]rnams grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[164b.6\]]thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM sarba tA thA ga ta/_ma hA a mo g+ha/_kA ru NA/_d+h+yAn sa mA d+hi/_sarba bi mo k+Sha/_a pra kam pya ka_/tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dmigs nas yid rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na/_
[\[164b.7\]]dran pa tsam gyi mod la des bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyur 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a mo g+ha/_ma hA pradz+nyA/_a ba b+hA sa/_s+pha ra Na/_bud d+hi/_pra sa ra pra sa 
[\[165a.2\]]ra/_sa man+ta bud d+hi/_a ba lo ki ta/_b+ha ga bA na pra dz+nyA/_a ba lo ki ta/_tsak+Shu She ma hA pradz+nyA/_ba ra dA/_pA Ni/_ma hA pradz+nyA/_pad+ma d+ha ri Na/_b+hu dze hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thabs dang shes rab 
[\[165a.3\]]sna tshogs kyi dge ba chen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes 
[\[165a.4\]]rab dang blor 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub la thug gi bar du rab tu rmongs par mi 
[\[165a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM a mo g+ha bi 
[\[165a.6\]]mo k+Sha/_maN+Dal ma hA da b+hU ta bi ma le/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_ma hA da b+hu ta/_a mi tA b+ha/_ma ku Ta/_d+ha ra hU~M phaT swA hA/_dkyil 'khor der yungs kar dang /_dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas/_chus kun tu chag chag btab na chag chag btab pa tsam gyi 
[\[165a.7\]]mod la dkyil 'khor kun tu dpag tshad gcig gi nang dus sbyangs te yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar shel gong dang /_rin po che sna tshogs pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro/_/shin tu dag pa dang /_shin tu dri ma med pa dang /_shin tu nyams dga' 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]pa dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro/_/shin tu sa gzhi spa bar 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs de'i bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag 
[\[165b.2\]]thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[165b.3\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[165b.4\]]bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis de'i sa lag par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang /_rims dang bral ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa dang /_sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag phyis lus 
[\[165b.5\]]la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/sa yongs su sbyong ba'i rig sngags so/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen 
[\[165b.6\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM a mo g+ha dru ma/_la ta br-i k+Sha/_sha kha pa tra puSh+pa pha la/_ba Ti pa A ro ha na hi DA ga_/push+ka ri Na/_u ta sa hr-i da/_sun da ra pra sra ba Ni/_bi bi d+ha/_bi tsi tra/_pa ri sho d+ha ya/_pad+ma b+hu dze/_sa ma sa ma/_sa man+te na/_pa ri maN+Dal/_pa ri sho d+ha 
[\[165b.7\]]ya/_ma la ma la/_bi ma la bi ma la/_ni rma la su pa ri shud d+ha/_pad+ma ut+pa li b+ha dza la ma lA na bi shud d+ha/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_pa ra ma ma hA shud d+hA ya sa twA hU~M phaT/_na mo tri b+hu ba ne hU~M phaT swA hA/_'dis tsan+dan dang /_pad+ma dang /_chu dang yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te/_ljon pa'i 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]sdong po dang /_me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_sna tshogs pa'i lcug ma dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_chu klung dang /_mtsho bran dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing bu dang /_'bab chu mdzes pa'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/_de rnams thams cad la 
[\[166a.2\]]bdud rtsi blug par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams thams cad la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bur 'gyur ro/_/tha na lha'i rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang nags kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/gang la reg pa tsam gyis reg pa de thams cad ser sna'i dri ma dang bral zhing /_phrag dog spangs 
[\[166a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_mchil ma dang bral zhing /_lus kyi phyi dang nang gi dri mi zhim pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang lus kyi nang gi nad dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs pa de thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing /_rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[166a.4\]]rnam par nyams pa dang /_legs par yongs su dag pa dang /_dri ma med par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/de la chus khrus byas pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang lha'i chu dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi chus khrus byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad bkrus par 'gyur ro/_/

[\[166a.6\]]nas ut+pa la'i dri bro bar 'gyur ro/_/ngag 'jam zhing snyan par yang 'gyur zhing ngag mnyen par yang 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing /_skye bo thams cad yid dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/mi'am ci'i dbyangs su yang 'gyur ro/_/bstan bcos dang /_cho ga 
[\[166a.7\]]zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags dang /_theg pa chen po thams cad thos pa tsam gyis kun tu 'dzin par byed cing kha ton du yang gnas par byed do/_/me tog de la mnams pa dang /_phreng ba mgul par 'ching bar byed pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang byang chub yan lag gi me tog gi phreng ba bcings 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/_/sna tshogs su dag par yang 'gyur te/_lha'i dri dang /_reg pa dang /_yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[166b.2\]]lha'i so dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur/_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang la gtam smras pa de rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos shing skye ba brjes nas bde ba can gyis 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/_pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 
[\[166b.3\]]rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/_/'bras bu dang /_me tog dang /_chu dang /_nags kyi bdag po dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[166b.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM a mo g+ha a ma le tri ma le/_bi ma le/_ni rma le/_di bya pa ri shud+d+he sar+b+ba ma lo pa kar+Shi te/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra de pra ba ra pa ri shud+d+he/_ma hA ma Ni rat+ta kA ya pa ri shud+d+he ma Ni ma Ni sho d+ha ni ma hA 
[\[166b.5\]]a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni shud+d+he/_hr-i da ya shud+d+he/_kA ya ni rma la ma hA ma Ni pa ri shud+d+he/_hu ru hu ru pra ba ra pA Ni ma hA b+hu dza ba ra de/_tu ru tu ru/_ma hA sa twa ba ta sa le pa ri sho d+ha ya mAM sarba pA su bi shud+d+ha ma le swA hA/_rig sngags 'dis rig sngags 'chang gi bdag nyid kyi lus yongs 
[\[166b.6\]]su sbyang bar bya ste/_tsan+dan gyi chu dang /_gur gum pa dang /_gla rtsi'i chu dang /_ga pur gyi chu dang /_yungs kar dang ba byung lnga bsres pas/_rdza gsar pa'i bum pa bkang ste rig sngags 'di stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing lan bdun du btung bar bya'o/_/
[\[166b.7\]]khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos bdag nyid dbang bkur bar bya'o/_/khrus byas pa tsam dang /_dbang bskur ba tsam gyis bdag rang gi phyi nang yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_dug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa dang nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rga ba la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_bdud la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za la sogs pa thams 
[\[167a.2\]]cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur zhing bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du slar 'ong nus par mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang bde bar sgrub pa dang /_bde bar nyal ba dang /_bde bar sad pa dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang /_dri ma thams cad spang ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[167a.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+mo'i nang 
[\[167a.4\]]nas rdzus te skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /_lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang /_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs 
[\[167a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde gzhung sna tshogs rnam pa du ma kha ton byed par 
[\[167a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+ma/_bi ma le/_pra sa ra/_sa man+ta/_mu khe swA hA/_dkyil 'khor char phye ste thig gdab pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+hi/_rU pa bi tsi tra/_gan d+ha ra san d+ha ra/_pra ba ra/_b+hu dze sA hA/_
[\[167a.7\]]tshon rtsi'i sngags dang /_sku gzugs gzhag pa dang /_mtshon cha'i rtags bri ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta pa ri maN+Da la/_bA sha ban+d+he hU~M/_yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bsdam par bya'o/_/oM a mo g+ha/_sa man+ta/_da sha dig ma hA sI 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]man/_ban d+ha ya/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_hU~M phaT swA hA/_yungs kar dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams gcad pa'o/_/oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na/_pA sha ha ste/_b+hu ru b+hu ru swA hA/_yungs kar dang dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag bsrung ba'o/_/oM a mo g+ha 
[\[167b.2\]]tsU Da ma Ni/_hU ru hU ru/_nA ga bA sha ba na d+he hU~M swA hA/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsug bcing ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha/_sa man+te na/_ma hA pA she_/d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/_slob ma dang grogs rnams bsrung ba ste yungs kar dang /_thal ba la lan nyi 
[\[167b.3\]]shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsrung bar bya'o/_/oM a mo g+ha/_dza la bi ma le/_su ru su ru swA hA/_dri chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas khrus bya ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta bin du tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/_nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha di pya ba s+t+re tsu 
[\[167b.4\]]ru tsu ru swA hA/_gos kyi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha b+hu dza ka_/ka ba tsa/_ba ra de/_tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/_go cha'i sngags yin te yungs kar dang gur gum gyi chus bya'o/_/oM a mo g+ha brah+ma b+hu dza pA r+ya na te na pra sa ra swA hA/_mchod phyir thogs kyi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha tsU DA ma Ni pad+me/_a 
[\[167b.5\]]b+hi Shiny+tsa ya/_ma ma sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ma Ni ma Ni swA hA/_dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba sun d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha ra Ni/_hU~M/_stan gyi gsang sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta par+ya nga ke_/b+hu bi swA hA/_skyil mo krung bca' ba'i sngags so/_/
[\[167b.6\]]oM a mo g+ha su ra d+hi/_pad+ma pa ra pa ra hU~M/_me tog gi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha/_gan+d+ha/_pra sa re/_pU r+Na b+hu dze swA hA/_dri'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha le pa na pra ba re pi ri pi ri swA hA/_byug pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha ga gan s+phar Na/_ma yai b+hu ru b+hu ru hU~M/_
[\[167b.7\]]bdug pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha shu kla sa ra sa ra sa a gra d+ha ra bi d+ha ra hU~M/_gtor ma'i sngags te thams cad du bya'o/_/oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra/_nu pi lo ki ni/_ki ri ki ri hU~M/_zas dang gtor ma'i sngags so/_oM bi bi d+ha/_a mo g+ha/_pha la/_pa ra pa ra hU~M/_'bras bu'i sngags 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]so/_/oM a mo g+ha a da b+hu ta g+ha na d+ha ba re hU~M/_mchod yon gyi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha/_bi bi d+ha/_ma Ni/_b+hU Sha Na/_ba re/_dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M/_rgyan dang /_thod dang /_dar dpyang ba dang /_mda' dang /_tshon sna lnga dang /_thig skud kyi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha/_bi bi b+ha/_b+hA dza ni/_dza ya dza ya 
[\[168a.2\]]swA hA/_snod kyi sngags te thams cad du sbyar ro/_/oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra b+ha ba na b+hu be tha ra tha ra swA hA/_gzhug pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha na ma ska ra Na/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_oM dza le hU~M/_phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyar ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha tsakre du ru du ru pra du ru swA hA/_bskor 
[\[168a.3\]]ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta b+ha ba ne b+ha ba b+ha ba swA hA/_spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha tsin+ta ma Ni a kaR+Sha ya du ru du ru swA hA/_gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha ni rman+t+ra Na bi mo k+Sha maN+Da le mi li mi li swA hA/_snyan gsan dbab pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha ma hA rash+mi dz+wa 
[\[168a.4\]]la sa ha sra dz+wa la dz+wa la sa man+ti swA hA/_ma ra me'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste pra sa ra gats+tsha sba b+hA ba naM bi sa rdzi to si sa ra sa ra hU~M phaT swA hA/_slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha pA sha ba na d+ha sa man+ta ma hA sa ma ya dr-i D+he hU~M phaT swA hA/_dam tshig gi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha sa 
[\[168a.5\]]man+te/_pra ba ra/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra ma hA da b+hu te shwa ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_gsang sngags 'dis la du dang /_mo da ka ra dang /_zan dang /_rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_gtor ma dkar po dang /_tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa'i sbyin pa 
[\[168a.6\]]byas na phyis bgegs byed nus par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/_/phyag rgya de nas brjod bya ste/_/gang gis gzung ba tsam gyis ni/_/sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang /_/dug rnams thams cad rnam par bcom/_rnam grol 
[\[168a.7\]]dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni/_/dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin/_/lag gnyis pad+ma 'drar byas la/_/sor mo rnams ni mnyam gzhag ste/_/gung mo lcags kyu 'dra bar bya/_/lag gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa yi/_/phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di/_/don yod zhags par byin gyis 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]brlabs/_/'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyi/_/lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed/_/oM pad+ma b+hu dze pad+ma bi ma le swA hA/_dam tshig rtse mo'i rtse shes pas/_/rdo rje pad+ma rtag tu bya/_/gung mo cung zad bskums nas ni/_/lag gnyis pad+mo 'dra bar bya/_/gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba/_/'jig rten 
[\[168b.2\]]rnams kyi dbang phyug dag_/mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/_/rnam grol phyag rgyas dogs med par/_/sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis ni/_/phyag byas pa yi phyag rgya 'di/_/rnam grol dkyil 'khor rmad du byung /_/oM pad+me sung pad+me 
[\[168b.3\]]bi mo k+Sha maN+Da la/_pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/_rdo rje bcing ba mnyam gzhag ste/_/rdo rje pad+mo gung mo ni/_/bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/_/rnam grol gsung ba'i phyag rgya 'di/_/yang dag grol bar rab tu bstan/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bstan pas ni/_/ngan par byas pa thams cad 'jig_/
[\[168b.4\]]oM a mo g+ha badzra pad+ma b+hu dze mi li mi li swA hA/_lag gnyis thal mo khong stong las/_/mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing /_/nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra/_/yid bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin/_/las ni don yod thams cad byed/_/don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs shing /_/don yod pha 
[\[168b.5\]]rol phyin drug rdzogs/_/don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin/_/don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang /_/mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar mdzad/_/oM a mo g+ha ma Ni ma Ni/_ma hA ma Ni pad+ma ma Ni swA hA/_rdo rje pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar/_/pad+ma kha bye 
[\[168b.6\]]'dra bar rgyas/_/gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi/_/phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu bzang /_/phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/_/'bras bu chen po rmad du byung /_/'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phags/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/_/oM a mo g+ha/_badzre ma hA pad+me/_dza le su dza le la 
[\[168b.7\]]ma hA dza le swA hA/_snying gar rdo rje pad+ma nyid/_/rdo rje bcing ba phun sum tshogs/_/mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra ba ni/_/bcing bar bya ba phyag rgya 'di/_/gzi brjid chen po dag dang ni/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang /_/thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas/_/thams cad grub par rab tu 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]sbyin/_/'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che/_/sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na med/_/sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub/_/gsang sngags grub pa bla na med/_/oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/_sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi/_a ba lo kA ya sid d+hi/_/ma hA bi bu la sid d+hi/_ku ru ku ru swA hA/_rdo rje thal 
[\[169a.2\]]mo mnyam bzhag ste/_/gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba dang /_/srin lag mthe bo so sor 'gyed/_/gung mo yid tsam dgug phya ba/_/pad+ma'i dbang phyug sems dpa' che/_/'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste/_/rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/_/
[\[169a.3\]]phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin no/_/phyag rgya 'di dang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang /_phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no/_/phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/_phyir mi ldog 
[\[169a.4\]]pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam mthong ba'i mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba dang gzung ba tsam gyi mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing mod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub bla na med pa yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[169a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a ba lo ki ta ma hA shud d+ha sa twa sa ra sa ra/_sa man+ta/_a ba b+hA sa/_kuN+Da la/_d+ha la/_a mi tA b+ha/_ma ku Ta d+ha ra/_dza Ta ma ku Ta/_na ba badzren+d+ra/_maN+Di ta/_tsa ra tsa ra/_
[\[169a.6\]]sam+b+ha ra/_b+hu ba ne shwa ra pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/_phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/_rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/_'jig rten mgon po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin no/_/phyag rgya bdun ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun 
[\[169a.7\]]gyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/_phyag rgya chen po bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog gzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag brgya bcings bar 'gyur ro/_/gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/_/bstod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang /_kun du las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no/_/gang zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus 
[\[169b.2\]]legs par byas te/_gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_sngon gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/_/phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 
[\[169b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun du gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba 
[\[169b.4\]]dang /_'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang /_mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis ji ste phyag rgya gzung ba tsam dang /_bstan pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur 
[\[169b.5\]]ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za la sogs pa rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_gzhon nu rnams rtag tu 
[\[169b.6\]]rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten du gyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang /_lus ring bsrel gyi snying po yin par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i 
[\[169b.7\]]lus su 'gyur ro/_/dug gis mi tshugs/_mes ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_chus ma yin/_dbyig dug gi 'jigs pas ma yin/_seng ges ma yin/_gcan gzan gtum pos ma yin/_dug mi bzad pas ma yin/_rkun po dang /_mi rgod kyis ma yin/_khyim rdib pas 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]ma yin/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/_lus la dug sbyar ma dang /_byad dang sbod gtong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu 
[\[170a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/_rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'dis mthong bar dgyes par 
[\[170a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro/_/dpal gyis lus la shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du 'di mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa 
[\[170a.4\]]chen por 'gyur ro/_/lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dgyes par 'gyur te/_mchod par byed do/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_gzhon 
[\[170a.5\]]nu dang /_drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyang rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dgyes par ston pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la 
[\[170a.6\]]dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te/_ga pur dang /_gla rtsis bsgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga'am/_/
[\[170a.7\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bya'o/_/mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/_/byams 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa dang snying rje'i sems su bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang /_snying rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas yid la byed 
[\[170b.2\]]pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/_phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcings par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mthu brjod par bya'o/_/mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rang bzhin gyi 
[\[170b.3\]]sku mngon du mthong ba yin no/_/rgyal po'am/_btsun mo'i nang du'am/_skye bo mang po'i nang du tshogs pa dang /_dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du'am/_'khor du bcad pa'i nang du'am/_rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_
[\[170b.4\]]bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang du de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa mod la mngon du mthong ba dang /_'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba 
[\[170b.5\]]dang /_skye ba dang /_skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba dang /_skyes nas phyug po'am/_dbul po'am/_rgyal po thob pa'am/_lha'i longs spyod dang /_lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[170b.6\]]khyab 'jug dang /_rtag tu dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ba dang /_klu'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skye ba dang /_mtshams med pa la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang /_bram ze'i rigs sam/_rgyal rigs sam 
[\[170b.7\]]gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/_rgyal ba dang /_rnam par rgyal ba dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_mi ngas 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_pha rol gyi 'khor ram/_rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang /_dgra dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_g.yul sprod pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_nad 'byung ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_shin tu char 'bab 
[\[171a.2\]]pa dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang /_dar ba dang /_rgud pa dang /_'byor pa dang /_mi 'byor pa dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_nor dang /_'bru rnyed pa dang /_'phel ba dang /_'bri ba dang /_lo nyes pa mthong ba dang /_'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad 
[\[171a.3\]]legs par byed pa dang /_nyes par byed pa dang /_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_'bri ba'am/_'phel ba'am/_skye ba legs par skye ba'am/_ngan par skye ba dang /_bu 'byung ba/_bu pho'am/_bu mo'am/_bu bzang po'am/_bu ngan pa'am/_bsod nams can nam/_bsod nams med pa 
[\[171a.4\]]mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/_las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas the tshom mi bya'o/_/tshes grangs dang /_rgyu skar dang /_nyin mtshan brjod par bya mi dgos kyi bzlas brjod dang /_gtor ma dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_bkru bshal dang /_shin tu khrus bya ba dang /_
[\[171a.5\]]gos gtsang ma bcang ba dang /_bden par smra ba dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_bla ma la legs par mnyan pa de gzung ba kho nar bya'o/_/zas dang /_skom gtsang ma dang /_chang dang /_sha dang /_beg btsong dang /_sgog skya dang /_ke'u dang /_'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas yongs 
[\[171a.6\]]su spang ba dang /_shin tu spags pa dang /_de dag ni khyad par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar byas na las 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dka' thub spyod pa la brnyas sems mi bya/_ma gus pa mi bya'i lkog tu'ang mi bya'o/_/rjes su bstan pa de dag ni mchog 
[\[171a.7\]]yin no/_/bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa yin no/_/dngul las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la zangs las pad+mo'i gdan khru gang gi tshad sdong bu dang bcas par bya'o/_/me long gi gong du dngul lam/_gser las 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ste tshad sor bzhi pa/_gdan pad+mo phyag bzhi la mdung rtseg sum pa dang /_zhags pa dang /_pad+ma dang /_nor bu'i rin po che thogs par bya ba ni 'jog sbyong legs par byas pa/_'jam po 'od phyin pa tsam du sbyang bar bya'o/_/
[\[171b.2\]]de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel gzhag par bya'o/_/ga pur dang /_gla rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o/_/me long gi nye 'khor thog thag tu dngul gyi me tog dang /_gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba gdags par 
[\[171b.3\]]bya'o/_/dbang bskur ba'i dar gdags par bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/_ji tsam brgya stong tshang gi bar du bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de nas me long 
[\[171b.4\]]'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'dzag go/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ngo /_/de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod par dga' ba 
[\[171b.5\]]dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lus shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan 
[\[171b.6\]]par bya dgos pas/_de nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyar khru bzhi 'phang du khru do pa byas la shin tu mkhregs pa shin tu 'jom par bya'o/_/thig skud kyis rnam par phye ste/_tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor 
[\[171b.7\]]gyi sgo rnam par phye ste/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad tshon gyis gsal bar bri zhing pad+ma'i dkyil du ge sar dang ze ba bya'o/_/stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /_stegs bu grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa gtum pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs bri bar 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]bya'o/_/stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_gzhon nu dang /_lus ngan po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha dbang phyug dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_ral 
[\[172a.2\]]pa gcig pa dang /_sgrol ma dang /_dkar mo dang /_khro gnyer ma dang /_rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o/_/stegs bu'i phyi rol du mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba dang /_rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /_pad+ma'i phreng 
[\[172a.3\]]ba kun du bya'o/_/phreng ba'i bar dbus dang /_grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyad dang 'jigs byed ma dang /_dpe med ma dang /_ba san ti dang /_dpal sgra dbyangs dang /_sa'i lha mo dang /_dung can ma dang /_pus pa dan ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_me tog sna tshogs dang rin po 
[\[172a.4\]]che'i snod thogs par bya'o/_/phyi rol thog thag tu phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o/_/ga pur dang /_gla rtsis mchod cing /_dkyil 'khor kun du dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang /_mda' 
[\[172a.5\]]dang /_rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/dngul gyi snod bzhi cung peng gis bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/_/dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis dgang bar bya'o/_/dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o/_/snod brgyad ro sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang bar 
[\[172a.6\]]bya'o/_/'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/kha zas bza' ba dang /_gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/dri sna tshogs dang /_byug pas dngul gyi snod bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/_/dngul gyi pog phor brgyad tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_tu ru ska dang /_ga pur 
[\[172a.7\]]dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur gum dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_pog gis gang bar bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs pa sreg go/_/dngul dang /_zangs dang /_gser gyi me tog gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du gcal du dgram mo/_/phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gtsal du dgram par bya 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ste/_phreng ba rnams khor yug tu bskor nas bzhag ste/_de la yang me long legs par brgyan par byas nas/_dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i ge sar dang ze'u 'bru la shar du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/_
[\[172b.2\]]dkyil 'khor gyi las dang /_bya ba thams cad byas nas me long la mngon du phyogs te/_skyil mo krung du 'dug par gyur nas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod dbul bar bya ste/_bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang /_khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ro/_/
[\[172b.3\]]dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang /_'khor chen po'i dbus su me long gi dbus der 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ste/_me long gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/_/
[\[172b.4\]]rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/_/bdag la don yod pa'i me long la 'bebs pa'i de kho na nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thams cad yang dag par mthong ste/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya ba yongs su dag pa nyid do/_/rig 
[\[172b.5\]]sngags 'chang khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa med pa thob bo/_/khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya grub bo/_/rig sngags 
[\[172b.6\]]'chang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog gang 'dod pa smros shig_/de thams cad sbyin par bya'o zhes so/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchog gang don du gnyer ba de blangs nas thams cad 'phral nyid du sbyin par byed do/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa der/_kun 
[\[172b.7\]]nas 'ongs pa'i bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bkrabs pa dang /_mdun na 'don dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor du kun 'ongs pa dang /_bsod 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]nams dang ldan pa'am/_bsod nams dang mi ldan pa'am/_yongs su dag pa'am/_lta ba ngan pa'am/_gzhan dmyal ba ba'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa lhud ba/_mnar med pa la gzhol ba/_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_dam pa'i 
[\[173a.2\]]chos spong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus de la ston par byed/_thams cad du smra bar byed/_yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed/_thams cad du rang gi las la dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams 
[\[173a.3\]]cad ston par byed do/_/rig sngags kyis chom rkun dang /_gdol pa dang /_rig sngags spong zhing nyams par byed pa dang /_rig sngags sun 'byin par byed pa dang /_rig sngags la ma dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni ma gtogs te/_gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu 
[\[173a.4\]]sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo /_/de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yid la byed pa 'jug ste/_'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten las 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba bsod nams dang /_
[\[173a.5\]]bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo /_/po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom 
[\[173a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khang na lha dang klus yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo /_/gzhan ji ltar da ltar gyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'am/_lo legs pa dang /_lo nyes pa'am/_nad dang /_
[\[173a.7\]]'chi ba dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_rang gi dmag tshogs dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_g.yul dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'jigs pa dang /_rgyal ba'am/_'pham pa'am/_rlag pa'am/_ma brlags pa'am/_yams dang /_char ches pa'am/_dus ma yin pa'i 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]char ram/_char med pa'am/_rlung ngam/_sad dam/_tshangs pa yang rung ste de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/nor dang ldan pa'am/_nyams pa'am/_'phel ba'am/_lo thog gam/_me tog gam/_'bras bu 'phel ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/chom rkun dang /_rkun 
[\[173b.2\]]po dang /_dug dang /_mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa'am/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pa'am/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa de thams cad mthong ngo /_nor chen po'am/_nor med pa de thams cad mthong ngo /_/'chi 'pho ba dang /_
[\[173b.3\]]skye ba mthong ngo /_/bu thob pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul dang /_ljongs thob pa dang /_bud med thob pa de thams cad mthong ste/_'di la dogs pa dang /_yid gnyis dang /_the tsom bskyed par mi bya zhing /_mchog tu dad pa dang gus pas shin tu 'bad de cho ga 'di bsgyur bar bya'o/_/
[\[173b.4\]]don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[173b.5\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_ras ris shin tu zab pa/_shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing /_shin tu rgya 
[\[173b.6\]]che la/_shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang /_dkyil 'khor mang po dang /_phyag rgya mang po dang /_gsang sngags mang po dang /_ras ris mang po yongs su bsgrags pa rnams ni rab rib dang bral bar mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa zab pa lta bu/_lhun po chen 
[\[173b.7\]]po dang mtshungs pa lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_rdul phra rab lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa lta bu/_bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_tshad med pa/_bskal pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]ma dang /_bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang /_lha'i yul gyi tshad ma dang /_klu'i yul gyi tshad ma dang /_sems can gyi tshad ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i tshad ma dang /_
[\[174a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la kun du snang ba'i tshad ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshad ma dang /_bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma rnams kyis thog mar dmigs pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs pa ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das bar du yang 
[\[174a.3\]]dmigs pa ma lags so/_tha mar yang ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_sgrub thabs kyi cho gas bsgrub par bya ba ni du zhig lags/_gsang sngags ni du zhig_/phyag rgya ni du zhig_/dkyil 'khor ni du zhig_/bri bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni du zhig 
[\[174a.4\]]lag pa'i phyag rgya ni du zhig_/bdug pa'i sbyor ba ni du zhig_/mig sman ni du zhig_/ril bu ni du zhig_/bdug pa ni du zhig_/ras ris ni du zhig_/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig_/snying po ni du zhig_/nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig_/khro bo'i gsang sngags ni du zhig_/drag po ni du zhig_/
[\[174a.5\]]zhi ba ni du zhig_/yi ge gcig pa ni du zhig_/yi ge gnyis pa ni du zhig_/yi ge gsum pa ni du zhig_/yi ge bzhi pa ni du zhig_/yi ge lnga pa ni du zhig_/yi ge drug pa ni du zhig_/yi ge bdun pa ni du zhig_/yi ge brgyad pa ni du zhig_/yi ge dgu pa ni du zhig_/yi ge bcu pa ni du zhig lags/_
[\[174a.6\]]smyung bar gnas pa ci ltar lags/_nyin mo dang mtshan mo ni ci ltar/_khrus kyi cho ga ni ci ltar/_gos bgo ba ni ci ltar/_phyogs bcing ba ni ci ltar/_dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni ci ltar/_gtsug tor bcing ba ni ci ltar/_bdag srung ba ni ci ltar/_gzhan srung ba ni ci ltar/_grogs srung ba ni 
[\[174a.7\]]ci ltar/_slob ma srung ba ni ci ltar/_rab tu 'jug pa ni ci ltar/_phyag bya ba ni ci ltar/_bskor ba bya ba ni ci ltar/_mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil 'bul ba ni ci ltar/_gtor ma 'bul ba ni ci ltar/_me tog 'bul ba ni ci ltar/_bdug pa ni ci ltar/_dri ni ci ltar/_mar me ni ci ltar/_
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]nye reg ni ci ltar/_lha bshos ni ci ltar/_thams cad du spyan drang ba ni ci ltar/_snyan gsan dbab pa ni ci ltar/_rmi lam bskul ba ni ci ltar/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni ci ltar lags/_zhi ba can ni du zhig lags/_rgyas pa can ni du zhig_/mngon spyod can ni du zhig_/zhags pa ni du zhig_/rdo rje ni du zhig_/pad+ma 
[\[174b.2\]]ni du zhig_/gshegs su gsol ba ni du zhig_/nye bar 'pho bar byed pa'i bya ba ni du zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba dang /_rgyu mtshan ci 'dra ba dang /_kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba ni mi shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag las sgrub pa'i cho ga du zhig gi rjes su 
[\[174b.3\]]'brang bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ci ltar phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_dngos grub du zhig rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_ci ltar sems can bla na med par 'gyur bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la bdag 'khrugs par gyur 
[\[174b.4\]]cing /_bdag la spobs pa med do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes par mi nus na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de dag bdag la gsung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom mchis pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi the tshom bcad 
[\[174b.5\]]du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas zhu ba yongs su zhus par gyur pa gsan nas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje mchog tu rnyed 
[\[174b.6\]]par dka' ba 'di dri ba yongs su dris pa ni legs so/_/legs so/_/lag na rdo rje khyod la yongs su 'dri bar byed pa'i spobs pa skyes pa ni lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir don gyi ched yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog 'grub pa'i 
[\[174b.7\]]don du yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang /_lag na rdo rje 'di ni mchog tu rmad du byung bas te/_phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo /_/lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga_/rgya mtsho chen po 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dug can pa dang /_zab bar mtshungs pas te/_'di ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/_/lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po thigs pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar nus kyi/_lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so/_/lag na rdo rje ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni 
[\[175a.2\]]rdul phra rab tu gtor ba'i grangs kyis mthar thug par bya bar nus shing /_slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu gnas par 'dod pas rang gi gnas su rab tu bzhag par nus kyi don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so/_/de ltar rgya che ba/_de ltar gting dpag 
[\[175a.3\]]dka' ba/_de ltar zab pa ste/_lag na rdo rje/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa dang /_gting dpag par mi nus so/_/don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i ched 'dzin par ni mi nus so/_/
[\[175a.4\]]lag na rdo rje sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de dang /_snying po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dang /_zhags pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can rnams kyi 
[\[175a.5\]]gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs sna tshogs pa dang /_tshul sna tshogs su mthong bar byed de/_sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i ched dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[175a.6\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du mnyam par 'gro ba ste/_gang du chu dang 'o ma mnyam pas mnyam pa bzhin no/_/thams cad du mnyam pas byams pa dang snying rje chen po rgyas par byed do/_/don yod pa'i zhags pas 'gugs par byed la sgrol bar byed 
[\[175a.7\]]do/_/'chi ba med pa'i thad rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'jog par byed do/_/dman pa dang /_mchog dang /_bar ma dang /_rigs mthon po dang /_dma' ba dang /_dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa rnams thams cad du mnyam par dran par 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]byed cing ming smos pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed cing /_sems can thams cad bla na med par byed la dub pa dang /_ngal ba dang /_yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[175b.2\]]chen po dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_brjed byed dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_nags dang /_gshin rje'i gnas ji srid du sa 'og gi nang du son pa rnams dang /_srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang /_ji srid du 'og min gyi srid pa'i bar du gcig tu sems 
[\[175b.3\]]bskyed pas yongs su rgyug go/_/lha dang /_klu dang bcas pa nas ji srid dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar thams cad dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams bla na med par byed do/_/dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni mun pas mdongs pa thams cad sel bar byed de/_'dzam 
[\[175b.4\]]bu'i gling thams cad du mnyam par snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du snying rje chen pos kun du snang bar byed cing thams cad la thams cad du mnyam par gnas te/_sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[175b.5\]]tshor ba dang /_'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang /_nad dang /_mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'chi ba rnams thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su grol bar byed do/_/mtho ris la gzhol ba la sogs pa'i lam thams cad 
[\[175b.6\]]du 'god par byed do/_/de ltar na snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa chen pos thams cad du mnyam par rjes su 'gro ste/_thams cad du mnyam par mchog tu byed cing /_thams cad du mnyam par byang chub kyi lam la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/thams cad du mnyam par skyabs dang /_
[\[175b.7\]]dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni/_brtan pa dang /_go cha dang /_spro ba chen pos rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du zhugs pa'o/_/lag 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]na rdo rje 'di ni thabs cig tu 'jug pa chen po ste/_sems can thams cad 'jigs pa chen po'i lam las so sor ldog par byed pa'o/_/bde ba nas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam du 'god par byed pa'o/_/rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med la bsam pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/_/
[\[176a.2\]]sems kyis yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do/_/de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan bsngags pa chen po 'di thos nas dga' ba dang /_mgu 
[\[176a.3\]]ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu rangs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa ni ched du brjod par gyur to/_/e ma mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug_/e ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/_/khyod kyi ming gi yon tan bskyed pas/_/ngan 'gro thams cad grol bar byed do/_/phyag na 
[\[176a.4\]]rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi bla ma mgon po/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi yab chen po/_'di ni 'jig rten sgrol bar byed pa'i mgon po/_thub pa nyin mo'i nyi ma'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de lta bur lag na rdo rje ji ltar smra bar bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[176a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug can song la/_mngon par phyag 'tshal nas yongs su zhus shig_/mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig gis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du snying po dang /_de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin de rnams ston par byed do/_/don yod 
[\[176a.6\]]zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur zhing lung 'bogs par byed do/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes zab mo zab pa rtogs shing khong du chud de seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro zhing /_rdo rje bskor bar byed bzhin pas zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med 
[\[176a.7\]]pa'i me tog bzung nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan gsum 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]bskor ba byas te/_zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog phul te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shin tu rmongs pa dang ldan pa dran pa yongs su 
[\[176b.2\]]nyams pa blo'i dpa' zhum pa ste/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgya mang po dang /_ras ris kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rgyas pa 'di dang de dag mi shes so/_/sngon ma ni du zhig_/bar ma ni du zhig_/tha ma ni du zhig_/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig_/snying po ni du zhig_/nye ba'i 
[\[176b.3\]]snying po ni du zhig_/ji srid du yi ge bcu pa'i bar gyi gsang sngags ni du zhig_/dkyil 'khor dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_ras ris ni du zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs dbye bar gsol zhes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag na 
[\[176b.4\]]rdo rje la brtse ba'i don du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du nam mkha'i dbyings su gtor ro/_/gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi mtshams su 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas so/_/dpag tshad lnga brgyar khyab cing sa gzhi las gyen du 
[\[176b.5\]]'phags pa nyid kyi ji srid 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du gnas te/_bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi dril bu dpyangs pa'i ba dan bcings pas mdzes shing 'bar bar yongs su gyur to/_/'khor lo'i rnam pa legs par yongs su 'khor ba ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i kun 
[\[176b.6\]]tu snang ba legs par yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mchod sdong rnam par mdzes par shin tu gnas pa/_nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs pas spras pa dga' bar bya ba/_yid kyi shing rta rab tu tshim par byed pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba mthong ba lha dang /_lha ma yin gyis 
[\[176b.7\]]phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /_rjed par bya bar 'os pa dang /_drang srong rnams kyis bstod par 'os pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par 'os pa ste/_thams cad du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog gi ge ser la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pa la/_gdugs kun nas yongs su 'khor ba'i lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_chus byung dang /_lha'i bu mo dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_mi'am ci'i bu mo dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[177a.2\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_rig sngags 'chang dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub kyis brgyan cing /_dar dpyangs dang /_ba dan dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa 
[\[177a.3\]]dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed par gyur te/_lha rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab par gyur cing lha'i dri za'i glu dbyangs yang dag par len cing /_rnga dang /_pheg 
[\[177a.4\]]rdob rnams kyis mchod pa'i don du rol mo byed par gyur to/_/po Ta la'i ri bor gzhal med khang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ru/_ca co'i sgra chen po sgrogs par gyur to/_/po Ta la kar gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_
[\[177a.5\]]lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa rnams kyang sems tshim pa thob cing /_rmad du byung ba thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang /_pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang /_rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang /_nor 
[\[177a.6\]]bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang /_glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan pa dang ldan zhing /_rmad du byung ba thob ste/_sems tshim pa skyes la ngo mtshar ba thob nas/_bcom 
[\[177a.7\]]ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin du kun du gnas par gyur to/_/zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs dang /_lha dang /_mtshan mo'i lha dang /_dbang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_dga' byed dbang phyug dang /_tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang /_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]nag po chen po dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_gang ba bzang po dang /_stobs kyi lha dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan gyi lha rnams dang /_gzhon nu'i lha rnams gdugs kyi yub nas bzung nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[177b.2\]]'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/_/lha'i gzhal med khang chen po lha'i rnam par sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod pa byed do/_/gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khor yug gi nang du dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_'og min gyi lha dang /_lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i bus yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' la mchod pa'i 
[\[177b.3\]]sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed do/_/sa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za gang yin pa rnams dang /_sa gzhi'i lha dang /_chu'i lha dang /_nags kyi lha dang /_lo thog gi lha dang /_sman gyi lha gang yin pa de 
[\[177b.4\]]rnams thams cad sa'i mthil gyi gzhal yas khang de sbyong bar byed par gyur te/_dri sna tshogs pa'i chus chag chag 'debs shing /_dri sna tshogs pa'i phye mas byug par byed/_me tog sna tshogs gcal du 'grems shing /_bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas sa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par brgyan par gyur to/_/
[\[177b.5\]]de ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i go skabs rgya chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/_de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yangs pa rgya chen po mthong nas/_shin tu ya mtshan pa 
[\[177b.6\]]thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/_'di ltar sems par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstan pa ni shin tu ya mtshan no/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[177b.7\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slar yang gsol ba btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar mdzod cig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje dogs pa bsal 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]ba dang /_the tshom gcod pa la rjes su bzung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[178a.2\]]sngar 'khod nas/_mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa lus 'od zer 'bar bas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_pad+ma yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor dang /_don 
[\[178a.3\]]yod zhags pa'i gsang ba sgyu ma lta bu'i snying po dang phyag rgya dang /_kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/sgrub pa bla zhing bklags pas grub pa dam tshig mchog tu gyur 
[\[178a.4\]]pa'i snying po nye bar bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas phyag gser gyi kha dog can/_'od zer sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis yang dag par brgyan pa brkyang nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[178a.5\]]spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing sems can dag pa chen po legs so legs so/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug_/da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig 
[\[178a.6\]]nas phyogs bcur kun du bltas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kun du bltas te/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsungs so/_/don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du 
[\[178a.7\]]pad+ma gtsug gtor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang po ni/_dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor don yod pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi snying po'i dam tshig rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 
[\[178b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/blo gros chen po 'phags pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[178b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+mo'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'chang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po 
[\[178b.4\]]can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/drang srong chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa/_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po de bzhin 
[\[178b.5\]]gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs pa 'di/_bdag gis da ltar 'khor chen po la bshad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM pad+moSh+NI Sha ba ra da hUM/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/tsi ri tsi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka_/si ri si ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_ma hA pad+ma ha staM/_ka 
[\[178b.6\]]la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/_e h+ye hi/_bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/_d+hA ba d+hA ba/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/_tsa la tsa la/_sany+tsa la/_bi tsa la/_e Ta Ta/_e Ta Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_ma hA bi ma la/_
[\[178b.7\]]pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ra dza sA d+ha ya hUM hUM/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA pa shu pa ti/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA pad+moSh+NI Sha d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_sarba A ba ra Na ha ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skr-i te/_ha ra ha ra/_sarba kilpi Sha ha ra/_hA hA hA hA/_hI hI hI hI/_hU hU hU hU/_oM kA ra brah+ma ba Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ma hA pad+ma dz+wa la d+ha ra/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_pad+tsa pA sa d+ha ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra/_pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI rA ya/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa/_b+ha ga bA na so ma A di t+ya ya ma/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_brah+ma/_in+d+ra/_r-i Shi ga Na/_de ba ga Na/_a b+h+ya rtsi 
[\[179a.2\]]ta/_tsa ra Na/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_pu ru pu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_sa na ta ku mA ra/_ru tra/_bA sa ba/_biSh+Nu/_d+ha na da/_de ba r-i Shi/_nA ya ka_/ba hu/_bi bi d+ha/_be Sha d+ha ra/_ma hA pad+ma daN+Da d+ha ra/_pA sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi/_d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu/_tha ra tha ra/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_ya ra ya ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_pa ra pa 
[\[179a.3\]]ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ma hA ba ra dA ya ka_/sa man+ta maN+Da la/_a ba lo ki ta/_lo ke shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_mu hu mu hu/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_b+ha ga bA na Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_ma ma sarba b+ha yaM b+h+yaH/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/_sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaH/_sarba gra he b+h+yaH/_sarba dz+wa 
[\[179a.4\]]re b+h+yaH/_sarba bya d+hi b+h+yaH/_bad+d+ha ban+d+ha na tA Da Na rdza na/_rA dza/_tsau ra/_ta ska ra/_ag+ni/_u da ka_/bi Sha/_sha s+t+ra/_pa ri mo tsa ka_/ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_tsa ra tsa ra/_in+d+ra ya ba la/_bo d+h+yaM ga_/tsa tur+ya sa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka_/ta ma ta ma/_da ma da ma/_sa ma sa ma/_sa ma sa ma/_ma hA ta mon+d+ha ka ra bid+ha 
[\[179a.5\]]ma na/_ShaT bA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka_/mi li mi li/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Thi Thi Thi Thi/_Tu Tu Tu Tu/_Thu Thu Thu Thu/_e ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra e h+ye hi/_I shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_pad+me shwa ra/_ma hA b+hU ta ga Na/_saM b+hany+dza ka/_ma hA sid+d+hi swa ra/_ku ru ku ru/_pa ra pa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_
[\[179a.6\]]bi shud+d+ha pi Sha ya/_ni bA si na/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta ma ku Ta ma had+b+hutaH ka ma lA laM kr-i ta/_ka ra ta la/_d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/_bi mo k+Sha pra kam+pa/_ba hu sa twa san+ta ti/_pa ri pA tsa ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka_/sarba byA d+hi pra mo tsa 
[\[179a.7\]]ka_/sarba A shA pa ri pU ra kaHsarba sa twa/_sa mA shwA sa ka_/oM pad+mo Sh+NI Sha pA sha hr-i da ya maN+Da la na ma stu te swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]khams kyis gzhi cher g.yos par gyur te/_ri dang /_nags dang /_dgon par bcas pa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/kun nas sa'i mthil 'di yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad+ma'i gdan kun nas bting bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma'i lte ba'i 
[\[179b.2\]]gnas na pad+ma chen po gyen du 'phags pa 'dab ma stong ba/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/_bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu dang /_'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang /_mu tig dmar po'i ze 'bru dang /_lha'i mu tig chen po'i ge sar dang gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin 
[\[179b.3\]]par byed pas te/_'di lta ste sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog tu snang bzhin pas 'bar zhing /_rnam par gsal ba lhang nge'o/_/phyogs bcu kun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun du snang bar byed do/_/lha'i gnas dang /_klu'i gnas dang /_
[\[179b.4\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i gnas dang /_dri za'i gnas dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gnas dang /_mi 'am ci'i gnas dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kun du snang bar byed do/_/rab tu tshim par byed do/_/yang dag par skul bar byed do/_/yang dag par dbugs 'byin 
[\[179b.5\]]par byed do/_/dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po rnams kun du snang zhing reg pas dmyal ba chen po de rnams kyang pad+ma can chen por skyes par gyur to/_/sems can dmyal ba de rnams kyang kun nas snang zhing reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te/_bsams pa tsam gyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[179b.6\]]su pad+ma las rdzus te skyes shing /_lha'i lus la rgyan lhab lhub dang /_gos dang /_spud pas rnam par brgyan cing /_skye ba nas skye ba ru skye ba dran par skyes so/_/de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kun nas snang bas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya de dag thams cad kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas las yongs su grol 
[\[179b.7\]]te/_mtho ris su rna rgyan dri ma med cing g.yo ba 'dzin par skyes so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun du sems can thams cad kun du snang zhing reg pa de rnams thams cad sa chen po brgyad pa la rab tu gnas par gyur to/_/des kyang 'khor chen por kun du 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]rnams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod par gyur to/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor chen po'i snying po gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub so sor thob par gyur to/_/
[\[180a.2\]]klu'i rgyal po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan so sor snang bar gyur to/_/lha'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang 'od 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo/_/gnod sbyin dang srin po gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang 
[\[180a.3\]]du gnas par gyur to/_/'byung po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to/_/lha ma yin gyi 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rdo rje'i go cha dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi ya lad bgos par gyur te/_nam mkha' lding gi 'khor gang yin pa thams 
[\[180a.4\]]cad rdo rje mchu rtse mo chen po'i stobs kyi shugs rjes su thob par gyur to/_/mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par gyur to/_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang yin pa de rnams 
[\[180a.5\]]thams cad skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sku las nyi ma'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer chen po rnam par spros te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar rjes su zhugs so/_/
[\[180a.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar zhugs ma thag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ltos shig_/lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[180a.7\]]mthong lags so/_/sems dpa' dag pa bdag gis mthong lags so/_/sems dpa' chen po dag pa 'di'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa pad+ma'i dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa/_shin tu rgya che ba/_rmad du 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]byung ba chen po dngos grub mchog sgrub par byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das mtha' dag rgyas par gsungs shig_/gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_rig sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'joms pa'i don dang /_rig sngags 
[\[180b.2\]]'chang rnams kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po 
[\[180b.3\]]mchog tu gsang ba gtsug tor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/_dri ma dang /_rnyog ma thams cad sel bar byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par 
[\[180b.4\]]byed pa/_sdig pa dang /_ma rungs pa'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_bgegs dang /_log par 'dren pa thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/_/bdud la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dug_/mtshon cha dang /_me dang /_chu'i 'jigs pa 
[\[180b.5\]]dang /_mche ba'i dug dang /_seng ge dang /_rgyal po dang /_gnod sbyin rnams zlog par byed pa/_dug dang /_byad stems dang /_g.yeng byed dang /_phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid gces pa rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i sgrub pa bla na 
[\[180b.6\]]med pa bklags pas grub pa 'di rjes su zung shig_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bzhin 'dzum cing /_gdong khro gnyer dang bral bas rdo rje bskor bar byed bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[180b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dam par gyur pa gsang ba pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams du zhig lags/_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_gnod 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab par rig nas/_phyag g.yas pas lte ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa la reg go/_/reg ma thag tu phyag g.yas pa'i pad+ma la/_snying po'i rig sngags de yang pad+ma'i steng du ste/_rang gi ngo bo gzhal med khang tshangs pa'i cha 
[\[181a.2\]]byad 'chang ba don yod pa'i gzugs spyan gsum pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_nor bu gser gyi cod pan can/_'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_ral pa'i cod pan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis spud pa/_zla ba phyed pas rnam par mdzes pa/_zhags pa 'chang 
[\[181a.3\]]ba/_pad+ma'i gtsug tor 'chang ba dang /_nor bu'i dbyug pa 'chang ba dang /_rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'chang ba/_skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_'od zer 'bar bas yang dag par brgyan pa/_gos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs dang /_spyan nyi ma dang zla bas lhag par 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa/_pad+ma 
[\[181a.4\]]rnams kyi steng na mdzes bzhin pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs mnyes par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa/_lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa/_klu thams cad kyis rjes su gzung bar 'os pa/_drang srong thams cad kyis dga' bar 'os pa/_
[\[181a.5\]]lha mi yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bla mar 'os pa mthong ste/_de lta bu'i snang ba rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_
[\[181a.6\]]de kho na nyid gces pa'i snying por gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/_snying po gsang ba/_don yod pa'i pad+ma dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor 
[\[181a.7\]]thob par gyur to/_/ting nge 'dzin so sor thob pa gang gis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du chud par gyur to/_/de rnams thams cad rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis zhabs dag gi rjes la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags 'di smras so/_/oM a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da ya pad+moSh+NI Sha ku mA ra be Sha d+ha ra/_pad+me shwa ra/_A be sha ya/_sarba a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya hr-i da ya/_sarba sid+d+hi a mo g+ha pra yats+tsha pad+ma/_pad+ma hU~M hU~M na ma stu te swA hA/_'di ni don yod zhags 
[\[181b.2\]]pa'i snying po bklags pas grub pa'i sgrub thabs so/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+mo Sh+NI She shwa ra/_pad+me shwa ra/_sa man+tA ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_a mo g+ha pad+moSh+NI Sha sa ma ya A kar+Sha ya/_pra be sha ya/_sarba karma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM hUM/_ma hA pad+moSh+NI Sha b+hu dze swA hA/_rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang 
[\[181b.3\]]sngags so/_/oM a hA tsan+Da pad+me shwa ra bi bi d+ha rU pa/_bi ka Ta/_pad+ma daMSh+Da ke rA la b+hI Sha Na/_bAk+t+ra sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da yaM/_khA da ya/_big+ha nAM/_pad+ma d+h+ri ka_/tsi Ti/_dri Ti hUM swA hA/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i rigs kyi snying po'o/_/nang gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i las rnams so/_/oM a mo g+ha pad+moSh+NI Sha pad+ma pA sha kro d+ha ka_/mo ya 
[\[181b.4\]]karma pra be sha ya ma hA bA shu pa ti/_ya ma/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_ma hA tsaN+Da be ga_/a mo g+ha ku las ma ya/_pad+me hUM hUM/_khro bo'i rgyal po don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'o/_/de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams 'gyur te/_dran pa tsam gyi mod la/_dus 
[\[181b.5\]]gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas gcig tu mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur 
[\[181b.6\]]ro/_/mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ngo /_/pad+ma'i phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i gtsug tor bcings pa nyid kyis spyi bo'i gtsug 
[\[181b.7\]]tu mngon par dbang bskur na/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ro/_/pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis don yod par dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de/_pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par gyur pa thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang /_bla na med 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]pa'i dpal thob bo/_/rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te/_thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang 
[\[182a.2\]]sngags kyi rgyal po dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do/_/pad+ma'i phyag gis rjes su 'jug cing /_don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub ste/_bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tshom med do/_/pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rigs 
[\[182a.3\]]kyi dngos grub dang /_pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/_don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du bklags nas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/_rigs kyi rgyal po dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang /_phyag 
[\[182a.4\]]rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun mong ba thams cad du rgyal po'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi rig pas lha'i dbang phyug 
[\[182a.5\]]dang /_lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yang gnod sbyin rnams dang /_srin po rnams su gyur pa dang /_dri za rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang /_dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'gyur te the tshom med do/_/nam mkha' lding 
[\[182a.6\]]rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang drag po de yid la sems pa tsam gyi mod la/_'phral du ri rab ltung bar byed cing /_khor yug gi ri rnam 
[\[182a.7\]]par 'thor bar byed do/_/rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing /_rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar byed do/_/kun du gsal bar byed do/_/klu'i gnas thams cad du klu'i gnas 'bar bar yang byed do/_/bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis steng du bdug par byed do/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_gza' dang /_brjed byed dang /_mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang ba thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig la gnas pa dang /_dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya gnas pa dang /_gsang 
[\[182b.2\]]sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/_/de rnams thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing gnas par byed do/_/'ga' zhig gang du 'gro ba'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang /_skabs 
[\[182b.3\]]gsum pa'i lha dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_sde dpon dang /_de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang 
[\[182b.4\]]bar byed do/_/the tshom med do/_/khros pa'i las rnams sam/_de bzhin du drag po'i las rnams thams cad kyang hUM yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub mthong ngo /_/phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang 'jigs 
[\[182b.5\]]pa dang /_rnam par 'gras pa'i skye bo dang /_sdig pa de rnams thams cad hUM yig gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/sdang ba dang /_ngan sems pa'i sems can dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa la 'khon pa thams cad drag po'i hUM yig bzlas pa tsam
