[\[182b.6\]]gyis skad cig la bsreg ste/_dper na me yis phye ma leb bzhin no/_/las gzhan stong phrag rnams dang /_las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/_dran pa tsam gyi mod la/_las thams cad 'grub bo/_/de nas don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam 
[\[182b.7\]]gyis/_bya ba thams cad ni gnyis su 'gyur te/_ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byed do/_/dkyil 'khor ram/_gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du/_ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do//_//
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/_o~M zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma 
[\[183a.2\]]gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang 
[\[183a.3\]]rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/_dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha 
[\[183a.4\]]gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad do/_/gsang sngags o~M zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags kyi yi 
[\[183a.5\]]ge gcig pa'o/_/o~M b+hu yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad/_sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam 
[\[183a.6\]]par dag par mdzad/_sngon gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/_nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/_tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 
[\[183a.7\]]'gyur/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/o~M pad+me gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/_pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang /_gsang 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi 
[\[183b.2\]]dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/_thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/_/o~M pad+ma hrI/_gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum pa bzlas brjod byas nas bzhi 
[\[183b.3\]]ba la 'jug par 'gyur/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/_rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad 
[\[183b.4\]]de/_rig sngags 'chang tshur shog_/khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/_rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/_/mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 
[\[183b.5\]]'gyur/_phyir zhing nam yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/_'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/o~M pad+ma b+hu dze/_gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur/_de bzhin 
[\[183b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad/_sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur/_rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs 
[\[183b.7\]]so/_/khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/_rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe brjes na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyed par 'gyur 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]zhing nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/_khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 
[\[184a.2\]]spangs kyis bya ba thams cad gyis shig_/yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro/_/o~M pad+ma a ba lo ki te/_gzungs sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 
[\[184a.3\]]'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba mdzad par 'gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du 
[\[184a.4\]]ston par mdzad/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/_/rig sngags 
[\[184a.5\]]'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog_/las byas pa ni shin tu yongs su zad cing khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/_khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/_khyod 
[\[184a.6\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang /_rigs kyi spyi ni khong du chud/_khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/_khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas 'jig 
[\[184a.7\]]rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig_/o~M pad+ma dz+wa la hu~M d+h-ika/_yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral bdag pa zhes bya 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]ba thob par 'gyur la/_ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/_sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/_lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[184b.2\]]kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing /_gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba sna tshogs dag 'bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[184b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i pad+ma 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/_phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin la dbugs 'byin par mdzad 
[\[184b.4\]]de/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no/_/'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 
[\[184b.5\]]'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /_pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par sprul pa grub kyis rig sngags 
[\[184b.6\]]'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig_/o~M a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/_gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/_bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu 
[\[184b.7\]]rin po che chen po shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag ste/_de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/_sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]yongs su dag par rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing /_rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/_legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin 
[\[185a.2\]]par mdzad de/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa dga' ba la zhugs so/_/rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par blta bar tshur shog_/der khyod kyis 
[\[185a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig_/o~M pad+ma lo tsa ni hu ru hU~M/_gzungs 
[\[185a.4\]]sngags kyi snying po yi ge dgu po 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu 
[\[185a.5\]]bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston cing /_sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad/_rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad/_legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/_rig 
[\[185a.6\]]sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyang ba'i las legs par bsgrub pa byas so/_/khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo sgrub 
[\[185a.7\]]pa dang mdo sde lung bcas pa sgrub pa 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin no/_/o~M pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ma le hU~M phaT/_gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur nas sa bcu pa la gnas 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]par 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_don yod pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te the tshom mi bya'o/_/gsang sngags 
[\[185b.2\]]bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub par yin te/_bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa/_gtsang ma/_gtsang sbra spyod pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos 
[\[185b.3\]]pa/_byams pa'i sems dang snying rje skyes pa/_bden pa smra ba/_bla ma la gus pa/_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/_bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to/_/de 
[\[185b.4\]]nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzum la lag na rdo rje skor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras pa/_sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi don yod 
[\[185b.5\]]pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po rgyal po 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/_gzungs sngags kyi snying po re re po 'di dag ni bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[185b.6\]]gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod bsgrub pa dang /_cho ga rgyas par bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_nyin zhag gcig bsnyen gnas la gnas shing zas bslangs pa dang /_'bras bu dang /_ldum bu dang /_rtsa ba bza' ba zos nas rig sngags 'di bsgrubs 
[\[185b.7\]]na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_lag na rdo rje nyin zhag gcig smyung ba la gnas shing nyin zhag gcig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ba 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ni lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang dge sbyong mgo bregs pa/_rigs kyi gtso bo bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_skyes 
[\[186a.2\]]pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo'am/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs gang la la skad cig thang cig yud tsam mam/_dus tshigs gcig gam/_dus tshigs gnyis sam/_dus tshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan mi smra bar don 
[\[186a.3\]]yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba gzungs sngags chen po'i snying po bcu po 'di lan cig dran nam/_klog gam/_ming gzung ba'ang dran nam/_lag na rdo rje dus tshigs gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i 
[\[186a.4\]]mtshams med pa byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/_bskal par gnas pa yang de yis thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/_sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/_lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/_sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang 
[\[186a.5\]]bral bar 'gyur/_tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_nams kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 
[\[186a.6\]]'gyur/_bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 
[\[186a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam par gzigs par skye bar 'gyur/_tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_bskal pa 'bum phrag drug tu rtsa gnyis su nor bu 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_bskal pa 'bum phrag gsum 
[\[186b.2\]]cu rtsa gsum gyi nang du brgya byin nyid byed par 'gyur/_bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug par 'gyur/_bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod par 'gyur te nams kyang ma'i mngal du 
[\[186b.3\]]skye bar mi 'gyur zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/_lag na rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[186b.4\]]lag na rdo rje gal te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/_lan cig smyung ba la gnas te bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byas na lag na rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib ba dang bral nas don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/
[\[186b.5\]]don yod pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/pad+ma gsal ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/don yod pa'i dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin 'thob bo/_/
[\[186b.6\]]pad+ma gtsug tor mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba grub pa 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[186b.7\]]ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/_tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo dang /_don yod 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /_phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing /_don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i 
[\[187a.2\]]zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags grub pa'i cho ga ste/_sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags 
[\[187a.3\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad par gsol/_bcom ldan 'das rig 
[\[187a.4\]]sngags 'chang kun gyis 'grub pa/_bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na bshad du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 
[\[187a.5\]]lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yis nyon cig_/lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[187a.6\]]kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can la dmigs pa'i sems 
[\[187a.7\]]can gang yang rung ba ngan song gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag med de/_de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtse ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis dug dang /_'brum bu dang /_'bras dang /_lhog pa dang /_rkang shu dang /_mdze dang /_g.yan pa la sogs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/lan bzhi brjod 
[\[187b.2\]]pa tsam gyis dbyig dug dang /_byad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/lan lnga brjod pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan drug brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa dang /_gdon dang /_
[\[187b.3\]]rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nad dang /_yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can 
[\[187b.4\]]thams cad kyi don du nyin re zhing gzhan mi smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o/_/sems can gang la la sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba shi ba dang /_dge slong gang la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral ba dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon 
[\[187b.5\]]la gus par ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/_dur khrod dam/_ro bsregs pa'am/_'chad pa der bye ma gtor bar bya'o/_/gang dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod sar bye ma gtor ma thag tu de dang der 
[\[187b.6\]]bye ma bab pa'i sems can dmyal ba'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_sha zar skyes pa'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'i skye gnas su skyes na de de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur zhing nams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyur 
[\[187b.7\]]ro/_/yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa'am/_rkang pa bzhi pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thams cad mtho ris su gzhol 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_tha na ldang sko ska dang /_ne'u le dang /_sdig pa dang /_sbrul dang /_khyi dang /_rus sbal dang /_lag 'gro dang /_dkyil 'khor de la grib ma bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[188a.2\]]rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/dung la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu 
[\[188a.3\]]mo dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /_gang dag bsnyen 
[\[188a.4\]]gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang /_gang dag skyabs gsum bzung ba dang /_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[188a.5\]]byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/_tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/_mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'am/_
[\[188a.6\]]dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/_skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/_rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs na gang dag der dri mnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos gos la bdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang 
[\[188a.7\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/lus la bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang /_ser sna dang /_skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid kyis gos de bdugs 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po btsun mo dang /_'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/_mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/_'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod 
[\[188b.2\]]gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na nor chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mod la nyi ma 
[\[188b.3\]]'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed do/_/gu gul dang bsres nas lha chen po'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bya ba pa byas na mod nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun 
[\[188b.4\]]du 'dug nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed do/_/bo la dang /_tsan+dan dang /_gu gul bsres nas sred med kyi bu'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan nyi shu gcig lus kyi yan lag la bya ba pa byas na sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 
[\[188b.5\]]'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed la/_dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed do/_/yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi bya ba pa byas na/_tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la mchog 
[\[188b.6\]]thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/pad+ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas nag po chen po dang /_ma mo'i tshogs la bdugs na nag po chen po dang /_ma mo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang /_bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par 
[\[188b.7\]]byed do/_/nA ga puSh+pa dang /_sbrul gyi shun pa dang /_bsres pa'i bdug pa klu'i mtshor bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas klu'i mtshor gtor la/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing dran 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]par byas na klu dang /_klu mo dang /_klu'i bu pho dang /_klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud cing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lan 
[\[189a.2\]]gsum sbyar na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'ang 'ong ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo yang 'ong zhing thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dug go/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dgug par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi nang du mi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas 
[\[189a.3\]]bdugs la/_gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na gnod sbyin dang srin po dag rgyug cing 'ong la/_rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas rje btsun bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang /_de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de 
[\[189a.4\]]bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas na bsgo ba thams cad byed la mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug go/_/thod pa sbyar ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas bdugs na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad 
[\[189a.5\]]dbang du 'gyur la/_las byed par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas btsag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/_ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pa pad+ma'i ri mo bri zhing phye'i gtor ma pad+ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la bdug pa 'dis bdug cing /_gsang 
[\[189a.6\]]sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/_yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing /_lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste/_don gsang ba thams cad bsgo 
[\[189a.7\]]ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ma'am chung ma'am/_sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/_gal te mar byas na bu la sdug pa longs spyod dang /_gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su skyong bar byed do/_/gal te 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]sring mor byas na rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyur ro/_/gal te chung mar byas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtser 'jug par byed do/_/lha mo dpal la bdugs la gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo 
[\[189b.2\]]la byugs na lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing /_nor gyi phung po chen po 'bul bar byed de/_nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na gser srang stong sbyin par byed do/_/
[\[189b.3\]]nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na gser gyi dong tse stong sbyin par byed do/_/tshal gseb tu bdugs na tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing rdzas dang /_sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go/_/ri rnams la bdugs 
[\[189b.4\]]na rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugs na grong khyer kun du yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_nad thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo 
[\[189b.5\]]dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'brog tu bdugs na rkun mo dang /_g.yon can dang /_gnod byed dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_sbrul dang /_dred dang /_dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur 
[\[189b.6\]]zhing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rims thams cad la bdugs na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa tsan+dan gyi bdug pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o//_//
[\[189b.7\]]de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/_rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags bsgrubs pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/_gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po rnam 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]par 'phel lo/_/lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gyis rig sngags 'chang gis the tshom mi bya'o/_/dpral ba'i steng du thig le 
[\[190a.2\]]byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal shing shel ltar dag pa mdog dkar ba dri zhim pa dang /_glang po che'i bya ba dang /_dpral ba dang /_ba lang gi gnas ltar skyon med cing mnyam par mthun la shin tu dul ba/_ded 
[\[190a.3\]]dpon gcig pu'i nor bur gyur cing gsang sngags 'bum bzlas pas legs par bsgrubs pa/_gser dang /_gos ltar kun du 'bar ba ni thig le yin no/_/smin mtshams kyi bar dpral ba na shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni zla ba nya ba mkha' la 'gro 
[\[190a.4\]]ba lta bu yin la/_skye bo'i dbus na gsal ba ni rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin lta bu yin la/_skye bo'i dbus na ni 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin/_'jig 
[\[190a.5\]]rten gyi nang na gdugs gcig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin tu dul ba yin la/_shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no/_/lha dang 
[\[190a.6\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gcig pu ltar mchog dang /_rab mchog sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin par byed de de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang bcas pa 
[\[190a.7\]]dbang du 'gyur zhing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang du 'gyur bar rjes su 'gro ba dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'dong bar gyur pa thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni mkha' la skar ma ltar dpral bar 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin te/_sems can thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag 'dud la me yis mi 'tshig_/chu yis mi 'khyer zhing lus la dug dang /_sbyar ba'i dug dang /_phye ma'i dug dang /_byad mi bzad pa dang /_ngan sngags dang /_sdang ba'i rnam 
[\[190b.2\]]pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/rims dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_nad dang /_rlung dang /_klad nad chen po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod la de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_
[\[190b.3\]]sems can btson du gzung ba'am/_chad pas bcad pa'am/_bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/smin mtshams dpral bar thig le lta bu byas na de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang srin po drag po'i gzugs 
[\[190b.4\]]can gdon brgya stong rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing /_glang po che dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bdag po'i khyu dang /_chom rkun dang /_shod kyi lam dang /_ri'i lam dang /_ri sul dang /_ngam grog dang /_glog dang /_glang dang /_sbrul dang /_sngang 'jigs 
[\[190b.5\]]kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/_g.yul dang /_'thab mo dang /_tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur/_de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang 
[\[190b.6\]]yin pa dang /_thig le yang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/_'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur 
[\[190b.7\]]zhing phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro/_/thig le byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khod do/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchod gnas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang /_yan lag dag tu thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/_don gang dang gang bsgrub pa de dag de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[191a.2\]]ril bu dag ni khar bcug nas/_lhan cig 'dug la smras na ni/_/thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/_/dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang /_/rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid/_/skyes pa dang ni bud med dang /_/khye'u dang bu 
[\[191a.3\]]mo rnams kyang rung /_/de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/kun du mngag pa'i las rnams byed/_/ril bu zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig_/gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims/_gang dag khong skem nad kyis nyams/_/gang 
[\[191a.4\]]zhig rtag pa'i rims kyi btab/_/gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang /_/de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can/_/bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon/_/skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang /_/gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa/_/sdig pa'i las ni kun du spyod/_/
[\[191a.5\]]sngon gyi las ni mi zad pa/_/de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig_/ril bus khrus byas tsam gyis ni/_/'bras dang shu bar 'gyur rnams dang /_/lhog pa dang ni rkang shu dang /_/mtshan par rdol dang me dbal dang /_/khyi rngo mdze dang rkang pa'i nad/_/mi bzad de rnams 
[\[191a.6\]]kun dang ni/_/gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin/_/byugs pa tsam gyi mod la ni/_/thams cad dug med zhi bar 'gyur/_/ril bu thams cad las byed pa/_/lha rdzas shi ba sos par byed/_/ril bu dag ni 'chang byed cing /_/thig le dag ni byas pa yis/_/thams 
[\[191a.7\]]cad du ni mchod pa 'thob/_/thams cad du ni nor dag 'du/_/dpal 'dod pa ni dpal 'thob cing /_/'bru 'dod 'bru yi phung po 'phel/_/lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing /_/klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas/_/gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang /_/lha min mkha' 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]lding mi'am ci/_/lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /_/'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas/_/rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing /_/thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khod/_/'khod kun bran byed ci bya zer/_/gang zhig ril bu de dag brten/_/ril bu thig le 
[\[191b.2\]]rtag byed la/_/de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang /_/de nyid rig la rtag tu ni/_/mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad/_/bsod nams phung po stong dag ni/_/nyi ma re re sogs par byed/_/'jig rten 
[\[191b.3\]]pa yi bde spyad cing /_/'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde/_/tshe brje ba ni 'phos nas su/_/bde ba can du mod la 'gro/_/gang dang gang du skye bar ni/_/tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran/_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/_/gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing /_/g.yel 
[\[191b.4\]]ba med par nyin mtshan du/_/dus kun du ni srang ba dang /_/skyob dang sbed dang srung bar byed/_/gang zhig bu ni med pa dang /_/bu med bu ni 'dod pa la/_/ril bu gcig ni sbyar nas su/_/mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni/_/mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi 
[\[191b.5\]]ngor/_/'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas su/_/zla ba nya ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_/skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing /_/yan lag yan lag thig le bya/_/dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing /_/bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas su/_/
[\[191b.6\]]gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham/_/bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan nas su/_/gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya/_/byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas/_/snying rje'i sems can sdug par byed/_/bsam pa dag cing des pa dang /_/bla ma rtag tu gus par bya/_/
[\[191b.7\]]me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing /_/spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang /_/du rus tsan+dan sA la ki/_/lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing /_/bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni/_/ril bu legs sbyar bza' bar bya/_/gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni/_/btung dang kha zas 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]bza' bar bya/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang /_/mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya/_/byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du/_/mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni/_/mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur/_/'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[192a.2\]]gzigs kyi dbang /_/mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing /_/mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad/_/bud med de ni bu skyed cing /_/gzugs bzang mchog tu blta na sdug_/stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/_/lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro/_/
[\[192a.3\]]chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang /_/tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur/_/dpa' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang /_/sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/_/yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed par 'dod pas thos pa la brten nas 'dug cing rig sngags 'chang gtsang 
[\[192a.4\]]ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ril bu bdun bcug ste/_zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya/_zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags 
[\[192a.5\]]par 'gyur te bstan bcos thams cad dang /_chos lugs dang /_'dul ba dang /_snyan dang gas dang /_brda sprod pa dang /_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i 
[\[192a.6\]]sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_chos mngon par dang /_rtsis dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya thams cad dang /_theg pa chen po thams cad kha ton du lobs par 'gyur ro/_/zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[192a.7\]]tu sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/_glang po che khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gcig tsam sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang /_skra dkar spangs la skra lcang lo 'khyil zhing 'khyil par 'gyur ba dang /_lus 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro/_/lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing nam mkha'i steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig mthun par 'gyur la/_brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/_lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs dang /_lha'i 
[\[192b.2\]]gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/_nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/_gzi brjid shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 
[\[192b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la the tshom mi bya'o/_/las thams cad bsgrub pa'i thig le dang /_ril bu bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub par bshad par bya ste/_
[\[192b.4\]]rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na nyid yin no/_/sman dngul chu dang /_brah+mA k+Shi ra dang /_su bar Na k+Shi ra dang /_shel sngo sangs dang /_ku k+Shi dang /_su gan d+hi dang /_king kuSh+Tha skyon med pa dang /_ut+pal bzang po dang /_pad+ma k+Sha dang /_gu gul 
[\[192b.5\]]dang /_phe lu pad tra dang /_gur gum dang /_na ga puSh+pa dang bcas pa dang /_spang spos dang /_shi ri Sha'i me tog dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis 
[\[192b.6\]]shin tu brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/_yi ge gcig pa lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/_de'i tshe gzungs sngags bcu bo so sor lan nyi shu rtsar re 
[\[192b.7\]]bzlas brjod bya ste/_gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod pa rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag la grib ma la bskam par bya'o/_/
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang 
[\[193a.2\]]mar gyur pas lus legs par khrus byas la spos chus byugs te/_gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/_sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byug par bya ste/_lan cig bskus pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/_gnas gsang bar bya ba'i 
[\[193a.3\]]sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/_don thams cad byed par 'gyur/_'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing de dag thams 
[\[193a.4\]]cad dbang du 'gyur te/_ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 
[\[193a.5\]]'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing las su byed pa dang /_dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la/_de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/sman 
[\[193a.6\]]la sing ha dzi hwa dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang /_rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs par byed do/_/gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par byed/_gnas su gtogs pa 
[\[193a.7\]]thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do/_/spos kyi til mar dang sbrus nas byin pa dang /_rkang pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'phags 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]par 'gyur zhing /_nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/_chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nams kyang phyis sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/_lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pa reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus 
[\[193b.2\]]kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/_bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do/_/don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo /_/bud med gang 
[\[193b.3\]]dang phrad na sus kyang mi mthong la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang mi shes so/_/khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang /_bzhad gad byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo /_/bum pa la 
[\[193b.4\]]byugs nas chus bkang na chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mngon no/_/gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus su byugs na chu de gang bar snang la gzhong pa de ni mi snang ngo /_/bdag nyid la byugs nas bum pa chus bkang ba lag na thogs na bum pa las chu 'byung ba ni 
[\[193b.5\]]snang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo /_/mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/_de'i sgra ni thos shing rang gi lus ni mi mngon no/_/gnas su gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[193b.6\]]su yang rung ba'i mig la bskus la lus la yang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kun la bskus nas mdzod chen po'i nang du 
[\[193b.7\]]zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la gser dang /_dngul dang /_phra men dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_byi ru dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_ma rgad dang /_mthon ka dang /_gos dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub gang 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang mi mthong la khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo /_/rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang 
[\[194a.2\]]du 'jug par 'dod pas gtsang mar khrus bya'o/_/de nas spos chus khrus bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o/_/yang na gur gum gyis khrus bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ba'i rnam lngas khrus bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ba'i til mar dang lhan cig bsres pa 
[\[194a.3\]]des lus bsku bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i nu zho dang sbyar bas mig la bskus la de nas ril bu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o/_/de nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs 
[\[194a.4\]]na mi mthong bar 'gyur te lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo /_/nyi ma gcig gam/_nyi ma gnyis sam/_nyi ma bdun nam/_nyi ma bcu bzhi'am/_nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/_yongs su spyod par byed kyang sus 
[\[194a.5\]]kyang mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang glags mi rnyed de/_ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du rang gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/phug tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phug tu zhugs na phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur 
[\[194a.6\]]gyis/_gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji lta ji ltar las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig_/chu'i nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus mi rlan la/_chus gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/me'i nang du zhugs na mes lus la mi reg cing tsan+dan 
[\[194a.7\]]ltar bsil bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na gnas na 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gis ji ltar rang gis yid la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig_/mi snang bar bya ba ril bu sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po bcu drug pa/_de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_las thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/_dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/_sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa/_de bzhin du 
[\[194b.2\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/_rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/_gnod sbyin thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs par rgyal ba sbyin pa/_dgra thams cad zlog 
[\[194b.3\]]par byed pa/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa nyid dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad las sgrol bar byed pa/_grub pa don yod pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor 
[\[194b.4\]]gyi dngos grub phyag rgya 'pho ba dang /_de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa las thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste 'di la the tshom med do/_/bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu sbyin pa dang /_dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang 'gugs 
[\[194b.5\]]pa dang /_lha dang /_klu thams cad spyan 'dren pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang /_bdud dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_gdon mi bzad pa dang /_brjed byed mi bzad pa dang /_tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad thams 
[\[194b.6\]]cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang /_nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par the tshom med do/_/rims thams cad rtag tu rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/_dug thams cad gsod par byed pa/_'phral du sreg blugs 
[\[194b.7\]]byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen po dang /_thams cad du mthong na dga' ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar mchod par bya ba dang /_thams cad du stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]mthong ba yang sbyin par 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu kun du snang ba dang /_dus thams cad kyi tshe las thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang /_skye ba nas skye bar tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du bla ma 
[\[195a.2\]]la sri zhu che ba dang /_thams cad du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma'o/_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu yang srung ba dang /_yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha nyid kyis kyang /_dus rtag tu srung ba dang /_skyob 
[\[195a.3\]]pa dang /_sba bar byed par the tshom med do/_/dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha'i bu stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sba bar byed cing rtag tu legs par kha los sgyur bar gnas par 'gyur 
[\[195a.4\]]ro/_/tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_drag po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_stobs kyi lha dang /_gang ba bzang po dang /_lngas rtsen dang /_gar mkhan mchog ste 'di rnams kyis rtag tu srung ba dang /_skyob par byed cing 
[\[195a.5\]]gnas te 'di la the tshom med do/_/me'i lha gzi brjid chen po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sba bar byed cing /_mchog tu mchod pa byed pas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg tsam 'di ni/_bya ba thams 
[\[195a.6\]]cad bla na med pa'i dngos grub rnams la'o/_/'bras thug po che dang /_yungs kar dang /_gu gul dang /_mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/_bya ba 
[\[195a.7\]]thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dang /_pad+ma'i chu ba dang /_'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang /_a ga ru dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar bsres pas/_sa mA'i shing gi zhi ba'i me spar te stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te/_mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/bya ba thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 
[\[195b.2\]]zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams thams cad 'gugs pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_cho 
[\[195b.3\]]ga zhib mo dang /_sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshigs gsang ba la rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng dang /_nim pa'i shing gi yam shing gi 'bras sA lu dang /_til 
[\[195b.4\]]dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_lan tshwa dang bsres pa sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_bgegs dang /_log par 'dren pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i gdon thams cad dang /_gdug pa dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams 
[\[195b.5\]]cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad las sgrol bar byed do/_/mtshon cha thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[195b.6\]]tsan+dan dang /_'bras yos dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar bsres pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_yul 'khor dang /_ri brags dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs rnams su/_kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag gcig kho ra khor yug tu 
[\[195b.7\]]zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gcan gzan 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]gtum po thams cad dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_yul 'khor dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba thams cad shis pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/ma tam ga dang /_
[\[196a.2\]]yungs kar dang /_mar dang /_klu shing gi me tog dang /_'bras yos rnams bsres pas arka'i shing gi yam shing gi me sbar la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na char mi 'bab par byed pa la/_de nas klu chen po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de ji srid char pa 
[\[196a.3\]]'bab par 'dod pa'i bar du'o/_/lo thog dang /_shing dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman gyi rdzas dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/legs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang 
[\[196a.4\]]bcas pa thams cad kyis dga' ba chen por 'gyur zhing /_dus dus su ji ltar ba bzhin du char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do/_/ha cang char ches na de nyid kyi thal bas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na ha cang char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/'bras yos dang /_go la dang /_
[\[196a.5\]]yungs kar dang /_gtum po'i sa bon mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na/_rlung dang ser ba thams cad zlog par byed do/_/dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/rlung bcing ba la yungs kar dang 'bras thug po che'i 
[\[196a.6\]]sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/_ji srid du be ram b+ha'i rlung gi bar du bcings par 'gyur ro/_/klu bcing ba la ni yungs kar dang /_til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_lo bcu gnyis su klu 
[\[196a.7\]]bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni/_yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog pa ni/_ka ra bI ra'i shing gis me sbar te/_ni ma 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]pa'i 'dab ma dang /_lan tshwa dang /_phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_phyir rgol pa dang /_dgra thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcing ba la dpag 
[\[196b.2\]]tshad stong phrag khor yug gis so/_/til dang /_yungs kar dang /_'bras yos dang /_pad+ma'i 'dab ma mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/log 'dren 
[\[196b.3\]]thams cad bcing ba la ni/_yungs kar nag po dang /_til nag dang /_sran ma dang /_til dang mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams bcing ba byas par 
[\[196b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin 'byin pa la ni/_b+haM ga'i sa bon dang /_lan tshwa dang /_til mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed la sogs pa thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[196b.5\]]mngon sum du nges par 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/yams dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dge legs thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze dbang du byed pa la/_'bras yos dang /_
[\[196b.6\]]arka'i yam shing mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la/_bu ram dang /_mar dang /_'bras yos dang /_arka'i 'dab mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_rgyal rigs 
[\[196b.7\]]thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la/_myos byed kyi 'bras bu dang /_dong ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_dmangs rigs thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog 'grub bo/_/rje rigs dbang du byed pa la/_mar rnam 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]pa gsum gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_rje rigs thams cad dbang du byed do/_/sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon 
[\[197a.2\]]nu ma dbang du byed pa la/_chu'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_gzhon nu ma thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa la/_'bru dang mar gyi sbyin sreg phrag brgyad byas na/_/
[\[197a.3\]]'jigs pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/nor dang 'bru 'phel bar byed pa la/_'bru bdun mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang 
[\[197a.4\]]phyug thob pa la/_yungs kar dang /_mang+ng+hAHdang /_sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/yul thob pa la/_tshab gsum mar dang /_mad+d+hAHdang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_yul chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/grong 
[\[197a.5\]]gi don du ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang /_yungs kar dang /_'bras yos mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gter gdon pa la ni/_pad+ma'i chu ba mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gter chen po so sor rnyed 
[\[197a.6\]]do/_/gnod sbyin spyan drang bar 'dod pas/_gu gul dang /_gtum po'i sa bon dang /_sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_gnod sbyin rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/_ci bsgo ba byed cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur 
[\[197a.7\]]ro/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can ma spyan drang bar 'dod pas 'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i dri dang /_pri yang ku'i kar bI ra'i shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na de'i 'og tu 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]'dod pa'i gzugs can ma 'ongs te/_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod par byed do/_/rnam pa gsum brjod par bya ste/_ma dang /_chung ma dang /_sring mo'o/_/gal te ma yin na bu la zhen pas/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_longs spyod chen po rnam par 'phel zhing phun sum 
[\[197b.2\]]tshogs par byed de/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi 'bral bar kun du gnas par byed do/_/gal te chung ma yin na/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba du mas rtse zhing /_longs spyod la yongs su spyod par byed de/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang /_rgyan dang /_
[\[197b.3\]]lhab lhub dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mal stan dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba dang bcas pa rnam par 
[\[197b.4\]]'phel ba la yongs su spyod de/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/gal te sring mo yin na de'i tshe/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang /_lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod la 
[\[197b.5\]]yongs su spyod cing /_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed do/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog pa la phub ma dang /_lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis dpag tshad brgya stong phrag gi nang du dgra mi 'byung ste/_sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na g.yul dang 'khrug pa 
[\[197b.6\]]chen po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma 'bab par byed pa la/_ri'i rtse mor sbrang rtsi dang /_na le sham dang /_'bras thug po che dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nyin re re zhing nyi ma 'bab par byed do/_/mchog thams cad rjes su stsol bar byed cing /_ji 
[\[197b.7\]]srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dod pa tsam gyis bsnyen bkur dang /_rim gro byed cing nye bar gnas so/_/zla ba dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par 'dod pas gnas mthon por tsha ba gsum dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_lan tshwa dang /_'o ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]pa'i sbyin sreg byas na zla ba dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par byed de/_'dod pa dang /_yid kyi shing rta dang /_bskal pa dang /_dbang phyug thams cad cher 'phel ba rab tu sbyin no/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas te/_ji srid 
[\[198a.2\]]'tsho'i bar du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_spa ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma re re zhing mthong bar 'dod na 'bab par byed do/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi 
[\[198a.3\]]dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje rigs dang /_dmangs rigs thams cad 'gugs pa la til dang /_yungs kar dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_sman sna tshogs 
[\[198a.4\]]dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/_'gugs pa chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur te/_'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa 'khor du 
[\[198a.5\]]'gyur te/_rtag tu de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur la ngag gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid kyis sam nor gyis kyang rung ste/_thams cad du bla ma gcig pur mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so//_//
[\[198a.6\]]de nas mig 'phrul bshad par bya ste/_don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched du las thams cad byed pa/_dge ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi bde ba sbyin pa/_rtag tu dbul po rnams kyis bde ba thob par byed 
[\[198a.7\]]pa'o/_/de nas rtogs pa'i mod la 'bru mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma nyid du mchod par bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_dbang phyug sbyin zhing /_longs spyod chen po 'phel ba dang /_rgyal po'i bde ba dang ldan pa dang phyogs 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]phyogs su rab mchog sbyin par byed do/_/gi wang dang /_cu gang dang /_ldong ros dang /_mu zi dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_li kha ra dang /_gur gum dang /_rgya mtsho lbu ba dang /_gnyis dang /_gser gyi 'dab ma stong phrag sbyar te/_phye ma 
[\[198b.2\]]shin tu zhib mor byas la legs par bsgongs lag pur dang /_gla rtsi tsam gyi blangs la/_sngags kyi stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa/_mkhas pas rnam pa gsum du sbyar bar bya ste/_skye bos gang ba nyid la lnga mnyam pa'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mig 
[\[198b.3\]]sman gyi snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mig la byug par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po'i dbus su nam mkha' la nye bar gnas par byed do/_/hU~M yig gis mthong bar bya'o/_/nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do/_/gnas par byed do/_/nyal bar byed do/_/
[\[198b.4\]]rgyug par byed do/_/bskus na lus la me 'bar bar mthong ste/_de ston par byed do/_/du ba'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed do/_/rkang pa'i mthil la kun du byugs na/_chu bo dang /_chu klung chen po'i steng nas 'gro ste rkang pa la chus gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/me chen po 'bar 
[\[198b.5\]]ba'i nang du 'jug ste/_sreg par mi byed cing /_ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang 'byi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phye mas phyogs bzhir nam mkha' kun du gtor na/_me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i char gyi rgyun ltung bar byed do/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang 
[\[198b.6\]]mthong bar byed do/_/lus mtha' dag la byug par bya zhing /_skye bo'i mig sman bsku zhing phye mas gtor nas/_ljongs chen po'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/_de cung zad kyang mi mthong ngo /_/ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du rmongs pa chen po'i sgyu ma ston par byed de/_rgyal 
[\[198b.7\]]po dang /_dmag sde chen po dang /_drang srong gi gzugs dang /_gser gyi bum pa can dang /_mi'i seng ge dang /_phag dang /_dga' byed kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rol snyed ma phrogs pa dang /_zla 'od mgo bo yongs su gtong ba ston par byed do/_/'joms pa dang /_gsod 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]pa dang /_srog 'dor ba ston par byed do/_/me tog gi char ram/_'bras bu'i char ram/_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba dang /_'bru'i char ston par byed do/_/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam 'gyur rnams ston par byed de/_gzhal med khang chen po'i 
[\[199a.2\]]rnam pa rnams bsams pa tsam gyis ston par byed do/_/dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug na/_rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa ya ma zung gzhal du med pa ston par byed do/_/bdag nyid kyi mgo bo la bskus nas mgrin pa tsam gyis dri za/_til mar 
[\[199a.3\]]bsgos pa'i phye mas gtor bar bya zhing /_mig sman gyis byug par bya/_phye mas lus mtha' dag la bdug par bya rkang pa la byug par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na yang dag par shes bzhin dang /_zhi ba dang /_dul ba dang /_zung tsam du mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[199a.4\]]zhugs pa tsam gyis me'i khams su mthong bar byed do/_/sems par mthong bar byed do/_/nam mkha' la gnas par byed do/_/'chag par byed do/_/'dug par byed cing mal stan la rtog par byed do/_/'ong bar byed cing 'gro bar byed do/_/me tog 'bab 
[\[199a.5\]]par byed do/_/nam mkha' la rnga'i sgra ston par byed do/_/rig byed bzhi ba'i nang du shing arka'i 'o mas bsgos nas byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do/_/lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do/_/ji 
[\[199a.6\]]lta ji ltar yid la byed bzhin pa'i b+hA ra ta dang /_dga' byed rnams mthong bar byed do/_/'khor chen po'i dbus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gar mkhan rnams su ston par byed do/_/rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbus su/_lha'i gar mkhan 
[\[199a.7\]]sna tshogs pa rnams su mthong bar byed do/_/gling gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sna tshogs pa dang /_mAn d+hA ta dang /_yid ldan dang /_shing rta bcu pa dang /_rin chen 'od dang /_drag pos 'od byin dang /_mi bdag dang /_mnga' bdag dang /_tshong bdag 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]ded dpon dang /_zhi ba dang /_mche bzang dang /_snying rje can dang /_pad+ma dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig pa'i gar mkhan rnams su mthong ngo /_/rin po che'i char dang /_gos kyi char dang /_spud pa'i char dang /_lhab lhub kyi char mthong bar byed do/_/me 
[\[199b.2\]]tog gi gzhal med khang dang /_'bras bu'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do/_/gzhal med khang la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa mthong par byed do/_/de ltar na mig sman dang phye ma mthu chen po bsku ba dang sbyor bas gzhal med khang dang /_gar mkhan dang /_
[\[199b.3\]]gzhal med khang mthong bar byed de/_ji srid sgra sgrogs dang /_'jigs byed dang /_bum pa dang /_gzhal med khang mthong ba dang /_ha nu ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed pa dang /_gar mkhan rmongs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do/_/ji srid 
[\[199b.4\]]bdud 'joms pa la sogs pa dmag sde sna tshogs pa'i mchog gi gzugs kyi bar du mthong bar byed do/_/stobs dang /_brtson 'grus chen po mthong bar byed do/_/mig sman dang phye ma'i sbyor ba gsum gyi dngos grub ni/_bsku ba dang /_bklags pa dang /_yang 
[\[199b.5\]]dag par sbyar bas tshe'i dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro/_/sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa 'grub ste/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum 
[\[199b.6\]]du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa'i cho ga rmongs pa chen po'i cho ga'o//_//de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang /_don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dngos grub dang /_rig pa 
[\[199b.7\]]'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid bla na med pa'o/_/dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/_'dod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang /_don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang /_sngags kyi 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]dngos grub dang /_mchog gi dngos grub dang /_gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang /_sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par byed pa grub pa/_sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba rmad du byung ba/_byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed 
[\[200a.2\]]pa/_rdo rje gdan gyi gnas su yang dag par lhag par gnas pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa/_bdud 'joms shing tshar gcod pa/_bgegs thams cad lhung bar byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnas mthong bar byed pa/_de nyid las de bzhin 
[\[200a.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba'o/_/de nas po Ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas/_don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/_skad cig la mnar med 
[\[200a.4\]]pa'i gnas dang /_mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas de bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel 
[\[200a.5\]]ba de gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang /_de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs dang /_de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang /_de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gcig pur zhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen 
[\[200a.6\]]po dang mnyam pa'i gnas/_de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas thams cad du son pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa/_dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa'i gnas/_yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[200a.7\]]par byed pa/_re ba phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po 'di ni byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te/_sems can thams cad rtag tu sgrol bar byed pa/_don yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med pa'o/_/bsod nams 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i gnas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po'i gnas/_chos kyi mdzod dang rtag tu mnyam pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzod/_mdzod chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi mdzod la 
[\[200b.2\]]mkhas pa rtag tu pad+ma'i mdzod/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod/_rdo rje'i mdzod/_de bzhin du nor bu chen po nyid kyi mdzod/_rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab pa/_mi g.yo ba/_mi 'gul ba/_zil gyis mi non pa'o/_/bdud dang /_log 
[\[200b.3\]]par 'dren pa/_bgegs dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_srin po thams cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/de la mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnyed dka' zhing bla na med pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste/_ba byung 
[\[200b.4\]]dang yang dag par ldan pa/_khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bya'o/_/yang na khru brgyad par bya ste/_de phyed dang gnyis kyi khru'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam par phye ste gdab par bya'o/_/grwa bzhi mnyam par phye ba/_logs bzhi legs par rnam par phye ba/_shin tu 'jam pa/_
[\[200b.5\]]shin tu legs par bcags pa/_bsnyen la 'jam shing brgyan pa/_sa gzhi bai DUr+ya'i kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa thig gis char rnam pa dbye bar bya ste/_sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba/_skud pa la tshon sna lnga byin te/_dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par 
[\[200b.6\]]rnam par dbye'o/_/khru gnyis kyi tshad kyis re khA lnga rnam par dbye'o/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste/_dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la/_don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor bya ste/_pad+ma phyed kha bye pa'i pad+ma'i 
[\[200b.7\]]'dab ma'i steng du/_pad+ma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste/_bde ba'i gzugs dang mtshan gyis brgyan pa/_gtsug tor gyi rnam pa 'bar ba'i snying po la khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri'o/_/gzhogs g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gzugs ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa dbul 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can no/_/gzhogs g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa dang rgyan bcings pa/_'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbu la pad+ma 
[\[201a.2\]]gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o/_/phyi rol du tsam pa ka dang /_bAr+Shi ka dang /_ut+pal sngon po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i grwa bzhi'i gnas rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/_go cha dang ya lad 
[\[201a.3\]]bgos pa drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i snying po'i lus so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi re khA sngon ma la/_rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i re khA 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/re khA rim par phye ba gnyis pa la me tog gi re khA bri bar bya'o/_/gsum pa la 
[\[201a.4\]]nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud pa re khA bri bar bya'o/_/re khA bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/_/re khA lnga pa la kha khyer gyi rnam pa bri bar bya ste/_tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba rnam par bkra ba'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i khor yug tu mtshan 
[\[201a.5\]]ma'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnams su gnod sbyin chen po bzhi bya ste/_drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can mche ba gtsigs pa bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba bum pa gang ba thogs pa/_skra brdzes pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis 
[\[201a.6\]]rnam par brgyan pa thod pa'i cod pan can 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can ri bo'i gdan la gnas par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi re khA'i phyi rol du phreng gsum 'gyur du bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_bAr+Shi ka dang /_a d+hi muk+ta ka 
[\[201a.7\]]rnams rnam par dbye bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar byas nas shin tu rnam par phye ba/_shin tu mkhas pa dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan dang /_rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa/_khor yug tu mda' dang /_tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]par bkra ba'i ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_bla re dang /_dar dpyangs dang /_khor yug tu bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang /_gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug dang /_de bzhin du bdug pa'i snod bcu drug dang /_gzhong pa bcu drug tu rab tu brjod do/_/kham por 
[\[201b.2\]]bcu drug tu bshad pa dang /_dri sna tshogs pa'i snod dang /_lhung bzed bcu drug nyid dang /_mchod yon gyi snod bcu drug dang /_dngul gyi snod bzhi dang /_dri'i phye ma rnams bzhag cing gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug bzhag nas pog phor bzhi'i nang du tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang du ru ska 
[\[201b.3\]]dang pog dang /_gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing de bzhin du spr-i ka dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_gur gum dang /_gla rtsi dang /_bo la dang /_ga pur tsam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi byug pa 'di nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/tsan+dan dang /_gur gum 
[\[201b.4\]]dang /_de bzhin du dzai g+ha dang /_bal+li ka'i phye ma rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar ba 'dis phye mar sbyar bas bsgos pa'o/_/me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram zhing ji ltar 'dod pa/_ji ltar stong pa dang /_ji ltar thob pa'i me tog mdzes pa mngon par gtor bar bya'o/_/
[\[201b.5\]]dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu dri'i chus gang ba'i bum pa ma reg pa dang gser dang /_dngul las byung ba'i snod gsar pa nyid dang /_zangs dang sa las byung ba'i mchog dang /_dri sna tshogs sbyar bas dgang bar bya'o/_/bum pa dang bkra shis bcing bar bya zhing pi wang dang /_gos 
[\[201b.6\]]bzang po dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/ring bsrel pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas bum pa dang /_gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_gdu bu byas nas gzhag par bya'o/_/dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du snying po dang /_nye ba'i snying 
[\[201b.7\]]po nyid kyi gsang sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas so/_/de nas gtor ma'i las la mnyam par bzhag nas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_dkar po dang /_de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang sna tshogs pa'i ro gzhag par bya'o/_/rnam pa sna tshogs su 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]phye ba'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang /_sna tshogs pa'i kha dog dang ro nyid dang sna tshogs pa'i yul du rgyu ba ste/_'di ni gtor mar brjod de/_'byor ba'i gtor mar bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan gdags te sna tshogs 
[\[202a.2\]]pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po dang /_sna tshogs pa'i lo ma sngon po'i phreng ba dang /_mar me'i phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang /_ji ltar rnyed pa'i mar dang til mar gyis kun nas bkang ba brgya rtsa brgyad do/_/bdag dngos grub 'dod pa rnams phye dang /_la phug dang /_dkar dang /_la du dang /_
[\[202a.3\]]sran ma mud ga'i la du dang /_'bras bu rnams de bzhin du log 'dren la gtor mar byin pas las thams cad bde blag tu 'grub bo/_/phye'i zan dang /_zho'i nying khu dang /_lo ma sngon po nyid gnod sbyin dang /_srin po kun nas phyogs bzhir gnas pa rnams la gtor 
[\[202a.4\]]mar sbyin par bya'o/_/zho'i zan dang 'o ma yang ste/_'di ni 'byung po'i gtor mar bshad do/_/lo ma'i gong bu dang /_phye dang /_'bras thug po che'i zan dang /_de bzhin du 'khur ba zlum po ste/_'di ni phyogs bzhir [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang sha za rnams la gtor mar sbyin 
[\[202a.5\]]par bya'o/_/'bras thug po che dang /_'o ma'i zan ni zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i tshogs kyis lhan cig pa'i lha dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gtor mar bya'o/_/rtag tu tsan+dan gyi chu dang /_de bzhin du me tog dang 'o ma'i zan ni mtshan mo'i lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste las kyi dngos grub bla na 
[\[202a.6\]]med pa'o/_/'bru bdun mdzes pa chen po dang /_shing snu ha mchog tu mdzes pa/_'bras A ma khu bskol ba mdzes pa dang /_zho dang 'o ma so sor mnyam pa dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam pa bdun po sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/_/sa kurba 
[\[202a.7\]]dang /_rtsab mo dang /_'bras thug po che btsos pa'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di rlung lha'i gtor mar brjod de/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dgyes par byed do/_/zho dang 'o ma bskol ba dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_hwags dang bcas shing bu ram dang bcas par ldan pa 'khur ba zlum po 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]dang /_mar gyis gang ba'i 'khur ba 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi gtor mar brjod de las thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/'khur ba zlum po dang /_ba byung lnga dang /_pu shel tse dang /_ma la ya'i tsan+dan dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_zhabs bsil dang /_mchod yon rnams bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[202b.2\]]la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/_/gur gum gyi chu dang 'bras thug po che la dri bzang pos bsgos te/_chu klung gi rgyal po la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/_/thams cad du las thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/rtswa dUr ba'i chu dang /_'o ma dang /_gtum pa'i sa bon btsos pa dang /_'bras thug 
[\[202b.3\]]po che ni tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang /_gsang ba pa rnams la gtor mar dbul bar bya ste thams cad rig pas so/_/'di ni gtor mar brjod de/_bgegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa la bgegs rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dga' bar 'gyur te the tsom med do/_/
[\[202b.4\]]de'i phyir rig sngags 'chang mkhas pas thams cad legs par bsgrub par bya'o/_/zho dang 'o ma dang 'o thug dang /_bu ram dang mar dang /_li kha ra dang ldan pa 'dis bdag skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste/_tshe'i dngos grub dang /_de bzhin du rgyas pa dang /_
[\[202b.5\]]zhi ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad zlog par byed do/_/'di ni gtor mar brjod de rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi bde ba thob pa'o/_/bya ba gang yin pa de rnams la bdag gi gtor mthun gsum du byas na/_rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags bde blag tu 
[\[202b.6\]]'grub ste the tsom med do/_/de'i bgegs thams cad dang sdig pa dang /_sdang ba rnams nam yang bar du gcod par mi nus te nam yang phyis sdig pa mi 'byung ngo /_/rtag tu gtor ma rgyas pa thob par byed cing /_stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang thams cad thogs pa med 
[\[202b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu byed bzhin pa'i rig sngags smra ba'i mkhas pa de bgegs rnams thams cad kyis de nam du yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang sha zas sdang bar byed pa med do/_/nad med cing rgyal po'i dpal min med la 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]skem byed dang /_skem pa med la brjed byed dang /_klu dang /_gza' dang /_rims med cing thams cad kyi tshe cung zad kyang med do/_/dug med cing sbyar ba'i dug nyid kyang med la byad stems thams cad kyang nam yang mi yong ste/_kun nas dpag tshad stong 
[\[203a.2\]]phrag tu ring du 'bros par byed do/_/kun nas stobs nyid rgyas pa dang de bzhin du yang dga' ba dang /_de bzhin du yang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 
[\[203a.3\]]byed do/_/tshe ring du 'phel zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha gang yin pa yang dri yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing de rnams thams cad kyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du stobs dang brtson 'grus 'phel bar byed par the tsom med do/_/de 
[\[203a.4\]]la dgra mi 'byung zhing nam du yang phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo med de phyag rgya 'dzin pa nyid med kyang dkyil 'khor gyi mchog tu zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la'am/_yang na 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam la de rnams kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[203a.5\]]brgya stong phrag bcu'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/_ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 
[\[203a.6\]]yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig 
[\[203a.7\]]gsang ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags rnams kyi dngos grub chen po so sor rnyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ris thun mong ba'i tshogs bsdus pa'i sar bgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas na gnas pa dang /_lha'i 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]dbang po brgya byin dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig thams cad du srung pa dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po du ma rig pa 'dzin pa byed pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing rtag 
[\[203b.2\]]tu rjes su 'brang ba rnams srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/stobs chen po dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang mdangs kyi rnam pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyi mod la bskal pa bye bar brgyud 
[\[203b.3\]]nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams dang mnar med pa la gzhol ba de thams cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/don yod pa'i bya ba'i dngos grub so sor rnyed do/_/
[\[203b.4\]]sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa'i dri ma dang ser sna'i dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad dga' ba dang bla ma chen po mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par yang 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa 
[\[203b.5\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchog stsol bar byed cing bla mar 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'phos te skye ba rje ba na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[203b.6\]]pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bla mar shes par bya/_mchod par bya/_'od dpag med dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mthu chen thob kyi bkod pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/des na rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa 
[\[203b.7\]]byas nas kun nas mtshams bcing ba byas shing /_srung ba'i cho ga byas la bdag bcing ba dang /_gtsug tor bcing ba dang mtshams bcing ba byas te/_de'i 'og tu kha shar du phyogs te dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug la don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]tor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus su tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba pad+ma dang
