[\[204a.2\]]zhags pa thogs te/_bzhengs nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs par mdzad de rig sngags 'chang la bka' stsal pa/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_khyod kyis rig pa 'dzin pa grub po don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjes su zung 
[\[204a.3\]]shig_/rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi mngal du gnas pa'i skye ba'i tha ma yin te skye ba rjes nas thams cad du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du tshe rabs 
[\[204a.4\]]dran par 'gyur zhing thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba nas skye ba thams cad du don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mtha' dag kha ton du byed do/_/don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa kha ton du kun tu gnas so/_/de nas 
[\[204a.5\]]rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bya/_a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/_me tog ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya/_gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/_de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[204a.6\]]dbang phyug mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu byas nas rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/don yod pa'i gtsug tor pad+ma dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/_rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis yongs su 
[\[204a.7\]]bskor bar 'gyur zhing pad+ma'i ris kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe lo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o//_//de nas de'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pas ras khru bzhi pa byas nas sam yang na dar la bal tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ste/_lha'i gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa phyag gnyis pa 'od zer gyis 'khor bar bya'o/_/ras ris sgrub pa ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la tshon lhag ma 
[\[204b.2\]]min pa snod gsar bar bzhag pas ri mo mkhan gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pas 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su bskor ba bya ste/_khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang 
[\[204b.3\]]ba kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can phyag bzhi pa/_zhal gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa zla ba tshes pas spras pa/_'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang ba mdung rtse gsum 'chang ba/_pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnam par bkra ba'i pad+ma'i zhags pa 'chang ba/_phyag g.yon par pad+ma 
[\[204b.4\]]'chang ba pad+ma'i steng du pad+ma gtsug tor bya'o/_/'dab ma phyed kha bye ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgul yan chad tsam cod pan 'chang ba dbu 'bar ba'i snying por yod par bri bar bya'o/_/phyag gcig ni dbugs 'byin pa 
[\[204b.5\]]'chang zhing rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/_'bar ba'i snying po can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa sna tshogs pa'i gos 'chang ba bya'o/_/pad+ma'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo mgo bo dgu pa/_klus yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa thal mo 'chang zhing lus 
[\[204b.6\]]phyed par bya'o/_/nya dang chu srin dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_nor bu shel dang /_ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_shang shang te'us yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha khyer dang bcas pas spras pa'o/_/gzhogs g.yas su sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_thal mo sbyar ba smad de 'dzin pa/_
[\[204b.7\]]'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can bya'o/_/g.yon du gos dkar mo gos dkar po 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can thal mo snang de 'chang ba'o/_/gzhogs g.yas su khro gnyer can skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dkar 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]sham ma gos dkar po 'chang ba bya'o/_/g.yon du srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma bya ste/_phyag brgyad pa drag mo drag tu rgod pa'i pho nya mo bya'o/_/bzhin khro gnyer can thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad pad+ma'i 
[\[205a.2\]]gdan la bzhugs pa bya'o/_/steng du tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha'i dbang po rnams nam mkha' nas bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/_/'og tu pad+ma la gshin rje dang chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang gzhon nu rnams khrus bya 
[\[205a.3\]]ste skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams bya ste/_drag po'i gzugs skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs te de rnams thams cad kyang pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[205a.4\]]gi zhabs drung du pad+ma'i gdan la rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/_pog phor dang lag na me tog gi phor pa dang /_bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o/_/de lta bu'i ras ris kyi bya ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang /_
[\[205a.5\]]ras ris dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi nang du gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la sdug bsngal dang sdig pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_/thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/nyes par byas pa thams cad 
[\[205a.6\]]'joms par yang 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang mtshams med pa lnga las rnam par thar bar byed do/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la don yod pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo/_sems can thams cad kyis kun du bskor bar bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/dgongs pa thams 
[\[205a.7\]]cad legs par grub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/nor dang /_gzugs byed pa dang /_bkra shis dang /_longs spyod dang /_rigs dang /_dbang phyug dang /_stobs dang /_spobs pa dang /_bsod nams dang /_skal ba bzang por byed pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi bye 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]brag 'phel ba dang bsod nams bsags pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phel pa dang phun sum tshogs par byed do/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la las su bya bar 'os pa'i bya ba thams cad byed do/_/de ltar ras ris mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yon tan gyi bye brag lhag par rtogs par 
[\[205b.2\]]'gyur ro zhes so/_/ras ris sgrub pa'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o//_//de nas phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/_phyag rgya rnams kyi don yod pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba phyag rgya chen po bla na med pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rgyas btab pa/_sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa don 
[\[205b.3\]]yod pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dang sgrub thabs thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/_sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa/_phyag rgya gzung ba tsam gyis mnar med pa yang skems par byed pa dmyal ba pa rnams skems par byed pa ste/_
[\[205b.4\]]gang gis gzung ba tsam la sogs pas dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar byed cing skems par byed do/_/dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu kun du gzigs par 'gyur 
[\[205b.5\]]te the tshom med do/_/dus gsum pa'i rgyal ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang /_de bzhin du pad+ma'i phyag gi rtag tu mchog sbyin pa dang rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing dga' ba dang /_'og min gyi lha dang lha'i dbang po brgya 
[\[205b.6\]]byin dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad kyis srung bar byed cing kun nas yongs su skyong bar byed de/_thams cad la cho ga bzhin du bdag nyid kyi snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du dge ba dang zhi ba dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus nyid dang /_mdangs kyang rab tu 'jug par 
[\[205b.7\]]byed cing de bzhin du yang tshe 'phel lo/_/phyag rgya 'di rnams bzung bas bkra mi shis pa thams cad nyams par byed do/_/bgegs thams cad nyams par byed cing /_bdud dang /_log par 'dren pa dang /_gdug pa'i gnod sbyin rnam par nyams par byed do/_/gdug pa'i srin po 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa'i skad cig de la mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas shing mig 'byin par byed do/_/brgya byin dang tshogs dang bcas pa'i gdug pa thams cad rab tu nyams par byed do/_/de'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin par byed 
[\[206a.2\]]pa la lag pa'i thal mo pad+ma 'dra ba pad+ma 'byung ba'i gtsug tor don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas sdigs mdzub yongs su dkris la mthe bong gi sor mo dang /_gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug ste ming med dang /_mthe'u chung lag pa'i nang du bcug 
[\[206a.3\]]nas rtag tu snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/_'di ni don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag rgyar brjod do/_/de bzung ba tsam dang phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags brjod pa nyid kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[206a.4\]]thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te char 'bab par byed do/_/me tog gi char dang /_lha rdzas kyi gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char bab bo/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas 
[\[206a.5\]]pa thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi phung po chen po stong phrag bskyed do/_/phyag rgya de bzung ba tsam gyis skad cig de la phyag rgya gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangs su bgrangs pa'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya bzung [(]btsas [,]ba tsam [)]gyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[206a.6\]]pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis rlob bo/_/ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i phung por byas te/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa so so so so la phul ba dang /_rgyal ba thams cad kyi 
[\[206a.7\]]bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tsom med do zhes so/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las g.yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyangs te rtsa ba'i 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gsang sngags lan cig brjod do/_/phyag rgya 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bya ste/_thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed do/_/phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis kyang bsod 
[\[206b.2\]]nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang spyan ras gzigs don yod pa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung 
[\[206b.3\]]ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang dang po bcings pa tsam gyis ri rab chen po ltar 'gyur te/_bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad dang /_'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad kyis mi 'gul zhing mi 
[\[206b.4\]]g.yo la zil gyis mi non par yang 'gyur ro/_/phyir rgol ba dang dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad nas yongs su grol lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i drung du dge ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po kun 
[\[206b.5\]]du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i lhag par 'dren pa 'di 'ching bzhin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gang cung 
[\[206b.6\]]zad yod pa de mig gis gsal bar mthong ngo /_/thams cad du rab tu 'ching zhing 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_phyag stong gi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_nor bu'i rigs kyi 
[\[206b.7\]]dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_don yod zhags pa'i yangs pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang /_rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_mgrin sngon gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_gzhan phyag rgya'i 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]dam tshig gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'di gcig pu bcings pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur la/_kun du bcangs pa dang mchod par yang 'gyur ro/_/'di ni 
[\[207a.2\]]phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gdugs gcig pur gyur pa ste/_ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bzhin du phyag rgya 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/_las 
[\[207a.3\]]thams cad la phyag rgya 'di sbyar na/_gang dang gang la rab tu sbyar ba de thogs pa med par 'grub bo/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam pa tsam du bkug pa 'di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya 'di spyan drang ba dang /_bod pa dang yang dag 
[\[207a.4\]]par bskul ba dang /_mchod pa'i sprin nyid kyang yin te/_dam tshig dang /_phyag byed pa dang /_'jug pa dang /_bskor ba byed pa nyid dag gdan dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_mtshams bcing bzhes pa dang /_gtsug tor bcing ba dang /_bdag srung 
[\[207a.5\]]pa dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang /_khrus dang /_gos bgo ba dang /_nye reg byed pa nyid dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_de bzhin du sngags bzlas pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gtor ma 'bul ba'i las dang /_
[\[207a.6\]]de bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba nyid dang /_de bzhin du 'gugs pa ste/_thams cad la phyag rgya 'di bya'o/_/sa bcu gnon pa'i phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags bcu la yang phyag rgya 'di bya ste/_snying po dang /_nye ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/khro bo'i 
[\[207a.7\]]rgyal po nyid dang /_mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /_rigs kyi gsang sngags dang /_gzhan la yang phyag rgya 'di dang /_phyag rgya 'di'i snying po dang /_nye ba'i snying po nyid kyang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /_rigs kyi gsang sngags gzhan 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]la yang gnas thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o zhes so/_/phyag rgya'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o//_//phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa/_/phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan/_/bzang po gtso bo chen po ste/_/mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no/_/phyag rgya gya nom bla na med/_/'jig 
[\[207b.2\]]rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/_/snying po de nyid gyur pa ste/_/phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di/_/dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs/_/kun gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/phyag rgya dus gsum gshegs pa yi/_/de bzhin 
[\[207b.3\]]gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa/_/thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi/_/gsang nyid kun du bzhugs pa yin/_/de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid/_/dngos grub bla med bshad par bya/_/o~M a mo g+ha hr-i 
[\[207b.4\]]da ya pad+ma uSh+NI Sha sA d+ha ya/_b+ha ra sa ma b+ha ra/_ma hA pad+me swA hA/_bskur ba la dang spyan drang ba dang /_gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha maN+Da le hU~M/_dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_dri chab dang /_chu dang /_
[\[207b.5\]]yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o/_/o~M pad+ma shi kha re hU~M/_spyi gtsug bcing ba yin te/_lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/_/o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha dza le hU~M/_khrus bya ba'i sngags te yungs kar dang /_chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas 
[\[207b.6\]]pas so/_/o~M bi ma le shud d+he hU~M/_nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/_/o~M saM ts+tsha da ya pad+me hU~M/_gos bgo ba'i sngags so/_/o~M mi li mi li shud d+he hU~M/_lus yongs su sbyang ba'i sngags te/_ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/_/o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha a b+hi 
[\[207b.7\]]Shiny+tsa At+ma shud d+he hU~M/_dbang bskur ba'i sngags te dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/_/o~M pad+ma ka ba tse dr-i D+ha ba na d+ha hU~M dz+wa la swA hA/_go cha'i sngags te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so/_/o~M badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na pad+me hU~M/_byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/_/
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]oM dz+wa la pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/_sa'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma a shra ya/_ru ha tsa la tsa la hU~M/_gdan gyi sngags so/_/o~M di bya pad+me ma~M/_me tog gi sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma a mo g+ha saM ba ra ni swA hA/_bdug spos kyi sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma gan d+ha I shwa ri hU~M/_byug 
[\[208a.2\]]spos kyi sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma pra kir+Na d+ha ra Ni so me swA hA/_'bras yos dang me tog dgram ba'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma dza le su gan d+ha ba ti hU~M/_mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M shu ga la bA re rA sa ya shud d+he hU~M/_lha bshos kyi sngags so/_/o~M su ru su ru ku ma b+ha ba ti swA 
[\[208a.3\]]hA/_gtor ma'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA pad+ma a shi ni sA d+ha ya hU~M/_gtor ma zar gzhug pa'i sngags so/_/oM pha la bi shud d+he pra ba ra hU~M/_'bras bu'i sngags so/_/o~M pra bar puSh+pe dza ya swA hA/_phreng ba'i sngags so/_/o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la ya ra sa ra gr-i Ni hU~M/_gtor 
[\[208a.4\]]ma bcos pa'i sngags so/_/oM pad+ma dI pa ya dz+wa la hU~M/_mar me'i sngags so/_/o~M sa ma pad+ma b+hu ba ne Shu sa ra hU~M/_'jug pa'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha mu ni hU~M/_phyag bya ba'i sngags so/_/o~M tsakra maN+Da le sa man+ta pad+me hU~M/_bskor ba'i 
[\[208a.5\]]sngags so/_/o~M sa man+ta pra kir NA pad+me saM b+ha ra hU~M/_me tog dor ba'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma sa ma ya uSh+NI Sha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya hU~M/_dam tshig gi sngags so/_oM sa man+ta sA d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra pad+me hU~M phaT/_skyil mo krung gi sngags so/_/o~M a pa ri mi tA dz+wa la 
[\[208a.6\]]pad+me hU~M/_bgrang phreng gi sngags so/_/o~M sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa li ta pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/_bzlas brjod kyi sngags so/_/o~M sa man+ta da R+Sha pad+me hU~M/_rmi lam gyi sngags so/_/o~M sa man+ta rak+Sha ra k+Sha ni pad+me hU~M/_srung ba'i sngags so/_/oM sa man+ta me ru dr-i D+ha s+shi ri hU~M/_ra ba'i 
[\[208a.7\]]sngags so/_/o~M sa man+ta dz+wa lA ma la gar+b+he/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ma hA pad+me dz+wa le hU~M/_me'i sngags so/_/o~M d+hu ru d+hu ru pra sa ra/_d+hu sa ri man tre swA hA/_sbyin sreg gi sngags so/_/o~M sa man+ta pra dz+wa li te b+hud d+he sa ma ya hU~M/_sreg blugs kyi sngags so/_/o~M sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]gu h+ye bA yu dzA be pad+ma be gi ni swA hA/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so/_/o~M shu b+ha sha sta d+hA ri Ni pad+ma b+hu dze hU~M/_mtshon cha'i sngags so/_/o~M saman+ta a kaR+Sha Ni pra sa ra gu h+ye hU~M/_drang ba'i sngags so/_/na mo tri b+hu ba na/_I shwa rA ya/_lo ke shwa rA ya/_ma he shwa rA ya/_d+ha 
[\[208b.2\]]ra d+ha ra/_sa man+ta/_a ba lo ki ta/_gu h+ye/_A gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_ma hA bi ri/_ma Ni ka na ka badzra bai DUr+ya/_ma ra ka ta pad+ma rA ga_/in+d+ra nI le/_ma hA muk+ti kA/_bi b+hU Shi ta sha rI ra/_ma hA pad+ma b+hu dza/_a mo g+ha pra sha d+ha ra/_sa mat+na/_a ba lo ki 
[\[208b.3\]]ta/_ba ra dA ba ra dA ya ka/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_sa man+ta/_a ba lo ki ta/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_b+ha ga bA na/_shI g+h+rAM sa ma ya/_ma nu sma ra/_bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/_ya ma ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_na ma skr-i ta/_I shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_pad+me shwa ra/_e hi b+ha ga pA na/_shI g+h+raM 
[\[208b.4\]]A gats+tsha/_sarba bid+yA maN+Da la/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_da ri sha na swa p+na/_bi bi d+ha te dza d+ha ra/_sa man+ta rash+mi/_dz+wa la gar+b+ha sha rI ra/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/_sau ma s+ya mu kha/_pa ri pU ra Na/_tsan+d+ra maN+Da la/_na ba tsan+d+ra dza Ta d+ha ra/_a mi tA b+ha/_mu ku Ta d+ha ra ya/_
[\[208b.5\]]ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_tri lo tsa na a mo g+ha ba ra dA/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka/_pad+ma pA sha a ba lo ki te/_shud d+ha sa twa/_ba ra dA ya/_na mo stu te swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/rig sngags 'dis 
[\[208b.6\]]gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o/_/bdugs pa tsam gyi mod nyid la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par mdzad cing /_mchog thams 
[\[208b.7\]]cad sbyin par mdzad do/_/gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang /_bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/_dge slong tshangs par legs par spyod pa bsam pa dag pa/_dad pa can mos pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]mod nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa mngon sum du ston par mdzad cing /_mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do/_/drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing /_
[\[209a.2\]]'dod pa dang /_dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/sred med kyi bu la bdugs na gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing /_tshig 'byin la yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/_rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_stobs dang /_shugs dang /_
[\[209a.3\]]brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon par byed pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do/_/ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po la bdugs na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 'dug la las dang bya ba thams cad grub par byed/_thams cad du dngos grub chen 
[\[209a.4\]]po sgrub par byed do/_/tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na sdang ba dang /_gdug pa dang /_bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing 
[\[209a.5\]]mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du gyur te/_nye bar gnas pa 'dod pa dang bya ba thams cad byed do/_/nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na nyi ma 'bab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub 
[\[209a.6\]]thams cad sbyin bar byed do/_/zla ba nyal bdugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed do/_/rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na nor 'phel ba chen po sbyin par byed do/_/lha mo chen mo dpal la bdugs na dpal 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams 
[\[209a.7\]]cad la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'bros so/_/zin pa 'am ma zin pa la bdugs na mod la 'ong ngo /_/dur khrod kyi mi ro la bdugs na ro langs ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/thod pa la bdugs na 'bab cing gar byed/_glu len rgyug par byed 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]cing sbod gtong byed do/_/rdo rje bdugs na 'bar ro/_/mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do/_/'khor lo la bdugs na nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/thag pa la bdugs na sbrul bzhin 'khril bar byed do/_/rdza ma dang /_bum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed 
[\[209b.2\]]cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do/_/lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar byed do/_/ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gor bar byed do/_/dung la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag thams cad du 'thab 
[\[209b.3\]]pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nad thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_sdig pa dang /_gdug pa thams cad dang /_dgra thams cad las thar par 'gyur 
[\[209b.4\]]zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/rims thams cad la bdugs na/_rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rims nyin bzhi pa la bdugs shing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran na rims nyin bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i mtshor bdugs na mod 
[\[209b.5\]]nyid la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed do/_/char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches pa gcod par byed do/_/sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na grang lhags dang /_rlung dang /_ser ba thams cad gcod par byed la/_lo gcig gi bar du mtshams chen po 
[\[209b.6\]]bcad par 'gyur ro/_/ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na/_phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_phas kyi dgra thams cad dang /_dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmugs pa dang /_rengs pa dang /_bcings par 'gyur la dpag tshad stong 
[\[209b.7\]]gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid la bdugs na sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bu mo la bdugs na bag mar blangs bar 'gyur ro/_/tshong zong la bdugs na rin che bar lon par 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/bang bal bdugs na 'bru 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro/_/btung ba'i gnas su bdugs na btung ba 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro/_/gos la bdugs na gos thob par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs nas gang la byin pa de dag bdag nyid dam 
[\[210a.2\]]nor gyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyur ro/_/phreng ba la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gang gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing /_ya mtshan byung ba dang 'byung ba smra'o/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na rig sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur 
[\[210a.3\]]zhing /_'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad do/_/gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/_gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur la ji srid 
[\[210a.4\]]'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/_/sbyor ba mo la bdugs na/_sbyor ba mo thams cad dang /_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/_/'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma la bdugs na 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas 
[\[210a.5\]]chung mar bya'o zhes smra na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad dang /_longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro/_/dril bu la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na 'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[210a.6\]]las thar bar 'gyur la/_srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur khyim gyi nang du dkrol na 'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_brjed byed dang /_grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur bros par 'gyur ro/_/o~M a mo g+ha pA sha pad+ma uSh+DIuSh+Ni Sha/_
[\[210a.7\]]ta ra ta ra/_a pa ta ra tu/_b+ha ba na gats+tsha tu/_swa b+hA ba na na/_tu ru tu ru/_ma hA pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/_slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/_/bdug spos gu gul dang /_chu dang yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du slar gshegs 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]su gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[210b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod de/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[210b.3\]]gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so/_/gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig 
[\[210b.4\]]sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du gzhag lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi 
[\[210b.5\]]rgyal po de'i snying po dang /_cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/_rig sngags 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur/_rig 
[\[210b.6\]]sngags 'chang gi rig sngags sgrub cing yongs su spyod pa la rim gro bgyi ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog stsol bar bgyi ba dang /_bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bskang bar bgyi ba de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 
[\[210b.7\]]mang po 'dus pa'i mngon sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig/_de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying po smras pa/_na maHstai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM shAkya rA dzA ya a d+hiSh+ThA na na 
[\[211a.2\]]ma skr-i tA nAM/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twa ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na ma stA rA yai/_ma hA de bi/_o~M twa ra Ni tA ra Ni tA re/_pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta tA re/_ma Ni ka na ka bi tsi tri ta mA la/_dza Ta ma ku Ta na na/_di ta pad+me/_d+hu ru d+hu 
[\[211a.3\]]ru/_pad+ma pA sha b+hu dze/_a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/_tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/_ma hA sid d+hi ba ra de/_tu ru tu ru/_ma hA tA ra Ni/_ba ra de/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_si da d+he/_a mo g+ha ba ra de swA hA/_o~M a mo g+ha pad+mi ni tA re swA hA/_snying po'o/_o~M ma Ni tA re hU~M/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_
[\[211a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po/_don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa cho ga zhib mo'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[211a.5\]]cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu stsal bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjes su stsal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang /_cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/_du ru ska dang /_gu gul dang /_spr-i ka gcig tu bgyis la gsang sngags kyi snying po 'dis 
[\[211a.6\]]lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang /_g.yar drangs par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis 
[\[211a.7\]]shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad bzlog par bgyi/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/_bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/_mchog stsal bar bgyi/_bde legs dang /_dge legs bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis 
[\[211b.2\]]bdag la bdugs shing /_bdag gi snying po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod dang /_dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongs su dag pa bstan cing /_mngon sum du mchis 
[\[211b.3\]]par bgyi/_mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bka' mchid bgyi'o/_/dran pa tsam gyi mod la don yod pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du mchis shing bsam 
[\[211b.4\]]pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_sdang ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/_dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/_rig 
[\[211b.5\]]sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_cho ga zhib mo dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_bsod nams dran pa'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams 
[\[211b.6\]]cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi/_rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rig sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/_nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/_
[\[211b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab pa de/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rtag tu mngon sum du bstan cing mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/_sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa shin tu dran pas dus las 'da' bar bgyis pa dang /_ji 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ltar sbrul pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal ba dang mnyam par pad+ma dag las rdzus te skye la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /_tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su 
[\[212a.2\]]bzung zhing byin gyis brlab par 'gyur/_lus rdo rjer 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chud par 'gyur/_sa bcu la gnas par yang 'gyur/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur/_dge 
[\[212a.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du ston par 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/_de bzhin 
[\[212a.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig rtogs pa dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha mo chen 
[\[212a.5\]]mo sgrol ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lha mo chen mo legs so legs so/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu legs so/_/cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang de yang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang /_
[\[212a.6\]]yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir dang /_dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha rnams kyi 
[\[212a.7\]]dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshogs kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang /_rig sngags 'chang dang dkyil 'khor kyi lha du ma dang /_nor bu bzang po'i bu dang /_lngas rtsen dang /_gar mkhan mchog dang /_stobs can dang /_stobs po che dang /_ljang sngo dang /_dung can dang /_de bzhin 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]du 'jigs byed dang /_dbyangs ldan ma dang /_dpe med ma dang /_lha mo chen mo dpal dang /_ral pa gcig ma dang /_me tog tshems te thams cad 'dus nas mthun par stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom 
[\[212b.2\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags 'chang de dang /_rig sngags smra ba rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[212b.3\]]slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di sgrub par bgyid dam/_klog par bgyid dam/_'don nam/_tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/_bcom 
[\[212b.4\]]ldan 'das de la bdag cag kun nas mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang par bgyi/_gzi brjid gzhug par bgyi/_dngos grub chen po'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_bsam pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_
[\[212b.5\]]nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/_byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du grogs po dag legs so legs so/_/khyod 
[\[212b.6\]]kyis bya ba de ltar yin te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di ngas gtams shing yongs su gtang ngo zhes bka' stsal to/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsang ba rdzogs so//_//rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan 
[\[212b.7\]]pa bklags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas mig 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag la pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur pa gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[213a.2\]]dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa dang /_phyag rgya tha dad par dang /_sngags tha dad pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_gzugs bri ba yongs su bsgrags par bgyi/_
[\[213a.3\]]sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/_rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa ni 'di lags te/_rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su stsal bar bgyi na 
[\[213a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_pad+ma'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rigs dang /_rdo rje'i rigs dang /_spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 
[\[213a.5\]]'gyur/_spyi'i byin gyis brlabs dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gzugs bri ba dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[213a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig byin gyis brlabs kyi de kho na nyid du 'gyur lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[213a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshig rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig_/ngas byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyis brlabs so/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[213b.2\]]ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_dam tshig chen por byin 
[\[213b.3\]]gyis brlabs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa/_don yod pa mthong ba'i 
[\[213b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas/_lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/_klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/_gnod sbyin dang srin po'i 
[\[213b.5\]]gnas thams cad snang bar byas/_'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/_sa'i 'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/_
[\[213b.6\]]bar snang gi gnas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por gyur pa dang /_g.yo ba'i mthu des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to/_/bskul ba tsam gyi mod nyid la/_de dag thams cad 
[\[213b.7\]]lhags te/_ri gru 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus par mthun par lhags nas 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus par mkhyen nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs la/_ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan zhing /_rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tshugs su thogs pa/_
[\[214a.2\]]tshangs pa'i gzugs can phyag bco brgyad pa rang gi ngo bo zhags pa thogs pa/_thal mo sbyar ba/_sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa/_mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_bgrang phreng bsnams pa/_pad+ma bsnams pa/_pad+ma'i phyag rgya bsnams 
[\[214a.3\]]pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /_rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/_me tog gi phur ma dang /_bI dza pU ra bsnams pa/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/_rin po che'i char 'bebs par mdzad pa/_thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/_spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/_dam 
[\[214a.4\]]tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/_pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/_rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_nor bu'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/_gzugs zhi ba/_spyan gsum pa/_mchod phyir thogs pa/_gdan pad+ma/_sku 'od 
[\[214a.5\]]zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/_sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ba/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan pos bskor ba/_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_lha'i bu dang /_
[\[214a.6\]]sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang chen dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'khod nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas/_me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la 'thor te/_
[\[214a.7\]]'di lta ste/_me tog shwa la dang /_ta ma la dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_a ti mug ta ka dang /_sho kA bar ta sha dang /_kha bye 'khyil pa dang /_gan d+ha ra Shi ka dang /_mthon ka dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_ka dam pa dang /_mdog mdzes pa dang /_
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]su ma n+ya ka dang /_sku snar dang /_cher gsal ba dang /_dri med gzi brjid dang /_dri dga' dang /_rab sim dang /_pa lA sha dang /_za ba dang /_ma raN+Da ka dang /_gzi brjid bsil dang /_dri med dang /_gzi yangs ldan dang /_shin tu bstan dang /_lha dga' 
[\[214b.2\]]dang /_yid dga' dang /_yu thi ka dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_ut+pa la dang /_ut+pa la dmar po dang /_ta ra Na gu h+ya dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed 
[\[214b.3\]]pa ni mngon sum du rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smras so/_/dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi

[\[214b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rtogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/blo gros chen po dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i tshogs

[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis da bzlas kyis/_bdag gi dgos pa thams cad grub par gyur cig/_'jigs pa thams cad du srung bar gyur cig/_//
[\[215a.2\]]tad+ya thA/_oM tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_bi ri bi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_pa ra ma ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_si ri si ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_ma hA pad+ma ha sta/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA shud d+ha/_sa twa/_eh+ye hi 
[\[215a.3\]]bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_d+hA ba d+hA ba/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hA s+tha ma prAp+ta/_tsa la tsa la/_sany+tsa la/_sany+tsa la/_bi tsa la/_bi tsa la/_e Ta Ta/_e Ta Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru 
[\[215a.4\]]Ni kA/_ma hA pa shu pa ti/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_hA hA hA hA/_hI hI hI hI/_hU hU hU hU/_o~M kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di 
[\[215a.5\]]ta sha rI ra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa/_b+ha ta bA na/_sau ma A di t+ya/_ya ma/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_brah+ma/_in+d+ra/_ri Shi/_de ba ga Na/_a b+h+yartsi ta tsa ra Na/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_pu ru pu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_sa nad ku mA ra/_ru dra bA sa ba/_biTh+Nu/_d+ha na dA/_bA yu/_de ba r-i Shi nA ya ka/_

[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]thams cad dang /_nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol/_bsrung du gsol/_gnod pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_chom rkun dang /_gnod byed dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_mtshon las yongs su thar

[\[215b.3\]]mi li mi li/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Tu Tu Tu Tu/_Thi Thi Thi Thi/_Thu Thu Thu Thu/_e ne ya tsa ra ma kri Ta/_pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma he shwa ra/_ma hA ta b+hu ta/_ga na b+hany+dza ka/_ku ru ku ru/_pa ra pa ra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_bi shud d+ha/_bi Sha ya/_ni bA 
[\[215b.4\]]sa ni/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta ya/_rat+na ma ku Ta/_mA lA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta/_dza TA ma ku Ta ma hA ta b+hu ta/_ka ma la kr-i ta/_ka ra ta la d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/_bi mo k+Sha/_a pra kam pya/_ba hu sa twa/_san+ta ti/_pa ri pA tsa ka ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/_
[\[215b.5\]]sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka/_sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/_sarba sa twa/_sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/_na mo stu te swA hA/_o~M brah+ma/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_sa man+ta/_dz+wa la a mo g+ha hU~M/_don yod pa'i snying po/_a yi ge gcig po ni kun nas gsang ba de bzhin gshegs 
[\[215b.6\]]pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang /_pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i yin te/_bklags pas grub pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge gcig po kun nas de bzhin 
[\[215b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char rab tu bab la/_kun nas rin po che'i char rab tu bab bo/_/de bzhin 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig stong kun nas gshegs nas nam mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so/_/don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po che sna bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa dang /_lha'i rin po che sna bdun 
[\[216a.2\]]gyi me tog rnams dang /_lha'i rgyan dang /_gos sna tshogs pa'i char bcom ldan 'das dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du zhugs pa la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti bya ba'i phyir rab tu phab bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 
[\[216a.3\]]legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/_sems dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog bstan pa legs so legs so/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_rig sngags kyi gnas 
[\[216a.4\]]rim par phye ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_yi ge gcig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma gcig shar ba yin no/_/gang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum 
[\[216a.5\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gis thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing /_snying po yi ge gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin la phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang /_
[\[216a.6\]]dam tshig gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin no/_don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas drangs shing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa yin te/_de 
[\[216a.7\]]nas don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabs so/_snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu bklags pas grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa legs so legs so/_/de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig thams cad grub pa/_don 
[\[216b.2\]]yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bsgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis yon tan gyi phung po shod cig_/snying po yi ge 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa bde ba/_bklags pas grub pa phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_sku 
[\[216b.3\]]gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma yangs 
[\[216b.4\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_pad+ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gsang ba chen po dang /_rigs spyi'i sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di'i yo byad dang /_cho ga bshad par bgyi yis bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab 
[\[216b.5\]]tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[216b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so/_/de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing /_rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis rab tu sbyin par gyis shig/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba'i dam 
[\[216b.7\]]tshig dang /_yi ge gcig po rigs spyi'i rjes su zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs kyis yo byad dang /_sgrub pa'i cho ga shod cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos nas/_snying shin tu dga' ste/_yo byad dang /_cho ga smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum nyid du sdig pa bsreg cing ma lus par zad par bgyid pa/_sems can dmyal ba rtsa ba nas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[217a.2\]]gyi cho ga smras pa/_dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su/_/dbus su pad+ma'i 'khor lo bya/_/tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par dbye/_/pad+ma ze ba'i dbus su ni/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par bya/_/bum pa bkang dang 'phan rnams kyis/_/dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya/_/
[\[217a.3\]]me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram/_/spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa yi/_/mar me'i phreng ba kun tu byed/_/mchod yon chu dag gzhag par bya/_/gu gul dang ni sa la la ki/_/a ga ru dang du ru ska/_/bdug spos snod bzhi dag nas bdug_/rig sngags 'chang ba khrus byas 
[\[217a.4\]]nas/_/gos gtsang bgos te smyung ba la/_/nye bar gnas nas tshes brgyad dam/_/bcu bzhi'am tshes ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ste/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo la bsgrub/_/shar du kha bltas 'dug nas su/_/don yod zhags pa dus gsum du/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/_/snying po'am brgya 
[\[217a.5\]]rtsa brgyad du bzlas/_/yi ge gcig po 'bum du ni/_/mtshan mo bar chad med par bzlas/_/skya rengs shar nas 'jig rten dbang /_/ze ba'i dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing /_/'bul 'gyur 'gul ba de yis ni/_/dmyal ba chen po bcu drug gi/_/sgo rnams dag ni bye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[217a.6\]]dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis/_/g.yo la g.yos pa tsam des ni/_/dmyal ba'i tshor kun rnam par 'jig_/dmyal ba de yang rnam par 'joms/_/sems can dmyal ba de dag ni/_/thar nas phyogs bcur brgyug pa yi/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[217a.7\]]kun las grol/_/mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad du dud 'gro rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad mthar gdugs par yongs 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]su zad par 'gyur/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur na/_de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can du ston par mdzad la mchog thams cad sbyin par 
[\[217b.2\]]mdzad do/_/don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_sgrib pa dang bral ba sems kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[217b.3\]]dgu bcu rtsa dgu po rnams mod nyid la mngon sum du ston par mdzad la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung 
[\[217b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig pu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur/_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon sum du ston cing nye 'khor 
[\[217b.5\]]la kun nas srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur/_dngos grub dang /_dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/_gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par ma gyur na/_de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can du mi mthong 
[\[217b.6\]]des sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa lhag ma lus par shes par bya ste/_de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gnyis pa byas pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gsum pa byed na bzlas 
[\[217b.7\]]brjod kyi cho ga gsum rdzogs pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang bteg ste mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad la mngon sum du bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]dpag med kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/_tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_gal te sems can gzhan rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu 
[\[218a.2\]]mo'am/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa zad par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos/_smyung ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag la/_rig sngags 'chang cho ga byed pas gsang sngags 
[\[218a.3\]]rjes su dran par byas nas rma bya'i sgros byab par bya'o/_de tsam gyis yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur te/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang /_gdug pa thams cad dang /_/na ba thams cad dang /_mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 
[\[218a.4\]]'gyur te/_the tshom med do/_/sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/_lha thams cad kyis gzung zhing kun nas bsrung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs 
[\[218a.5\]]bzhed par 'gyur/_tshe ring ba dang /_sgrib pa dang /_nad dang bral bar 'gyur/_tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/_tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur te/_snying rje 
[\[218a.6\]]dang /_byams pa chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bya zhing smyung ba dang /_bzlas brjod bya'o/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_/bam po bcu bdun 
[\[218a.7\]]pa/_de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du/_legs par phye ba/_gru bzhi pa/_rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/_dri'i tshon rtsi rnam par bkra ba kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba dang /_rdo 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]rje'i ge sar la brten pa'i dbus su pad+ma bya'o/_/rdo rje'i thig skud kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa dog par bya'o/_/nyi ma re re zhing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing nyi ma re re zhing a 
[\[218b.2\]]ga ru'i bdug pa dang /_khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod dang /_phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/_/yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod thun gsum du lan gsum mam/_lan bdun nam/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas so/_/zas ngan pa 
[\[218b.3\]]bcu yongs su spang bar bya zhing /_sems can ngan pa yang spang bar bya'o/_/sgrub thabs kyi de kho na nyid las thams cad du 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub bo/_/'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad po de rnams las grol lo/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po dran pas nad 
[\[218b.4\]]thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_/dug dang sbyar dug dang /_byad stems dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_skrag pa dang /_rims dang /_nad thams cad dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_mtshan par rdol ba dang /_
[\[218b.5\]]g.yan pa dang /_rkang shu dang /_mdze dang /_mgo bo na ba dang /_mig na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_sna na ba dang /_kha na ba dang /_rkan na ba dang /_mgul na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_so dang mchu na ba dang /_lag pa na ba dang /_rtsib logs 
[\[218b.6\]]na ba dang /_chu son ba dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_rkang pa na ba dang /_rgyab na ba dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad na ba dang /_tshad pa dang /_gzhang nad dang /_gcin nad dang /_gsud pa dang /_'khogs pa la lan cig brjod de byas 
[\[218b.7\]]pa tsam gyis thams cad sel bar byed de/_myur du rab tu zhi bar byed cing skad cig de nyid la yang yang dag par gnas par byed do/_/'jig rten pa'i bya ba gzhan thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rtsa dgu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyi ma re re zhing bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshig btsun bar yang 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/_/don che zhing che ba dag 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[219a.2\]]ro/_/dbang phyug dang /_dpon po lhun gyis grub pa nyid du rnyed do/_/rgyal po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_g.yog tu bcas pas gcig tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yang de bzhin 
[\[219a.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba so sor thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par brgyan pa mthong ngo /_/tshes brgyad dang bco lnga la po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal med khang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs te/_
[\[219a.4\]]'khor chen po la chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang /_'od dpag med bde ba can gyi gnas na zhugs pa mthong ste ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar du mthong ngo /_/'chi 'phos pa na bsam pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/_rgyan thams cad kyis 
[\[219a.5\]]rnam par brgyan par pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pa don yod pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin gang zhig thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[219a.6\]]stong phrag snyed las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/_se gol gtogs pa tsam nyid la slar yang 'ong ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin gzhan khrag khrig brgya stong phrag so sor thob cing /_/bzlas pa'i cho ga 
[\[219a.7\]]gcig pus las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//_//de nas khrus kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_khrus byed pa la mkhas pa gang gis dri ma thams cad sel bar byed cing mdzes pa/_sdig 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/_dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i de kho na nyid bsod nams dang gzi brjid rab tu 'phel bar byed pa/_nad thams cad sel bar grub pa/_sdig pa dang /_sdig to nyams par byed pa/_de bzhin du zad pa dang nyams pa bcom pa/_dug 
[\[219b.2\]]dang byad stems nyams pa/_nad yun ring po yongs su spangs pa/_de bzhin du gcod yun ring po dang rims yongs su spangs pa ste 'di dag khrus kyis 'grub ste/_rig sngags gang yin pa des 'grub par don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yongs su bsgrags so/_/
[\[219b.3\]]bgegs kyis reg pa gang yin pa dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon mi bzad pas reg pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa la yang /_dgra rnams kyis pham pa dang /_skye bo sdang ba dang /_gang gi 'khrug 
[\[219b.4\]]pa'i g.yul du song ba dang /_rgyu skar gyis bcom pa gang yin pa dang /_blo'i skye ba zad pa dang /_ma ning dang /_nyams pa'i ma ning dang /_dbang po nyams pa'i bar gang yin pa rnams dang bu mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa rnams kyi bu mthun par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bsad cing gzhom 
[\[219b.5\]]pa thob pa gang yin pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_gsod par song ba gang yin pa dang /_chom rkun nam/_rkun mo'i nang ngam/_gnod sbyin nam srin po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang /_gcan gzan gtum po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang /_mche ba gdug pa dang /_dug gi 
[\[219b.6\]]khrod du song bas dug 'jigs pa mi bzad pa zos pa gang yin pa dang /_khyim rdib pa dang /_g.yang sa dang /_byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa rnams dang /_mi mngon par sdig pa byed pa gang yin pa dang /_mtshams med pa byed pa gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa la 
[\[219b.7\]]skur pa 'debs pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba 'di rnams dkyil 'khor du khrus byas pas thams cad yang dag par zad par 'gro zhing /_myur du thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de rtswa rnams mes sreg pa bzhin du sngon bsags pa'i mi bzad pa'i las 'di dag 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma dang /_rtag tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/tshe yun ring por gnas te/_rtag tu bde ba dang /_dga' bar byed do/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nad med cing rims med pa nyid du gnas so/_/bde 
[\[220a.2\]]blag tu bya ba byed cing /_de'i skye ba bdun dran par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing /_mthar thug rtag tu dpal 'bar bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas rnams rtag tu mthong ba dang /_rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par byed pa dang /_rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa 
[\[220a.3\]]yang thun mtshams rtag tu mngon sum du mthong bas gnas par byed do/_/rtag tu rig sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang /_rig sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/_rtag tu dkyil 'khor gyi mchog gang yin pa yang sgrub par byed do/_/rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/_
[\[220a.4\]]tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o/_/me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pas bkra ba/_sgo bzhi kun nas rnam par phye ba dang /_las rnams legs par zin nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/_'khor lo yang dag par bri'o/_/pad+ma'i lte ba dang /_
[\[220a.5\]]snying po nyid kyang 'bar bar bya'o/_/zur dang zur rnams su/_zhags pa 'bar ba pad+ma la gnas pa bya'o/_/rig sngags 'dod pas khrus dang gtor ma dkar po yang 'dir dgod par bya'o/_/a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul zhing /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du/_dkyil 
[\[220a.6\]]'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o/_/las gzhan sgrub pa ni ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor mas mchod par bya zhing sna tshogs pa'i bdug spos dbul lo/_/bum pa chus bkang nas rdzas kyi phye ma rnams der gzhug cing /_rin chen sna bdun bcug ste/_de la rgya dar gyis bcings 
[\[220a.7\]]la/_don yod zhags pa brgya dang /_snying po nyid kyang lan brgyar bzlas so/_/yi ge gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so/_/tsan+dan dang /_sa mI dang /_si ri Sha dang /_hab shang tsi'u dang /_gur gum dang /_yungs kar dang pad+ma ge sar rnams legs par btags nas 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]bum pa bkang bar bya ste/_'di rnams kyis khrus bya'o/_nye'u shing /_shu ti dang /_bil ba ste 'di rnams kyis nyed pa dang /_rtag tu sngon tu bya ba par byas la/_de nas mkhas pas khrus bya'o/_/de nas srung ba'i cho ga ni don yod rgyal pos bya'o/_/de nas rtswa dUr ba bting nas/_de la 
[\[220b.2\]]skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/_bum pa'i chus khrus bya zhing pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang byed du gzhug go/_/de nas gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos te/_gtsug tor bcing bar bya zhing /_sngon du bzlas pa 'bul ba dang bskor ba byas nas/_sgo dang sgo nas phyag bya'o/_/shar gyi sgo ru zhugs la 
[\[220b.3\]]dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/_skyil krung gis 'dug la/_don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan bdun du bya ba par bya'o/_/lag tu rdo rje dang /_bgrang phreng gis mngon par dbang bskur zhing /_chu dang /_yungs kar dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de nas dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[220b.4\]]mchod pa bya'o/_/'di ni khrus kyi gtso bor 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungs so/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang /_rig sngags 'chang rnams la khyad par du/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_don 
[\[220b.5\]]yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gdon mi za bar byed do/_/gang dang gang du las la nges par sbyar ba thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/_thams cad du 'di la the tshom med do/_sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur te/_don yod pa'i dngos 
[\[220b.6\]]grub thob cing 'phral nyid du 'bras bu mthong ba yin no/_/lus yongs su dag cing shin tu dri ma med pa dang /_legs par khrus byas par de brjod par bya'o/_/sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed pa/_nad thams cad las yongs su grol 
[\[220b.7\]]bar byed pa ste/_mdor na/_thams cad du dngos grub so sor rnyed cing /_dpal chen por lhag par 'gro'o/_/rig sngags don du gnyer ba thob ste/_rig sngags don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid la sa bu 'dod pas ni bu thob bo/_/nor 'dod pas ni nor thob bo/_/dbang phyug 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]'dod pas ni dbang phyug thob bo/_/myur du dpal 'dod pas ni dpal thob bo/_/mngon par 'dod pa thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/zhes so/_khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas nor bu'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang /_dkyil 
[\[221a.2\]]'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrub pa rmad du byung ba don yod pa'i nor bu'i dngos grub dang /_bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_thams cad du ltung ba'i sdug bsngal las byung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob par byed pa gsod thob pa mngon par 
[\[221a.3\]]thar bar byed pa/_mtshon cha dang /_khong sgril gcog par byed par the tsom med do/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/_mtshams med pa zad par byed pa/_rtag tu gsod pa med pa'i gnas thams cad du son par byed pa/_rtag tu 'khrugs pa dang /_g.yul ngo las 
[\[221a.4\]]rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/chom rkun gyi nang nas grol bar 'gyur zhing /_rkun mo las kyang sgrol bar byed do/_/gcan gzan gtum po seng ge dang /_glang po che dang /_dom dang /_gzig dang /_dred dang /_khyi dang /_phag dang /_ce spyang rnams las nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i mod 
[\[221a.5\]]la thams cad du sgrol bar byed do/_/dug dang /_sbrul thams cad dam/_mche ba sdug pa dang /_sbrul go na sa dang /_bta sa nA b+ha dang /_dug nyid dang /_dug shring ga dang /_dug mu sta ka nyid dang /_da ra da'i dug dang /_lus la byas pa dang /_mi bzad pa'i dug dang /_dug ha la ha 
[\[221a.6\]]la dang /_sdig pa la sogs pa gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i dug gang yin pa dang /_dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang /_reg pa'i dug 'jigs pa dang /_'jog po yis kyang zin pa dang /_gzhan yang srog chags mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dug mi bzad 
[\[221a.7\]]pa rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang /_nor bu reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad 'phral du dug med par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gang gar 'bab pa'i dug 'thungs kyang 'phral du 'joms par byed do/_/nam mkha' lding gis sbrul nyid dang klu bzhin no/_/me yis mi 'tshig 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]go/_/slar yang chus 'khyer bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_de la rgyal po khro bar mi byed do/_/nam yang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_'thab mo dang /_'khrul 'khor byed pa dang /_sdang ba gang yin pa de rnams med de/_cho ga 'di ni 
[\[221b.2\]]mchog go/_/dug dang byad stems dang /_phye ma'i sbyor ba la sogs pa thams cad skad cig de la nyams par byed do/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_skem byed dang /_brjed byed dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren rnams 
[\[221b.3\]]dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang /_nor bu bzung ba nyid kyis thams cad 'bros par byed de 'di la the tsom med do/_/'di thams cad kyis thun mong du nor bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la/_bsam pa gang yin pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yid la don du gnyer bar bya ba gang yin pa rnams 
[\[221b.4\]]kyang nor bu bzung ba nyid la thams cad myur du phun sum tshogs par byed do/_/che 'phel ba dang /_sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa grub bo/_/bkra shis pa dang /_dam pa dang /_bsod nams dang /_dag pa dang /_sdig pa nyams pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa nyams pa dang /_'phral du 
[\[221b.5\]]rmi lam bzang por byed pa nyid dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /_rtag tu lha rnams 'gugs pa nyid dang /_rtag tu 'byor pa thams cad byed pa dang /_rtag tu zla ba nya ba ltar 'od zer 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa dang /_tshig btsun pa dang /_
[\[221b.6\]]rtag tu dga' ba dang /_thams cad tu mchod par bya ba'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rdzas kyi sbyor ba bya ste/_cha mnyam par legs par phye la gtso bo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_rgyal ba dang /_rnam par rgyal ba dang /_nA ku li dang /_dri'i nA ku li dang /_a ru ra 
[\[221b.7\]]dang /_lag pa dang /_dbang po lag pa dang /_dri'i pri yang ku dang /_rgya spos dang /_'khor lo dang /_'khor lo chen po dang /_khyab 'jug gnon pa dang /_so ma rA dza dang /_su nan da dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_ma la ya'i tsan+dan na la da dang /_gur gum dang /_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]ba bla dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_klu shing gi me tog dang /_tsam pa ka'i me tog dang /_pa DA dang /_brag skyes dang /_spang spos dang sA ma ka rnams mnyam par byas te phye ma zhib mor legs par btags la pu shel tse dang /_tsan+dan gyi chus sbrus te/_zangs 
[\[222a.2\]]kyi snod du bzhag la/_khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkod de/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas snying po brgya rtsa brgyad nyid dang /_yi ge gcig pa 'bum du bzlas pas rdzas kyi snod 'bar bar byed do/_/de nas nor bu mgo bo la bcings pa 'am/_lag pa 
[\[222a.3\]]la bcings la gzung bar bya ste/_mchog du bskal ba bzang po thob cing /_dbang phyug gi mchog dang dpon po thob bo/_/rje rigs bu med pas kyang mi dang nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_dgra rab tu 'joms shing /_srung ba'i mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/_nor 
[\[222a.4\]]bu gang du gnas pa der/_glog gi gnod pa med do/_/der byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_g.yo ba mi 'byung ngo /_/nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i gnas 'di mchod rten du bkur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing /_rtag tu yang 
[\[222a.5\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rtag tu yang srung zhing /_dus rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te the tsom med do//_//dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyi logs bzhi pa zur bzhi pa shin tu bcags pa/_legs par sbyar ba mchog 
[\[222a.6\]]tu mdzes pa bya'o/_/khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs kyi mgo lcogs kyis bkra ba bris la shar gyi sgo rnam par phye ste dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la yang /_'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[222a.7\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du/_rdzas kyi snod gzhag par bya zhing /_me tog gcal du bkram par bya la/_dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya ste/_dri dang /_yon chad dbul bar bya zhing /_tsan+dan gyi bdug pa sreg go/_/nyin mtshan du gos 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gtsang ma bgo zhing bcing bar bya/_shin tu dri ma med pa'i sems du 'gyur bar bya/_byams pa dang /_snying rje mchog tu 'gyur bar bya zhing /_de nas nor bu'i rdzas smras po zhes so/_/nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas ldong ros kyi mig sman gyi cho ga'i dkyil 
[\[222b.2\]]'khor bshad par bya ste/_rgyar gzings kyi cha'i mthar thug pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/_dri sna tshogs dang /_rnam par bkra ba'i rig sngags 'chang ni/_grwa rnams su mkhas par bri bar bya'o/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/_pad+ma 'dab ma phyed kha bye ba'o/_/lag 
[\[222b.3\]]pa gnyis kyi dbus su pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa 'chang ba'o/_/shar gyi sgo rnam par phye ba bya ste/_ldong ros dngul gyi snod du bzhag nas dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i steng du dgod par bya'o/_/snod kyi khor yug tu/_dar dmar po'i gos bzang pos g.yog par bya'o/_/yang na pad+ma'i 'dab ma'am/_yang 
[\[222b.4\]]na byang chub shing gi 'dab ma'am/_yang na shing 'dzam bu'i 'dab mas g.yog par bya'o/_/a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i drung du dgod par bya'o/_/me tog dang /_
[\[222b.5\]]dris mchod pa bya/_rig sngags 'chang gis dkar gsum zos la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o/_/yang na nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa bya/_zla ba yar ngo 'am/_tshes bco lnga'i nya'am/_tshes bcu bzhi 'am/_tshes brgyad la/_gtsang mar 
[\[222b.6\]]khrus byas te/_gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /_snying po brgya rtsa brgyad kyang bzlas par bya/_yi ge gcig pa stong phrag bcur bzlas la/_dkyil 'khor nye bar spras shing me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_mar 
[\[222b.7\]]me dang /_gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'phang bar bya'o/_/'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin par byed do/_
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]ldong ros kyi snod de yang 'bar bar byed de/_'bar ba tsam gyi mod la mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/don yod pa'i ye shes yangs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo/_/don yod pa'i 'khor lo kun nas 
[\[223a.2\]]rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chag gi 'khor los sgyur ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du gnas kyi mnga' bdag rgyal 
[\[223a.3\]]por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro zhing /_tshe bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul so sor thob ste/_rdzu 'phrul gang gis se gol gtogs pa 
[\[223a.4\]]tsam gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing /_gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dngos grub yangs pa'i mchod pa byed par 'gyur zhing skad cig gis slar yang 'ong bar byed do/_/rang gi 
[\[223a.5\]]lus la 'od zer brgya stong phrag du ma 'bar bar byed do/_/gang 'dod pa thams cad byed do/_/de nas du ba 'thul bzhin pa ni bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te/_mi snang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu 
[\[223a.6\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas gnas te/_gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do/_/gnas thams cad na gnas pa rnams 'bangs su gyur 
[\[223a.7\]]nas gnas te/_ci bsgo ba byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'phrang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pas mchod pa dang /_bla mar bya ba'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/bka' bsgo ba yang /_bdag nyid dang /_nor gyis 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]kyang byed cing gnas so/_/dbu ba 'byung bzhin pa bskus na/_cho ga zhib mo dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig mngon du gyur nas gnas te/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da 
[\[223b.2\]]ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rnams sngon du gyur nas gnas so/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad yang dag par rjes su 'brang zhing /_srung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i ched du rtag pa kho nar 
[\[223b.3\]]rjes su 'gro'o/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/_sa'i steng nas sor bzhi tshad du 'phags pa'i nam mkha' la gnas so/_/
[\[223b.4\]]ldong ros la bzlas nas mig la bskus nas/_mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du gyur nas gnas te/_rgyal po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_blon po dang /_bkrabs pa dang /_mdun na 'don dang /_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang /_bud med dang /_skyes 
[\[223b.5\]]pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje rigs dang /_dmangs rigs rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas so/_/tha na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya yang lta bar byed bzhin du dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so/_/'dis byugs pa'i mig 
[\[223b.6\]]gi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_/lus kyi gdung ba dang /_sems kyi gdung ba thams cad dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_mtshan ma ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis par gyur pa thams cad rnams par 
[\[223b.7\]]nyams par byed do/_/skye ba brjes nas kyang spyan lnga yongs su dag pa so sor thob bo/_/tshe rabs dran par yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang /_sgrib pa dang bral zhing /_don yod pa legs par rab tu gnas pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i lus dag pa so 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sor thob bo/_/kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig so sor thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba so sor thob 
[\[224a.2\]]bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rtag tu yang 'grogs shing gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/zhes so mig sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas bdug pa rim par phye ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/_
[\[224a.3\]]rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog tu rmad du byung ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang /_de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten gsum po thams cad 'gugs pa grub pa dang /_lha thams cad spyan drang ba dang /_dbang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[224a.4\]]khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams bsdigs par byed pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_sha za dang /_gdon ma rungs pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par byed par the tsom med do/_/bgegs dang log par 'dren pa nyid dang /_sdang ba dang /_de 
[\[224a.5\]]bzhin du bdud kyang rung ste/_bdug pa'i dris rnam par zhig par 'gyur zhing /_yan lag dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar byed do/_/rang gi dmag dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_shin tu 'gras pa dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_de bzhin du dgra bo nyid dang /_skye bo sdang 
[\[224a.6\]]ba dang /_gang du 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_g.yul nyid kyang bdug pa'i dris thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do/_/gal te skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze nyid dang /_de bzhin 
[\[224a.7\]]du dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_rgyal po 'am/_rgyal phran dang /_de bzhin du rgyal mo dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor kyang rung ste/_legs par khrus byas/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug spos 'dis bdugs na gang gis 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bdugs pa'i dri mnams pa dang /_de lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol lo/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid thob par 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom med do/_/mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnams 'phral du thams cad rnam par 
[\[224b.2\]]dag par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/bdug pa 'di tsam gyis/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dris kun tu 'gengs te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas ji srid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dris kun tu 'gengs so/_/stobs dang shugs chen pos lha'i gnas 
[\[224b.3\]]thams cad 'gul bar byed cing skyod par byed do/_/chu rgyun gyi klu rnams 'gul bar byed cing /_ri rab las gzhan pa'i ri gang yin pa 'dar yed yed byed do/_/gsang bar gnas pa rnams rnam par skrag par byed do/_/dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa rnams rnam par zhig 
[\[224b.4\]]par byed do/_/de bzhin du/_sa'i mtha'i thams cad kyang dkar bsil du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te/_bde ba can du yang 'gro'o/_/mtho ris thams cad 
[\[224b.5\]]du ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so/_/dmyal ba thams cad nyams te/_pad+ma can du rab tu 'gyur ro/_/nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhan rnams dang /_sa 'og gi nang du song ba gang yin pa dang /_dgon pa dang /_ri dang /_tshang tshing dang /_dgon dung dang /_
