[\[224b.6\]]g.yang sar gnas pa'i dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris yongs su grol lo/_/mi gtsang ba za ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za gang yin pa rnams dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba za ba gang yin 
[\[224b.7\]]pa rnams dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs za ba gang yin pa rnams dang /_'dres pa za ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dri mnams pa tsam gyis yongs su grol nas 'phral nyid du lha'i 'jig rten du skye'o/_/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang /_
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]dri zhim po'i kha zas rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rnams thams cad dril mnams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo/_/bdug pa mnams pa tsam 'dis nad thams cad las 
[\[225a.2\]]yongs su grol lo/_/rims thams cad las yongs su grol lo/_/na ba thams cad las yongs su grol lo/_/'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_me dbal dang /_shu ba dang /_mdze dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mig na ba dang /_mgo bo na ba dang /_gzhogs 
[\[225a.3\]]phyed na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_sna na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_kha na ba dang /_sba ba dang /_'jigs pa dang /_skrag pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bdug pa'i dri bsnams pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[225a.4\]]gzigs dbang phyug de dang /_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i mthu yis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing /_rnam par grol te mi 'jigs pa'i grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rdzas rnams kyi rang gi cha 
[\[225a.5\]]shas rnam par phye ba dang ldan pa bshad par bya ste/_tsan+dan srang gsum dang /_a ga ru srang gsum dang /_du ru ska srang lnga dang /_gur gum srang bcu dang /_spr-i ka srang gnyis dang /_na lan da srang gnyis dang /_ma he'i mig srang nyi shu dang /_sra rtsi po ga srang bcu dang /_bo la 
[\[225a.6\]]srang gsum dang /_sal+la kI srang brgyad dang /_rgya spos srang gnyis dang /_spang spos srang gcig dang /_shA ma ka srang gcig dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra srang gcig dang /_pad+ma ge sar srang gcig dang /_shrirI ma'i me tog srang gcig dang /_li kha ra dkar po srang bcu dang /_dri'i 
[\[225a.7\]]pri yang ku srang gcig dang /_pu shel tsi srang lnga dang /_stag sen srang gcig dang /_sug smel srang gsum dang /_bA la ka srang lnga dang /_gur gum dang /_gla rtsi tshor ba ste/_thams cad legs par rnam par dbye bar byas nas/_phye mar byas la mthar thams 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]cad gcig tu bsdoms te/_sbrang rtsis sbru bar bya'o/_/tshes bco lnga la/_rgyu skar dang /_tshes grangs kyi lha dge ba la/_rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_legs par khrus byas par gyur pas brtul zhugs spyad pas bdug pa'i mchog sbyar 
[\[225b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas bdug pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa tshad shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/_gzings kyi tshad kyi shin tu bcags pa/_'jam zhing bsnyen pa la/_tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pas sgo bzhi shin tu rnam par phye ba/_mdzes par bri bar bya'o/_/dbus kyi 
[\[225b.3\]]dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/_pad+ma'i phreng ba bri'o/_/dbus kyi pad+ma phyed kha bye ba'i phreng ba bri ste/_lag pa gnyis 'thon nas sna tshogs pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa 'dzin par byed pa'o/_/de'i steng du bdug pa'i snod bkod nas/_me'i kha dog can gyi gos kyis g.yogs la/_dkyil 
[\[225b.4\]]'khor gyi grwa bzhi rnams su/_rlung gi rgyal po bri'o/_/sgo bzhir zhags pa bris nas khor yug tu lag pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/pad+ma'i phreng ba las nges par 'thon pa'o/_/bdug spos 'khyil pa 'chang bar byed pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du spras par bya'o/_/ji ltar 'byor 
[\[225b.5\]]pa'i gtor ma dang me tog dbul bar bya/_mchod yon gyi snod dang /_gang ba'i bum pa dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyan dang /_skud pa dmar pos mtshams bcing ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la dngul dang /_gser bzhag cing /_khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang /_dri 
[\[225b.6\]]sna tshogs rgya chen po'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkod nas kha shar du phyogs nas pad+ma'i phreng ba la nye bar dgod par bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bdug pa'i rgyal po la yongs su bzlas par bya ste/_nyi ma bdun la thun gsum du don yod pa'i 
[\[225b.7\]]rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/don yod pa'i snying po yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas brjod 'bum rdzogs pa ste/_stong phrag brgya rdzogs pa ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing /_
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]slar yang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o/_/de nas thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dbul bar bya/_de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug 
[\[226a.2\]]pa dbul lo/_/'di ni bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub par 'gyur ro/_/bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bya ba de sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar gyi 'bras bu gcig gi tshad tsam gyi bdug pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'dod pa 
[\[226a.3\]]dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri gcig gis rgyas par 'dod pa dang /_bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pas kun nas g.yogs par 'dod pa dang /_dri sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs par byed par 'dod pa des/_bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdug pa de/_
[\[226a.4\]]rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas la me tog gcal du bkram par bya'o/_
[\[226a.5\]]mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil yang gzhag par bya/_bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par bya zhing /_don yod pa'i rgyal po dus gcig tu brjod par bya ste/_phyogs bcur bdug pa'i pog phor dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la 
[\[226a.6\]]byed par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can 'byung po thams cad la byams pa bsgom par bya/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad dri ma med pa'i sems kyis yid la bsgom par bya/_dkyil 'khor la me tog dang bdug pa dang /_mchod yon dang /_zhabs 
[\[226a.7\]]bsil phul te yi ge gcig pa yid la brjod cing /_phyag rgya yang lan cig bcings la phyag bya'o zhes so/_/phul ba tsam gyi mod la phyogs re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bye ba la dris khyab par byed cing /_bdug 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa chen po 'khrigs pas nam mkha'i mthil du khyab par 'gyur ro/_/dri sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[226b.2\]]'das la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dus dus su don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byed pa srung ba'i don dang /_phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa de srung ba'i don du/_legs 
[\[226b.3\]]so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa rgyas par byed pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po nye bar sog pa byed do/_
[\[226b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing /_bye ba brgya stong phrag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed do/_/ji ltar rig sngags 'chang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i cho ga byed byed par de bzhin du/_rnam pa du ma de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing 
[\[226b.5\]]gi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang nyi ma bdun du rab tu brtson pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_bla ma mchod do/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba stsol bar byed do/_/de rnams thams cad kyi dbugs 
[\[226b.6\]]'byin par byed la mchog rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sa bcu yang dag par gnon te mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho 
[\[226b.7\]]ga'o/_/de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten las 'das pa la 'chi 'pho ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga'i zhabs drung du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro bar byed pa de thams 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]cad du yang /_de bzhin gshegs pas rig sngags 'chang la lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/phyis kyang skye ba gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur nas/_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 
[\[227a.2\]]song ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do/_/tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/_'di'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par so sor thob bo/_/'di ni 'jig 
[\[227a.3\]]rten las 'das pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i khyad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga brgya stong phrag du ma 'grub par byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar bdug pa nyid yid la byed pa de lta de ltar thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i gnas su 
[\[227a.4\]]bdugs na/_bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la/_klu'i rgyal pos char rgyun chen po 'byin par byed do/_/rgyal po'i sgo ru bdugs na/_rgyal po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas gnas so/_/skye bo mang po'i dbus su bdugs na/_rigs bzhi'i 
[\[227a.5\]]'jig rten dbang du gyur nas gnas so/_/bdag nyid la bdugs na/_thams cad du mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad la bdugs na/_nad thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do/_/dug la bdugs na dug med par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams kyi nang 
[\[227a.6\]]du bdugs na me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad ro zhim pa dang /_legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/lo thog la bdugs na/_'bru'i phung po chen por 'gyur ro/_/khyim mam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer la bdugs na/_dug dang /_sbyar dug 
[\[227a.7\]]dang /_dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags thams cad nam yang mi 'byung ngo /_/g.yul gyi dbus su bdugs na cher rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid dam/_gzhan rnams sam/_don mthun pa rnams la bdugs na/_lam du 'gro ba na chom rkun dang /_g.yon can dang /_
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]rkun mo dang /_gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing /_bde ba dang legs pas rang gi khyim du 'ong ngo /_/dpag tshad stong du 'gro yang ngal ba med cing /_slar yang 'ong bar byed do/_/dung la bdugs nas mthon por bus na ji srid 
[\[227b.2\]]dung gi sgra thos pa de srid du gnod pa thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_mtshon cha dang /_'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra bo dang /_sdang ba dang /_rab tu sdang ba'i sems can 
[\[227b.3\]]thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_/yams thams cad dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_'khrugs pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_/bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_dga' bar 'os par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[227b.4\]]ba thams cad 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/nad med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_rims med pa dang /_thang chad pa med par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas so/_/khang pa'i steng mthon por phyogs bzhir bdugs na/_rlung dang /_sad dang sprin gyi ser ba thams cad bcing 
[\[227b.5\]]bar 'gyur te/_ji srid yid la byed pa nar mar yod pa de srid du mtshams bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim gyi nang du bdugs na/_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo thams cad dang /_ji srid du rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang 
[\[227b.6\]]bzhi pa thams cad byams pa'i yid du 'gyur te dbang du gyur nas gnas so/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed do/_/slar yang yid gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_bdugs na/_dri mnams pa'i mthu des/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa skyes te/_de 
[\[227b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong ba so sor thob ste/_phyir kyang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho ba na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]khams sam/_mngon par dga' bar skyes te 'di la dogs pa dang /_yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya zhing /_the tshom bskyed par mi bya'o/_/zhes so/_/ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim la bdugs na/_nag po chen po la sogs pa/_ma mo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[228a.2\]]yongs su bskor ba/_dbang du gyur par 'gyur te/_mdun du nye bar gnas par byed do/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad dang /_nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'dug na/_bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la/_kha nas khrag skyug go/_/
[\[228a.3\]]rig sngags 'chang gis de blangs te/_thig le byas nas nam mkha' la lding bar byed do/_/mig la byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur te/_bde blag tu 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/lto bar yongs su byugs na/_gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dpon po'o/_/lus mtha' dag la 
[\[228a.4\]]byugs na/_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rtsal chen po nag po chen po dang mtshungs pa'i shugs su 'gyur te/_de nyid kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro/_/'khor gyi tshogs chen por yang 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa la bdugs na/_bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la/_'o ma 'dzag pa blang bar bya 
[\[228a.5\]]ste/_lus la byug par bya'o/_/tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'i stobs dang zhugs su 'gyur te nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do/_/khyab 'jug la bdugs na/_bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la lus la pa lA sha'i kha dog gi dri'i chu 'dzag ste/_rig sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par bya'o/_/
[\[228a.6\]]sred med kyi bu'i gzugs dang /_stobs dang /_shugs 'chang bar 'gyur te/_lag na 'khor lo thogs pas nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/dbang phyug chen po la bdugs na/_dbang phyug chen po'i lus la rdul 'byung ste/_rig sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par bya'o/_/dbang 
[\[228a.7\]]phyug chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur te/_lag na mdung rtse gsum dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rtsal gyis 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyur te nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/thams cad la don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod lan gsum gsum rnam par sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]snying po yi ge gcig pas spyi bor bzlas brjod lan bdun du bzlas brjod sbyin par bya'o/_/spra tshil las byung ba'i klu mgo bo dgu pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bya ste gser gyis g.yog par bya zhing dri'i dkyil 'khor bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag par bya'o/_/don yod pa'i rgyal 
[\[228b.2\]]pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so/_/bdug pa 'dis bdugs pas klu ldang bar byed do/_/rig sngags 'chang gis 'jigs pa med par bya ste/_khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la bzlas te/_spyi bo'i gtsug tu brdegs na/_lding bar byed do/_/gang du 'dod pa der gnas nas/_
[\[228b.3\]]klu chen po'i mtsho dang /_gnas dang /_gzhal med khang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/chu gang yin pa de rnams kyang 'thung bar byed pa dang /_khrus byed pa'i bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'am/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song bas 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de rnams 
[\[228b.4\]]thams cad kyang nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin par byed cing /_char 'bebs par byed do/_/dus dus su me tog dang /_
[\[228b.5\]]'bras bu dang /_lo thog rnams rdzogs par byed de/_ro zhim po'i ro myong bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir zhing log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phug dang khung bu'i sgo ru 'khrul 'khor gyi sgo glegs la bdugs na bye zhing gcog par 'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa'i dus su bdugs na 
[\[228b.6\]]'pham par 'gyur ro/_/lag mthil la bdugs na/_gang dang gang la reg pa thams cad du dbang du byed do/_/bdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_don yod par thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub 
[\[228b.7\]]pa nad thams cad sel bar grub pa/_thams cad du dug 'joms par byed pa/_na ba thams cad sel bar grub pa/_sdang ba thams cad ldog par byed pa/_'byung po thams cad la mi 'jigs pa/_mtshon dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug rab tu 'joms pa/_rtag tu srung ba 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]dang bskyab pa dang sba bar byed pa/_dgra rnams dang /_gzhan rgyal ba ldog par byed pa/_rgyal po dang /_rgyal phran nam/_btsun mo'i 'khor du song ba dang gtso bo rtag tu dbang du byed cing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang 
[\[229a.2\]]'khrug pa dang /_g.yul rnams rtag tu rab tu 'joms par byed pa/_gang gi tshe chom rkun gyi nang du song ba nyid dang /_don mthun gyi nang dang /_rkun mo dang /_seng ge dang /_stag gi nang du song ba de'i tshe/_thams cad du sman gyi rgyal ba ster ro/_/tshe ring por 'gyur te/_rtag tu 
[\[229a.3\]]pad+ma'i phyag gi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding nyid dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po nyid dang /_mi ma yin gdug pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad nyin 
[\[229a.4\]]dang mtshan du srung ba'i don du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur te the tshom med do/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang /_skabs gsum pa'i lha'i dbang 
[\[229a.5\]]po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha de rnams thams cad mthun pas rtag tu srung bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyis rnam par gzigs shing /_rtag tu yang mthong ba stsol bar mdzad do/_/gang sman lag tu phyin par 'gyur ba 'di/_yang 
[\[229a.6\]]nas yang du rig sngags kyi dngos grub myur du thob bo/_/byad stems 'pho ba med do/_/de la dug med cing sdig pa med la/_mi bzad pa'i sbyor ba dang /_phye ma'i sbyor bas gnon par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi sgrib pa nyams par byed de/_de bzhin du yang /_sdig pa thams cad dang /_
[\[229a.7\]]rmi lam ngan pa dang /_mtshan ma ngan pa gang yin pa dang /_gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdang ba nyid de/_de rnams thams cad myur du rnam par nyams par byed do/_/sman gang du gnas pa'i dpag tshad khor yug tu srung ba dang /_de bzhin nyid du mtshams bcing bar byed do/_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]bgegs dang /_log par 'dren pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin du/_bdud dam sdang ba de rnams thams cad rab tu 'bros par byed do/_/sman gang du gnas par gdon rab tu 'bros par byed de/_/mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma gang yin pa dang /_skem 
[\[229b.2\]]byed dang /_gza' dang brjed byed dang /_grib gnon gang yin pa dang /_mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams der gnas par byed cing /_'khrul 'khor la sman a ga da de mchog go zhes so/_/rgyal bas dbugs 'byin par mdzad 
[\[229b.3\]]cing /_dngos grub thams cad kyi de kho na nyid stsol bar mdzad do/_/rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog stsol zhing /_rtag pa'i mthar mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa myur du 'grub ste/_sman 'chang ba la/_sman gang du gnas par gang gis kyang 
[\[229b.4\]]glags mi rnyed do/_/don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu sman gyi mchog rab tu 'bad pas bcangs pas legs par bsgrub par bya ba dngos grub kyi mchog las thams cad byed pa de nyid de'i tshe shi ba yang dag par 'tsho bar byed pa/_lo rdzogs par bsten te/_
[\[229b.5\]]sngags dang phyag rgyas gso bar bya'o/_/lo stong phrag tu rtag tu bde ba dang /_dga' bar byed do/_/dbang phyug dang /_nor thob pa dang /_'bru 'phel ba dang /_bla na med pa dang /_rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur te rtag tu gnas so/_/'bangs dang /_ci bgyi dang /_mchod pa chen 
[\[229b.6\]]po rnyed do/_/thams cad du de rtag tu tshig btsun pa'o/_/thos pas dngos grub mchog gyur pa'i/_/rdzas kyang 'dir ni bshad bya ste/_/tsan+dan rgya spos ru rta dang /_/spr-i ka shing tsha bA la ka/_/brag skyes spang spos sA ma kang /_/sug smel gla sgang na la da/_pad+ma ut+pal pri 
[\[229b.7\]]yang ku/_/shing kun 'dab ma tsha ba gsum/_/shi rI sha yi me tog dang /_/de bzhin pa ri pai la ba/_/'di rnams cha ni mnyam par ldan/_/thams cad legs gzhal legs par sbyar/_/gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/_/khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]yi ge gcig pas stong phrag bcur bzlas so/_/'dir sman rnams bgrang phreng gi tshad tsam du bsgongs nas grib ma la yongs su bskam par bya'o/_/gla rtsi dang /_ga bur gyi blangs la legs par sbyong ba'i bya ba byas pa dang /_dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ni/_ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[230a.2\]]du dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dam tshig la rab tu 'jug pa la/_shar gyi sgo ru phyag byas nas/_dkyil 'khor mchog la bskor pa bya ste/_sgo dang sgo ru phyag bya zhing /_shar gyi sgo ru 'jug par bya'o/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying 
[\[230a.3\]]por/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par pad+ma'i ge sar la 'dug nas/_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/_mngon par dbang bskur bar bya zhing /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang 
[\[230a.4\]]sngags legs par sgrub bo/_/de nas mchod pas 'jig rten mgon po'i dngos grub mthong bar byed cing rtag tu g.yo bar byed la 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo/_/dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_gru bzhi po ko la'i tshad du cha legs par phye ba gru bzhi dang /_
[\[230a.5\]]sgo bzhi yod pa/_them skas kyi rim pa can du tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po mdzes par bya/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po pad+ma mchog kha phye ba 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_snying po dang /_ze ba shin tu mdzes pa/_snying po las pad+ma byung ba/_kha 
[\[230a.6\]]phyed bye ba dang /_lag pa gnyis byung bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris par dngul gyi snod kyi nang du sman bkang ste dar gyis kha g.yogs nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du gzhag par bya/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/_dar gyi cod 
[\[230a.7\]]pan bcings shing brgyan pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal bar bri'o/_/sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhag pa kha dog dang 'od zer 'bar ba bri'o/_/grwa grwar bum pa gang ba bri'o/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]kun du 'phan dang /_bum pa gang ba dang /_'bras bu dang /_me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o/_/gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya/_tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru'i bdug spos dang /_spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/_dkyil 
[\[230b.2\]]'khor kun tu mar me'i phreng ba dang /_me tog phreng ba dgod cing kun du 'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dgram par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bya zhing /_gos gtsang ma bgos pa 'jigs pa med pas zla ba yar gyi ngo nya la bsgrub par bya ste/_
[\[230b.3\]]sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur cing byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o/_/gang gis lag gis gzung ba tsam dang /_reg pa tsam gyi mod la de dga' ba 'thob cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_sngon gyi sgrib pa rnams 'jig 
[\[230b.4\]]par 'gyur/_mtshams med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/_mod la nad thams cad 'byang zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par byed pa bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan cing de bzhin gshegs 
[\[230b.5\]]pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa/_'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sprul pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis bsngags pa/_rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/_lha thams 
[\[230b.6\]]cad kyis bsrung ba/_klu'i dbang po thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla bas mchod pa/_de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi 
[\[230b.7\]]tshogs dang /_gza' kun dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_de bzhin du gza'i khyim dang /_thams cad du bkra shis kyis mchod pa/_cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang /_de bzhin du dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_bzlas brjod thams cad dang /_gsang sngags thams cad kyi 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]rjes su zhugs pa/_rigs spyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_yid 
[\[231a.2\]]bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang mthun pa'i sman gyi rdzas bkra shis pa bye ba khrag khrig gam/_lhag par gyur pa gzhan gang yang med do/_/sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog gtso bo 'byin pa/_'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no/_/de'i phyir thams cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas gnas 
[\[231a.3\]]gang yang rung bar sbyar bar bya ste/_gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa des sbyang bar bya'o/_/ji lta ji ltar bkra shis kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa da lta de ltar bsam pa yid la byed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_sbyar ba tsam gyi med la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_'dod pa 
[\[231a.4\]]thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos pa spos chus legs par khrus byas la nyid re sman re re don yod pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod byas te zos na/_zos pa tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[231a.5\]]thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs shing snang ba rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/_nyin zhag gsum du sbyar na ngag rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/_/nyin zhag lngar sbyar na dran 
[\[231a.6\]]pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/_/nyin zhag bdun du sbyar na rig sngags chen po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/_/nyin zhag bcu bzhir sbyar na don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig chen po 'thob bo/_/nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na de bzhin 
[\[231a.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub 'thob bo/_/zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyar na 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gzigs dbang phyug gi dngos grub sgyu ma lta bus brgyan pa thob cing tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gsum du sbyar na lus yongs su dag pa dang /_mdog yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/_/lo gcig tshang bar sbyar na don yod pa'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang 'khor los 
[\[231b.2\]]sgyur bar 'gyur te/_mig mthon mthing mdog bung ba lta bu skra ral bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/_tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang mthun par 'gyur la/_tshe bskal ba 'bum thub par 'gyur ro/_/bdar nas bdag nyid la byugs na/_gang dri mnams pa tsam gyis bgegs dang /_
[\[231b.3\]]log 'dren dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_skem byed dang /_brjed byed dang /_grib gnon thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_gdug pa thams cad dang /_dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so/_/gal 
[\[231b.4\]]te myur du mi 'bros na ni spyi bo dum bu 'bum du 'gas shing yan lag dang /_yan lag rnams zhig par 'gyur la/_bu dang chung mar bcas pa 'jigs par 'gyur/_sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams 
[\[231b.5\]]med pa lnga dag 'jig par 'gyur/_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_mi shis pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_spos bsnams pa tsam gyis rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_rgyal rigs 
[\[231b.6\]]dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/_/byams pa tsam gyis 'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_me dpal dang /_rkang shu dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mdze dang /_khyi rdo dang /_shu ba dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_
[\[231b.7\]]rma dang /_khong gi rma yongs su sos par 'gyur/_dug thams cad dang /_zos pa dang /_dug myos dang /_sbyar dug drag po dang /_dug sbyar ma dang /_sbyar dug phye ma dang /_byad rnams la bskus pa tsam dang /_chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur ro/_/dri tsam gyis 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro/_/rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa la dpral bar bskus na ku co 'dod cing 'bros so/_/rims thams cad dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa 
[\[232a.2\]]las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_lpa ba dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_mchin pa na ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_skran dang /_gcin sri ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_mgul pa na ba dang /_kha na ba dang /_'khyil zhing na ba dang /_tshang 
[\[232a.3\]]pa dang /_mdoms na ba dang /_yan lag dang nying lag na ba chu dron po 'thungs ba tsam gyis yongs su sos par 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_mgo na ba dang /_mig na ba dang /_rna ba na ba la bskus pa tsam gyis sos par 'gyur ro/_/thig le byas na chom rkun dang /_gnod 
[\[232a.4\]]byed dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_byi ba za bas 'jigs pa dang /_gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur zhing /_'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes par byas pa thams cad yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lag pa gdengs pa'i 
[\[232a.5\]]'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus shing bar chad bya bar mi nus so/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/_/rgyal po btsun mo dang /_'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur 
[\[232a.6\]]ro/_/gzhan yang gang dang gang du sbyar ba rang gi blos bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar na las grub par byad de/_sman gyi mchog shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o/_/sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas de'i phyir gser gyi ril bu'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_
[\[232a.7\]]'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i rnam par gzigs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_de bzhin 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]gshegs pa rin chen snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags pa/_byin 
[\[232b.2\]]gyis brlabs pa/_dbang bskur ba/_rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa/_lung bstan pa/_mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gtsug tor gyi nor bu cod pan 'chang ba/_rgyal po 'od dpag med kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan 
[\[232b.3\]]gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa/_rig sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi/_sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dis tshad bstan par 
[\[232b.4\]]lta su zhig gis nus mod kyi/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba dang /_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon sum du mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod par gzung ba dang 
[\[232b.5\]]lung ston pa 'thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nor bu gser gyi kha dog tu bstan pa'i ril bu 'di gang gis mthong zhing 'chang ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 
[\[232b.6\]]bskyed bskyed par 'gyur/_nor bu ril bu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_gdug pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mnar med par gzhol pa dang /_dam pa'i chos sprod ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_sngon gyi tshe rabs nas bsags 
[\[232b.7\]]pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig cing spangs par 'gyur/_rims dang /_nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_gang gi lag na sman 'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can de ni lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/ril bu gang la yod pa ni/_/phyir mi ldog par lung 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bstan cing /_/mgon po sa bcud dag la gnas/_/rtag tu mchod rten gyur pa ste/_/sku gdung snying po'i bdag nyid can/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur/_/dus gsum dag la zhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa gang /_/sangs 
[\[233a.2\]]rgyas dpa' bo de kun gyi/_/sras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras/_/thugs las skyes dang zhal las skyes/_/chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes/_/'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon/_/rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_/
[\[233a.3\]]phyag g.yas rtag tu spyi bor ni/_/'jog mdzad 'di ni the tsom med/_/ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'tshed/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'dag_/de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/phyir zhing 
[\[233a.4\]]gnas mchog zhi ba 'thob/_/'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag med/_/mgon po rtag tu mngon sum mthong /_/bde ba can du 'jug par byed/_/gang na de yi mngon dga' ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa/_/rtag tu mi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[233a.5\]]de bzhin mi g.yo mi 'gul te/_/sems dpa' ri rab che dang mnyam/_/gzung du med pas mcho dang 'dra/_/de la bgegs dang log 'dren dag_/nams kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur la/_/sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur/_/gang la nor rgyal 'di yod 
[\[233a.6\]]la/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag_/dpung dang bcas pa bkol dang bcas/_/rtag tu bsrung phyir gnas byed de/_/'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhin no/_/lha tshogs thams cad bsrung bar ni/_/the tshom med par byed par 'gyur/_/gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel/_/
[\[233a.7\]]de la legs par 'jug par 'gyur/_/'jigs med rtag tu rmi lam ni/_/dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong /_/gru 'dzin ri la gzhal med khang /_/tshal dang bcas shing rin chen bcas/_/gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]dri za lha min gsang ba pa/_/ma mkha' lding dag mi 'am ci/_/de bzhin lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ni/_/kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/rin chen lha yi seng ge'i gdan/_/khang pa brtsegs pa rin chen dang /_/nor 
[\[233b.2\]]bu chen pos brgyan pa dang /_/'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i gtso/_/pad+ma'i snying po la zhugs nas/_/don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i chos ston to/_/gsung kun thob par gyur nas ni/_/thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong /_/de ltar rmi 
[\[233b.3\]]lam bzang rmi ba/_/nyin gcig bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur/_/nor bu rgyal po'i mthu ni de 'dra bas/_/de bas mi yis 'bad pa chen pos zung /_/dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am/_/btsun mo slas sam dpung gi 
[\[233b.4\]]gtso bo 'am/_/skyes pa 'am bud med khye'u dang bu mo dag_/nor bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa/_/de ni ston pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/chom rkun gyis ni mi slus shing /_/gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/_/'jig pa mi bzad brgyad las thar/_/de la dug 
[\[233b.5\]]dang sbyar ba'i dug_/sbyar dug drag pos mi tshugs shing /_/de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur/_/gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod/_/de la nad kyis mi tshugs shing /_/na bas ma yin sdig pas min/_/pad+ma chu yis mi chags ltar/_/rtag tu chags pa med par gnas/_/
[\[233b.6\]]g.yul 'gyed pa yi nad na 'am/_/'thab bam 'gyed pa'am rtsod pa na/_/lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni/_/thob par 'gyur te the tsom med/_/de nas rdzas ni bshad bya ste/_/sman ni bkra shis dang ldan pa/_/grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu gtsang /_/'jig rten mgon 
[\[233b.7\]]dang mnyam par gsungs/_a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pal dang /_shi ri sha'i me tog dang /_a bA marga dang /_me ru dang /_na la da dang /_chu srin gyi sen mo dang /_ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang /_tsan+dan gyi 'bras bu dang /_/pad+ma'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]rdo dreg dang /_med dang /_btsod dang /_sU ka ri dang /_ma ka TI dang /_dzA ya dang /_bi dzA ya dang /_pa ri pe la pa dang /_ra sa dang /_bI rA dang /_d+h+ya ma ka dang /_rgya spos dang /_bu sA dang /_a par ta ka dang /_ru rta dang /_bya gran kha dang /_pad tra 
[\[234a.2\]]dang /_tra tsa dang /_ka dmar rA dang /_pri yang ku dang /_gi'u wang dang /_spr-i ka dang /_smyig rkang dang /_yungs kar dang /_nA ga puSh+pa dang /_e lA dang /_ldong ros dang /_gur gum dang /_ga pur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_spang spos dang /_na le sham dkar po dang /_su ma dang /_
[\[234a.3\]]nye'u shing dang /_shu ti dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_tsam pa ka ste/_de bzhin rdzas ni de dag kun/_/su bar Na ni dkar pos sbyar/_/ril bu nam gcig tsam du ni/_/skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin/_/su bar Nas ni bkab nas su/_/rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya/_/cha 
[\[234a.4\]]rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste/_/gla rtsi yis ni dri bskyed do/_/phye ma zhib mor btags nas su/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i chu sbyar nas/_/grib ma la ni bskam par bya/_/tshes brgyad nas ni brtsams nas su/_/tshes ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga nya yi bar/_/nyin gcig bzhin du don yod pa'i/_/rgyal 
[\[234a.5\]]pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so/_/khro bo'i rgyal po nyin gcig bzhin/_/lan bdun bar du dbang bskur ro/_/phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar yang bya/_/de nas tshes ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ste/_/nya la chu dang yungs kar dag_/dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/_/de nas nor bu'i rgyal po dang /_/
[\[234a.6\]]gzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/_/cha rnams ma nor legs par dbye/_/rgyar ni ko la'i tshad du bya/_/shin tu 'jam la phyi bdar legs/_/tshon rtsi sna tshogs mdzes pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdab bo/_/sgo bzhi gdod cing grwa bzhi gdod/_/kun 
[\[234a.7\]]nas shin tu cha phye zhing /_/dkyil 'khor snying po cha phye ba/_/tshad dang shin tu ldan par bya/_/pad+ma chen po bzhi dag dang /_/de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcas/_don yod dngos grub bri bar bya/_/nor bu rgyal po 'chang ba yis/_/phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya/_/chu yi rgya 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]mtsho'i nang du ni/_/las kyis rdo rje legs par bri/_/dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la/_/kun nas kha khyer rnam pa dang /_/me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun du ni/_/nor bu pad+ma legs par bri/_/sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su/_/pad+ma zhags pa 
[\[234b.2\]]mdung rtse gsum/_/rdo rje'i tshul mchog legs par bri/_/grwa bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su/_/lag na nor bu yod pa bri/_/pad+ma'i steng na rab tu gnas/_/dkyil 'khor bzang po phan phran dang /_/bum pa bkang dang me tog dang /_/bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan/_/
[\[234b.3\]]gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag_/ci bdog bungs cher gzhag par bya/_/kun du mar me phreng ba dang /_/mchod yon chu dang a ga ru/_/tsan+dan bdug spos dbul bar bya/_/nor bu rgyal po 'jigs med pa/_/snod bzang legs par bkang nas su/_/rgya dar la yis 
[\[234b.4\]]kha g.yogs te/_/dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag_/dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang /_/gzhag ste de nas las rdo rje/_/snod kyi steng du bzhag pa ni/_/nor bu dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po 
[\[234b.5\]]lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/_khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya/_de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'bum tshang bar bzlas brjod bya ste/_'bum bzlas brjod byas na nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag_/
[\[234b.6\]]g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas ni/_/chang pa dam du bsdam par bya/_/bsdams pa tsam gyi mod dag la/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/_/nor bu dri ma med pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa zhes bya ba/_rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob la 
[\[234b.7\]]'khor rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/_khung gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]rgya dag kha ton du lobs par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_'dud pa dag gis gsong por smra bar byed/_thams cad du yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 
[\[235a.2\]]thar ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba thob par 'gyur/_tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/_don yod pa'i pad+ma'i 'khor lo bdun nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na sngar bstan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur 
[\[235a.3\]]la/_mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rgyal po'i ril bu ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las rnams sgrub pa yin no/_/tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/_gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams 
[\[235a.4\]]cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_nor bu'i ril bu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing blta bar 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong zhing rtag tu blta bar 'gyur/_ril bu rang gi lus 
[\[235a.5\]]la yod pa de yang phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po mchod rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/_'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa grangs dang bgrang 
[\[235a.6\]]ba'i tshul gyis bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa/_mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_dam pa'i chos spong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[235a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bdag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_bde 'gro'i lam la gzhol 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bar 'gyur/_tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na legs par sgrub pa mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/_mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/_shin tu gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pa 'bad pas sbyar bar bya/_
[\[235b.2\]]rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs su btang nas btsal bar bya zhing cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yongs su btsal bar bya ba yin na phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_gos dang /_rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas yongs su btsal 
[\[235b.3\]]bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_srog gtang bar bya'i de gtang bar mi bya'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba sgrub pa 'di btsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o/_/'di'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs 
[\[235b.4\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing nams kyang ngan 'gro log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nor bu'i ril bu sgrub pa'i dkyil 
[\[235b.5\]]'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi sman nor bu dang /_gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/_sman nor bu dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_
[\[235b.6\]]phyag rgya'i mthu des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/_bklags pas grub pa/_
[\[235b.7\]]rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba thams cad du nye bar ston par mdzad do/_/rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/_/ngal ba dang /_dub pa dang /_'bad pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]sems kyi rgyud dad pa dang /_gus pa dang /_gsang chen dang /_gsang bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/_dngos grub med par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na gsang sngags sgrub pa ni shin tu gsang bar bya zhing legs par smyung ba byas la 'bad par bya/_/kha 
[\[236a.2\]]zas ngan pa spang bar bya/_gos ngan pa dang /_sems ngan pa yang yongs su spang bar bya/_mi srun pa dang /_mi bden pa dang /_phra ma dang /_sems can sun 'byin par byed pa dang /_gsang sngags rku ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo rku bar byed pa dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor rku bar 
[\[236a.3\]]byed pa de dag gi rtogs pa ni gang na yang med de/_dus gsum gyi mgon pos smad cing byang chub sems dpas kyang smad la/_mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smad pa yin no/_/sems can sdong dum bsregs pa 'di/_/gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs 
[\[236a.4\]]pa/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/rtag tu smad par bya ba yin/_/lha rnams kyis ni yongs su btang /_/ma rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos/_/ma rungs pas ni bgegs kyis zos/_/bslab gzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_/mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa/_/de la 
[\[236a.5\]]dngos grub ji ltar 'byung /_/de la skyob pa gang yang med/_/mgon med kun tu smad pa yin/_/de bas de la dngos grub ni/_/chung ngu'ang med la nyes pa yis/_/gsang sngags dang ni sman mi 'grub/_/nyes pa de dag rang gis byas/_/gzhan yang ma rungs byed pa yin/_/de bas 
[\[236a.6\]]sems can mkhas la sbyin/_/slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dga'/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas/_/sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog_/de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste/_/de yi dngos grub bla na med/_/gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gsang ba yin te/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi 
[\[236a.7\]]snying po gsang ba de yang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya sgrub sla ste/_bklags pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu 'jug cing dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rab tu ston par byed pa yin no/_/rig sngags 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]'chang ni bdag nyid kyis/_/mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba/_/rig sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma yis/_/khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed la/_/'dir ni nyin zhag smyung ba dang /_/dad dang gus pas mchod pa bya/_/don yod 'khor lo sgrub byed pas/_/dngos grub dkyil 
[\[236b.2\]]'khor dam pa bsgrub/_/sman spr-i ka dang /_tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /_a ga ru dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma'i ldum bu dang /_pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /_de bzhin du gi'u wang dang /_ldong ros dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_su ma na ste/_de bzhin cha ni mnyam sbyar te/_/phye ma 
[\[236b.3\]]dag tu byas nas ni/_/de nas don yod rgyal po yis/_/tshes brgyad nas ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya/_/khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad/_/bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur ro/_/de'i 'og tu cha lngar bya ste/_mig bsku ba dang /_ril bu dang /_
[\[236b.4\]]phye ma dang /_til mar tshos pa dang kha gdong bkru zhing khrus bya'o/_/mig sman ni so'u byi re dang lhan cig sbrus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/_/ril bu ni sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig sbru'o/_/phye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me tog dang lhan 
[\[236b.5\]]cig sbru'o/_/til mar btsos pa ni brat+pa ti la ste/_shing pa la sha'i mar dang lhan cig sbru'o/_/kha gdong bkru ba ni tsan+dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig sbru zhing su ma na dang /_gur gum dang /_spos chus lhan cig sbrus la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad zlas brjod bya/_khro bo'i rgyal pos nyi shu 
[\[236b.6\]]rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas gcig tu sbrus te/_/dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag par 
[\[236b.7\]]bya ste/_dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la de nas so sor dar gyis kha bcad de/_dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bzhag la don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/_khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya/_
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]dbang bskur bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/_de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni/_/'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste/_/bdug spos lnga dag dbul bya ba/_/a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang /_/spr-i ka gu gul du ru ska/_/mchod yon snod 
[\[237a.2\]]ni lnga dbul zhing /_/gtor ma lnga ni dgang bya ste/_/ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgang /_/ro ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i/_/gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya/_/kun tu phreng ba nyi shu dang /_/mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang /_/spos kyi phyi ma lnga dag dang /_/spos kyi cha lngar phye bas 
[\[237a.3\]]byug_/'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags/_/tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes par bya/_/gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi/_/bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga/_/rin po che ni lnga gzhug go/_/sgo bzhi grwa bzhir bum pa brgyad/_/brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid/_/dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras 
[\[237a.4\]]yos dang /_/yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram/_/slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni/_/gos dang snod dang yon gyis so/_/thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar/_/ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su/_/dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 
[\[237a.5\]]gshegs par gsol/_/de nas las rnams bya ba ni/_/ji ltar yid la sna tshogs bya/_/don yod chen po'i gzhal med khang /_/rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsang /_/de nyid dngos grub bsgrub sla ba/_/de bzhin nor bu sman sngags so/_/don 'di shin tu bkra shis 
[\[237a.6\]]te/_/mkhas pa mi yis bya ba yin/_/phra ma'i tshig kyang mi bsten te/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni nam yang sma mi bya/_/'di ni bsgrub pa'i de nyid de/_/de la 'grub pa the tsom med/_/'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/_/kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste/_/grwa bzhi cha ni legs par dbye/_/
[\[237a.7\]]ko la'i tshad de legs pa dang /_/sna tshogs tshon gyi thig skud kyis/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab bo/_/dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying por ni/_/'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya/_/dbus kyi lte bar pad+ma yis/_/'khor lo gsal ba bri bar bya/_/pad+ma'i snying po 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gser dang ni/_/dngul lam tsan+dan las byas pa/_/'bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs/_/'khor lo kun tu rtsibs dang ni/_/mu khyud dag gis cha dbye'o/_/dkyil 'khor snying po'i grwa rnams der/_/lha yi dbang po tshangs pa dang /_/khyab 'jug dbang phyug 
[\[237b.2\]]chen po bri/_/kun tu kha khyer rnam pa dang /_/pad+mas phreng ba rnams bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni/_/rtags dang phyag rgya rnams bri ste/_/rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum/_/ral gri zhags pa tho ba dang /_/gshin rje be con pad+ma gdugs/_/dbyug to mda' po 
[\[237b.3\]]che rnams so/_/grwa rnams kun tu phreng ba dang /_/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgram/_/sgo sgo der ni dkyil 'khor gyi/_/lha ste gshin rje chu lha dang /_/lus ngan dang ni gzhon nu bri/_/dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi rnams su ni/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag_/go cha legs par 
[\[237b.4\]]bgos pa dang /_/khro bar lta ba 'jigs byed bri/_/'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams/_/legs par yongs su rdzogs par ni/_/rig sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin/_/de nas legs par khrus byas la/_/gos gtsang bgos 
[\[237b.5\]]pa 'jigs med pas/_/sman mchog bzung ste las bya'o/_/rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang /_/sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sprul pa/_/gang gis ngan 'gro thar 'gyur ba/_/sems can kun la bstan par bya/_/rtag tu dga' dang dad pa dang /_/gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[237b.6\]]rig sngags 'chang gis bsgrub pa'i mchog_/dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas la rdzas kyi dri chab gtsang ma don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/_tsan+dan gyi chu la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas skra yan 
[\[237b.7\]]chad tsam byugs la tshod zin par bskus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o/_/mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na mig bzang bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro/_/de bzhin du til mar 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas skra yan chad bsku ba dang /_tshod zin bar bsku ba dang /_lus rkang mthil yan chad bsku'o/_/yi ge gcig po yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang /_btsun mo'i sgo 'am/_skye bo'i nang ngam/_'dus 
[\[238a.2\]]pa chen po'am/_dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/_tshogs dang phrad pa'am/_de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang kha dog tu mthong zhig sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang tsam gyis spags te 'dug la/_ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi 
[\[238a.3\]]dad pa de lta de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/_rgyal po'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'am/_mi'i seng ge'am/_phag gam/_sred med kyi bur ston pa'am/_tshangs pa'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po'am/_dbang phyug chen po mig gsum pa'am/_gzhon nu 'am/_
[\[238a.4\]]chu lha'am/_gshin rje'am/_rnam thos kyi bu'am/_de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi'am/_nag po chen po'am/_dag 'byed dbang phyug gam/_ser skya'am/_gsang ba pa'am/_lag na rdo rje stobs po che'am/_nor bu bzang po'i bu'am/_gang ba bzang po'am/_
[\[238a.5\]]stobs kyi lha'am/_gar mkhan mchog gam/_rlung lha'am/_drang srong nyid de ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do/_/me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de 
[\[238a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /_gzugs sna tshogs su snang zhing gzhal med khang gi rnam pa dag kyang ston par byed do/_/ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed do/_/'khor tshogs pa'am/_dgon pa'am/_'chag sa dag kyang 
[\[238a.7\]]sman nor bu dang /_gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do/_/'gron po 'brog gi nang du phyin pa nyam thag pa/_'jigs pa mi bzad pa/_chu med pa/_dgon par mgon med pa/_sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i na 'du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]gyur pa/_skyabs med pa/_mgon med par gyur pa/_skyob pa med pa/_dpung gnyen med par gyur pa na de la rig sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bya/_phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo bris la ril bu lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 
[\[238b.2\]]gzhag go/_/yungs kar la til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/_khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas khro bo'i rgyal po hU~M zhes bya bas phyag rgya bcings la sa la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar 
[\[238b.3\]]bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/_phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[238b.4\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_nyo tshong dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_rta dang /_glang po'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_dge 
[\[238b.5\]]sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_tshong pa dang /_khyim dang /_khang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go/_/chu dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang 
[\[238b.6\]]du gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dgra 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la 'obs bcad 
[\[238b.7\]]cang rab kha khyer gyis bskor la grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan pa'am/_gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so/_/mtshan mo'i dri'i til mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/_brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas chad pa gang me'i nang du 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]gtor/_/chang pa gang phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na kun nas mar me phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/_/ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro/_/gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'am/_ri'am/_phug gam/_'chag sa'i gnas sam/_khyim du gtor na mar me'i phreng 
[\[239a.2\]]ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/_chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/_grong khyer gyi sgor yungs kar gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang na phyir rgol ba dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 
[\[239a.3\]]gnas pa'i grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_tshal gyi nang ngam/_dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_thams cad phan tshun ngo mi shes nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros par byed do/_/dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na mtshon cha thams cad 
[\[239a.4\]]dang /_'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro/_/zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro/_/dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyed byed do/_/
[\[239a.5\]]de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa spos kyis lus bskus pa des/_yungs kar dang /_til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[239a.6\]]la gtor bar bya/_khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgya bcas pa'i lag pas ril bu spyi bor bzhag la phye mas gdab par bya/_til mar gyi rgyal pos rkang pa la byug par bya/_don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya ste/_yongs su sbyang ba'i las lhan cig 
[\[239a.7\]]bya ba legs par byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/_gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro'o/_/lha'i steng du gtor na lha lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' ba der 'gro'o/_/phye mas lha'i 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]steng du gtor la khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya ba mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la bdag nyid kyi pus mo dang /_byin pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rkang mthil la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi 
[\[239b.2\]]tsam mi reg go/_/rdo'i steng du rkang pa bzhag pa dang /_rkang rjes byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang /_bum pa dang /_bum bu bzhag pa'i rkub la bskus na sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'dug go/_/yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mes sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas 
[\[239b.3\]]lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_til mar gyis sbrus pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas mig la bskus na mig gsum ston cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do/_/thal bas lus la byugs na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to/_/shing pa 
[\[239b.4\]]la sha dang parna sha bsres pas lus byugs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang /_shugs dang /_gzugs su ston to/_/til mar chen pos khar bskus la thal bas dpral bar thig le byas na gzhon nu'i gzugs su ston to/_/yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar 
[\[239b.5\]]chen po byugs pas bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/_phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/_de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gzhag_/de nas las thams cad byed de nam mkha' la gtor na 
[\[239b.6\]]nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i tshe nam mkha' la gtor na me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/_'dus pa'i nang du nam mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu dang nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs pa ston to/_/tshal gyi nang du gtor na me tog 
[\[239b.7\]]dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ston to/_/ri phug tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to/_/mchod rten rnying pa'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_lha'i gnas su gtor na yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhing rdzogs pa khang pa bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]ston to/_/grong khyer stong bar gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yul gyi rgyal po dang /_slas dang /_bkrabs pa dang /_mdun na 'don pa dang /_blon po dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_
[\[240a.2\]]bu mo dag ston to/_/yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i hU~M zhes bya bas gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ston to/_/dur khrod kyi nang du gtor na shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_lha 
[\[240a.3\]]ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_dri za'am/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_bya'am/_nya'am/_ru sbal gyi rigs su skyes pa'am/_lha'i 'jig rten nam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa'am/_thod pa la tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la gang du skyes pa de'i 
[\[240a.4\]]gtam yang smra'o/_/gang dang gang gi skye gnas su skyes pa de thams cad smra la thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o/_/yungs kar des kyang rus gong 'brel pa'am/_shi ba'i ro'am/_rus pa 'thor ba la bab na bab pa tsam gyi mod la sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar nas 
[\[240a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zong bkram pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' la gtor na skar ma rnams mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa'i nang du 
[\[240a.6\]]gtor na thams cad bro rdung bar byed do/_/dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na dge slong thams cad bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyur ro/_/mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang /_wa dang /_
[\[240a.7\]]khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na sbyor ma thams cad 'bar la ma he'i gzugs can du snang ngo /_/shi ba'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed do/_/thod pa'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do/_/lam gyi bzhi/_
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]mdor gtor na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la ji srid 'tsho'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/_/nyin gcig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na mchod pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te/_gzhan yang rang gi blo rnams kyis las 
[\[240b.2\]]'bum snyed byed do/_/don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_de nas de'i phyir 'gugs pa chen po dang /_lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstan 
[\[240b.3\]]pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/_gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang /_phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du ston to/_/rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che/_/rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang /_/de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs po che/_/log 'dren rnams ni rab 
[\[240b.4\]]'joms dang /_/khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan/_/ki li ki li'i rgyal po che/_/khro bo chol pa stobs po che/_/de bzhin rdo rjes 'og gzugs/_/rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang /_/klu chen rab 'joms spyan yangs dang /_/sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang /_/de bzhin thigs 
[\[240b.5\]]khro khros chen dang /_/de bzhin mche ba gtsigs mdzad dang /_/rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog_/klu yi dbang po stobs kyis gnon/_/mgon po gos sngon gyon pa dang /_/dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang /_/'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma'i lte/_/phyag na pad+ma pad+ma 
[\[240b.6\]]phyug_/de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang /_/de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten bla/_/sna tshogs gzugs te bzang po dang /_/sred med bu dang tshangs pa dang /_/drag po dang ni dbang phyug dang /_/nag po chen po gzhon nu dang /_/gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid/_/
[\[240b.7\]]nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang /_/rgyu skar sgra gcan mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/de bzhin gza' dang lha ma yin/_/nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/_/gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che/_/'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu/_/de bzhin yul skyong mig mi bzang /_/'phags skyes de 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]nyid mthong ba dang /_/mi'u thung dang ni drang srong gzugs/_/nor bu bzang sras gang ba dang /_/sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang /_/rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang /_/tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang /_/bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang /_/dge 
[\[241a.2\]]sbyong stag dang seng ge dang /_/khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha/_/shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha/_/gang gA si tA ya mu nA/_/zla ba skal ldan ru sbal nya/_/lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can/_/skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang /_/me tog rgyal rlabs chen po dang /_/sna tshogs gzugs 
[\[241a.3\]]dang rnam sna tshogs/_/de ltar dgug pa bstan pa dang /_/de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid/_/sbyin sreg dra ba 'di nyid ni/_/sgyu 'phrul rmad byung gsang sngags grub/_/rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub/_/don yod zhags pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/de nyid dngos grub rab ston 
[\[241a.4\]]pa/_/mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang /_/lha yi gnas dang de bzhin grong /_/grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i dngo /_/mtshe'u dang lteng ka chu bo dang /_/rdzing dang de bzhin char 'bab dang /_/'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'gyu dang /_/gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang /_/dud 
[\[241a.5\]]pa'i phung po bde 'gyed dang /_/skyes bu go cha gyon pa dang /_/de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong /_/khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang /_/de nyid rmad du byung ba ste/_/rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang /_/de nyid dngos grub bla na med/_/sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas/_/
[\[241a.6\]]bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad/_/rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub/_/dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing /_/sdang ba rnams ni byams par bgyid/_/mu stegs gzhan rnams dad par bgyid/_/mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid/_/gdul 
[\[241a.7\]]dka' rnams ni thar bar 'tshal/_/dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob/_/ting 'dzin bla na med pa thob/_/chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong /_/sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig_/mi rigs byas rnams thar pa 'thob/_/mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]don/_/dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog_/ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul/_/ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru/_/thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas/_/ma grol ngan 'gro kun las 'grol/_/sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/_/lung ma bstan 
[\[241b.2\]]pa lung ston byed/_/skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams/_/thams cad mod la spong bgyid de/_/de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/_/bklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags/_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/_/don gyi dngos grub bla na med/_/gang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid/_/
[\[241b.3\]]dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/yid la bsams pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/'dir ni yid kyis rnam bsams pa/_/ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang /_/ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa/_/de ltar rnam 'phrul ston par bgyi/_/tshes grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal/_/smyung ba 
[\[241b.4\]]bgyi ba mi 'tshal te/_/cho ga ji bzhin dus ci bzhin/_/cho ga rig sngags rgyal po bzlas/_/rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur cing /_/legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag_/bgos pa bden par smra ba dang /_/bla ma la ni gus byed pa/_/rtag tu byams pa'i sems la 
[\[241b.5\]]gnas/_/sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog_/sdom la gnas shing tshangs par spyod/_/chos ma yin pa spong byed pa/_/gal te de nyid grub 'dod na/_/chang dang sha dang kun dong dang /_/'dres dang za 'phro sbags pa spang /_/sems can ngan pa sun 'byin pa/_/rig 
[\[241b.6\]]sngags rku dang cho ga rku/_/chos rku gsang sngags rku ba dang /_/de bzhin rkun mo chom rkun dang /_/ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis/_/de dag la ni dngos grub med/_/ma rungs pa yis dam tshig nyams/_/yid gcugs pa ni med par byed/_/sdig pa'i chos ni kun du spyod/_/
[\[241b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis smad/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad/_/rtag tu chos kyi sdong dum 'gyur/_/shi nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol/_/rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur/_/dbul po lus ni skams pa dang /_/mdze dang khyi rngos 'debs pa 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dang /_/sdug bsngal rkun ma chos sun 'byin/_/chos rku ba yi lus can ni/_/'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten pha rol ga la bde/_/sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin/_/de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes 
[\[242a.2\]]su 'brang bar bya zhing rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang /_/pha dang ma dang bla ma dang /_ston pa ni skyob pa dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen mdzad pa/_ston pa/_mchog sbyin pa/_dngos grub dang /_mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_rga shi las thar bar byed pa/_dbang phyug sbyin pa/_nor sbyin pa/_
[\[242a.3\]]longs spyod sbyin pa/_dang ba mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/_mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug mgon po/_mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/_gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/_dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/_mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs 
[\[242a.4\]]las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa/_nad sna tshogs sbyong bar grub pa/_rin po sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/_'jig rten sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/_bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyid pa lags te/_de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams 
[\[242a.5\]]cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/_rtag tu 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyis pa lags so/_/de nas rdzas kyi sman grub pa dang /_bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/_seng ge'i lce dang /_snying dang /_mig dang /_de bzhin du nya phyis kyi phye dang /_ldong ros dang /_
[\[242a.6\]]brah+ma'i 'o ma dang /_gu gul dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma'i ze ba dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_nA ga pus pa dang /_li shi dang /_rgya spos dang /_de bzhin du gi'u wang dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur dang /_gur gum dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_spr-i ka dang /_te dza ba ti ste de ltar cha mnyam 
[\[242a.7\]]par byas pa de dag thams cad phye ma zhib mor byas la dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar gyis g.yogs/_don yod pa'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri bzlas brjod bya'o/_/dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]brjod byas pas dbang bskur zhing phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur ro/_/khri tshang nas cha lnga byas te phye ma dang /_til mar dang /_nor bu dang /_mig bsku ba dang /_til mar tshos pa dang cha lnga'o/_/phye ma'i pad+ma mu ru ka'i phye ma dang sbyar la bzlas brjod bya'o/_/
[\[242b.2\]]khro bo'i rgyal pos ni lnga stong ngo /_/til mar ni ma hA ru d+hi ras 'grub ste brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo /_/nor bu ni sbrul gyi khrag gis sbrus te khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o/_/mig sman ni rma bya'i mig chu 
[\[242b.3\]]dang /_'ug pa'i mig dang /_klad pa dang sbyar la khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad do/_/brah+ma tai la srang nyi shu/_gan d+ha ra ba tai la srang brgyad/_yungs mar la srang bcu drug_/'o ma la srang brgya/_ba ser mo grub pa'i 'o ma dang /_ba'i 
[\[242b.4\]]lci ba dang /_ba gcin srang bdun/_du ru ska'i mar khu srang gnyis te rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nas pad+ma'i sdong bus dkrug cing zangs snod du btso'o/_/mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/_/cho ga dag gis bsrung bar bya/_/cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyar/_/
[\[242b.5\]]me tog bdug spos dag gis bdug_/til mar mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/chung ngur me bud grub pa mchog_/spos kyi shing gis bud pa bzang /_/'di ltar grub par shes pa dang /_/khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba/_/nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskur ro/_/til 
[\[242b.6\]]mar de ni snod gtsang ma/_/zangs snod yang na dngul snod bzang /_/smyig ma'i snod du gzhag par bya/_/de nas rig sngags brgyad stong dang /_/khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid/_/so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya/_/dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa der gzhag par 
[\[242b.7\]]bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas nas gzhag cing slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/_ji ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang /_'jug pa dang /_dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang /_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]phyag bya ba dang /_spyi'u gtsug bcing ba dang /_phyag rgya bcing ba dang /_srung ba'i cho ga dang /_nye reg bya ba dang /_gos bgo ba dang /_mchod phyir thogs pa sde dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyi de dag thams cad bstan par bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[243a.2\]]dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por bzhag la rig sngags 'chang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas pas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/_khro bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/_phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang 
[\[243a.3\]]bskur la/_phyag rgya bcings nas rnam pa gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro/_/de nas las thams cad byas te yungs kar dkar po grub pa la rig sngags 'chang gis brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la pad+ma'i mchog gtso bo gtsang ba/_gtsang mar byas pa/_legs 
[\[243a.4\]]par bkrus pa/_sbyangs pa/_phye ma zhib tu btags pa thal ba lta bu la brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang /_gu gul dang /_tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_spr-i ka la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang la/_dbus kyi dkyil 
[\[243a.5\]]'khor dam pa'i steng du so sor gzhag go/_/de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/_gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba'i tshe bya ba thams cad byed do/_/gser ram/_yang na dngul lam/_zangs las pad+ma'i tshad 
[\[243a.6\]]du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_snying po dang /_ze ba can dang /_de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/_skud pa dmar po'i zhags pa pad+ma'i tshon dmar pos bzhen pa/_gzhon nus 
[\[243a.7\]]bkal ba grub pa/_de dag la brgya stong bzlas brjod bya/_khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag go/_/gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe las thams cad grub pa stan to/_/
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]shin tu gtsang zhing gtsang bar bya ste/_su la yang mi sbyin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyur pa/_dam tshig nyams pa la bgegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing /_'phral du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams kyang shes par mi 
[\[243b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan ni bla ma la gus shing /_/sangs rgyas chos la rten byed pa/_/'phags pa'i tshogs la dang ba dang /_/byams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_/de yi lag tu rab tu sbyin/_/bdag gi srog bzhin gtad par bya/_/de dag dngos grub mchog sbyin te/_/
[\[243b.3\]]bklags dang mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin/_/rjes su mthun pa'i las byed do/_/'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu bde/_/'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin/_/'gro ba lam ni bde bar 'gro/_/gang na 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/_/bde ba can 
[\[243b.4\]]du rtag tu 'gro/_/brdzus te skye ba'i pad+ma las/_/rgyan rtags kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/tshe rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te/_/sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par 'dod pa gtsang mas legs par 
[\[243b.5\]]khrus bya/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas lag na rdo rje dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du bzhag ste/_me tog dang bdug spos dbul zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs 
[\[243b.6\]]dang /_phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa yang bya/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug_/lag na rdo rje la gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis bdug_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha 
[\[243b.7\]]bshos dkar po 'bul/_lag na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/_nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya/_mtshan mo khro bo'i rgyal po ngal ba med par bzlas brjod bya ste/_kha gdong khro gnyer med pa dang /_dri ma 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dang ser sna med pas nam langs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar bar 'gyur la/_lag na rdo rje yang pus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/_de gnyis kyi mig nas 'dzag pa/_rig sngags 'chang gis 
[\[244a.2\]]blangs nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/khar bcug na rig sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang /_shugs dang /_brtson 'grus kyis pha rol 
[\[244a.3\]]gnon par 'gyur/_lag na rdo rje'i rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par byed la/_rang gi gzugs kyis spyod par byed/_lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang /_shugs dang /_brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa rjes su sbyin par 
[\[244a.4\]]byed/_de ltar lag na rdo rjes 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su til mar chen po ran par bdag nyid la bsku/_mig sman gyis mig byug_/phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid thig le bya/_nor bu mgo la bzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug_/bdag 
[\[244a.5\]]nyid gos ngur smrig bgos nas sangs rgyas yid la bya ba sgom zhing /_zhi ba dang dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi sde can gyi nang du zhugs sam/_dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rig sngags 
[\[244a.6\]]'chang de bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang /_mdog dang /_rtags dang /_spyod lam du mthong ste/_mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa 'od 'dom gang ba/_stan pad+ma/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun gyi bdar ba'i lha tshogs sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to/_/
[\[244a.7\]]dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_mdog tu mthong nas thams cad zhabs gnyis la 'dud par byed do/_/rig sngags 'chang des brnyas par mi bya zhing /_bdag la bstod par yang mi bya/_brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyi bsod nams 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen pos stobs bcu dang ldan par dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/_rgyu des na brnyas par mi bya'o/_/de nas grong khyer dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/_de nas 'dus 
[\[244b.2\]]pa'i nang du 'jug par bya/_de nas grong dang /_tshang tshing dang /_yul dang /_ri brags kyi nang du 'jug par bya/_de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/_yul gyi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /_mdog 
[\[244b.3\]]dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang /_rim gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no zhes smra ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga 'thob bo/_/yungs kar dang /_til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtor cing byugs 
[\[244b.4\]]na/_thams cad lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su ston to/_/rkang pa til mar gyis bskus na sa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis spags te nam mkha' la 'gro ste/_ji srid du ma 
[\[244b.5\]]bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du ston to/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang de nang par sngar langs nas gtsang ma khrus byas te/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas 
[\[244b.6\]]phyogs bzhir gtor na/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_btsun mo dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu rgyan dang 
[\[244b.7\]]phreng ba byas la mgo la gdags so/_/til mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya/_dpral bar thig le bya/_mig sman gyis mig bsku/_phye mas bdag nyid la gdab/_ras bzang po yug gcig bgo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad du bgyi ba dang /_nor bu dang /_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_gser skud kyis bcings na de dag thams cad rgyan dang /_spud pa dang /_nor bu dang /_dngul dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai dUr+ya sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan par snang ngo /_/lag na pad+ma thogs na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[245a.2\]]phyug gi gzugs su snang ngo /_/yid la ji ltar bsams pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang /_'jigs pa brgyad dang /_tshangs pa'i tshul dang /_yid bzhin nor bu dang /_rgod ma'i kha dang /_mgul sngon dang /_rta mgrin du ston to/_/ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar 
[\[245a.3\]]ston te/_ji srid du thig le yod cing dbu rgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs ston par byed do/_/til mar dang /_yungs kar dang bsres na/_king kuSh+Tha dang lhan cig sbrus nas lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/_dpral bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas pad+ma'i phye mas gtor 
[\[245a.4\]]la/_nor bu spyi gtsug tu bcing /_mig sman gyis mig bsku/_gu gul gyis bdugs la shes rab can khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul byas na mngon sum du rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su snang ste/_de la the tshom mi bya'o/_/ji srid du bdag khrus ma byas pa de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can du snang la 
[\[245a.5\]]las sna tshogs byed cing mi dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/_de la the tshom mi bya'o/_/seng ge'i khrag gis til mar dang nor bu sbrus nas lus la bskus na mi'i seng ge chen po'i gzugs su ston to/_/phag gi khrag gis sbrus nas lus la bskus 
[\[245a.6\]]na phag gi gzugs chen por ston to/_/til mar dang /_phye ma lhan cig sbrus nas yung ba dang /_shing pa la sha'i mdog tu byas la lus la bskus na sred med kyi bu'i gzugs su ston to/_/rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma dang /_til mar lhan cig sbrus la lus la bskus na dbang phyug 
[\[245a.7\]]chen po'i gzugs su ston to/_/shing arka'i 'o ma dang /_til mar dang /_mnyam par sbyar la lus la bskus na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to/_/glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbyar nas lus la bskus na tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to/_/ra'i khrag 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]dang sbrus nas lus la byugs na ra'i gzugs su ston to/_/til mar dang /_thing shing dang /_pad+ma'i phye ma dang /_glang po che'i khrag dang lhan cig sbyar nas lus la bskus na nag po chen po'i gzugs mngon sum du rang gi gzugs su ston la/_gang dang gang dag la thig
