[\[245b.2\]]le byas na ma mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su ston to/_/sbrul gyi khrag dang /_pags pa dang /_til mar gyi rgyal po dang lhan cig sbrus la sgal tshigs su bsku zhing /_dpung pa g.yon par yang bskus na klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su ston te/_ji ltar ji ltar khrag dang sbyar 
[\[245b.3\]]zhing ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar gzugs ston to/_/de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod na yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas dge 'dun gyi nang du steng 'og tu gtor/_phye mas nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun tu bskus na dge 'dun rgan rims su bkod 
[\[245b.4\]]pa'i dbus su gzhal med khang chen po rgyan gyis brgyan pa ston/_dge slong rnams kyi steng du gtor na dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ji ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang /_gzhan dag blon po dang /_gzhan dag bkrabs pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[245b.5\]]dag mdun na 'don pa dang /_gzhan dag yongs su spyod pa'i gzugs su ston la/_yungs kar la bskus pas gtor na slar yang dge slong rnams su snang ngo /_/shing arka'i 'o ma yungs kar la bskus nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge slong rnams kyis mal stan gyi steng du 
[\[245b.6\]]gtor na/_ji ltar dge slong thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo /_/ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa la gtor na rgan po 'khar ba thogs pa sgur po ltag dgye skra dkar can nyam chung bar snang ngo /_/mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gtor ba gal te mtshan thog thag bzhag 
[\[245b.7\]]na gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na de thur ma'i gzeb dang /_sbrul nag po snang ngo /_/snod kyi steng du gtor na kham phor du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/btung ba'i snod sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i steng du gtor na phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo /_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer kun tu gtor na grong khyer kun nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer kun la yungs kar dang pad+ma'i phye ma gtor na skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo mi snang ba thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge'i khrag 
[\[246a.2\]]dang sbyar nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi steng du gtor na lam gyi bzhi mdo thams cad du seng ge'i gzugs su ston to/_/sde drag cing gtum la yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na thams cad wa'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug go/_/g.yul 
[\[246a.3\]]'gyed sar gtor na thams cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la mtshon cha thams cad dang /_go cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/me'i nang du gtor na mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/_/til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[246a.4\]]chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/bum pa chus bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so/_/tshal gyi nang du yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu mi snang bar 'gyur pa thams cad snang zhing shing 
[\[246a.5\]]skam po dang /_tshal gyi mthar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to/_/nam mkha' la gtor na phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/_'dus pa'i nang ngam/_skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/_lha'i dri legs par smin pa yid dga' 
[\[246a.6\]]ba sim par byed pa 'bab bo/_/las dang ldan pa'am/_bzo'i gnas kyi las te/_las kyi snod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la phye mas bsku/_pad+ma chen po'i phye mas 'khor gyi gnas bsku/_yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor la/_de nas las kyi 
[\[246a.7\]]bzo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yo la/_las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed par 'byung ste/_gal te phyir bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do/_/
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la dpag tshad brgya stong tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la phye mas byug cing yungs kar chags par byas la/_pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas 'jim pa 
[\[246b.2\]]bzhag la snod kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste/_snod kyi ngo bo dngul las byas pa'am/_gser las byas pa'am/_zangs las byas pa'am/_lcags las byas pa'am/_lcags lnga las byas pa rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis spras pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i snod 
[\[246b.3\]]bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/_nyo tshong byed pa yang 'byung ste/_rin chen pos tshong byed do/_/yungs kar gyi phye ma dang /_pad+ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas tshong dus kyi dbus su gtor na kun tu zong bkram pa'i snod mi snang bar byas pa thams cad snang 
[\[246b.4\]]bar byed do/_/thag pa'i steng du gtor na sbrul chen po ston to/_/khyim dang /_ra ba'i ngos dang /_sgo dang /_shing sbyar ba dang /_ka ba'i steng du gtor na khang pa dang /_ra ba dang /_'khor gyi khyams rnams sbrul du ston to/_/ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa ma 
[\[246b.5\]]byas pa/_de srid du sbrul rnams 'dug go/_/bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang ngam/_lha'i gnas sam/_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ngos la gtor na sbrul chen por snang ngo /_/lha'i steng du gtor la mig sman gyis bsku/_ril bus thig le byas na 
[\[246b.6\]]lha'i gzugs brnyan de ku co 'don cing 'gro ste/_gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o/_/bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad/_bzhud par mdzad do/_/'jug 
[\[246b.7\]]par mdzad do/_/'chag par mdzad do/_/tsan+dan la bzlas brjod byas nas bdugs na phyir bzhugs so/_/bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa rnams la gtor na g.yo bar byed do/_/ji tsam du phyir bzlog pa ma byas pa de tsam du g.yo'o/_/chu dang yungs kar 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]gyis bzlog na phyir 'dug go/_/de nas rdo rje bskyod par 'dod na spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/_gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug_/de yang yungs kar dang /_phye ma dang bcas pas gtor la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod 
[\[247a.2\]]byas na/_rdo rje dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/_'phar bar byed/_'dug par byed/_'bar bar byed cing /_phan tshun 'gro bar byed/_mtho bar 'gro bar byed/_dma' bar 'gro bar byed/_rnam par 'gro bar byed/_'bar ba chen pos 'bar bar 
[\[247a.3\]]byed de ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na de nyid du snang ngo /_/de nas 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas me tog sna tshogs dgram pa'ang bya/_gu 
[\[247a.4\]]gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/_lte ba'i dbus su thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/_de la yang yungs kar dang /_pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gdab par bya/_
[\[247a.5\]]'khor lo kun nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing se gol gyi sgra yang byas na 'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'phar zhing sdang ba thams cad la 'bab par byed de/_gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bab na/_de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mgo gcod 
[\[247a.6\]]par byed/_sdang ba thams cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed/_bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_gdon rnams la 'bab pa dang /_klu sdang ba thams 
[\[247a.7\]]cad la bab na 'jig par byed de/_ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar ro/_/chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/_/mdung rtse gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor byas la thod pa gzhag par bya/_me tog 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]dgram pa 'ang bya/_gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs la/_mdung rtse gsum pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/_phye mas gdab cing thig le bya/_rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas thod pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/_yungs kar gyis gtor zhing hU~M 
[\[247b.2\]]zhes se gol byas na mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar bar byed/_ldang bar byed/_nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/_kun du 'bar bar byed/_'gro bar byed/_phyogs bcur 'phar bar byed de/_ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar bar byed do/_/chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog 
[\[247b.3\]]pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/_/dung la til mar gyis byugs la phye mas gtor la thig le bya/_yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus na ji srid du sgra thos pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad bro rdung bar byed/_
[\[247b.4\]]rgyug par byed/_mchod par byed cing phyogs bcur rab tu rgyu par byed do/_/g.yul ngor bus na 'gyed pa'i mi thams cad dang /_mtshon cha thams cad dang /_go cha thams cad btang nas bro rdung bar byed de/_gcer bur 'gyur bar byed/_phyogs bcur rgyug par 
[\[247b.5\]]byed do/_/gal te dung lan bdun bus na phyir rgol ba dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur te/_/ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du mchod zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go/_/spos chus bzlog cing khrus byas na phyir bde bar gnas 
[\[247b.6\]]par 'gyur la/_rtag tu rgyal ba dang /_dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgyu ma de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i gsang sngags dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[247b.7\]]gang du dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing /_kun nas brgyan par yungs kar dang til mar gyi rgyal po dang /_phye mar bsres pas byug pa dang /_thig les kyang dbang bskur cing pad+ma chen po'i phye mas byugs la lag pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang /_hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]brjod na brjod pa tsam dang /_yungs kar gyis gtor ba'i mod la/_gtor ma'i snod dang /_snod rdza ma dang /_bum pa dang /_bum pa bkang ba thams cad dang /_mtshon thams cad dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas nam mkha' la sor bzhi 
[\[248a.2\]]tsam gyis spags te/_'dug la ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du nam mkha' la 'dug go/_/rig sngags 'chang ba sa'i steng gi sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug go/_/las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 
[\[248a.3\]]'khor gyi yod byad dri chab kyi cho gas dbang bskur na gtor ma dang /_snod rdza ma dang /_bum pa dang /_bum pa thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed la/_slar yang rang gi gnas su 'dug go/_/go cha de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya ste/_thams cad du yon tan ston par snang 
[\[248a.4\]]la/_byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/_the tsom mi bya'o zhes bshad do/_/de'i phyir pad+ma'i dngos grub bshad par bya ste/_gser ram dngul lam zangs las shin tu legs shing mdzes pa snying po dang /_ze ba dang bcas shing sdong bu tshad dang ldan par 
[\[248a.5\]]byas la/_'dab ma phyed kha phye ba 'khor bar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang /_snying po dang /_ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/_pad+ma'i phye ma dang /_mig sman dang /_mig bsku ba dang /_thig 
[\[248a.6\]]ler byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/_pad+ma'i sdong bu'i bar du nor bu rin po che bzhag nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/_khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas la/_gos 
[\[248a.7\]]gtsang ma bgos pas til mar gyis bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/_mig bsku ba dang /_thig le dang /_bdug pas bdag nyid kyi lus la bdug par bya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/_lag pa g.yon pa pad+ma gzung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]'dug ste/_'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya ste/_pad+ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas chu dang yungs kar gyis btab na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma sprul pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du bor na pad+ma mgal me bskor ba 
[\[248b.2\]]ltar 'khor bar 'gyur la/_pad+ma 'bum rnams char du 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i chu'i nang du gzhag par bya ba ni mtsho bran nam/_lteng ka'am/_chu bo'am/_chu bo chen po'am/_'obs sam/_rdzing ngam/_mtsho'i nang gang yang rung ba'i gnas su bzhag na gnas de dang de thams cad du pad+ma'i 
[\[248b.3\]]mtsho chen po 'byung ste/_ji srid du pad+ma ma phyung ba de srid du/_dus rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug ste/_ston ka'am/_dgun nam/_dpyid dam/_sos ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug go/_/tshal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus pa phye ma dang sbyar 
[\[248b.4\]]nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig lag gis bzung ste bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor na/_tshal gyi mtha'i shing thams cad la me tog rgyas par snang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/_tshogs pa'i nang ngam/_rgyal po'i pha brang 'khor ram/_skye bo'i nang du me tog ji snyed pa lag gis bskor la/_
[\[248b.5\]]yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chu dang yungs kar gyis thams cad du zlog par byed pa yin no/_/'bras bu ji snyed pa lag gis bzung nas yung kar gyis gtor na 'brang bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gos lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor 
[\[248b.6\]]te bskor na gos dang bla re sna tshogs ston par byed do/_/rgyan lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/_/lha'i rgyan bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bo 'dus pa thams cad kyi rgyun du byed la thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar dang chus 
[\[248b.7\]]bzlog par bya'o/_yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus phye mas bsgo/_/gi'u wang dang /_gur gum dang /_shing kun dang /_snu ha'i 'o mas kyang bsgos la de dag gcig tu byas nas grib ma la bskam mo/_/de nas 'bras bu gcig khar bcug la phyogs bzhir gtor na kha nas me 'bar 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bar snang zhing lus las 'bar ba sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/_ji srid du yungs kar kha na yod pa'i bar du lus las 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo /_/til mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/_kong bur til mar gyi rgyal pos 
[\[249a.2\]]bkang ste mar me 'bum ston par byed do/_/me thab khang bu'i nang du bcug na ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid du ma phyung ba de srid du me 'bar bar ston to/_/mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug la ma phyung na rtag tu 'bar ro/_/mgal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bum snyed du snang 
[\[249a.3\]]ngo /_/gtor ma'i rdza ma dang /_bum pa'i nang du gtor na gtor ma'i rdza ma dang /_bum pa thams cad 'bar bar snang ngo /_/lag cha dang /_mtshon cha thams cad la byugs na gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la ril bu gtsang ma spyi bor bzhag na 
[\[249a.4\]]lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus ril bsregs pa ltar snang ngo /_/'o ma dang yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lag pa dang rkang pa la bskus la/_ril bu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag pa g.yas pas gzung ba'am/_/rkang pa'i mthe 
[\[249a.5\]]bos bzung na lag pa dang /_/rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang /_'brel bar snang ngo /_/'dus pa'i nang ngam/_skye bo 'dus pa mang po'am/_rgyal po'i 'khor ram/_sde can gyi nang ngam/_rig byed bzhi'i nang thams cad du yan lag nyams par snang ngo /_/dri chab dang /_
[\[249a.6\]]yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo mar me'i ril bu bsregs pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag nas yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor na mar me 'bum phrag bye ba snang ngo /_/kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no/_/
[\[249a.7\]]tshal chen po'i mtha' dang /_nang du gtor la shing gcig la ril bu gtsang ma bzhag na shing dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo ma thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo /_/ri'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ri kun tu gtor na ri kun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing mched par snang 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]la sems can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/rkun ma dang /_g.yon can dang /_gnod byed dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_sdang ba dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_phas kyi dgra thams cad dang /_sdang sems can nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gtum po dang /_bya la sogs pa'i 
[\[249b.2\]]bar ril gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan mo nyid phyogs bcu kun du bros shing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to/_/spos chab kyis bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gtor la/_gtsang ma'i ril bu 'bar bar bzhag na gzugs brnyan thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/_spos chu dang /_
[\[249b.3\]]yungs kar gyis bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/mar me'i ril bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi spor spar te gnas gtsang mar gzhag dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga bum pa bkang ba gzhag/_grong khyer kun tu yungs kar gyis gtor zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par byas na grong 
[\[249b.4\]]khyer kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba gcig tu snang ngo /_/grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs na gang grong khyer na gnas pa skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de dag thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[249b.5\]]grong khyer de na gang sdang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang /_phas kyi dgra dang /_chom rkun dang /_g.yon can dang /_gnod byed dang /_glags tshol bar gyur pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_mi ma yin pa gang yang rung 
[\[249b.6\]]ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag lang long du gyur cing gdugs la ngu zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi sgor byung nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros so/_/grong khyer de yang kun nas gnod pa med cing 'khrugs pa med par 'gyur/_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_
[\[249b.7\]]nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_mtshan mo 'das nas spos chu dang /_yungs kar gyis grong khyer gyi sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na bzlog par 'gyur ro//_//
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_ldong ros dang /_thing shun gyi phye ma dang /_yungs kar dang /_ma hA tai la dang /_a rka'i 'o ma dang /_pha gu'i 'o ma dang /_gcig tu sbyar ro/_/nya'i mig mkhris pa dang bcas 
[\[250a.2\]]pa dang /_nA ga pus pa dang /_pad+ma'i chu ba rnams kyang lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor bya'o/_/phye ma snga ma legs par sbyar la chus ril bur byas pa dang /_phye mas gzhan yang bcang ngo /_/phye mas 'di dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma bcang ba lhan cig tu bsres pa'i phye mas lus bskus la phyogs 
[\[250a.3\]]bzhir yungs kar gtor te/_ril bu khar bcug la hU~M zhes bya ba bsdams te brjod na de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing /_de kho na bzhin du rna ba gnyis kyang lha rdzas kyi chu 'byung bar snang /_lus las spos kyi rigs yid du 'ong ba rab tu sim par byed pa 'byung ba ni nad thams cad grub 
[\[250a.4\]]par snang ste/_rgyal ba'i phyag bzhin no/_/yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs te nam mkha' la gtor la ril bu lag pas bskor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/ril bu nam mkha' la 'phangs na mi 'bab bo/_/g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du phye ma de yungs kar dang 
[\[250a.5\]]bsres te nam mkha' la gtor la ril bu de yang khar bcug ste/_steng du bltas la hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgras bos la/_gnam lcags chen po 'bab ste yid mi 'chad pa dang sdug bsngal bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/chu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma de gtor la yungs kar dang /_ril bu chu'i 
[\[250a.6\]]nang du gdab par bya/_phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/_tai las lus la bskus na klu chen po'i gzugs su snang ngo /_/ril bu dang yungs kar me'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar nam mkha' la gtor na 'brug sgra chen po 'byung zhing glog chen po gsal ba snang 
[\[250a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/chu'i nang nas byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/khron pa'i nang du btab na chu lud nas phyogs kun tu chu 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rdza ma'am/_bum pa'am/_rdze'u'am/_ril ba b+h+r-ing+ga ra'am/_ril ba la phye mas byugs te/_de'i steng du yungs kar gyis 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]gtor na chus bkang ste khrus byas na de chu 'bab par snang zhing de'i snod ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dgos pa mang po byed de mchog tu grub pa yin no/_/de nas rin po che'i ched du 'bru mar gyi rgyal po byas te 'bru mar gzhan dang /_de bzhin du til las 'bru mar gyi rgyal 
[\[250b.2\]]po de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag la 'dir nyam drod kyang shes par bya'o/_/gzhag pa thams cad nyam drod shes par bya ba ni mar sar bzhin du 'jam par 'gyur zhing skad cig de nyid la mtho ba dang /_dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin du ri yang 'gyur ro/_/snying 
[\[250b.3\]]po thur ma 'dra ba dang /_zlum po 'am/_yang na lcug ma lta bur byas pas ka ba yang 'dud pa dang /_ri yang dma' ba'am/_yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed do/_/yungs kar dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma lhan cig bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos pa phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor 
[\[250b.4\]]na ri thams cad mi snang zhing 'brog dgon par snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang ri bor snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na mi bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng ge dang /_stag gis gang ba lcug ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba'am/_rtsub pa'am/_dub bu'am 
[\[250b.5\]]khong stong du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi 'o thug gi zas zos te gtsang ma shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang 
[\[250b.6\]]ma bgos pas ri'i gseb tu zhugs la/_sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar ba la yungs kar phye ma dang bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun du dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/lha bshos dang gtor 
[\[250b.7\]]ma dkar po 'bul lo/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas spos sna tshogs kyis lus bskus gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te/_'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus bskus phye mas lus byugs mig sman 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]gyis mig bskus/_thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing mgul pa dang /_lag pa dang /_dpung pa dang /_rked par yang bcings la yungs kar dang mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/_pad+ma chen po'i phye ma de yang phyogs bzhir 
[\[251a.2\]]gtor/_rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang /_pad+ma gzung zhing g.yas pas rnam par lta ba snang ba dang /_don yod pa chen pos dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya bzung ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan cig bzlas brjod byas na ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bshad 
[\[251a.3\]]pa las bstan pa de ltar ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la yang gzhal med khang snang ste/_ri de la rin 
[\[251a.4\]]po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo /_/me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang snang ngo /_/sA la dang /_tA la dang /_ta ma la dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_a sho ka dang /_a d+hi muk+ti ka dang /_ba ri sha ka dang /_ka dam+ba dang /_nI la dang /_pA Ta la dang /_pA lA sha dang /_
[\[251a.5\]]u dum bA ra dang /_dong kA'i me tog sna tshogs dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_ta ra Na dang /_na ba ma li ka dang /_ku pa pya ka sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 
[\[251a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya'o/_/dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/don 
[\[251a.7\]]yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o//_//don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/_de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]pad+ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon/_/pad+ma kha ni phyed bye ba/_/phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin/_/phyag gnyis phyung zhing brkyang nas kyang /_/bskum pa'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis/_/kun nas phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags/_/mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni/_/'di lta ste/_ral gri 
[\[251b.2\]]dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_rdo rje dang /_rdo rje phreng zlum dang /_las kyi rdo rje dang /_zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang /_'khor lo dang /_dung dang /_tho ba dang /_zhags pa dang /_
[\[251b.3\]]dgra sta dang /_dbyug tho dang /_me tog gi thum po dang /_bum pa gang ba dang /_rin po che'i snod dang /_pad+ma'i phreng ba dang /_rdo rje'i phreng zlum dang /_ut+pa la'i phreng ba dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la dang /_zla ba dang /_ri rab dang /_me long 
[\[251b.4\]]dang /_klu dang /_mchod phyir thogs dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang /_be con dang /_gshin rje'i be con dang /_chu srin gyi kha dang /_sngags de'i phreng ba dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng zlum dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_bsgyings pa dang /_
[\[251b.5\]]dbugs 'byin pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_mchog sbyin pa dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_glegs bam bsnams pa dang /_'khar gsil dang /_lhung bzed dang /_gdugs dang /_dbu rgyan dang /_nor bu brgyus pa dang /_gser skud dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_
[\[251b.6\]]gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha dang /_me'i thab khung ngo /_/kun nas 'bar phreng phyag rgya de/_/sna tshogs rmad du byung bas smras/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa yi/_/pad+ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas/_/ras la bris pa'am dkyil 'khor ram/_/rtsig pa'am gang yang rung 
[\[251b.7\]]ba la/_/tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/gang du bris pa mthong ba de/_/ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar ni/_/phyir yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/gang zhig nyes byas mi zad pa/_/mtshams 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]med lnga po byed pa nyid/_/mnar med pa yi gnas dang ni/_/dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba gang /_/phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis/_/'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur/_/skye dang 'chi las rnam par grol/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal bar 'gyur/_/de dag skye 
[\[252a.2\]]ba phyi mar ni/_/phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos te/_/yang dang yang du pad+ma las/_/rdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur/_/rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro/_/gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag med/_/bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu der/_/skye 'gyur the tsom mi za zhing /_/don rnams bde bar 'grub 
[\[252a.3\]]'gyur zhing /_/rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar 'grub/_/bde bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu mi ldogs gnas 'gyur/_/phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur/_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/
[\[252a.4\]]bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob/_/de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa/_/de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin/_/sdig pa thams 
[\[252a.5\]]cad mod la sel/_/gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag_/mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yi/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_/dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni/_/mtho ris sgo phye the tshom med/_/sgo phye gyur pa rnams la ni/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 
[\[252a.6\]]'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/_mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na shi 'phos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[252a.7\]]dkyil 'khor 'di zhugs pa tsam gyis gang na thub pa 'dren pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la/_/kun nas cha nas mdzes par bya/_/gru bzhi go la'i tshad tsam la/_/sgo bzhi them skas bzhi yis brgyan/_/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]shin tu legs par bskus dang ldan/_/'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa yi/_/sa yi cha dang ldan pa la/_/dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis dbye/_/dkyil 'khor de nyid thig btab la/_/phyag rgya bri ba rnam par dbye/_/phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa yi/_/dbus na dkyil 
[\[252b.2\]]'khor snying po yin/_/gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba rnam par dbye'o/_/gru bzhi pa'i dbus su phyag rgya don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang /_phyag rgya rgyan gyis brgyan pa tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis 
[\[252b.3\]]bri'o/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyag rgya bri ba yang shin tu 'byes par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan la kun du yungs kar dkar po gtor ro/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kyi phyi rol gyi gnas su 
[\[252b.4\]]phyogs bzhi kun du bya ba ni ba lang gi lci bas dang bsres pa shin tu legs par byugs pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i phye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang /_kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba rgya chen po dang /_mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo bzhi yang rnam par dbyes par bri'o/_/ji ltar phyag rgya dang mthun 
[\[252b.5\]]pa'i ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/_phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul la/_dbyib mo dang /_phru ba dang /_bum pa dang /_kham phor dang /_rdze'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go/_/kun du bum pa gang ba dang /_/bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang /_/me tog 'bras 
[\[252b.6\]]bu sna tshogs dang /_/gtor ma dkar po dag gis bkang /_/me tog rnam par bkram byas la/_/kun du phreng bas gzhag par bya/_/phreng ba bzang po bzhag nas kyang /_/de bzhin kun du bdug spos dbul/_/a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_du ru ska dang /_sa la ki dang 
[\[252b.7\]]spr-i ka dang /_gu gul dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_sgron shing dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/_gtor ma dang /_me tog dang /_lha bshos dbul lo/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas te bskor la 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram zhing me tog gtor ro/_/gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang /_phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub pa gang dgos pa la sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu 
[\[253a.2\]]mdzes par byas la/_phyis las thams cad bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang ma yis/_/gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la/_/ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya/_/ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa/_/de bzhin du ni las bya'o/_/
[\[253a.3\]]phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam gyis/_/thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i/_/spyi yi rigs ni thams cad du/_/phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams rnams kyis/_/dam tshig kun du shes par 'gyur/_/spyi rigs kun gyi cho 
[\[253a.4\]]ga yi/_/dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin no/_/dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang /_/rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur/_/kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/_/chos kyi ro ni bdud rtsi yi/_/gzi brjid mod la 'jug par 
[\[253a.5\]]'gyur/_/rnam snang mdzad gsungs dkyil 'khor du/_/don yod dngos grub stsol bar mdzad/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang bzhugs pa/_/kun du spyi yi rigs rnams kyi/_/don yod dngos grub mchog myur thob/_/sangs rgyas bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya 
[\[253a.6\]]stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni tshe 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las 
[\[253a.7\]]rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing /_/tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]'thob ste/_/gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston par byed do/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi'i rigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang 
[\[253b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor rnams 'byor 
[\[253b.3\]]par gzigs nas bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang sba ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad phyi bzhin 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po btsun mo dang /_'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams 
[\[253b.4\]]cad gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan ma bri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/_rig sngags 'chang 
[\[253b.5\]]ba rnam dag gi/_/'di nyid sgrub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/spyi yi rigs rnams thams cad kyi/_/cho ga zhib mo bla med yin/_/gang gis sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/_/phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs gnas byon 'gyur zhing /_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[253b.6\]]dgongs par 'gyur/_/rig sngags dngos grub rjes stsol cing /_/rtag tu srung ba mdzad par 'gyur/_/mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/_/the tsom med par myur du byon/_/mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na/_/rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa 
[\[253b.7\]]thams cad rtag tu stsol/_/rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid/_/nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni/_/rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tsom med/_/dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ba ste/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni rgya chen po ko la'i tshad tsam la/_legs par byugs 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]pa shin tu 'jam pa/_shin tu gsal ba gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang /_them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/_rnam par dbyes pa mchog tu mdzes pa dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o/_/me yi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la/_/kun nas 
[\[254a.2\]]them skas bzhi dag dang /_/steng du grwa ni bzhi pa bya/_/rtag tu pad+ma'i snying po dang /_snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang /_/kun nas 'dab ma mdzes par bya/_/grwa bzhir pad+ma'i phreng ba bya/_/de bzhin du grwa gnyis kar rdo rje pad+ma dang bcas pa'o/_/gsum par mdung rtse gsum pa 
[\[254a.3\]]pad+ma dang bcas pa'o/_/bzhi par 'khor lo pad+ma dang bcas pa'o/_/lnga par bum pa gang ba gzhag go/_/sna tshogs tshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i/_/kun nas 'dab ma'i myu gu bya/_/rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang /_/me tog phreng dang ngang ba dang /_/phye ma pad+mar bcas pa dang /_
[\[254a.4\]]de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid/_/de bzhin sna tshogs brgyan pa'o/_/nub kyi gnas dang grwa dag tu/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma ut+pal bcas/_/bum pa dUr bas bkang ba bri/_/rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la/_/'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdab/_/de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya 
[\[254a.5\]]ba/_/thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing /_/sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni/_/tshon sna lnga yi skud pas gdab/_/me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni/_/kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/_/grwa dang grwar ni me lha bri/_/lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang /_/lag na me 'bar 'dzin pa dang /_/
[\[254a.6\]]mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang /_/cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga bzhin/_/ba dan mda' dang sna lnga yi/_/skud pas bum pa gang dkris dang /_/de bzhin bdug spos snod dag gis/_/kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya/_/sna tshogs 
[\[254a.7\]]gzugs can rgya che yi/_/sna tshogs ro yi gtor ma gzhag_/rdze'u dang kham phor rnam gsum gyi/_/dkar pos dkar ba gzhag par bya/_/rdze'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni/_/gtor mas bkang ba kun du gzhag_/'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag_/kun nas me tog 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]dgram bya zhing /_/phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya/_/'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni/_/kun du mar me 'bar ba dag_/sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin du/_/dri yi phye ma lha bshos dang /_/dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad 
[\[254b.2\]]la/_/blugs gzar dUr ba rtag tu gzhag_/shing ni arka shi mi dang /_/yungs kar 'bras ni so ba dang /_/zhun mar dang ni mar dkar dang /_/kun du tsan+dan dkar po dag_/sbyin sreg cho gar 'dir bzhag ste/_/dus gsum rtag tu reg 'dzin gyis/_/sbyin sreg 
[\[254b.3\]]brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/_/rigs pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yis/_/gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la/_/dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing /_/gzhan ni bza' dang spyad mi bya/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas/_/dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing /_/dar b+ha'i stan la skyil krung 
[\[254b.4\]]du/_/shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya/_/byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste/_/don yod rgyal po dran bya zhing /_/snga dro'i dus su sbyin sreg bya/_/gung la slom ma gzhug bya zhing /_/spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs ni/_/phye ma red dus su bya ba'o/_/gang zhig dkyil 
[\[254b.5\]]'khor du zhugs la/_/sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang /_/grub pa kun du cho ga yi/_/bdag nyid dbang bskur me kun gyi/_/sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs/_/kun du gnas ni thams cad na/_/rgyas pa gnas 'jog rwa gcig dang /_/gar ge de bzhin phur 
[\[254b.6\]]bu dang /_/mdun na 'don pa me lha ni/_/sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten par/_/mtshungs zhes ston pas lung bstan to/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa/_/rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang /_/phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang /_/khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang /_/
[\[254b.7\]]mnyam pa bas kyang lhag pa nyid/_/me yis sbyin sreg byed pa la/_/de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob/_/gal te zhag bdun dus gsum du/_/de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/_/me la sbyin sreg byed pa la/_/mod la mngon shes lnga thob ces/_/de skad 'jig 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]rten 'dren pa gsung /_/las ni byas nas de nas ni/_/sbyin sreg la ni brtsam par bya/_/sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/_/las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/lha rnams rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes 
[\[255a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni/_/mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzad/_/sdig pa thams cad bsreg par 'gyur/_/shin tu mi bzad sngon gyi las/_/sreg blugs tsam gyi mod la bsregs/_/'bar ba'i me yis phye leb bzhin/_/de la sogs pa'i 
[\[255a.3\]]sdig pa ni/_/bsreg 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/sdang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang /_/mi bzad phas kyi dgra rnams dang /_/pha rol dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid/_/de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung /_/de kun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/_/mi snang bar 'gyur the tsom med/_/
[\[255a.4\]]de bzhin mi ngas gcong kun dang /_/nad kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs nyid kyang /_/sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis 'jig_/gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang /_/de bzhin bgegs dang log 'dren dang /_/sha za brjed byed [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[255a.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs gdon/_/'di kun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/_/'jig par 'gyur bar the tsom med/_/rtag tu 'jigs med lo legs shing /_/gling dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad ni/_/kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyal po dpung 
[\[255a.6\]]dang bcas pa nyid/_/btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni/_/rtag par kun tu gsal bar ni/_/mi 'jigs sbyin par the tsom med/_/rtag tu nad med 'gyur ba dang /_/dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang /_/lus can dag ni thams cad la/_/rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas/_/
[\[255a.7\]]rtag tu me yi lha nyid ni/_/rgyun du mthong bar 'dod pa yis/_/me la sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/_/me lha nyid ni bzhugs gyur te/_/rtag tu las rnams thams cad mdzad/_/rgyun du phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/_/lha ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing /_/thams cad du ni mthong 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]ba ster/_/rgyu skar zla ba nyi ma dang /_/gshin rje dang ni chu lha dang /_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag_/dpung bcas bzhon par bcas pa yang /_/nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni/_/rjes 'brang bsrung 'gyur the tsom med/_/ci ste rig sngags 'chang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 
[\[255b.2\]]bsgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/_nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing /_shing arga'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar la pad+ma dang /_zhun mar dang /_'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg blugs 
[\[255b.3\]]lan cig byas pas mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gi me sbar la rigs spyir pad+ma dang /_/
[\[255b.4\]]ut+pa la sngon po dang /_yungs kar dkar po dang /_/zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang /_sbyin sreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyur ro/_/de nas pha rol gyi dmag 
[\[255b.5\]]tshogs gzhom par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te seng ldeng gi me sbar la zho dang /_zhun mar dang /_yungs kar dang /_gu gul gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg brgyad stong byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi 
[\[255b.6\]]dmag tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dgra gzhom par 'dod pa dang /_dpung gzhigs par 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing kar ba ka'i me sbar la/_sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa dang /_ske tse'i sa bon dang /_lan 
[\[255b.7\]]tshwa 'bras sA lu dang bsres pa yungs kar mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dgra la gnam lcags chen po dang /_rlung grang mo 'bab pas phongs pa dang /_yid mi bde ba bskyed par 'gyur/_dgra thams cad rnam par 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]'jig par 'gyur ro/_/klus char 'bebs par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/_shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang /_me tog phreng ba dang /_yungs kar dang /_sha ta bus pa zhun mar dang sbar ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan 
[\[256a.2\]]gcig la dus gsum du byas na klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs te/_'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/char de nyid ha cang ches na thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na ha cang char ches pa 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/yang me lha 
[\[256a.3\]]'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas shing sna ma'i me sbar la 'bras so ba dang /_zhun mar dang /_bu ram sha khar dang bcas pa dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_
[\[256a.4\]]sna ma'i me tog bsres pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/_/brgyad stong tshang ba dang /_me lha me'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste 'dug nas rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing ji ltar rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o/_/thams cad 
[\[256a.5\]]sbyin pa zhes bya ba mchog thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i me'i kha/_kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do/_/gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas gang du dbugs phyung ba dang /_rngubs pa der me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang du phu zhes byas pa 
[\[256a.6\]]der me 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mun gnag tu dbugs phyung na me 'bar te/_snang bar 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do/_/sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad zhi bar 
[\[256a.7\]]byed do/_/'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal ni rgyal po dbang du byed do/_/phub ma dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhe 'gras par byed do/_/'bras yos dang yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/_/yungs kar dang /_gu gul dang /_zhun mar gyi sbyin 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]sreg gis ni gnod sbyin 'gugs so/_/ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang /_gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni srin mo 'gugs so/_/de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do/_/sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad 
[\[256b.2\]]par bya ste/_kun tu thun mong sgrub pa'i mchog_/dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing /_/bla med bsod nams chen po sogs/_/don yod rgyal po de nyid ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu/_/'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar bya/_/
[\[256b.3\]]mthun dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i/_/'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba/_/grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas/_/so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni/_/ras sam yang na dar dag la/_/'jigs pa med pas gzugs bya'o/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad 
[\[256b.4\]]dam yang na tshad shin tu rnam par 'byed pa pad+ma'i mdog lta bu phyag brgyad pa/_dbu gsum pa/_de bzhin du spyan gsum pa/_zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya ste de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzin pa dang pad+ma 'dzin pa dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /_yid bzhin 
[\[256b.5\]]gyi nor bu dang /_be con dang dbugs 'byin pa dang /_bgrang phreng dang /_me tog thum po 'dzin par bya'o/_/g.yon du ni dkar mo'o/_/g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[256b.6\]]dbang phyug ni ral pa'i thor tshugs can/_dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/_g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa mnabs pa/_mchod phyir thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa'o/_/nang rim 
[\[256b.7\]]du pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/_/rim pa gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o/_/rim pa gsum par nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba dang /_rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o/_/rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'o/_/rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o/_/
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o/_/g.yon du gzhon nu dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_dbang phyug dang /_lha'i bu rnams bya ba 
[\[257a.2\]]ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o/_/lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khros pa/_gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/_phyag bzhi pa/_'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/_sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_ral pa 'chang ba/_'od 
[\[257a.3\]]dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can/_spyan gsum pa/_g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang /_dgra sta 'dzin par bya'o/_/dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni/_zhi ba'i zhal ras 
[\[257a.4\]]can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med can thogs pa/_pad+ma 'dzin pa/_nor bu rin po che 'dzin par bya'o/_/'og tu pho nya mo dang /_dbyangs can ma dang /_dung can ma dang /_dpal mo dang /_gnas ma dang /_dpe med ma dang /_ral pa gcig ma 
[\[257a.5\]]dang /_pho nya mo zhi ba dang /_lo tog gi lha dang /_sa'i lha dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/_steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o/_/nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o/_/ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi 
[\[257a.6\]]rol gyi rim pa kun du phyag rgya dang /_phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o/_klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o/_/rig sngags dngos grub bla med pa'i/_/ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni/_/sdig pa thams cad mod la sel/_/mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar 
[\[257a.7\]]byed/_/phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ri mo'i gzugs grub pa 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug par ston pa yin no/_/phyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]sems [(]dngas [,]dpas [)]kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/don yod pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa 'thob cing 
[\[257b.2\]]lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub bo/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 
[\[257b.3\]]'khor chen po 'khor bcas kyi/_/rig sngags cho ga bla med pa/_/spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni/_/thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan/_/de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang /_/gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin/_/nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang /_/rdo rje'i rigs 
[\[257b.4\]]gang bla med pa/_/spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni/_/ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin/_/phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing /_/dmyal ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de/_/mtho ris kyi ni sgo yang phye/_/bla na med pa ston pa yi/_/phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di/_/bsod nams 
[\[257b.5\]]bla na med pa yin/_/ci ste don yod pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des tsan+dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/_gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor tshad shin 
[\[257b.6\]]tu rnam par mdzes pa/_dbu dang /_mgur dang /_rked pa dang /_pus mo dang /_yan lag dang /_zhabs kyi tshigs dang /_phyag sor dang /_phyag sor gyi tshigs dang /_sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang /_ral pa dang /_sen mo tshad shin tu mdzes shing cod 
[\[257b.7\]]pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla ga ma zhi pa'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa/_phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang /_dbu skra shin tu mdzes pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_zhags pa 'dzin pa/_g.yon pa 'od dpag med can phyag na pad+ma bsnams 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]pa/_phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/_/sgrol ma dang /_dkar me yang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas par dgod do/_/mgon po shin tu mdzes pa/_nor bu dang /_
[\[258a.2\]]mu tig gi rgyan gyi mtshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i con pan nam/_yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel gzhag par byas la/_tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga pur gyis mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus 
[\[258a.3\]]su pad+ma ge sar dang bcas pa'i 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang phyug dar gyi cod pan gyis bcings pa bzhag la/_a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/_me tog gi phreng bas mchod 
[\[258a.4\]]par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas/_smyung ba byas la mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la mchod yon dang /_lha bshos phul la byams pa'i sems 
[\[258a.5\]]la mnyam par bzhag ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/_/sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing gtam gzhan mi smra bar shin tu yongs su sbyar ba legs par spyod cing gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba dang /_
[\[258a.6\]]phyogs bcing ba dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba srung ba dang bcas pa yang byas la bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang /_phyag rgya yang stong rtsa brgyad brtsams na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang /_bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying dga' bar 
[\[258a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag spyi bor gzhag ste legs so legs so/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so/_/sgrub pa dam pa byas so/_/de bzhin 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]gshegs pa'i spyi'i rigs 'di dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang /_thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang khyod la 'grub kyis/_khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying 
[\[258b.2\]]po rjes su zung shig dang /_rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang /_mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pa de thams cad rjes su sbyin no/_/'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mngal du 
[\[258b.3\]]gnas pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/_mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyur 
[\[258b.4\]]ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par 'gyur ro zhes tshig tu gsung ngo /_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gam/_cod pan la mngon par gtor na/_
[\[258b.5\]]des na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/_rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i 
[\[258b.6\]]zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/sku gzugs bsgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal ba chung ba mnar med par gzhol ba/_mtshams med pa lnga byed pas de lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis 
[\[258b.7\]]nges par mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs de rig sngags 'chang bsgrubs na rmi lam du bdag gi gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing sdig 
[\[259a.2\]]pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o/_/dri ma med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/skye bo thams cad 
[\[259a.3\]]kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/_sgo kun du dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur 
[\[259a.4\]]ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gdol pas kyang dad pa dang /_gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang /_cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_rang gi gzugs kyis 
[\[259a.5\]]mthong ba stsal bar bgyi na/_mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/_'di la the tsom 
[\[259a.6\]]dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags sgrub pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis rngo mi thogs lags so/_/gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag dang /_rig sngags 'chang ba'i 
[\[259a.7\]]sems can ser sna can/_sems gya gyu ba gnyis su mi byed pa/_ngo gnyis can/_ser sna can/_byas pa mi gzo ba/_pha rol gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/_gsang sngags rku ba/_yi ge rku ba/_gdug pa/_phrag dog che ba/_khengs ba/_gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/_
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston pa'i bla ma la ma gus pa/_rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus pa nyid brkam chags can/_byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/_sems can de dag la bskyang bar bstan pa'am/_dngos grub bstan par rdo 
[\[259b.2\]]mi thogs lags so/_/bdag la yang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/_bdag la'ang sun par bgyid pa/_bdag la'ang ma gus par bgyid pa/_kun nas mnar sems dang sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung ngo /_/bdag 
[\[259b.3\]]la'ang 'khu bar bgyid pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang /_dam tshig kun nas 
[\[259b.4\]]'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol ba zhes rig par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /_gsang ba dang /_dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes 
[\[259b.5\]]rig par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /_gsang ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/_/de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag gi sdig pas gdol 
[\[259b.6\]]pa zhes bgyi ste/_dge slong dag dang /_rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o/_/tshig pa ka ba tshig pa lta bu/_rig sngags nyams pa/_log 'dren gyis zin pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o/_/'jig rten pa 
[\[259b.7\]]dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa chud gzan pa/_rig sngags nyams pa/_dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag gis mnongs te/_bdag gis yongs su spangs pa ma lags so/_/de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su spangs 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]pa/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs pa/_rdo rje'i dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya thams cad spangs ba/_thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_dam tshig yongs su spangs 
[\[260a.2\]]pas bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag gis mnongs te/_bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so/_/de ltar mod kyis rig sngags 'chang bsregs pa/_dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/_
[\[260a.3\]]phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/_gsang ba bsregs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/_sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal bar sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/_'jig 
[\[260a.4\]]rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do/_/de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjes su sems pas byams pa'i sems su bya'o/_/gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_rig sngags gsang ba rnyed par 'gyur 
[\[260a.5\]]ba de la des gus pa chen po dang /_bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/_pha dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/_pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/_ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/_rang gi sha dang /_khrag dang /_rkang yang gtang bar bgyi/_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_
[\[260a.6\]]bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_stan dang /_bgo bas rim gro dang mchod pa bgyi ste/_de la ni bdag gis mchod par bgyi/_rjed pa dang bla mar bgyi'o/_rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/_dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gi gzugs mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_rgyun 
[\[260a.7\]]du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/_bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub kun du mchi bar bgyi/_rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bdag gis zhags pa dang /_lcags kyus 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/_bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/_thams cad du sgrub pa dang /_dngos grub dang /_mchog stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tsan+dan 
[\[260b.2\]]gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/_de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o/_/gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas par mtshungs 
[\[260b.3\]]par rig par bgyi'o/_/sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o/_/gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/_/de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig 
[\[260b.4\]]par bgyi'o/_/lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag 
[\[260b.5\]]par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/_/sa phyogs 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan par rig par bgyi ste/_de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i dngos 
[\[260b.6\]]grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang /_dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa/_sku shin tu 
[\[260b.7\]]tshad dang ldan pa/_phyag drug pa/_de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/_dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/_spyan gsum pa/_ral pa'i thog tshugs kyis brgyan pa/_'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/_zla gam can no/_/zhal 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po gzugs can/_gzugs bsgyur ba/_spyan gsum pa/_ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/_zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o/_/g.yon pa ni zhal khro gnyer can/_
[\[261a.2\]]khros pa'i lta stangs su lta pa/_spyan gsum pa/_ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba/_'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/_g.yas phyogs zla gam can/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/_zhags pa thogs pa/_pad+ma 
[\[261a.3\]]thogs pa/_mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/_dgra sta thogs pa/_dbugs 'byin pa/_rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o/_/g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/_
[\[261a.4\]]rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o/_/zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_lag na me tog thogs pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas nas pus mo btsugs te 
[\[261a.5\]]'dug par bya'o/_/lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis tshad dang tshad ma 'dres par spyan dang /_smin ma dang /_mchu dang /_sen mo'i gnas kyis gnas su sbyar bar bya'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_/bam po nyi shu pa/_
[\[261a.6\]]de nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/_'jigs pa med pas spos kyi rigs tsan+dan dang /_ta ga ra dang /_pu shel ci dang /_li shi dang /_nA ga pus pa dang /_spr-i ka dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_kha bar Ni kha dang /_spang spos dang /_na la da dang /_gur gum dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur 
[\[261a.7\]]dang /_sgron shing dang /_gan+da pri yang ku dang /_kun du ru dang /_sha kha ra dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_du ru ska dang /_til mar dang /_spra tshil dang /_lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu 'jam pa/_shin tu mnyen pa/_mchog 'di gtsang ma gtsang sbra spyod pas 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]thub pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin tu dul ba/_rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes par bya'o/_/gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas/_lan cig bsgrubs pa ni mchog yin te/_'di yongs su rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[261b.2\]]pos thams cad la mngon du gtor te de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las brtsam mo/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_shin tu khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa gsal ba/_ko la'i 
[\[261b.3\]]tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor bzang po legs par byugs pa shin tu gsal ba bya'o/_/dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o/_/'dir ni pad+ma'ang byas te/_/
[\[261b.4\]]'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar dang snying por bcas pa/_shin tu mdzes pa/_shin tu bzang ba/_tsan+dan dang gur gum gyis bri bar bya ste/_der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o/_/bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang /_de bzhin du dri chu dang /_gtor ma thams cad 
[\[261b.5\]]dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang /_ci yod pa'i gtor ma gzhag ste/_de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba ni gnas sam dgon pa'am/_khyim mam gang du gnas par gyur pa der khru gang tshad dam khru do'am khru gsum mam lhag par yang bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdug spos dang /_
[\[261b.6\]]tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_du ru ska dang /_kun tu ru'o/_/ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o/_/me tog phreng ba dgram bya zhing /_/dri dang byug pa de nyid dang /_/kun du mar me'i phreng ba'o/_/de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags 
[\[261b.7\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar gyi steng du bzhag pa la/_rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o/_/brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing cher g.yo bar 'gyur/_rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis 'dod pa'i 
[\[262a.2\]]las thams cad grub bo/_/don yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub dang /_thams cad du dgos pa grub pa de kho na nyid grub bo/_/khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub bo/_/khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog 
[\[262a.3\]]tu grub bo zhes sgra 'byung ngo /_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/_slob ma gzhug pa dang /_dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gang gi tshe dgos pa byung 
[\[262a.4\]]ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/_de nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la/_bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing ji ltar bsams 
[\[262a.5\]]pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i mdun du tsan+dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor byas la/_tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/de nas thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/_rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing /_thal ba de nyid dang /_
[\[262a.6\]]yungs kar gyi byug pa phyogs bzhir gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji lta ba de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/_ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dri chu dang yungs kar 
[\[262a.7\]]gyis mngon du phyogs par gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/thal ba des rab tu bdugs te dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i dpung dang 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za thams 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/_bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed do/_/rang la byugs te tshogs kyi nang ngam/_dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa mthong ba ji ltar rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/_mchod 
[\[262b.2\]]pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/_/phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/_don dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/thal bas lus bskus te klu'i mtshor zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing ji 
[\[262b.3\]]srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rang la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/_rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/_ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[262b.4\]]du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/_ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no/_/gang dang gang la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad bral bar 'gyur 
[\[262b.5\]]sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcad par 'gyur/_mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byas pa mi gzo ba/_gsang sngags kyi gdol 
[\[262b.6\]]pa/_ma gus pa/_bla mar mi byed pa/_rlom sems can/_nga rgyal dang ldan pa/_bdud kyi phyogs pa/_skyes bu gti mug can/_bsogs pa la zhen pa/_khengs pa/_nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de dag yun 
[\[262b.7\]]ring por thar pa mi rnyed pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/_skye ba brgyud par rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/_'jig rten 'di dang pha rol chud gson pa 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]dag ni ma gtogs te/_de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/_sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa bgrangs par 
[\[263a.2\]]yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rdo mi thogs lags so/_/de lta mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste/_byams pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/_byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/_
[\[263a.3\]]sems can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo /_/mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang /_'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs 
[\[263a.4\]]su mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/_'di ltar shes par bya'o/_
[\[263a.5\]]de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po'am/_rig sngags 'chang ngam/_gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig 
[\[263a.6\]]sngags 'chang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang /_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 
[\[263a.7\]]thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod na cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya ste/_snying po dang bcas/_bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang /_shin 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]tu myur ba dang /_mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba gsang ba ston par mthong ste/_'di la som nyi dang ne mnur bskyed par mi bya'o/_/the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags 
[\[263b.2\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshad tsam/_tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/_ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/_shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/_cha byad mdzes pa/_cha shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/_phyag gnyis pa/_spyan gsum pa/_
[\[263b.3\]]'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/_g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/_phyag g.yon na pad+ma dang /_ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_sku'i nang ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang ring bsrel gyis bkang ba/_g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa 
[\[263b.4\]]thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa/_gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_g.yon na dngul las dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/_/steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo krung bcas bcas te bzhugs pa dang /_g.yon na 
[\[263b.5\]]shAkya'i rgyal po skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o/_/'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing /_gnad dang gnad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/_skra dang /_dpral ba dang /_smin ma dang /_shangs dang /_snyan dang /_zhal dang /_
[\[263b.6\]]mgul pa dang /_dpung pa dang /_nu ma dang /_rked pa dang /_brla dang /_pus mo dang /_byin pa dang /_zhabs dang /_phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du mdzes pa/_sku chu zheng gab cing mtho dman ran pa/_mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po 'chang ba bya'o/_/las 
[\[263b.7\]]shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig nas/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya'am/_tshes brgyad dam/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'am/_bcu gsum mam/_bcu 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]bzhi'am/_rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang mthun pa rnyed nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par phye ba/_ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/_khru gsum par rnam par dbye 
[\[264a.2\]]bar bya ste/_chung ba dang lhag par ni mi bya'o/_/legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/_snyi ba/_mnyen pa/_dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa ni shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/_sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 
[\[264a.3\]]'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la/_lho'i grwa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/_/de nas byang 
[\[264a.4\]]gi grwar bri ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/_/de nas nub kyi grwar bri ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/_/de nas shar gyi grwar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis 
[\[264a.5\]]rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang /_shin tu gsal bar bri'o/_/shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor ri bo po Ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o/_/lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos kun nas 
[\[264a.6\]]dkris pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o/_/byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi ngad ldang dri za'i tshogs kyis gang ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes pa bri'o/_/nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi gnas me tog sna tshogs dang /_'khri shing dang /_shing 
[\[264a.7\]]ljon pa sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o/_/legs par zin nas kun tu ni mdung rtse gsum pa'i bar phreng ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go/_/nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhag na spyi'i rigs 'grub bo/_/lha mo sgrol ma ni ri bo po Ta la la gzhag go/_/ri rab la ni gos dkar mo'o/_/dpe med ma ni ti se'i rtse mor ro/_/sgrol ma bdun ni spos kyi ngad ldang la gzhag go_/
[\[264b.2\]]shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo zhib pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu rgyud lu gu rgyud bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/byang phyogs kyi sgor 
[\[264b.3\]]khro gnyer can mo khro gnyer can bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/de nas 'jigs pa med pas mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pa don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 
[\[264b.4\]]'khor du gzhag par bya'o/_/grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs po che go cha bgos pa/_drag shul gyi gzugs can/_mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa/_spyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba/_don yod 
[\[264b.5\]]pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa/_'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa/_don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsgrub pa'i ched du cho ga sna tshogs dran par bya'o/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/rnam thar dkyil 'khor de nyid ni/_/legs par 
[\[264b.6\]]bsgrubs pa mthong tsam dang /_/bklags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur/_/de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yis/_/sgrub par byed pa mi mkhas so/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dar dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos 
[\[264b.7\]]dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/_/ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang /_gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon dbul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/gzugs 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma yang bsgrub bo/_/me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang bra dang /_bum pa dang /_rdze'u dang /_phor zlum dang /_kham phor dang /_dbyib mo dag kyang dgang ngo /_/kun du dri chus bskos pa 
[\[265a.2\]]yi/_/rgya chen gtor ma kun du'o/_/sna tshogs pa yi pog phor nas/_/sna tshogs bdug spos dbul ba ni/_/a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_spr-i ka dang /_du ru ska dang /_kun tu ru dang /_gu gul dang /_sgron shing dang /_shri beSh+Ta ka dang /_sa ra dang /_sar dza ra sa dang /_
[\[265a.3\]]de bzhin du ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur gum dang /_sha kha ra'i bdug spos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/_thams cad du sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no/_/sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang /_/phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid/_/shes rab can gyis kun tu ni/_/dkyil 'khor dag 
[\[265a.4\]]la gzhag par bya/_/lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog dang /_zangs kyi me tog dang /_byi ru dang ni mu tig dang /_/in+d+ra nI la dag dang ni/_/pad+ma rA ga dag kyang ngo /_/gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna bdun can yang grwa bzhir gzhag 
[\[265a.5\]]par bya'o/_/'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor ro/_/kun nas me tog phreng ba ni/_/rmad byung dkyil 'khor la gzhag cing /_/kun nas mar me'i phreng ba yang /_/dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la bzhag_/rig sngags 'chang nyin 
[\[265a.6\]]zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la cho gas bsrung ba dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_kun nas dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/_/de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/_bla ma mkhan po 'am/_slob dpon nam/_pha'am 
[\[265a.7\]]rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po la dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan te/_mgon po 'jig rten gyis bla ma mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dbul ba byas la bskor ba 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste/_skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la mi smra bar ya mtshan du snang bar mthong gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor kun tu khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[265b.2\]]pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing yungs kar dang /_chu dang me tog gis dkyil 'khor kun tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor kun tu me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_dri phul nas mgon po 
[\[265b.3\]]'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o/_/de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod pa byed do/_/de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang /_kun du lha mo thams cad la'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 
[\[265b.4\]]gyi lha thams cad la'o/_/de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o/_/thams cad dang sgo srungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas phyogs bzhi kun du rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu mchod nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la 'jigs 
[\[265b.5\]]pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/_/byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/_/gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi g.yo zhing gang 
[\[265b.6\]]dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snying dga' ba dang /_sems bde ba 'thob bo/_/'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/_de bzhin 
[\[265b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/_lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas legs so zhes sgra grag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ji ltar gser bkod pa de ltar 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang /_mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_sgrol ma dang /_dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang 
[\[266a.2\]]nas bzhengs par 'gyur/_sku gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ston pa snang bar 'gyur/_phyogs bcu kun du rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/_rig sngags 'chang byams pa dang bcas pa'i 
[\[266a.3\]]sems brtan por gyur bas me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/_rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing rig 
[\[266a.4\]]sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /_cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/_skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag
