[\[266a.5\]]nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi ngo bo phyir mi ldog pa dang /_don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig_/dkyil 'khor 'di la brten pa'i 
[\[266a.6\]]skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par lung bstan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan las khrag 'dzag 
[\[266a.7\]]cing sgra mi zad pa 'byung ste/_mgon po 'di mi mthong /_sa 'di g.yo bar mi 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/_de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmi lam du ston te de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar mngon sum pa de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis legs par brtag cing so sor brtags te/_sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o/_/sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang /_dbang po yang dag par bsdams pa/_sems can 
[\[266b.2\]]thams cad la byams pa/_sems can thams cad la brtse ba can/_gzhan la yang dag par smra ba/_tshig brtags pa dad pa can/_gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/_mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba rtag tu bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems 
[\[266b.3\]]can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o/_/rab tu bag yod pa dang /_rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan pa dang /_kha zas ngan pa dang /_lhag ma dang /_'bags pa dang 'dres pa dang /_kha gcig tu bsres pa dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bkrus pa dang /_chang dang /_sha dang /_kun dong dang /_
[\[266b.4\]]sgog skya dang /_ke'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing /_rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar bya'o/_/lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste/_'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga la dran par bya'o/_/lag pa 'bags pas gdong la reg par mi bya/_lhung bzed dor bar mi bya'o/_rtag 
[\[266b.5\]]tu kha ma phyed phyed du gcod pa dang /_mchog tu 'bags pa 'di dag nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o/_/gtsang mas zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong la sogs pa la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu mdzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[266b.6\]]de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las shin tu yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang bas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung 
[\[266b.7\]]nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing shin tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas bkrol te rig sngags 'chang gi mgul du 'dogs par mdzad do/_/spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi thu bo zhes gsung ngo /_/mgul par nor 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]bu bcings pa tsam gyi mod la de nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig 
[\[267a.2\]]sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam 
[\[267a.3\]]par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/_gang ting nge 'dzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_sgrub pa dang /_dam tshig dang /_gsang 
[\[267a.4\]]ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa thob ste/_gang 
[\[267a.5\]]dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba 
[\[267a.6\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ring bsrel dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gdan bshams la de'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/_/a ga ru'i bdug spos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang par 
[\[267a.7\]]sngar gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/_rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/_nyin gcig bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur/_tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/da ltar gyi bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring ba'am/_tshe yongs su zad pa de 
[\[267b.2\]]thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po brje ba'am/_dgra 'thab pa'am/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'thab pa'am/_lo nyes pa dang /_mi ngas dang /_dgon pa dang /_nad dang /_na ba dang /_gdon dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_grang ba dang /_rlung dang 
[\[267b.3\]]tsha ba dang /_ser ba dang /_chom po'i 'jigs pa dang /_rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang /_gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang /_sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_'bras bu 'phel ba dang /_'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing 
[\[267b.4\]]de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/_sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun ma/_byas pa mi gzo ba/_brlang ba/_
[\[267b.5\]]'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/_bslab pa mi 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/_rna bar bsgrags par mi bgyi/_skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang bstan par mi bgyi'o/_/cho ga zhib mo 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru 
[\[267b.6\]]gcig tsam yang bstan par mi bgyi'o/_/rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur te/_mchog tu yid brtan pa/_rnam par thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal 
[\[267b.7\]]po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang /_bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyid/_bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang bla mar bgyis pa lags/_mchod pa dang rjed pa bgyid pa 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]lags so/_/de lta bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang /_snying rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dran pa 
[\[268a.2\]]dang /_bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la re ba thams cad dang mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las gzhan du bgyid na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[268a.3\]]'das de dag la bslus pa lags so/_/rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/_dam bcas pa bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/_rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyi/_rtag tu 'dzum pa dang /_rtag tu byams pa dang /_snying rje sgom pa yid 
[\[268a.4\]]la bgyid na/_de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/_de dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/_don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa 
[\[268a.5\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la/_rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs ltar thams cad kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o/_/ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba thams cad yongs su zad par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dga' bas kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o/_/sems can 
[\[268a.6\]]gang la byams pa dang /_snying rje mchis pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis shin tu sdom pas bsdams shing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o/_/yongs su gtong pa'i lag 
[\[268a.7\]]par bgyi zhing spar chum par mi bgyi ste/_lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o/_/gtor ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/_/sngags legs par spyad par bgyi ste/_don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o/_/de nas bdag 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o/_/rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//_//de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/_don yod rgyal po rmad byung che/_/kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing /_/dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba/_/sdang 
[\[268b.2\]]ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/_/bdud dang bgegs ni rnam par 'jig_/gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/_/'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros/_/gdon gyi gtso bo skrod byed cing /_/sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/_/sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing /_/'jigs 
[\[268b.3\]]phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/_/rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol ba/_/don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston/_/spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa/_/don yod spyi yi gsang ba ni/_/rtag tu gzhan min snying po nyid/_/khro 
[\[268b.4\]]bo'i rgyal po bla med pa/_/de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal pos khro bo'i gzugs su gnas te sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed 
[\[268b.5\]]par gyur cing lag na zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra badzra d+ha re b+h+yaH/_o~M tsa ra tsa ra/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/tsi ri tsi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_ma hA pad+ma ha sta/_ka la ka la/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA s+thA ma prA pa te/_tsa ra 
[\[268b.6\]]tsa ra/_tsa tsa ra ni shA tsa re/_shwa ra e h+ye hi/_bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya d+hA ba d+hA ba/_ki Ni ki Ni/_pa ra ma shud+d+ha sa twa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ma hA pa shu pa ti/_be Sha d+ha ra/_hA hA hI hI hU hU/_o~M ka ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra/_pra ti maN+Di ta/_
[\[268b.7\]]sha rI rA ya/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_sa na ta ku mA ra/_ru dra biSh+tu bA sa ba/_d+ha na dA/_r-i Shi nA ya ka/_ba hu bi bi d+ha/_be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/_bi lo ki ta/_lo ke shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_tA 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]Da na ta ra dza na/_rA dza ta ska ra/_ag+ni u da ka_/pi Sha sha sta ba ri mo tsa ka_/ka Na ka Na/_tsa la tsa la/_bo d+h+yang ga_/tsa tu rA r+ya sa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka_/ta ma ta ma/_sa ma sa ma/_ma sa ma sa/_ma hA ta mo\u0f85na d+ha kA ra/_pra sha man/_mi li mi li/_e ne pa/_
[\[269a.2\]]tsarma pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi/_ma Ta ma Ta/_bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya/_ni bA si na/_ma hA kA+e ru Ni ka_/shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/_rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta/_ka ra pu Ta/_sa mA d+h+ya pra kaM pya/_ShaT+pA ra mi tA/_pa ri pU ra ka ma hA/_sarba sa twa san+ta ti ba ri pA tsa ka_/sarba mar duSh+Ta pra 
[\[269a.3\]]marda ka_/sarba sid+d+hi A shA pa ri pU ra ka_/a b+hi Shiny+tsaM tu mA na/_sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She kai ra/_b+ha ga bA na/_a mo g+ha rA dza hU~M phaT/_na maHstu te swA hA/_khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/_/o~M bi kr-i ta daM Sh+T+re/_a mo g+ha sa ma ye a bi Shiny+tsaM mAM/_sarba bi d+yA a mo g+ha a b+he She kair 
[\[269a.4\]]hU~M mi li mi li swA hA/_de khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas ri chen po po Ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsams te/_klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so/_/lha'i tshogs thams 
[\[269a.5\]]cad ni dga' bar gyur to/_/sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to/_/bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur to/_/ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[269a.6\]]lha thams cad ni mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/sdang ba dang /_rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to/_/nad thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o/_/rims thams cad las ni rnam par grol lo/_/nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las ni yongs su grol 
[\[269a.7\]]lo/_/me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur to/_/de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/_/snying rje chen po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad 
[\[269b.2\]]dang /_rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang /_snying po dang /_khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 
[\[269b.3\]]don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shin tu mdzes pa ko la'i tshad tsam shin tu rnam par mdzes pa'i grwa bzhi dang /_sgo bzhi dang /_them skas bzhi dang /_rta babs dang /_mda'i kha 
[\[269b.4\]]khyer dang /_kun nas rdo rje'i rnam pa dag kyang bya ste/_tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par mdzes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o/_/ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod sar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o/_/dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ba/_/
[\[269b.5\]]dbus su legs pa rnam phye la/_/kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba dang /_/rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod/_/dbus su 'khor lo rta bri ba/_/shin tu blta sdug 'khor lo dgod/_/dbus der rgyal ba gzhag par bya/_/shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/_/g.yas su khro bo'i rgyal po 
[\[269b.6\]]yi/_/'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po/_/g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin bzhag pa/_/rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag_/de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang /_dgra sta dang /_go cha dang /_dbyug pa dang /_zhags pa dang /_dgra sta lu gu rgyud can dang /_mdung 
[\[269b.7\]]rtse gsum pa dang /_glegs bam mo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang /_gos dkar mo dang /_dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang /_dbyug pa dang /_ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug pa sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/_g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo'i co to nas 'dzin pa dang /_khrag 
[\[270a.2\]]gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/_glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang /_smad g.yogs can bya'o/_/mtha'i grwar pad+ma dang rdo rje bzhag pa ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba can shin tu bzang po gzhag par bya'o/_/shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig de'i sku 'bar 
[\[270a.3\]]ba'i phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o/_/lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa phyag na thogs par bya'o/_/nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni/_phyag na pad+ma thogs par bya'o/_/
[\[270a.4\]]byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i cho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na thogs pa'o/_/de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan+dan gyi chu gur gum dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur gyis bsgos pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa rin po che sna 
[\[270a.5\]]bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o/_/ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/_rnam pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o/_/bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang /_mar me'i phreng ba dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang /_
[\[270a.6\]]byug pas mchod par bya'o/_/ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams cho gas bsrungs la/_de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro bos dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 
[\[270a.7\]]yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang /_dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]gang bsams pa dang gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang /_
[\[270b.2\]]gdug pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi gnas phug 
[\[270b.3\]]dri ma med pa dang nam mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang /_chu na rgyu ba dang /_nags dang /_skyed mos tshal na spyod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig de la 
[\[270b.4\]]mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang 
[\[270b.5\]]lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam byas te/_shin tu mdzes pa/_shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/_zhal gsum pa/_ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing rgyan thams cad 
[\[270b.6\]]kyis brgyan pa/_rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/_zla ba dbu la thogs pa/_zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/_spyan gsum pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_pad+ma 'dzin pa/_zhags pa 'dzin pa/_ral gri 
[\[270b.7\]]dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog 'bul ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa/_lag na pog phor dang bgrang phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/_/gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum gyis mchod pa bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor de'i 
[\[271a.2\]]steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhag ste/_de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/_'chag par 'gyur/_'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/_tshig 'byin par 'gyur/_legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/_phyag 
[\[271a.3\]]g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/_yid la bsams pa dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang de yang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/_nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod pa yangs par snang ba/_dngos grub dri ma 
[\[271a.4\]]med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/tshe lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[271a.5\]]su 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par 'phrul bar 'gyur zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu 
[\[271a.6\]]med par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/_/bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i 
[\[271a.7\]]mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/_'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_mig 'phrul dang /_bzhad 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gad dang /_phur pas gdab pa dang /_bsreg pa dang /_'phang ba dang /_gsad pa dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_sgyu ma bstan pa dang /_bdag bsrung ba dang /_gzhan bsrung ba dang /_mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang /_nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang /_sa gzhi smra ba dang /_rgyu ba 
[\[271b.2\]]dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_chu rgal ba dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_mtshon cha las rgal ba dang /_rmongs byed dang /_rmugs byed dang /_rengs byed dang /_bcing ba dang /_rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang /_ro langs bslang ba dang /_shi ba gso ba dang /_
[\[271b.3\]]zla ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang /_dgug pa dang /_bden pa bstan pa dang /_nad la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /_dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dgug pa dang /_'byung po dgug pa dang /_klu dang lha dgug pa dang /_bud 
[\[271b.4\]]med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dgug pa dang /_btang ba dang /_dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/_las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/bklags pa tsam gyis las 
[\[271b.5\]]dang /_dngos grub dang /_sgrub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyis mchog 
[\[271b.6\]]tu 'grub par 'gyur te/_skal ba ngan pa dang /_nor chud za ba dang /_mi 'grub pa dang /_sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas bzung 
[\[271b.7\]]ste/_bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang skal ba mngon du 'gyur te/_tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po dang /_che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/rked pa'i gnas nas bzung ste/_bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/_rgyal po btsun mo dang /_'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/_bdag nyid dang nor gyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar 
[\[272a.2\]]du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur te/_'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags 
[\[272a.3\]]pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nam mkha' las babs nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang /_
[\[272a.4\]]bkur sti mngon du byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[272a.5\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so/_/me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa 
[\[272a.6\]]dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba bya ba byas so/_/ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[272a.7\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/_/'khor chen po de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/_/lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang /_
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]mngon du bstod pa dang /_phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje 'gying bag can/_brjid bag gi bgros kyis langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs 
[\[272b.2\]]su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 
[\[272b.3\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin tu zab pa/_shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/_rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin tu zab pa/_ri rab chen po lta bur shin 
[\[272b.4\]]tu mi g.yo zhing mi sgul ba/_mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba shin tu gzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang /_gsang sngags mang po dang /_dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang /_ri mo'i sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang /_sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 
[\[272b.5\]]'phrul ba mang po dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na ji ltar bsgrub par rdo thogs/_ji ltar nges par gzung bar rdo thogs lags/_
[\[272b.6\]]gsang sngags tha dad pa dang /_phyag rgya tha dad pa dang /_dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang /_ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang /_gtor ma tha dad pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil 
[\[272b.7\]]dang /_spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba dang /_dgug pa dang /_dam tshig dang /_khrus dang /_smyung ba dang /_phyag rgya bcing ba dang /_rab tu 'jug pa dang /_bzlas brjod dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_slar gshegs su gsol ba'am/_nges par bzung ba'am/_dran par bgyi 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bar rdo thogs/_bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams ma/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs 
[\[273a.2\]]sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs kyis rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di nges pas gzung bar ji ltar rdzo thogs/_rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par rngo thogs/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa 
[\[273a.3\]]de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tshom bcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das the tsom bcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[273a.4\]]stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags 'chang sgrub pa po bsgrub pa la gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe blo gros chen po'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur/_dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'grub par 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi phung po 
[\[273a.5\]]chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i che po dang ldan par 'gyur/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur/_lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 
[\[273a.6\]]'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[273a.7\]]kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_gzhan gang yang rung ba bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang gi 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rig bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bum tsam gcig thob par gyur la des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_khrus la sogs pa byed cing bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[273b.2\]]phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang /_mchog dang /_bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang de dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur 
[\[273b.3\]]ro/_/ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_gzhan bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mo de dag 
[\[273b.4\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/_rjed pa dang /_gus pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_phyag byas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[273b.5\]]par 'gyur/_de dag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan gang su yang rung ba/_
[\[273b.6\]]dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 
[\[273b.7\]]lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lag 
[\[274a.2\]]na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par yang dag par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de lta mod 
[\[274a.3\]]kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su dris shig dang /_dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yi rangs pa 
[\[274a.4\]]dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te/_song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/_byang 
[\[274a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang /_gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzums par lta 
[\[274a.6\]]zhing /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing gdong du bltas te rtog cing 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces 
[\[274a.7\]]smras so/_/lag na rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug ste rdo rje gsor zhing la ci zhig blta/_ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/_ci zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod/_lag na rdo rje de nga la smros shig_/lag na rdo rje khyod la skabs phye'i yongs su dris shig dang /_dris pa de 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib 
[\[274b.2\]]mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba shin tu zab pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang /_phyag rgya mang po dang /_dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang /_ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yongs su bsgrags pa 'di 
[\[274b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar nus/_dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/_rgya mtsho chen po ltar zabs che ba/_ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/_nam mkha' ltar mtha' thug pa ma mchis pa/_shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/_'di ji ltar shes par bgyi/_gnas 
[\[274b.4\]]ni gang /_'gro ba ni gang /_'byung ba ni gang /_sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang /_dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang /_snga ma ni gang /_phyi ma ni gang /_dbus ni gang /_tha ma ni gang lags/_mang du yongs su zhu'o/_/dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang gsang sngags dang sgrub 
[\[274b.5\]]pa'i cho ga dang /_dam tshig so so tha dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim 
[\[274b.6\]]par phye ste rjes su gzung ba de nges par gzung bar ji ltar nus/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tsom chen po dang /_mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa de thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim 
[\[274b.7\]]par phye ba dang /_ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga mtha' dag nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba/_the tsom bcad pa'i slad du'o/_/sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje yun ring po zhig nas spobs pa gang zhig skyes te/_nga la yongs su 'dri/_lag na rdo rje nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 
[\[275a.2\]]kha dog gcig pa/_rtags gcig pa/_chos gcig la zhugs pa/_dbyings dang khams dang /_snying po gcig pa/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o/_/de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[275a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang /_lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang /_nyan thos 
[\[275a.4\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so/_/de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i 
[\[275a.5\]]zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang gcig nyid las de thams cad du rjes su 'gro'o/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang /_
[\[275a.6\]]sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas/_bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rjes su 'thob cing de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de lta 
[\[275a.7\]]de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]de lta de ltar gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag par 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de lta de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyan 
[\[275b.2\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i 
[\[275b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun du blta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[275b.4\]]chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yul la rnam par 'phrul pa kun du bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[275b.5\]]'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shin tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyi ma kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms 
[\[275b.6\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun du phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun du lta ba'i 'od 
[\[275b.7\]]zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_don yod pa kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu don yod pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]'dzin dang /_dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpung rgyan rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i 
[\[276a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun du lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun du 
[\[276a.3\]]lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/_ting nge 'dzin re re la yang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad 
[\[276a.4\]]rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po klog pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang /_sgrub pa dang /_phyag rgya 'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[276a.5\]]lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par byed na lag na rdo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[276a.6\]]gshegs pa blta ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang /_gzungs don yod pa 'thob pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang /_bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yul la 
[\[276a.7\]]rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar don yod pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang /_
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang /_blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang /_shes rab zab mo rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /_rim gro dang /_bla ma dang /_gus par bya 
[\[276b.2\]]ba don yod pa de'i phyir lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes ming du gdags pa byas na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/_sems 'khrug par 'gyur/_dran pa dang blo gros rmongs par 'gyur te/_de'i gnas na mi snang na su zhig smra bar nus/_de bzhin 
[\[276b.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/_ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ming du 
[\[276b.4\]]dmigs so/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa ste/_sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/_/ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o/_/de snying po'o/_/snying po 
[\[276b.5\]]gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/_/gang yid la sems pa dang /_gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren 
[\[276b.6\]]par 'gyur/_'gugs par 'gyur/_len par 'gyur te/_shin tu ring po nas kyang ye shes kyi zhags pas 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_lag na rdo rje de bas na de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/_/lag na rdo rje gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs 
[\[276b.7\]]pa skye bar 'gyur/_blo dman par 'gyur te gnas 'di ni mi snang ngo /_/lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/_gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'i gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid du gnas te thams cad so sor yang dag par shes so/_/'di lta ste don yod pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i pad+ma'i lcags kyu 
[\[277a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa rnam pa snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_
[\[277a.3\]]don yod pa'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya 
[\[277a.4\]]ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa yangs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i blo rgyas pa zhes 
[\[277a.5\]]bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste/_gang gis 
[\[277a.6\]]gzungs de rnams thos pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /_gsang sngags dang /_cho ga dang /_
[\[277a.7\]]cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton tu gnas shing thams cad so sor yang dag par shes te/_gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/_dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/_dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur/_dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/_dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/_dran pa 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]mi brtan par mi 'gyur/_dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog gi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur/_dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/_rtag tu blo 
[\[277b.2\]]yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran pa dang /_blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po de ltar 
[\[277b.3\]]go skabs yangs pa la gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/_gzhan yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_mdangs yongs su dag pa dang /_mig 
[\[277b.4\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_rna ba yongs su dag pa dang /_sna yongs su dag pa dang /_lce yongs su dag pa dang /_dbang po yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang /_mnyan pa tsam dang /_mthong ba tsam dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa 
[\[277b.5\]]tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po'i chen po 'di thob ste/_gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/_de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum 
[\[277b.6\]]du 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po 
[\[277b.7\]]bstan par bya'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]sum du thos nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/_bdag lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas 
[\[278a.2\]]par bgyi'o/_/yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dga' ba dang ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang /_som nyir gyur pa dang bral ba dang /_'gyod pa mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[278a.3\]]dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri ma med par kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che 
[\[278a.4\]]chen po chos kyi dga' bar phul nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing 'gying bag dang /_brjid bag gi 'gros kyis song nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste/_bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhal du bltas 
[\[278a.5\]]nas snying yongs su dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dmigs pas sems can thams cad bsgral 
[\[278a.6\]]ba'i phyir 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkha' la 'phags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu rin po che de nam mkha'i dkyil du 
[\[278a.7\]]'phags ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par gyur to/_/'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/_/snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]pa thams cad dang /_dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song gi 'gro ba las yongs su grol bar gyur to/_/gang yang gling bzhi ba'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dmyal ba de dag la yang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams 
[\[278b.2\]]kyi gtub pa med par gyur te/_sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skyes te/_lus yongs su dag par gyur to/_/gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas dmyal ba de dag thams 
[\[278b.3\]]cad du pad+ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur cing /_sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par pad+ma las rdzus te skyes so/_/grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba dang /_reg na bde bar gyur to/_/
[\[278b.4\]]tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing /_reg na bde ba dang /_rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_tha na sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan 
[\[278b.5\]]du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/sems can gang dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur to/_/su mi 'dod pa dang /_lcags sgrog dang /_lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyis bcing ba de dag kyang du ma bur gyur to/_/gang snod ma yin 
[\[278b.6\]]pa de yang 'od zer des phog pas mthong ba yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/_/gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna mchang ba yang 'od zer des phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_lus yongs su dag par gyur to/_/gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa 
[\[278b.7\]]dang /_me tog gi shing ljon ba'i shing ljon pa yongs su skams par gyur pa yang 'od zer des reg pas me tog dang /_'dab ma dang /_'bras bu byung bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing so 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang /_seng ge'i 
[\[279a.2\]]khri dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang byung bar gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcur kun du rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi/_sprin brtsegs pas khebs par gyur te lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab 
[\[279a.3\]]tu 'bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /_cod pan dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_gdu bu dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_rna rgyan dang /_gser gyi skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/_/tshon kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab 
[\[279a.4\]]bo/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang /_tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu 'bab bo/_/tshon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/_/
[\[279a.5\]]lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_pa ri sha ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_a ti mug ta ka dang /_a sho ka dang /_skya snar dang /_ka dam pa dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu babs te/_phyogs 
[\[279a.6\]]bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/_gru bzhi pa ka ba bzhi dang /_sgo bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu 'bar ba/_lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan 
[\[279a.7\]]gyis yongs su bskor cing mu tig gi dra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gser gyi dril bu sna tshogs phyag 'phyang ba gos sna tshogs kyi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/_chu shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng ba/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/_grwar lha rdzas kyi rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes par 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]byas pa/_go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo /_/nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha rnams lha rdzas rnams kyi me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[279b.2\]]dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod de/_de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis rlabs rmad du byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul 
[\[279b.3\]]pa chen po'i chen por bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[279b.4\]]logs su song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom 
[\[279b.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/_gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba rig 
[\[279b.6\]]sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ba/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang /_don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/_nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom 
[\[279b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/_/gang gi dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_gsang sngags dang cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te thams cad so so 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]nyid du gnas so/_/gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad mdun du gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_sems can dag pa chen po khyod 
[\[280a.2\]]kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa legs so legs so/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can thams cad dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na 
[\[280a.3\]]da smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon du phyogs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[280a.4\]]sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so/_/dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_'phags pa 
[\[280a.5\]]rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa 
[\[280a.6\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag 
[\[280a.7\]]med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can thams 
[\[280b.2\]]cad la byams pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_sdang ba dang /_bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa' chen po mchog sbyin lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[280b.3\]]oM A kar+Sha ya/_pad+ma hasta/_ma hA a mo g+ha aM ku shi/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsa tsa ra/_sany+tsa ra/_sa man+ten/_ma hA pA sha/_aM ku sha/_b+hu dza ba ra da b+hu dza aM ku sha pA sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa man+ta mu drA/_man+t+ra maN+Da la/_pa Ta la d+ha ra aM ku sha_/pA she na/_d+hA ra ya hU~M hU~M/_ma hA brah+ma/_be Sha d+ha ra/_a mo 
[\[280b.4\]]g+ta rU pa/_aM ku sha d+ha ra/_ta ra ta ra/_ta ta ra/_sa na tA ra ya/_ma hA mu drA/_maN+Da la/_a mo g+ha aM ku sha ba ra da/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/tri lo tsa na/_bshu pa ti/_be Sha d+ha ra/_I shwa ra/_ma he shwe ra/_pa ra ma kA ru Ne ka_/ma ha d+hu te shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/_na ma skr-i ta/_ku mA ra/_trai lo kya ba 
[\[280b.5\]]rad/_dam ka_/sha ma ka_/shA sa ka_/rak+Sha ka_/ma hA bid+yA/_a mo g+ha/_maN+Da la/_pU dzi ta/_rat+na ma ku Ta/_mA la d+ha ra/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ma hA aM ku sha ak+Sha d+ha ra hU~M hU~M/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/_sa man+t+wa mu drA maN+Da laM bU ra ya hU~M hU~M/_hri da ya aM ku shi_/a ba lo kA ya/_mA na sA 
[\[280b.6\]]d+ha ya sid d+hi ra/_A kar+Sha ya/_mu drA man+t+ra/_maN+Da la/_pa Ta laM/_sa ma ya/_big+haM pra sA d+ha ya mA raM/_ha ra ha ra/_sarba pA pa ki la bi Sha ma la/_mA ta sar+ya/_hu ru hu ru/_ma hA aM ku shi_/hU~M hU~M/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_tu ru tu ru/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa aM ku sha rat+na pA shaM d+ha ra/_
[\[280b.7\]]nA nA bi tsi tra A b+ha ra Na bi b+hU Shi ta/_a mi tA b+ha/_dzi na ma ku Ta d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_pad+ma pA sha aM ku sha d+ha ra/_sarba bid+yA man+t+ra mu drA maN+DA la/_bra bar/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/_sa ha srab+hu dza/_sa ha sra ne tra/_sau mya mu kha/_pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka sa twa bta sa la/_sarba man+tA mu drA/_
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]pra sA d+ha ka_/ma hA ba ra da sa dA na maHstu te/_a mo g+ha aM ku sha_/pad+ma b+hu dza swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad smras ma thag tu ri po Ta la chen po brag dang /_nags tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal du bcas pa'i gnas 
[\[281a.2\]]kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po bab bo/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga 
[\[281a.3\]]zhib mo 'di'ang so sor le'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so/_/gang gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru'ang gser la bai DUr+yas yi ger bris pa sprin gyi rim pa na snang ste/_yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par bris pa/_thig gi phreng ba gshibs pas brgyan pa snang ngo /_gang 
[\[281a.4\]]lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba/_phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so/_/gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa nam mkha' la gnas par gyur to/_/gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs/_gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[281a.5\]]'dzin pa/_rnam par bkra ba cho ga dang /_yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris pa'ang nam mkha' la gnas so/_/gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/_grwa bzhi cha mnyam pa rnam par phye ba dkyil 'khor shin tu spras shing brgyan pa/_gzugs 
[\[281a.6\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang nam mkha' la gnas so/_/dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha pho nya dang /_khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_
[\[281a.7\]]phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so/_/rig sngags kyi mchog dam pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa gang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 
[\[281b.2\]]snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs so/_/'khor 'di'i nang na nam mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi 
[\[281b.3\]]ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_
[\[281b.4\]]khye'u'am/_bu mo rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag 
[\[281b.5\]]byas pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/_de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang /_blo rgya mtsho 
[\[281b.6\]]bsags pa dang /_shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing nam yang brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[281b.7\]]pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_mchog chen po sbyin pa/_lag na pad+ma/_mchog tu snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legs so legs so/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[282a.2\]]phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod 
[\[282a.3\]]pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang /_gang yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_
[\[282a.4\]]bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dang /_skyes pa'am/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog par 'tshal ba dang /_bstan par 'tshal ba dang /_bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 
[\[282a.5\]]'tshal ba dang /_mtha' dag rdzogs par bsgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol du phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran par bgyi zhing /_yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o/_
[\[282a.6\]]de nas dran pa tsam gyi mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/_ri bo Ta la'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[282a.7\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]pa/_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnam pa rgya chen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di yang bkug par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/_
[\[282b.2\]]thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pas dngos grub dam pa rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/_ji ltar shin tu rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa 
[\[282b.3\]]mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang /_blo dang mdangs dri ma ma mchis par 'jug par bgyid de/_zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing /_kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang /_'jam pa dang /_zab pa dang /_tshig rnam 
[\[282b.4\]]par dag par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'am ci'i dbyangs dang /_sgra snyan pa dang /_dbyangs mnyen pa dang /_dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing ka la ping ka'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/_/ji ste dus gsum du lan gsum du dran par bgyi na gsang sngags dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_dkyil 
[\[282b.5\]]'khor dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs dang log 'dren dang bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_sngon 
[\[282b.6\]]gyi sgrib pa dang /_dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi mod la bdag rang dang /_
[\[282b.7\]]rang gi gnas kyi khang pa dang /_slob ma dang /_bsnyen bkur dang /_'khor dang bcas pa mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/_yongs su ma dag pa'ang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dri ma dang bcas pa'ang shin tu dri ma ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'ang zhe sdang dang 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'ang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang bcas pa'ang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa dang bcas pa'ang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/bgegs dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang log 'dren 
[\[283a.2\]]gyis yongs su zin pa'ang bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_bdud la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sems kyi sdig pa'ang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/thun mong ma yin pa'ang thun mong du gyur cing bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs ma mchis par 
[\[283a.3\]]yang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/smyung ba ma bgyis pa'ang smyung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi gnas dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa'ang tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas 
[\[283a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba mi spyod pa'ang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/chos mi spyod pa'ang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams mi bgyid pa'ang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/dul ba'i spyod pa mchis pa'ang dul ba'i spyod pa chen 
[\[283a.5\]]po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags ma mthong ba dang /_dam tshig ma mchis pa'ang dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags mthong ba dang /_dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi gnas dang 'khor thams cad 
[\[283a.6\]]du sangs rgyas dang /_chos mthong bar mi 'tshal ba'ang byang chub dang /_chos dang /_dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsams pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du 
[\[283a.7\]]ma gyur pa'ang byang chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa dang 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]yongs su gtong ba dang mi 'bral zhing sbyin pa dang /_yongs su gtong ba dang /_sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa dang mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po'i go cha 
[\[283b.2\]]brtan pa bgos par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan dang mi 'bral zhing bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab dang thabs cad la mkhas pa zhan pa'ang shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags 
[\[283b.3\]]nyams pa'ang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang /_cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad du snying du sdug pa dang /_bla mar 
[\[283b.4\]]bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro/_/de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/_
[\[283b.5\]]mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/_dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid do/_/dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par bgyid do/_/sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs 
[\[283b.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_don dam pa dang /_stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'dis 'dres par bgyid/_yangs 
[\[283b.7\]]par bgyid/_dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do/_/de ltar mthu che ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_yon tan chen por brjod pas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyid do/_/de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun tu sogs par bgyid pas rig sngags 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags so/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_
[\[284a.2\]]dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_gzhan du yang rung ba/_bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis dgug par 
[\[284a.3\]]'tshal ba dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'tshal na des cho ga 'di bgyi'o/_/gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos pa/_ba'i rnam lnga'i chu sa bsangs pa'i mchod phyir thogs btags pas ras dmar po'i 
[\[284a.4\]]skud pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongs su gzung ste/_mtshog ma dang /_spyi gtsug bcing ba dang /_gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba dang /_lag ngar gnyis su bcing ba dang /_de nas rked par bcings pas/_sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas sam/_
[\[284a.5\]]gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun nas zlum po legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa bgyi'o/_/de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas rnam par 
[\[284a.6\]]mdzes par thig gdab bcing tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri bar bgyi'o/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa rnam par phye ba/_shin tu mdzes pa/_gru bzhi kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o/_/dbus su pad+ma bgyi'o/_/'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_'dab ma thams cad 
[\[284a.7\]]la lcags kyu bri zhing dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/_/'od kyi phreng ba zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par bgyi'o/_/snying po'o dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po'ang bgyi'o/_/phyi rol gyi 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]dkyil 'khor kun du mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir rnam par phye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/_drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o/_/sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bar 
[\[284b.2\]]bgyi ste/_shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'chang zhi ba'i gzugs can bzhin 'dzum pa/_rdo rje 'gying bag can du 'dzin pa/_ri rab kyi steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/_/lho phyogs kyi sgor khro bo'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyi dang /_pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs 
[\[284b.3\]]pa/_me tog kha phye ba'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa'o/_/nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/_mig gsum pa ri'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/_/byang phyogs kyi skor don yod pa'i zhags pa gdong khro gnyer can/_pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/_pad+ma'i 'dab 
[\[284b.4\]]ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyu dang lhan cig mchis pa bri'o/_/dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu gos dang /_ba dan dang /_mda' dang /_rgyal mtshan kun gyis brgyan par bgyi'o/_/tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kho ra khor yug tu dkri bar bgyi'o/_/gtor ma thams cad dkar po gzhag 
[\[284b.5\]]go/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun du dngul dang gser gyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag go/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang /_'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang /_mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil ba'i snod bzhi dang /_dri'i snod bzhi dang /_dris 
[\[284b.6\]]bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang /_dngul gyi phog por a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_du ru ska'i bdug spos bsregs pa bzhi gzhag go/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang /_gtor ma'i snod bum pa yongs su bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_bdug 
[\[284b.7\]]pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog phor brgyad 'jigs pa med par gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu bzhi nas zla ba nya tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas 'bras yos dang /_yungs kar la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgya 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o/_/yungs kar dang /_dri chab la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor zhing dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du mar me drug 
[\[285a.2\]]cu rtsa bzhi spar bar bgyi'o/_/me tog ji snyed pa mang po dgram zhing kho ra khor yug tu phreng ba gzhag par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang /_phyogs bzhi dang /_steng dang /_'og 
[\[285a.3\]]tu gtor na dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcing ba dang /_spyi gtsug bcing ba dang /_bdag bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings 
[\[285a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa de thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor kun 
[\[285a.5\]]nas bsrung ba'i slad du gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_gzhon nu dang /_ku be ra dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang /_'khor dang bcas pa/_lcags kyu dang /_zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/_dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/_
[\[285a.6\]]'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/steng nas nam mkha' la tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_mtshan mo'i lha dang /_nyi ma 
[\[285a.7\]]dang /_zla ba rgyu skar dang bcas par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis phyag bgyi ba'i las bgyi ste/_rig sngags 'chang gis rtswa ku sha'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te/_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/_dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing /_me tog re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[285b.2\]]mdun du dor bar bgyi'o/_/de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas gtor bar bgyi'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pas 
[\[285b.3\]]dbul bar bgyi'o/_/ril bu re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bgyi'o/_/yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis la/_snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang /_thun tha ma'i nam nangs kar gya nom pa/_yid du 'ong 
[\[285b.4\]]zhing dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' bar bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing /_sgra mnyen pa dang /_snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_mi'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang gi sems brtan por bgyi 
[\[285b.5\]]zhing mchog tu dga' ba yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams kun tu mchi zhing snang bar 'gyur te/_nam mkha'i dkyil na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 
[\[285b.6\]]'od zer gyi gzugs su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lha'i tsan+dan dang /_go shiR+Sha'i tsan+dan dang /_tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang /_ga bur dang /_gla rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/_dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dri 
[\[285b.7\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba rmad du byung ba bai DUr+ya sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas par yang 'gyur te/_phyogs bcu kun tu bdug spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas snying po'i 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/_tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can/_ral pa'i thog tshugs kyis brgyan pa/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi pa/_
