[\[286a.2\]]pad+ma dang /_zhags pa thogs pa/_rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/_dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/_mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/_rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid kyis 
[\[286a.3\]]shin tu 'bar ba/_bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/_khru brgyad tsam gyi lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad+ma'i stan las langs te/_nam mkha' la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje chen po yid la 
[\[286a.4\]]bgyis pas dkyil 'khor kun du lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/_rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/_/lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin tu bzang po 'od zer bye ba brgya stong 
[\[286a.5\]]phrag stong gis legs par brgyan pa'i lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa spyi bor bzhag ma thag tu de nas rig sngags 'chang de nam mkha' la mchis te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa dang /_lcags 
[\[286a.6\]]kyu rgya chen po 'od zer snang ba bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed 'thob bo/_/kun du don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa 
[\[286a.7\]]don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/_gang gis gzungs thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton nyid du gnas so/_/gzhan yang pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang /_rdo rje'i rigs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rigs dang /_glang po che'i 
[\[286b.2\]]rigs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang /_gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang /_phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du gnas so/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur 
[\[286b.3\]]ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang /_mchog dang rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/_rig sngags 
[\[286b.4\]]'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa dang /_bsam pa smros shig dang /_mchog de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang /_mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing mchog yid la re ba thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[286b.5\]]gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba smra'o/_/lo legs pa dang /_lo nyes pa dang /_bde ba dang /_nad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_lhag par 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[286b.6\]]pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_rang gi dmag tshogs dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra bo dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_mi ngas dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'tshe ba dang /_gza' 'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mtshang 'du ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_g.yul 
[\[286b.7\]]'gyed pa dang /_char ches pa dang /_char dkon pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_tshe yongs su zad pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba gang /_'byor pa dang /_rgyud pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_'grub pa dang /_
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]mi 'grub pa dang /_bgegs dang /_bgegs med pa dang /_bdud kyi bar chad dang /_'bru 'phel ba dang /_nor 'phel ba dang /_nad mang ba dang /_nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de thams cad par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[287a.2\]]gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'jigs rten dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang 
[\[287a.3\]]mi ma yin pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya'i skye ba dang /_'chi ba de thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing de dag gi thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye ba dang /_klur skye ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang /_rgyal po nyid dang /_bud 
[\[287a.4\]]med dang /_skyes pa nyid dang /_bu rnyed pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs su skye ba dang /_rgyal rigs su skye ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rigs mthon po dang /_dma' ba dang /_

[\[287a.6\]]yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang /_sgrub pa dang /_grub pa de thams cad de la stsol bar bgyid de/_'di lta ste nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang /_zhing smra ba dang /_mgo sman gyi dngos grub dang /_mi snang ba dang /_mig 'phrul dang /_
[\[287a.7\]]gter smra ba dang /_phug tu 'jug pa dang /_nags su 'jug pa dang /_spo pa dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_dbab pa dang /_ro langs bslang ba dang /_nad zhi bar bya ba dang /_gos 'thob pa dang /_grong 'thob pa dang /_yul gyi bdag po nyid dang /_chu klung chen po rgal ba dang /_dug 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]bza' ba dang /_gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i dngos grub dang /_'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang /_dgug pa dang /_dran pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/_/gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/_/de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa 
[\[287b.2\]]thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing /_don yod pa'i zhags pas bcing bar 'gyur ro/_/bsams pa dang /_don du gnyer ba dang /_yid la re ba'i dgos pa de thams cad shin tu ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings nas thams cad drangs te

[\[287b.4\]]gyur te thams cad du gtso bor 'gyur/_thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal na gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/_nyal kar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug spos su phul te nyal na/_'phags pa spyan ras

[\[287b.6\]]'grus dang /_mdangs 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhing mthong bar 'tshal na/_de'i tshe shing arga'i 'o ma dang /_gu gul dang /_rgya skyegs kyis ril bur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/_tshangs pa la bdug spos su phul nas/_
[\[287b.7\]]tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na ma mchis shing mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rjes su stsol to/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar gyi tshangs pa'i gnas dang /_gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur zhing tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ro/_/lha'i gnas thams cad du mes po yin no zhes tshig mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad dang /_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_

[\[288a.3\]]sbyin sreg gi cho ga bgyi ste/_rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/_sna ma dang shing arka'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar ba la gu gul dang /_yungs kar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyi'o/_/brgya stong rdzogs 
[\[288a.4\]]pa dang /_sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so zhes smra'o/_/sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na rig sngags 'chang

[\[288a.6\]]su stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa mchog gtso bo dang dgos pa'i las sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des lha'i gnas su 
[\[288a.7\]]mchis pa la lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang /_pad+ma'i phye ma dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang /_lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas nag po chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/_zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas pad+ma sar pa'i phye ma dang /_gu gul dang /_ra'i khrag dang /_yungs kar dang /_zhun mar dang sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i

[\[288b.3\]]mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/sgrub pa'i cho ga bzang po 'dis bdag yongs su mgus rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang mchog rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o/_/mchog 'dod pa thams cad rjes su long

[\[288b.5\]]mngon sum du smras na/_gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'thob cing thams cad du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu lta zhing spyir thams 
[\[288b.6\]]cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang /_las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/_las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur te/_nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do/_/thams cad 
[\[288b.7\]]rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par 'tshal na de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/_gang na me tog gi shing ljon pa 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]mchis pa der mchis la/_zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas shin tu dri zhim pa'i dri'i shing gi me sbar bal pu shel tse dang /_ta kar dang /_spang spos dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_zhun mar dang /_sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg lan 
[\[289a.2\]]stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/_/gla rtsi dang /_ga bur dang /_tsan+dan gyi chus bsgos pa'i 'bras yos dang /_me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum pa sar pa brgyad stsal lo/_/dkar gsum gyi gtor mas bkang ba ga bur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum stsal lo/_/
[\[289a.3\]]me tog shin tu dri zhim po stsal bar bgyi zhing gla rtsi dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ga bur dang /_kun tu ru'i bdug spos stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal med khang du mchi zhing mdun na mchis te/_de mthong nas 
[\[289a.4\]]ma'am/_sring mo'am/_chung ma'am/_las byed pa'am/_mngag gzhug ma'am/_pho nya ma rnams ji lta bur ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de la smros shig dang /_ci ste mar gyur na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser 
[\[289a.5\]]dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_mal chas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/_/ci ste sring mor gyur na de'i tshe longs spyod thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/_/ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas kyang bkug ste/_yongs su 
[\[289a.6\]]longs spyad pa'i phyir yongs su spyod par bgyid cing phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyid do/_/ci ste chung mar gyur na de dang /_lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/_lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang btung ba dang /_longs spyod stsol bar bgyid 
[\[289a.7\]]do/_/ro bro ba'i mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod par bgyid do/_/lha rdzas kyi dri dang /_me tog dang phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_lha rdzas 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]kyi gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba yongs su gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/_/nor bu dang /_gser dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_shang ka shI la dang /_byi ru dang /_
[\[289b.2\]]dngul dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul skyog dpag tu med pa thob pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do/_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_phyugs dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo rab tu mang po mang por 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/_/mal cha'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol bar 
[\[289b.3\]]bgyid do/_/lha rdzas kyi chung ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/rig 
[\[289b.4\]]sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyi ste/_dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_rdo rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o/_/rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse 
[\[289b.5\]]bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o/_/gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de/_shin tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du las la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste mngag gzhug mar gyur na gnas gang du mngag pa de'i gnas thams 
[\[289b.6\]]cad du mchi ste/_dpag tshad stong gi pha rol du mchi zhing /_skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/_/thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid 'dren par bgyid do/_/dpag tshad stong gi pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_glang po che dang /_ma he dang 
[\[289b.7\]]rta dag 'gugs par bgyid de/_slar yang gtong bar bgyid do/_/bag yod pas bsgo bar bgyi ste/_bdag nyid shin tu ring po'i yul dang /_gnas su 'phen par bgyid/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'degs par bgyid de/_
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]der srog gi bar chad du 'gyur bar mi bgyid do/_/ji ste pho nya mor gyur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/_lha'i 'jig rten du mchi'o/_/klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi gnas su mchi'o/_/mi 'am ci'i gnas su 
[\[290a.2\]]mchi'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o/_/gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas su mchi'o/_/'byung po'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis nas slar mchi'o/_/skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing mchi'o/_/skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad du 
[\[290a.3\]]phyin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do/_/ji srid sa'i 'og gi bar du 'jug cing phyir yang mchi'o/_/bya ba shin tu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas yang las thams cad bgyi ste/_nyin gcig bzhin du mchod yon dang /_rkang pa bkru ba stsal bar bgyi'o/_/thams cad kyi 
[\[290a.4\]]gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa/_bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzhan gyis ma reg pa'i shing leb sar pa la gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing 
[\[290a.5\]]gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang /_'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/_/shing ka ra bI ra'i me sbar ba la yungs kar 
[\[290a.6\]]dang /_gu gul dang /_ra'i khrag dang /_zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang /_me tog dmar po stsal na gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/_rig sngags 'chang slongs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[290a.7\]]rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga'i ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no/_/nga'i las thams cad byed pa yin no/_/nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo de ltar legs so zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]de'i tshe yungs kar dang /_gu gul la yongs su bzlas nas mer gtor na de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dbyig stong stsol bar 'gyur/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur/_rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug 
[\[290b.2\]]par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang /_dben pa dang /_sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus 
[\[290b.3\]]bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad par bgyis la/_de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod yungs kar la bzlas pas bu mo de la lan 
[\[290b.4\]]stong rtsa brgyad brdeg par bgyi'o/_las yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/_gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/_thams cad du mchi 
[\[290b.5\]]par 'gyur/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste srin po dang /_srin mo dgug par 'tshal na gu gul dang /_ba lang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs 
[\[290b.6\]]na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te srin po dang /_srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/_ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/_ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gdugs gcig bzhin 
[\[290b.7\]]du dngul chu srang khri stsol bar bgyid do/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/_cha gcig ni dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o/_/cha gnyis pa ni gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang ngo /_/srin mo rnams la zan dang /_tshod sngon rlon pa'i gtor ma stsal bar 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro/_/de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/_shugs chen pos dgos pa thams cad grub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/gtor ma gtsang ma stsal 
[\[291a.2\]]bar bgyi'o/_/ji ste sha za dang /_sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na ba lang gi mkhris pa dang /_de'i song dang /_gu gul dang /_shing arka'i 'o ma sbyar te/_lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing /_lhag ma dang 'bags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/_sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun 
[\[291a.3\]]du mchis te/_ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/_las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/_/dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/_/dus gsum du gtor ma lhag ma'i gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar 
[\[291a.4\]]bgyi'o/_/nyin gcig bzhin du gser gyi dong tse brgya sngas su 'jog par 'gyur te/_des thams cad zad par bgyis na phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa 
[\[291a.5\]]des yungs kar dkar po dang /_ske tshe'i sa bon dang /_gi'u wang dang /_pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_lan tshwa bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas na phye ma'i rdzas su bgyis la yungs kar dang /_ske tshe'i sa bon dang /_sbrang rtsi'i sa bon lan cig mnyes 
[\[291a.6\]]la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_rgyal po'i sgo 'am/_lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/_lam po che'am/_grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do/_/rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug 
[\[291a.7\]]cing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid cing /_bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gang bslangs pa de ster te dngul dang /_gser dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_spud pa dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_'bru la sogs pa stsol 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]bar bgyid do/_/gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de'i yul gcig tu yang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/_rig sngags 
[\[291b.2\]]'chang des nas dang /_til dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyis na/_rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du mchod pa bgyid 
[\[291b.3\]]par 'gyur zhing bram ze thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na til dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_sran mu dag dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/_sbyin sreg 
[\[291b.4\]]stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bgyis na thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar bgyid do/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bgyid de ci bgyi ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dmangs rigs dbang du bgyi 
[\[291b.5\]]bar 'tshal na lan tshwa dang /_'bras sA lu'i phub ma dang /_su mu kha'i sa bon dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_zhun mar sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyis na dmangs rigs thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/dgra dang 
[\[291b.6\]]phyir rgol ba dang /_phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des shing mngar gyi shing gi me sbar ba la/_sa bon bdun dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong ba bgyi'o/_/brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang /_dgra 
[\[291b.7\]]dang phyir rgol ba dang /_phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na shing tsher ma can gyi me sbar ba la 'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]brgyad stong bgyi'o/_/brgyad stong rdzogs na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/g.yul 'gyed pa bzlog par 'tshal na ske tshe'i sa bon dang /_gu gul dang /_b+hang ga'i sa bon dang /_zho ga chu dang /_zhun mar dang 
[\[292a.2\]]sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar bzlog par 'gyur zhing /_thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des bdug pa 
[\[292a.3\]]'di sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi ste/_k+She ma ka dang shing mngar dang /_/tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang /_/mu ra ya k+Sha mu ra dang /_/b+hu ta ke shi mnyam par gzhal/_/phub ma dang ni pa la ka_/khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang /_/sbrul lpags dang ni yung rnam 
[\[292a.4\]]gnyis/_/b+ha ga'i sa bon ba lang mkhris/_/nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te/_/ra yi gcin gyis bsgos pa la/_/lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/_/bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di/_/thams cad du ni rigs pa ste/_/stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa 
[\[292a.5\]]bzhi gdon/_/gang dag sa steng gnas pa rnams/_/bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing /_/mi bzad gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing /_/sum cu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo/_/gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas dag 
[\[292a.6\]]dang /_/sdang ba'i srog chags chen po 'tshig_/gzhan yang sna tshogs dug bcas pa'i/_/srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba/_/dri tsam gyis ni dogs pa med/_/bdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na/_/der ni rims nad mi gnas te/_/nyin gcig pa 
[\[292a.7\]]yi rims dang ni/_/nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims/_/gang yang mi bzad khyab 'jug rims/_/de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing /_/skad cig gis ni gtan nas 'joms//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]rgyal po/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_de nas mig bsku ba'i sman brjod par bya'o/_/gdon thams cad 'joms pa gang gis mig bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/_mig bskus pa tsam gyis 
[\[292b.2\]]de thams cad med par 'gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o/_/mig gi nad ni ling tog dang /_skya bor gyur pa dang /_rab rib dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu zags pa dang /_tshag po dang /_ha sa rA dza dang /_byis pa'i mchi ma dang /_mig tu sme ba byung ba dang /_khrag dang /_
[\[292b.3\]]rlung dang /_bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dang /_rdul 'byung ba dang /_'brum bu dang /_g.ya' ba dang /_mig skams pa dang /_mdongs pa dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_kha nad dang /_kha na ba dang /_dpral ba na ba de dag thams cad 
[\[292b.4\]]'joms par 'gyur ro/_/mig sman gyis mig bskus pa tsam gyis rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_nad thams cad sel ba dang /_mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na mig sman 
[\[292b.5\]]mchog tu grub pa/_bgegs thams cad sel ba dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/_thams cad du rgyal bar byed pa/_mig sman rtag tu mchog tu dkon pa/_gsad pa la thug pa thar bar byed pa/_
[\[292b.6\]]btson ra nas gang thar bar byed pa/_rgyal po dag gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur te/_nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin yongs su skyong zhing gnas pa/_dug thams cad mod la med par byed pa ni/_mig sman mchog yin no/_/bsam pa ngan cing 
[\[292b.7\]]sdang ba'i sems can dang /_dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_'gyed pa dag mig sman gyis bskus pas mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so/_/ma he gtum po dang /_glang po che dang /_rlung dang /_ser ba dang /_steng ga mthon po nas g.yang du ltung ba 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]dang /_me'i phung po dang /_khyim rdib pa dang /_g.yang sar ltung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bskus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_gzhan yang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de 'di la dogs par mi bya'o/_/yung ba dang /_skyer pa dang /_na phe sham 
[\[293a.2\]]dang /_pi pi ling dang /_shring ga be ra dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_ldong ros dang /_gur gum la sogs pa'i mig sman dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_spang spos dang /_rgya mtsho'i sbu ba dang /_dung phye dang /_'di rnams lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor 
[\[293a.3\]]byas pa la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te ga bur dang /_gla rtsi bsnan pa'i mig bsku ba'i sman lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/_mig bskus na dri ma thams cad sel zhing sdig pa dang /_gzhan sdug bsngal 
[\[293a.4\]]thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/mun pa thams cad kyi nang du nyi ma bzhin du skye bo thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ril bu bshad par bya ste/_sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa/_nad thams cad sel bar 'grub pa/_bgegs thams 
[\[293a.5\]]cad med par byed pa/_gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/_mod la dug thams cad med par byed pa/_nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel ba/_bcings pa thams cad gcod par byed pa/_g.yul thams cad 
[\[293a.6\]]las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/_dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/_rtag tu dug thams cad 'joms pa/_rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/_nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ba/_rgyal po dang /_rkun po dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_dug dang /_glang 
[\[293a.7\]]po che med par byed pa/_sbrul ma rungs pa dang /_byi ba'i dug gis 'jigs pa dang /_khyim 'jigs pa dang /_ri snyil ba dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dom la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_bcings pa'i tshe 'gro bar dka' ba 'byung 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]ba dang /_nad dang rims 'joms pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa/_tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu ma rnams mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste/_gang gis ril bu bcangs na thams cad du rgyal 
[\[293b.2\]]ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_rnam par log 'dren gyis ma yin no/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed ma rungs pa rnams ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/'dis byis pa 
[\[293b.3\]]gsod par mi byed do/_/sman 'di la reg pa tsam gyis khyim der dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_na ba thams cad dang /_nad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_'brum phran mched pa dang /_shu ba dang /_g.yan 
[\[293b.4\]]pa dang /_mdze dang /_'brum bu mched pa dang /_sha bkra la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lus thams cad du zhugs pa'i nad la chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam la sogs pas yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rtag tu 
[\[293b.5\]]rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas thams cad du song ba la sbyar ba byas na thams cad 'kho bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rdzas su bya ba ni pu shel tse dang /_tsan+dan dang /_rgya spos dang /_ru rta dang /_rdo dre ga 
[\[293b.6\]]dang /_pad tra dang /_tsha ma ka dang /_sha mi dang /_pad+ma pa tra dang /_ut+pa la dang /_nal da dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_sug smel dang /_btsod dang /_su ga ri dang /_ra dza n+ya rnam gnyis dang /_spr-i ka dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_
[\[293b.7\]]gur gum la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_de dag kun bsres te/_zhib mor btags la/_kha ra dang /_chu dang /_sbyar bas ril bu byas la gsang sngags brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/_grib ma la skams pa de ni sman grub pa yin te/_thams cad 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]rgyal bar byed cing dge ba yin no/_/rnga dang /_rnga bo che dang /_dung la ril bu mchog bskus te/_gnas mthon por song ste/_dung gi sgra dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dug dang 
[\[294a.2\]]bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur te dogs par mi bya'o/_/nad thams cad dang /_mi ngas thams cad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_lo nyes thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bde zhing lo legs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can 
[\[294a.3\]]dmyal ba la gzhol bdag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste/_bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thams cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang /_don 
[\[294a.4\]]grub pa bla na med pa yin no/_/nor dang 'bru rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no/_/thams cad mchod pa dang /_rtag tu tshig gzung ba 'os par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med rnams kyi gnang 
[\[294a.5\]]chen du 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu dpal dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang /_shi nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[294a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i 
[\[294a.7\]]gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_bklags pas 'grub pa/_don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dam tshig grub pa lags so/_/gang gis pad+ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang /_phyag rgya dang /_rim par phye ba dang /_gsang sngags dang /_cho ga dang /_bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi thams cad kyi 
[\[294b.2\]]dam tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs dang /_rdo rje'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje rin po che rtse mo'i mchog dang 
[\[294b.3\]]po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig las thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba de rig sngags 'chang ba de thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang /_sems can thams cad la 
[\[294b.4\]]rjes su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig 
[\[294b.5\]]pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o/_/grub pa yang dag par rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[294b.6\]]sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin tu yongs su dag pa yin te/_legs so legs so/_/rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs 
[\[294b.7\]]dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams la bstan par bya ba shod cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i grub 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]pa dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so/_/ngas kyang de bzhin du de dag byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[295a.2\]]don yod pa'i rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/_don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/_sgrub pa dam pa ni sa dang ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni shin tu mdzes pa shin tu 'jam por bya'o/_/tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye 
[\[295a.3\]]ba ni grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o/_/tshon sna tshogs kyis bri ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni mnyam par thig gis dbye bar bya ste/_sgo bzhir cha dbye bar bya'o/_/chu zheng du khru bzhi tshad tsam du dbye bar bya'o/_/dbus kyi 
[\[295a.4\]]dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni tshad khru do par byas la/_tshon sna lnga'i sga la bu dang /_tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o/_/pad+ma kha bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang /_lcags kyu dang /_
[\[295a.5\]]pad+ma gnas par bya ba ni klu mgo gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang /_lag pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i lcags kyus 'dzin pa dang /_'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o/_/tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/_/pad+ma kha bye ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu 
[\[295a.6\]]ni lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sgal bur bya'o/_/nang dang phyi'i bar du ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o/_/zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni 
[\[295a.7\]]mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o/_/mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi sga la bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/_mtshon cha sna tshogs dang /_me tog rnams so/_/kun la 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang /_'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o/_/phyag 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]gi phyag rgya'i phyir rol gyi sgal bu ni stegs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar ni rgyal po chen po bzhi go bgos pa lcags kyu dang /_mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa 'bar ba'i nang 
[\[295b.2\]]na 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te/_pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad+ma la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/_/sgo bzhi gnas su 
[\[295b.3\]]pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/_lhor ral pa gcig ma/_nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/_byang du pho nya mo dang /_rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni me tog gi stegs bu 
[\[295b.4\]]'dra ba bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun du ba'i lci bas bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor kun du bum pa gang ba dang /_dar btags pa'i mda' dang /_dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug 
[\[295b.5\]]pa'i chu dgang ba dang /_bdug pa'i snod kyis brgyan pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /_dri chab dang /_mchod yon gyi chab dang /_'bras bu dang /_yon chab dang /_dngul gyi me tog dang /_gser gyi me tog dang /_zangs kyi 
[\[295b.6\]]me tog gis 'jigs pa med par brgyan par bya'o/_/mu tig dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che bai DUr+ya dang /_sngon po dang /_margad dang /_pad+ma rA ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to/_/dkyil 'khor kun du dung dang /_bil ba dang /_rtswa dar 
[\[295b.7\]]b+ha dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang /_sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]thog thag tu ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang /_bum bu dang /_byam bum dang /_bum pa dang /_rte gu dang /_kham phor dang /_bum pa gang ba rnams byas te gzhag go_/pog phor dang /_gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang /_/
[\[296a.2\]]me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/_/phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/_/tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags/_/tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur bu la btags pa gzugs par bya/_kun du mar me'i phreng ba dang /_mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[296a.3\]]mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_du ru ska dang /_spr-i ka rnams kyis bdug pa ga bur dang /_gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang /_sa la ki dang /_
[\[296a.4\]]kun tu ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos sar pa bgos te/_gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang /_lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang /_slob ma gzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[296a.5\]]dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya dang /_ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/_mkhas pas phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen po ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mtshams bcing ba dang /_phyogs bcing 
[\[296a.6\]]ba dang /_spyi gtsug bcing ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_dam tshig dang /_khrus bya ba dang /_gos bgo ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bskor ba dang /_de dag thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sbyin sreg dang /_bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhi 
[\[296a.7\]]ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_mngon spyod dang /_dgug pa dang /_spyan drang ba dang /_gshegs su gsol ba dang /_de bzhin du yang dag par sprul pa dang /_las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]par 'chang zhing des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro/_/bgrang phreng dang /_mkhrig ma'i gdu bu dang /_srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang /_rtswa dar b+ha dang /_yungs kar dang /_chu dang bsre ba dang /_rtswa dar b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te/_
[\[296b.2\]]skyil mo krung bcas nas las bya zhing pad+ma dang /_mchod yon gyi dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang /_de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du nges par bya'o/_/don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/_grub pa mchog dang /_
[\[296b.3\]]las thams cad sgrub pa dang /_gang dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o/_/gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo/_/gsang sngags gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' bo gcig tu 
[\[296b.4\]]bklags pas grub pa'i mchog_/sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin 
[\[296b.5\]]par byed pa yin no/_/don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'dag cing sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang /_sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa rnams sngar bsags pa rnams rnam 
[\[296b.6\]]par zhig par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang /_'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang /_shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/_pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang /_kha ton byed na tshe 
[\[296b.7\]]rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /_gang zhig 'chad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi/_
[\[297a.2\]]gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing bla ma dang /_chos can dang /_nor gyi mchod pa dang /_sems can kun gyis mchod par 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang /_
[\[297a.3\]]gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 
[\[297a.4\]]'gyur zhing rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang /_sems can thams cad dga' ba dang /_byams par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis lus can shin tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod par 
[\[297a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro/_/dpal gyis dus rtag tu 'bar zhing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[297a.6\]]pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lcags kyu'i dkyil 
[\[297a.7\]]'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang /_dkyil 'khor de lta bu la me tog gcig dbul ba dang /_ril bu gcig tsam gyi bdug pa dbul ba'i sems can de dag ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/bdug 
[\[297b.2\]]pa mang po rnam par phye ba'i sprin las tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang /_gor shir sha'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin rim par phye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[297b.3\]]thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par mdzad de/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no/_/de dag gis me tog dang /_bdug pas dkyil 'khor 
[\[297b.4\]]mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu 
[\[297b.5\]]mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu mthong bar bzhed par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzhin 'dzum 
[\[297b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha'i bu rnams srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_skyob pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba chen por 
[\[297b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir song 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_dug thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang /_rims dang /_mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro/_/nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas 
[\[298a.2\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad las phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar ba'i 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs 
[\[298a.3\]]pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shin bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dag gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang /_de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags pa de dag lhag 
[\[298a.4\]]ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du'o//_//de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod 
[\[298a.5\]]par bya ste/_gnas thams cad du bla na med pa grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg par byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa de bzhin du nad thams cad sel ba/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/_'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par 
[\[298a.6\]]thar ba/_sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor chen por kun du lung bstan pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_mchog tu dkon pa yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/_bkra shis thams cad sgrub pa/_bsod 
[\[298a.7\]]nams thams cad sogs pa/_myur du nor dang /_'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/_sgrub pa yang dag pa grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'grub pa/_bzlas brjod 'grub pa/_yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/_pha rol tu phyin 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nam byang chub yang dag par thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs 
[\[298b.2\]]chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang /_sngon gyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_ngan song las thar bar 
[\[298b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_dmyal ba mi bzad pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs kun du bde ba dang /_da ltar gyi 'di la mchog tu dkon pa'i bde ba lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bkren pa yang longs spyod dang /_phyug po mtshungs pa med pa 
[\[298b.4\]]mchog mod la thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/_/'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po rnams kyis bla mar bya zhing rtag tu dus thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong dang /_bram ze 
[\[298b.5\]]dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/_sdug cing thams cad bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug pa ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na med pa yin no/_/
[\[298b.6\]]ras gru bzhi khyon kun khru gang ngam/_khru do pa la legs par btags pa/_ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po shin tu dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa'am/_yang na dar yug gam/_yang na mon dar ram/_shun phrags la zla ba 
[\[298b.7\]]yar gyi tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa bri bar bya'o/_/snod gtsang ma sar pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma ma yin pa blugs te/_ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri ba ni tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o/_/dbus su 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/_spyan gsum pa/_zhal gsum pa/_mchog tu bzang ba/_zhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa/_dbu lcang lo dang thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/_cod 
[\[299a.2\]]pan la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/_dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o/_/me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/_/phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o/_/cod pan la zla ba phyed pa dang 'dom gang bya'o/_/kun du lcags kyu bya'o/_/kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o/_/phyag bzhi la phyag 
[\[299a.3\]]g.yon na pad+ma'i lcags kyu g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/_g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu/_g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o/_/gdan seng ge'i pad+mo bya'o/_/g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o/_/
[\[299a.4\]]g.yas su dkar mo ste/_me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_pad+ma la bzhugs pa/_'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po 
[\[299a.5\]]che'i shing lcug phran dang /_yal ga dang /_chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/_/ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_rma bya dang /_bya ka la ping ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o/_/shing gi gong spyi bo la khang 
[\[299a.6\]]bu rtseg ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o/_/g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i gad mo 'byin 
[\[299a.7\]]pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa skra gyen du brdzes pa/_lcang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba/_nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o/_/smad du gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/_/gong du dbang po dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams btud de/_bcom 
[\[299b.2\]]ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/_/g.yon du dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byad pa'o/_/g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[299b.3\]]phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang /_pog phor dang /_bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa bya'o/_/phyogs bzhi ngos kun du ris bskor ba la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs sna tshogs 
[\[299b.4\]]kyis gang ba/_shing sna tshogs me tog dang /_lcug ma can bya'o/_/rdzing bu chu zags pa bya'o/_/'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o/_/gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang /_grul bum gyi shing bya'o/_/tshul de ltar don yod pa'i 
[\[299b.5\]]lcags kyu ras la bris te/_gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhag la rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod par bya'o/_/a ga ru dang /_du ru ska dang /_tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i 
[\[299b.6\]]rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o/_/nyi ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_mnar med par gzhol ba dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 
[\[299b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang /_nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang /_rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/dri ma dang bral 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' yang log par 
[\[300a.2\]]ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis rgyun du bsrung zhing rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/ras kyi sku 
[\[300a.3\]]gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba 
[\[300a.4\]]byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[300a.5\]]de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi 
[\[300a.6\]]ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[300a.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang /_sems can gyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang /_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]bar bgyi ba'i phyir don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/_rig sngags 'chang thams cad 
[\[300b.2\]]kyi khro bo chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang /_bsam pa dang /_yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ma rungs pa brtson pa med pa/_brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams 
[\[300b.3\]]cad dang /_'byung po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad thag 'jug pa/_ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad rab tu dul 
[\[300b.4\]]bar mdzad pa/_bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /_phung bar byed pa/_sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang /_gcod pa dang /_'bigs 
[\[300b.5\]]pa dang /_rdung ba dang /_gtor ba dang /_lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni/_bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad+mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 
[\[300b.6\]]mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/_dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa 'chos par byed pa/_dam tshig 'dzin pa gnas thams cad la rjes su skyong ba ste/_de ni sgrub par byed pa/_sgrub pa 'grub 
[\[300b.7\]]par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlab cing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[301a.2\]]phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab ste/_ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs so/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing 
[\[301a.3\]]byin gyis brlabs kyis smros shig_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad gsang ba pa lag na rdo rje dang /_rdo rje 'chang ba dang /_rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri 
[\[301a.4\]]za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba smros shig_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang /_
[\[301a.5\]]mchog grub par byos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bsgo zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying dga'/_smin ma bskums/_dpral ba phyed khros par 
[\[301a.6\]]byas/_gdong khro gnyer du byas/_mche ba ni gtsigs/_spyan ras gzigs kyi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/_dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[301a.7\]]gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/drang srong chen 
[\[301b.2\]]po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[301b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[301b.4\]]gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M bi kr-i ta/_ba da na/_ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA b+ha yaM ka ra/_ma hA daMSh+Ta/_aT+TaT+Ta hA sa/_dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/_mA la ma ha rau dra/_rU pa b+ha yaM ka ran/_ha na ha na/_
[\[301b.5\]]sarba duSh+Ta/_yak+Sha/_rAk+Sha sA na/_da ha da ha/_sarba duSh+Ta/_nA gA nA na/_pa tsa pa tsa/_sarba duSh+Ta/_big+h+naM bi nA ya kA na/_pA ta ya/_pA ta ya/_sarba duSh+Ta sa twA nAM/_b+ho b+ho ma hA kro d+ha rA dza/_ma Ni ka na ka/_badzra/_bai DUr+ya/_a lang kr-i ti/_sha 
[\[301b.6\]]rI rA na/_badzra pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/_ma hA pad+ma ang ku sha_/b+hu dzA ya/_ma hA pad+ma A sa nA ya/_ma hA pad+ma bi ka tsa gab+hA ya/_a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/_ba la pa rA kra mA ya/_sa ha sra/_bir+yA ya/_sarba b+hU ta/_b+ha yaM ka rA ya/_sarba 
[\[301b.7\]]de ba b+ha ba na/_kA ma pa uta b+ha bA ya/_ma hA bi kr-i ta/_ba da nA ya/_nA ra sing ha mu khA ya/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_badzra dz+wa la/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ma hA tsaN+Da/_be ga d+ha ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsa tsa ra/_ni sha tsi ra/_I shwa ra/_b+h+r-i ku TI mu kha/_hUM hUM 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]phaT/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa pra ra/_sarba pA pa/_kilbi Sha ha ra/_ma hA ma Ni/_te dza d+ha ra/_pad+ma ha sta/_o~M pad+ma ang ku sha b+hu dze/_ta rA ya/_man+t+ra ma ya/_bi g+hAM/_shA sa ya/_duSh+TA na nA sha ya/_sarba pA pA ba ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/_
[\[302a.2\]]pA sha ha stA ya swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/_sa mA shwA sa kA ya swA hA/_a mo g+ha ba ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/_kro d+ha rA dza b+ha yaM ka rA ya swA hA/_brah+ma be Sha d+ha rA ya swA hA/_trai lo kya pU dzi tA ya swA hA/_ya ma/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_na maH_kr-i twa ya swA hA/_badzra 
[\[302a.3\]]d+ha ra pU dzi tA ya swA hA/_ma hA kA la ma tr-i ga Na/_ban di ta/_pU dzi tA ya swA hA/_de ba ga Na/_ban d+hi twa ya swA hA/_nA ga A kar+ShA ya swA hA/_o~M b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_sarba maN+Da la a d+hiSh+Thi ta sa ma ya swA hA/_sarba mu drA a d+hi Sh+Thi ta mu 
[\[302a.4\]]drA yai swA hA/_o~M a mo g+ha ba ra de/_ma hA daMSh+T+rA/_aM ku sha badzre hU~M/_ma hA pad+ma/_A shwa sa d+ha ra na mo stu te a mo g+ha aM ku sha hU~M phaT swA hA/_khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang /_lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang /_ri rab dang bcas 
[\[302a.5\]]pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang /_gzhal med khang rnams kun tu 'gul lo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/ma rungs pa'i klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin 
[\[302a.6\]]po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za thams cad dang /_bdud la sogs pa dang /_log 'dren ma rungs pa dang /_gdon ma rungs pa rnams kha bub tu 'gyel lo/_/ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun du tshig ste 'bar ba/_kun du 'bar/_rab 
[\[302a.7\]]tu 'bar/_'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang /_ngu zhing 'gre ldog ste/_tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo /_/lha thams cad shin tu 'khrugs shing skrag go/_/bdud kyi rigs rnams bred nas khas btags so/_/'jig 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kun du 'khrugs so/_/rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu dang /_rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun du 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar ro/_/gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag 
[\[302b.2\]]brgya gnas pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang /_ril gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun du 'khrugs skrag cing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gdungs so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag 
[\[302b.3\]]go/_/nag po chen po dang /_tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang /_ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro/_/gnas la brten pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro/_/'bar kun du 'bar te gnas dang bcas 
[\[302b.4\]]par sreg go/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang /_klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro/_/lha rdzas kyi rgyan spud pa sna tshogs dang /_chos gos kyi char ba 'bebs 
[\[302b.5\]]so/_/mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan+dan gyi chu'i char pas sa la chag chag 'debs so/_/lha rdzas kyi gser dang /_dngul gyi me tog dang /_rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_/de nas gnod 
[\[302b.6\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/_shin tu 'gying bag tu seng ge'i 'gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas byang chub 
[\[302b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma la 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]phul te/_zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'di dbul longs spyod pa'i phyir dang /_bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen po bzhes su gsol/_gang gis bdag yun ring por 
[\[303a.2\]]phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur lags so/_/khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang /_gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang /_
[\[303a.3\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za ma rungs pa dang /_log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te/_lus kun du tshig cing rab tu 'bar nas kha bub tu 'gyel cing sreg go/_/shi la thug pa dang srog skams par 
[\[303a.4\]]'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o/_/bcang ngo /_/bsgom mo/_/mchod do/_/rgyas par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gang gi lag na khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[303a.5\]]rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa'am/_
[\[303a.6\]]lus la thogs pa'am/_lta ba'am/_dri ba'am/_tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bkur bar bgyi'o/_/spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/_/bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bsam 
[\[303a.7\]]pa dang /_yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_spra bar bgyi'o/_/rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[303b.2\]]lus la stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_gzi brjid bskyed cing bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o/_/dgra thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos 
[\[303b.3\]]dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa 'dra bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/dad pa dang /_gus pas dus kun du mchog tu mos par bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[303b.4\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so zhes smras te/_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog 
[\[303b.5\]]gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/_lag na rdo rje la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir dang /_dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su 
[\[303b.6\]]longs spyad pa'i phyir dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 
[\[303b.7\]]'dir 'dug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro/_/de nas phreng ba de nam mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]cad kyi dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ba/_dri ma med pa'i me tog de khang bu brtsegs pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/_'od 'tsher ba/_ka ba bzhi dang /_sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes pa/_gru bzhi lham pa/_chu zheng 
[\[304a.2\]]shin tu rgya che ba/_shin tu nang yangs pa/_me tog ka da l+ya dag gis mdzes pa/_gzhal med khang sna tshogs yongs su gyur te gnas so/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'i steng thad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che 
[\[304a.3\]]sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang du shin tu gnas so/_/de'i lag na rdo rje'i dbu'i steng gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin tu gnas so/_/de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[304a.4\]]phyug gi steng thog thag tu yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyis spras pa me tog ka da l+yas mdzes par byas te gnas so/_/khang bu brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor kun gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_
[\[304a.5\]]lus ngan po dang /_dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de dag kyang 
[\[304a.6\]]'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa'i phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 
[\[304a.7\]]khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba spa ba bzhin dang /_nam mkha' la zla ba nya ba ni rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba spa ba bzhin du spa bar gnas so/_/me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]med pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang /_lha rdzas kyi pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_ma hA man dA ra ba dang /_me tog ro tsa dang /_ma hA ro tsa dang /_me tog sa la dang /_tA la ka dang /_me tog ta ma la dang /_tsam 
[\[304b.2\]]pa ka dang /_me tog a d+hi mu ka ta dang /_me tog a sho ka dang /_me tog pa ta la dang /_me tog nI la dang /_ma hA nI la dang /_me tog gan d+ha bar+Sha ka dang /_me tog su man dang /_ta ra Na dang /_ku a ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyun phab 
[\[304b.3\]]bo/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang /_lha rdzas kyi chos gos spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du char 'bab cing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do/_/de ltar na cho 'phrul 
[\[304b.4\]]che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo /_/rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkha' la sgra 'byung ngo //_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_de nas de 
[\[304b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/_
[\[304b.6\]]rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/_sdig pa thams cad sreg pa bshad pa legs so legs so/_/'di ni phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis 
[\[304b.7\]]dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/_yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur/_gnas thams cad gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/_
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya che ba'i chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/_las grub pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 
[\[305a.2\]]khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/_dpung che ba brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gis lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po 'gul bar byed 
[\[305a.3\]]pa lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te/_rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te/_'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/_drag po gzi brjid drag po stobs che ba/_pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba 
[\[305a.4\]]de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[305a.5\]]chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsregs so/_/
[\[305a.6\]]gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsregs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhigs te tshig cing zhu bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bdag la 
[\[305a.7\]]skyob pa su lags/_dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig go/_/dus kyi zhags pas bcings so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdags su gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro 
[\[305b.2\]]po'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su song shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[305b.3\]]gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_skyob pa dang /_rten du 'gyur te/_gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/kye gnod sbyin chen 
[\[305b.4\]]po myur ba myur bar song ste skyabs su 'gro bar byos shig_/de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs gtsug phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[305b.5\]]dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing brgyal nas lag pa brkyang ste zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bskyab tu 
[\[305b.6\]]gsol/_thugs rje chen po bdag bskyab tu gsol/_bdag la srog stsal bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang bcas 
[\[305b.7\]]pa srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/shes pa ni stor/_stobs dang brtson 'grus spro bar byed pa ni nyams na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gso bar bgyid/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig_/nga ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig_/gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 
[\[306a.2\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par gtse bar byas/_khyod kyis bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo mang po ni zos na khyod kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang po ni nyams par byas/_khyod kyis rig sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor 
[\[306a.3\]]dang /_cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byas/_grub pa rnams ni med par byas/_ma grub pa rnams kyang med par byas/_skal ba can mang po ni med par byas/_skal ba med pa ni yod par byas/_mi 'tshe ba dang /_srog dang longs spyod kyi 
[\[306a.4\]]bde ba ni med par byas/_'tshe ba dang srog rnam par 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/_khyod kyis legs par bshad pa ni yongs su bor/_khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang /_ser sna ni mang du byas/_rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang /_sems 
[\[306a.5\]]can thams cad la khyod nag po dang /_rnam par 'jig par rab tu gnas/_khyod kyis ngan sems thams cad ni spel/_khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin tu mi bzad pa sdig pa can yin/_gshin 
[\[306a.6\]]rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na khyod gcig pu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/_rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang /_bslab 
[\[306a.7\]]pa dang /_sdom pa khas blang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos byos shig_/'on kyang kho bo khyod kyi skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o/_/khyod sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa dang /_bcings pa mi bzad pa dang /_me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]pa las ngas yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags 
[\[306b.2\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[306b.3\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rjes su sems pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 
[\[306b.4\]]'di dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_gang yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/don yod

[\[306b.6\]]dmigs te/_bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab par bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/lus la stobs dang /_spro ba dang /_gzi byin mang du bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de'i yul phyogs su 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 
[\[306b.7\]]'dru ba dang /_ma legs pa dang /_lo nyes dang /_mi ngas dang /_rims dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nyam thag par byed pa'i gdon dang bcas pa dang /_nad dang /_gcong dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/rab tu 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]bsal bar bgyi'o/_/rkun po dang /_zol po dang /_mi rgod dang /_gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/_/rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_

[\[307a.7\]]rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rigs so/_/sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen pos gzung bar bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]ba la bdag nyid kyis bsrung ba dang /_bcang bar bya'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de skyabs gsum la gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to/_/rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang

[\[307b.7\]]gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas mi smra bar gaN+DI brdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chan khyor ba bkang ste/_gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul ba byas na/_des khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu 'grub 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bsgrubs nas de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang /_dran pa gcig gis thams cad du 'grub par byas na thams cad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing /_don yod 
[\[308a.2\]]pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya'o/_/dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing dpag tshad tshun chad du rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du 'ong bar mi nus te/_rgyang ring po ring po na 'dug go/_/'di lan cig 
[\[308a.3\]]dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang /_cho ga dang /_sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po 
[\[308a.4\]]'phang du ri chen po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad tsam dang /_'og tu g.yang sar gyur te/_su yang 'ong mi nus so/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi 
[\[308a.5\]]ma yin pa dang bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar mi nus na/_mi ma yin pa phal pa dang /_bgegs dag log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas med do/_/rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub pa sgrub par byed do/_/bgegs med par 
[\[308a.6\]]thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing gdon bsal bar 'dod na/_gu gul dang /_yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/_gdon la bdug pa sbyin par bya'o/_/yungs kar gyis brdeg par bya'o/_/lan 
[\[308a.7\]]cig dran par bya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mos khros pas bsdigs par bya'o/_/bdug pa dang /_brdeg pa dang /_dran pa lhan cig tu byas na mod la gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/_sgra gcan 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]nam/_'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/_gdon gzhan 'ong bar lta ga la 'gyur te/_mod la gcig tu 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dang /_gdon gyis yongs su zin pa thams cad la dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/_spyi bor gtor zhing lan cig 
[\[308b.2\]]dran par byas na/_mod la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/na la da dang /_an da ni dra ka pa tsa dang /_gu gul dang /_ha sa dang /_ba la ka dang /_ma tu la dang /_pad+ma dang /_puSh+pa rnam gnyis dang /_ra dza ni dang /_yungs kar dang /_shing kun dang /_na ra pad+ma dang /_
[\[308b.3\]]bi sha ra dang /_tsan dri ka rnams ra'i gcin gyis sbrus te/_ril bu nas kyi 'dzel ma tsam byas te/_grib ma la bskams la/_lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la bdug pa mchog gi ril bu gcig bdug pa byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[308b.4\]]rten gyi khams ri dang nags tshal dang /_gcong rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo/_/rgya mtsho chen po ni 'khrugs so/_/ri rab chen po ni g.yos so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ni cher g.yos te 'gul lo/_/lha thams cad skrag go/_/lha ma
