[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]dug sna tshogs mi bzad pa yod pa la bdug pa'i dri tsam dang bskus pa dang /_ril bu tsam gyi mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te/_the tshom mi bya'o/_/'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_lu ta dang /_shu ba dang /_sha ba kra dang /_rkang shu dang /_mdze dang /_
[\[309a.2\]]'brum bu dang /_lhog pa rnam pa mang po dang /_nad mched pa dang /_lba ba'i phreng ba dang /_khong 'bras dang /_rkub na ba dang /_skran dang /_'khru ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_snying ga na ba dang /_gre ba 'gags pa dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_mig na ba dang /_
[\[309a.3\]]mgo bo na ba dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba la ril bus bskus pa tsam dang /_chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang /_bdug pa tsam dang /_mnams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma thag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/_thams cad la ril bu dam pa lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na thams cad du 
[\[309a.4\]]dgos pa thams cad byed pa bla na med pa yin no/_/shin tu char che ba dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char dang /_rlung dang /_ser ba dang /_'byung po dang /_ma mo'i gnas dang /_mtsho klu de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/char dus su 'bebs so/_/lo

[\[309a.6\]]mi bzad pa dang /_'das pa mi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang /_rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang /_me 'bar ba shin tu che ba dang /_zhag bzhi pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang /_grang ba'i rims sdug bsngal che ba dang /_rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 
[\[309a.7\]]'bar ba/_'khrug pa drag po mi bzad pa dang /_zlos pa'i rims gso dka' ba dang /_nyin gcig pa'i rims dang /_nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang /_nyin gsum pa'i rims dang /_de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]las gyur pa dang /_mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang /_rims rnying pa dang /_zug gzer dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_gcin snyi ba mi bzad pa dang /_rims thams cad la bdug pa tsam gyis the tshom med par rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' 
[\[309b.2\]]lding gi gdon dang /_gang dag mi'am ci'i gdon dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang /_mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang /_gang dag gzhan mi'i gdon thams cad bdug pa bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro/_/lcags kyu'i gsang sngags 
[\[309b.3\]]dam pa lan cig dran par byas na/_skem byed dang /_skams pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_gdon ra za yag sh+mA dang /_bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang /_grib gnon dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba dang /_gang du gnod pa dang /_
[\[309b.4\]]'khrug pa dang /_nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdugs pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po khros pa dang /_gang zhig rkun po dang /_mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/_gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/_dogs pa mi 
[\[309b.5\]]bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang /_bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang /_gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/_chu chen pos khyer bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lcags 
[\[309b.6\]]kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang /_bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang bde zhing legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_dug gis ma yin/_gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/_de la 
[\[309b.7\]]byad kyis mi tshugs/_nad kyis ma yin/_nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no/_/gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang /_bdug pas bdag bdug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te/_'di la dogs pa mi bya'o/_/dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]mi sems can ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang /_'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rig sngags lan cig dran par byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/_mthong ba tsam la dogs par mi bya'o/_/gang zhig rig sngags 
[\[310a.2\]]'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te nyams pa dang /_blo zhan cing le lo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba med pa bdag nyid bdug pa dang /_
[\[310a.3\]]ril bu mchog gis bkru ba dang /_mig bsku ba dang /_mchog thig le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang /_dga' ba dang /_dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du stobs thogs pa med 
[\[310a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du mchog grub pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen 
[\[310a.5\]]po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gcig nas ril bu bdun blangs pa las khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang 
[\[310a.6\]]ba'am/_gzhan gang yang rung ba nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze bkren pa sdug phongs pa'i bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mo'i don du ril bu gcig gis khrus bya/_gcig gis bdag bdug_/gcig gis gos bdug_/gcig ni ba'i rnam lnga dang sbyar te 
[\[310a.7\]]btung bar bya/_gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor gzhag_/gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/_ril bu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur/_bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/_rgud pa 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/_/rma dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_de bzhin du chag grugs dang /_bgegs kyis zin pa dang /_gdon ra za yag sh+mAs zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/_dogs par mi bya'o/_/sgrib pa 
[\[310b.2\]]thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/_sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/_gsang sngags bsten pa dang /_gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang /_bdug pa mchog gis bdugs par byas pas dogs par mi bya'o/_/mnar med pa 
[\[310b.3\]]dang /_mi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang /_dug dang /_sems can ma rungs pa dang /_las ngan pa dang /_phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyur ro/_/mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag tu myur du sreg par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dis 
[\[310b.4\]]bdug sa na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du sbyar ba la dogs par mi bya'o/_/'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang /_sgo chen por nam nangs ka dang /_mun sros kar 
[\[310b.5\]]bdug cang gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas na/_khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_grib gnon ma rungs pa dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung 
[\[310b.6\]]zhing ngus te/_kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang /_khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bab par 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslad par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_lha 
[\[310b.7\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang /_lus bsregs pa dang /_phyogs dang /_phyogs 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]mtshams 'khrul ba dang /_bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[311a.2\]]bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang /_thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rjes su skyong ba dang /_dus thams 
[\[311a.3\]]cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do/_/khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o/_/thig le skar ma lta bu ni/_/lha yi nyi ma bzhin du dpa'/_/nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/_/bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar/_/mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du/_/
[\[311a.4\]]mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur/_/tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa ni/_/skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin/_/bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang /_/dpag med gzhal du med pa yis/_/lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur/_/mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong ltar/_/mtshan dang dpe byad 
[\[311a.5\]]bzang pos brgyan/_/ril bu bsten pa byas na ni/_/lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed/_/gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang /_/shin tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu/_/phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/_/rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang /_/kun tu bla 
[\[311a.6\]]med grub par 'gyur/_/cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang /_/gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang /_/dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi/_/rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te/_/kun du 'grub pa bla na med/_/gi'u wang dang /_gur gum dang /_ru rta cha bsnyams te sbyar la khro bo'i 
[\[311a.7\]]lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par gzhag pa/_khrus legs par byas pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]gi 'bru tsam byas te grib ma la bskams la/_gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa de'i/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o/_/smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs 
[\[311b.2\]]kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang /_
[\[311b.3\]]rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig mnyams pa dang /_rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang /_btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/sems can kun gus pa dang /_dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa 
[\[311b.4\]]la bya ba bzhin byed do/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang /_klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 
[\[311b.5\]]'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_tshe 'phel bar 'gyur 
[\[311b.6\]]ro/_/nad med pa dang /_rims nad med pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang /_sdig pa dang /_dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang /_dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad 
[\[311b.7\]]du rgyal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/dgra dang /_phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun du rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgor 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan 
[\[312a.2\]]pa bzang zhing mdzes pa blta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'phrig pa dang ldan pa/_dpal gyis shin tu dpa' zhing 'bar ba/_bzhin 'dzum pa/_lus ngo tsha tsha ltar byed pa/_'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/_spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin 
[\[312a.3\]]po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed do/_/rig sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o/_/rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o/_/gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran par bya zhing yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o/_/ci ste gzhon nu ma de 
[\[312a.4\]]rtug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba khro bo'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ba/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_skra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la ral pa cod pan gyis brgyan par ston na rig sngags 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o/_/khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o/_/yang yungs 
[\[312a.5\]]kar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/_de'i tshe de sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing kye rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum mo zhes sgra 'byin to/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang 
[\[312a.6\]]bas rjes su brtags te/_gal te kha chu dbu bar byung na/_rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na rlung gi phung bo bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 
[\[312a.7\]]'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing skra yid tsam 'khyil zhing 'khyil 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]ba/_rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing spen tog 'phyang ba dang /_mkhrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/_lus pad+ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyur ro/_/tshe bskal pa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa 
[\[312b.2\]]gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro/_/gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi khyim sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung 
[\[312b.3\]]po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug go/_/mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang /_bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[312b.4\]]te mtshog mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi bdag po'i lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur 
[\[312b.5\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun du spyod par 'gyur ro/_/tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thob par 'gyur ro/_/lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang 
[\[312b.6\]]g.yog tu bcas chung ma dang /_bu mo gzhon nu ma'am/_thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra ste/_rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang /_las bgyi ba dang /_dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/_/yo byad 
[\[312b.7\]]thams cad kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/klu'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu longs spyad pas brtse bar bgyi'o/_/lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas par bgyi'o/_/nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang /_
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shang ka shi la dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_gser dang /_mu tig dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_mar ka ta dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_shin tu bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog 
[\[313a.2\]]dang /_lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar bgyi'o/_/shin tu char ches pa gcad par bgyi'o/_/char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o/_/dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o/_/dus su char dbab pa dang /_dus su char ba'i rgyun 'byung bar 
[\[313a.3\]]bgyi'o/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang /_lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig dang bsam pa rjes su bskyang 
[\[313a.4\]]bar bgyi'o/_/dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur te/_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams cad kyi stobs kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/'thab cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stobs thogs pa 
[\[313a.5\]]med pa rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad 'di la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zham ring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_dngogs 'byin pa dang /_mtshang 
[\[313a.6\]]'dru ba dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/lto bar thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par byas la yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/_'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas 
[\[313a.7\]]ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sker thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu sker lan cig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan thob par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rgyal po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug chen po'i chen po thob pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/lag mthil du thig le byas te lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 
[\[313b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/_grong khyer gyi sgo la brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_mdun na gnas shing de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/grong de na 
[\[313b.3\]]skye bo gang dag gnas pa bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_'dug cing ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'dod pas de srid du thams cad ci bya ba thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/lag 
[\[313b.4\]]pa g.yon pa la bskus te/_rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yas pa la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod bya ste/_phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim 
[\[313b.5\]]thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing khyim na gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go/_/rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas te dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za thams cad mdun 
[\[313b.6\]]na gnas shing dbang 'gyur ba dang /_khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang /_thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi sgo thams 
[\[313b.7\]]cad phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba'i sman dang /_rtswa dang mgo lcogs kyi nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa blangs pa bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/dpal lha mo chen mo'i 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]nu ma'i bar du bsku zhing khros pas gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te/_bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas na dpal ldan lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/nor shin 
[\[314a.2\]]tu mang po rnyed pa sbyin par mdzad de/_dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu bdar la lan cig bzlas brjod 
[\[314a.3\]]byas te mig la bskus na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo'ang nyin par bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mchu'i thor to la thig le bya zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur 
[\[314a.4\]]ro/_/tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/_/kha nas ut+pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro/_/gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang /_ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyur ro_/gdon thams cad la thig le bya zhing lan cig gsang sngags dran par byas na mod la tshangs 
[\[314a.5\]]pa'i srin po la sogs pa'i bar du thams cad ngu zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad la thig le byas na yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/phrag pa gnyis la 
[\[314a.6\]]thig le bya zhing khro bo lan cig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas phu zhes byas na me 'bar bar 'gyur te/_ji tsam 'dod kyi 
[\[314a.7\]]bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus mtha' dag bsku zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/chu dang yungs kar 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang /_bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/_dri chus steng du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ral gri dang /_gtun shing dang /_dgra sta dang /_'khor lo dang /_mdung rtse gsum dang /_rdo rje dang /_tho ba dang /_
[\[314b.2\]]mda' bo che dang /_mdung la bsku zhing rjes su dran par byas na skad cig tu thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo la bskus na skra 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/dung la bskus te de gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang thos pa tsam 
[\[314b.3\]]gyis sems can thams cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang /_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ngan pa dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sprin logs su bus na rlung sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir 
[\[314b.4\]]bus na/_byur dang gnod pa thams cad dang /_lo nyes dang /_nad ma rungs pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po 
[\[314b.5\]]dang /_sha za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_skem byed dang /_grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags dang /_byad dang /_sbod gtong dang /_dug gi 
[\[314b.6\]]'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i sgor bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_dgra dang /_phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ba 
[\[314b.7\]]lang 'chi ba dang /_phyugs 'chi ba dang /_mi 'chi ba dang /_rta 'chi ba dang /_glang po che 'chi ba dang /_rnga mo 'chi ba dang /_byur dang /_lo nyes dang /_nad dang /_mig nad dang /_nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan cig dung 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]sgra bud cing bzlas brjod byas na/_bus pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/_klu'i gnas mtsho 'gram du bus na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/char ches pa'i tshe sprin logs su 
[\[315a.2\]]bus na shin tu char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshams chen po gcad na ri mthon po'i khar bus te/_ji tsam dung sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams chen po gcad par byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[315a.3\]]dkyil 'khor mtshams gcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa thams cad bya ba la sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba la nas dang yungs kar dang mar bsres la 
[\[315a.4\]]shing arka'i me bus te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun du zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan brgya rtsa 
[\[315a.5\]]brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyas pa byas na yungs kar dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres te/_sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun du rgyas pa 
[\[315a.6\]]chen por 'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/shing dri mi zhim pa'i me bus te/_'bras kyi phub ma dang /_
[\[315a.7\]]lan tshwa dang /_yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/_nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon spyod kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]gsang sngags grub par 'dod na 'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/_shing arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na rang gi khro bo'i gsang sngags sgrub pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/lan bcu bzhi 
[\[315b.2\]]byas na don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi 
[\[315b.3\]]grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rigs dang /_pad+ma'i rigs dang /_rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/_/gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/til dang /_'bras dang so ba dang /_
[\[315b.4\]]zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar rnams sbyar te chang pa bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'ang 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed 
[\[315b.5\]]cing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dbang du bya na 'bras sA lu dang /_til dang /_yungs kar dang /_gu gul dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams 
[\[315b.6\]]mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/klu char 'bebs par bya na 'bras yos dang /_yungs kar dang /_nA ga pus pa dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[315b.7\]]sbyin sreg byas na des na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par 'gyur te/_ji tsam 'dod par char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so/_/shin tu char che ba gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na shin tu char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi g.yul 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]bzlog par 'dod na ske tshe'i 'bru dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed cing mtshang 'dru ba thams cad la pri yang ku'i me tog dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang 
[\[316a.2\]]sbyar te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab rtsod dang /_'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la/_sran ku lan tha dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg lan nyi 
[\[316a.3\]]shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med dbang du bya na su ma na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sdig pa 
[\[316a.4\]]thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba des 'bras sA lu dang /_til dang /_yungs kar dang /_pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[316a.5\]]dag par 'gyur ro/_/'on te khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang /_yungs kar dang /_gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs 
[\[316a.6\]]par 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//shu b+hamastu//_//
